|[<span data-ttu-id="31858-689">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-689">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>](#videocaptureallowedurls)|<span data-ttu-id="31858-690">Sitios que pueden acceder a dispositivos de captura de vídeo sin solicitar permiso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-690">Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="31858-691">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-691">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>](#wpadquickcheckenabled)|<span data-ttu-id="31858-692">Establecer la optimización de WPAD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-692">Set WPAD optimization</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="31858-693">WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-693">WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>](#webappinstallforcelist)|<span data-ttu-id="31858-694">Configurar la lista de aplicaciones web instaladas por la fuerza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-694">Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="31858-695">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-695">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>](#webcomponentsv0enabled)|<span data-ttu-id="31858-696">Nombre de GP: volver a habilitar la API de componentes web v0 hasta M84.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-696">Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="31858-697">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-697">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>](#webdriveroverridesincompatiblepolicies)|<span data-ttu-id="31858-698">Permitir que el controlador de WebDrive reemplace las directivas que no sean compatibles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-698">Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (obsolete)</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="31858-699">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-699">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>](#webrtclocalipsallowedurls)|<span data-ttu-id="31858-700">Administrar la exposición de la dirección IP local por WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-700">Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>|

  ## <span data-ttu-id="31858-707">Directivas de configuración de Protección de aplicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-707">Application Guard settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-708">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-708">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-709">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-709">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-710">Contenedor proxy de la Protección de aplicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-710">Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-711">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-711">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-712">En Windows desde la versión 84 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-712">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-713">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-713">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-714">Configure los parámetros del proxy para la Protección de aplicaciones de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-714">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-715">Si habilita esta directiva, la Protección de aplicaciones de Microsoft Edge ignora otras fuentes de configuraciones de proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-715">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard ignores other sources of proxy configurations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-716">Si no configura esta directiva, la Protección de aplicaciones de Microsoft Edge utiliza la configuración del proxy del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-716">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard uses the proxy configuration of the host.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-717">Esta directiva no afecta a la configuración del proxy de Microsoft Edge fuera de la Protección de aplicaciones (en el host).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-717">This policy does not affect the proxy configuration of Microsoft Edge outside of Application Guard (on the host).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-718">El campo ProxyMode permite especificar el servidor proxy utilizado por la Protección de aplicaciones Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-718">The ProxyMode field lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-719">El campo ProxyPacUrl es una dirección URL a un archivo proxy. PAC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-719">The ProxyPacUrl field is a URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-720">El campo ProxyServer es una URL para el servidor proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-720">The ProxyServer field is a URL for the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-721">Si elige el valor "directo" como "Modo Proxy", todos los demás campos son ignorados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-721">If you choose the 'direct' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-722">Si elige el valor "auto_detect" como "ProxyMode", se ignorará todos los demás campos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-722">If you choose the 'auto_detect' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-723">Si elige el valor 'fixed_servers' como 'ProxyMode', se utiliza el campo 'ProxyServer'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-723">If you choose the 'fixed_servers' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyServer' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-724">Si elige el valor 'pac_script' como 'ProxyMode', se utiliza el campo 'ProxyPacUrl'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-724">If you choose the 'pac_script' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyPacUrl' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-725">Para obtener más información acerca de cómo identificar el tráfico de Protección de aplicaciones mediante proxy doble, visite [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-725">For more information about identifying Application Guard traffic via dual proxy, visit [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-726">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-726">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-727">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-727">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-728">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-728">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-729">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-729">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-730">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-730">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-731">Diccionario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-731">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-732">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-732">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-733">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-733">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-734">Nombre único de GP: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-734">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-735">Nombre GP: contenedor proxy de Protección de aplicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-735">GP name: Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-736">Ruta GP (Obligatorio): plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Configuración de la Protección de aplicaciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-736">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-737">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-737">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-738">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-738">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-739">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-739">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-740">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-740">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-741">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-741">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-742">Nombre del valor: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-742">Value Name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-743">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-743">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-744">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-744">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {
  "ProxyMode": "direct", 
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", 
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```

  ## <span data-ttu-id="31858-746">Directivas de transmisión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-746">Cast policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-747">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-747">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-748">EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-748">EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-749">Habilitar Google Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-749">Enable Google Cast</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-750">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-750">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-751">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-751">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-752">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-752">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-753">Habilitar esta directiva para habilitar Google Cast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-753">Enable this policy to enable Google Cast.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-754">Los usuarios podrán iniciarlo desde el menú de aplicaciones, los menús contextuales de la página, los controles de medios en los sitios web habilitados para la transmisión y (si se muestra) el icono de la barra de herramientas de transmisión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-754">Users will be able to launch it from the app menu, page context menus, media controls on Cast-enabled websites, and (if shown) the Cast toolbar icon.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-755">Deshabilitar esta directiva para deshabilitar Google Cast.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-755">Disable this policy to disable Google Cast.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-756">De forma predeterminada, Google Cast está activado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-756">By default, Google Cast is enabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-757">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-757">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-758">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-758">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-759">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-759">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-760">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-760">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-761">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-761">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-762">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-762">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-763">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-763">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-764">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-764">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-765">Nombre único de GP: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-765">GP unique name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-766">Nombre de GP: habilitar Google Cast</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-766">GP name: Enable Google Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-767">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Transmitir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-767">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-768">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-768">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-769">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-769">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-770">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-770">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-771">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-771">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-772">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-772">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-773">Nombre del valor: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-773">Value Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-774">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-774">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-775">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-775">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-776">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-776">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-777">Nombre clave de la preferencia: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-777">Preference Key Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-778">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-778">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-780">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-780">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-781">Mostrar el icono transmitir en la barra de herramientas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-781">Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-782">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-782">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-783">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-783">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-784">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-784">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-785">Establecer esta directiva a verdadero para mostrar el icono de la barra de herramientas de Transmitir en la barra de herramientas o el menú de desbordamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-785">Set this policy to true to show the Cast toolbar icon on the toolbar or the overflow menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-786">Los usuarios no podrán eliminarlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-786">Users won't be able to remove it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-787">Si no configura esta directiva o si la deshabilita, los usuarios pueden anclar o quitar el icono utilizando su menú contextual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-787">If you don't configure this policy or if you disable it, users can pin or remove the icon by using its contextual menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-788">Si también ha configurado la directiva [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) como falsa, entonces esta directiva se ignora y el icono de la barra de herramientas no se mostrará.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-788">If you've also set the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy to false, then this policy is ignored, and the toolbar icon isn't shown.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-789">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-789">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-790">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-790">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-791">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-791">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-792">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-792">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-793">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-793">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-794">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-794">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-795">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-795">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-796">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-796">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-797">Nombre único de GP: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-797">GP unique name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-798">Nombre de GP: mostrar el icono transmitir en la barra de herramientas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-798">GP name: Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-799">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Transmitir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-799">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-800">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-800">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-801">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-801">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-802">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-802">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-803">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-803">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-804">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-804">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-805">Nombre del valor: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-805">Value Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-806">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-806">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-807">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-807">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-808">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-808">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-809">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-809">Preference Key Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-810">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-810">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ## <span data-ttu-id="31858-812">Directivas de configuración de contenidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-812">Content settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-813">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-813">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-814">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-814">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-815">Seleccionar automáticamente certificados de cliente para estos sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-815">Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-816">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-816">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-817">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-817">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-818">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-818">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-819">Especifique una lista de sitios, basada en los patrones de dirección URL, para los cuales Microsoft Edge debería seleccionar automáticamente un certificado de cliente, si el sitio lo solicita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-819">Specify a list of sites, based on URL patterns, for which Microsoft Edge should automatically select a client certificate, if the site requests one.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-820">El valor debe ser una matriz de diccionarios JSON encadenados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-820">The value must be an array of stringified JSON dictionaries.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-821">Cada diccionario debe tener la forma { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }, donde $URL_PATTERN es un patrón de configuración de contenido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-821">Each dictionary must have the form { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }, where $URL_PATTERN is a content setting pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-822">$FILTER restringe los certificados de cliente que el navegador seleccionará automáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-822">$FILTER restricts from which client certificates the browser will automatically select.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-823">Independientemente del filtro, solamente se seleccionarán los certificados que coincidan con la solicitud de certificado del servidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-823">Independent of the filter, only certificates will be selected that match the server's certificate request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-824">Por ejemplo, si $FILTER tiene el formulario {"ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } }, además se seleccionan solo los certificados de cliente que son emitidos por un certificado con el nombre común $ISSUER_CN.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-824">For example, if $FILTER has the form { "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } }, additionally only client certificates are selected that are issued by a certificate with the CommonName $ISSUER_CN.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-825">Si $FILTER contiene una sección de "EMISOR" y otra de "ASUNTO", un certificado de cliente debe satisfacer ambas condiciones para ser seleccionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-825">If $FILTER contains an "ISSUER" and a "SUBJECT" section, a client certificate must satisfy both conditions to be selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-826">Si $FILTER especifica una organización ("O"), un certificado debe tener al menos una organización que coincida con el valor especificado para ser seleccionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-826">If $FILTER specifies an organization ("O"), a certificate must have at least one organization which matches the specified value to be selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-827">Si $FILTER especifica una unidad de organización ("OU"), un certificado debe tener al menos una unidad de organización que coincida con el valor especificado para ser seleccionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-827">If $FILTER specifies an organization unit ("OU"), a certificate must have at least one organization unit which matches the specified value to be selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-828">Si $FILTER es el diccionario vacío {}, la selección de certificados de clientes no está restringida adicionalmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-828">If $FILTER is the empty dictionary {}, the selection of client certificates is not additionally restricted.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-829">Si no configuras esta directiva, la autoselección no se hace para ningún sitio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-829">If you don't configure this policy, auto-selection isn't done for any site.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-830">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-830">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-831">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-831">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-832">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-832">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-833">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-833">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-834">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-834">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-835">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-835">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-836">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-836">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-837">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-837">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-838">Nombre único de GP: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-838">GP unique name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-839">Nombre de GP: seleccionar automáticamente certificados de cliente para estos sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-839">GP name: Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-840">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-840">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-841">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-841">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-842">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-842">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-843">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-843">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-844">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-844">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-845">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-845">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-846">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-846">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-847">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-847">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-848">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-848">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls\1 = {"pattern":"https://www.contoso.com","filter":{"ISSUER":{"CN":"certificate issuer name", "L": "certificate issuer location", "O": "certificate issuer org", "OU": "certificate issuer org unit"}, "SUBJECT":{"CN":"certificate subject name", "L": "certificate subject location", "O": "certificate subject org", "OU": "certificate subject org unit"}}}

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-849">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-849">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-850">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-850">Preference Key Name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-851">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-851">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{"pattern":"https://www.contoso.com","filter":{"ISSUER":{"CN":"certificate issuer name", "L": "certificate issuer location", "O": "certificate issuer org", "OU": "certificate issuer org unit"}, "SUBJECT":{"CN":"certificate subject name", "L": "certificate subject location", "O": "certificate subject org", "OU": "certificate subject org unit"}}}</string>
</array>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-853">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-853">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-854">Permitir las cookies en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-854">Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-855">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-855">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-856">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-856">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-857">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-857">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-858">Defina una lista de sitios, basada en los patrones de dirección URL, a los que se les permite colocar cookies.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-858">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-859">Si no se configura esta directiva se utiliza para todos los sitios el valor global predeterminado de la directiva [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) (si está establecido) o la configuración personal del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-859">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-860">Vea las directivas [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) y [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) para más información.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-860">See the [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-861">Tenga en cuenta que no puede haber patrones de dirección URL conflictivos establecidos entre estas tres directivas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-861">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="31858-862">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-862">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="31858-863">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-863">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="31858-864">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-864">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="31858-865">Para impedir que se eliminen las cookies al salir, configure la directiva [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-865">To exclude cookies from being deleted on exit, configure the [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-866">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-866">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-867">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-867">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-868">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-868">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-869">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-869">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-870">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-870">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-871">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-871">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-872">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-872">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-873">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-873">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-874">Nombre único de GP: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-874">GP unique name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-875">Nombre de GP: permitir las cookies en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-875">GP name: Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-876">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-876">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-877">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-877">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-878">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-878">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-879">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-879">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-880">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-880">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-881">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-881">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-882">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-882">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-883">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-883">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-884">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-884">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-885">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-885">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-886">Nombre clave de la preferencia: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-886">Preference Key Name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-887">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-887">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-888">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-888">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-889">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-889">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-890">Bloquear las cookies en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-890">Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-891">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-891">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-892">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-892">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-893">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-893">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-894">Define una lista de sitios, basada en los patrones de dirección URL, que no pueden establecer cookies.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-894">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-895">Si no se configura esta directiva se utiliza para todos los sitios el valor global predeterminado de la directiva [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) (si está establecido) o la configuración personal del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-895">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-896">Vea las directivas de [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) y [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) para más información.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-896">See the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-897">Tenga en cuenta que no puede haber patrones de dirección URL conflictivos establecidos entre estas tres directivas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-897">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="31858-898">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-898">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="31858-899">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-899">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="31858-900">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-900">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-901">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-901">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-902">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-902">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-903">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-903">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-904">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-904">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-905">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-905">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-906">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-906">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-907">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-907">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-908">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-908">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-909">Nombre único de GP: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-909">GP unique name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-910">Nombre de GP: bloquear las cookies en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-910">GP name: Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-911">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-911">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-912">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-912">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-913">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-913">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-914">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-914">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-915">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-915">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-916">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-916">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-917">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-917">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-918">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-918">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-919">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-919">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-920">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-920">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-921">Nombre clave de la preferencia: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-921">Preference Key Name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-922">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-922">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-923">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-923">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-924">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-924">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-925">Limitar las cookies de determinados sitios web en la sesión actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-925">Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-926">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-926">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-927">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-927">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-928">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-928">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-929">Las cookies creadas por los sitios web que coinciden con un patrón de dirección URL definido por usted se eliminan cuando termina la sesión (cuando se cierra la ventana).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-929">Cookies created by websites that match a URL pattern you define are deleted when the session ends (when the window closes).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-930">Las cookies creadas por los sitios web que no coinciden con el patrón son controladas por la directiva [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) (si está establecida) o por la configuración personal del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-930">Cookies created by websites that don't match the pattern are controlled by the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or by the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-931">Este es también el comportamiento por defecto si no se configura esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-931">This is also the default behavior if you don't configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-932">Si Microsoft Edge se ejecuta en segundo plano, es posible que la sesión no se cierre cuando se cierre la última ventana, lo que significa que las cookies no se borrarán cuando se cierre la ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-932">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the session might not close when the last window is closed, meaning the cookies won't be cleared when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-933">Vea la directiva [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) para obtener información sobre la configuración de lo que sucede cuando Microsoft Edge se ejecuta en el modo segundo plano.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-933">See the [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about configuring what happens when Microsoft Edge runs in background mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-934">También puede utilizar las directivas [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) y [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) para controlar qué sitios web pueden crear cookies.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-934">You can also use the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) policies to control which websites can create cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-935">Tenga en cuenta que no puede haber patrones de dirección URL conflictivos establecidos entre estas tres directivas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-935">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="31858-936">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-936">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="31858-937">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-937">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="31858-938">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-938">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-939">Si establece la directiva [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) para restaurar las direcciones URL de sesiones anteriores, esta directiva se ignorará y las cookies se almacenarán de forma permanente para esos sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-939">If you set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to restore URLs from previous sessions, this policy is ignored, and cookies are stored permanently for those sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-940">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-940">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-941">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-941">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-942">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-942">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-943">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-943">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-944">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-944">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-945">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-945">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-946">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-946">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-947">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-947">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-948">Nombre único de GP: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-948">GP unique name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-949">Nombre de GP: limitar las cookies de determinados sitios web en la sesión actual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-949">GP name: Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-950">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-950">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-951">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-951">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-952">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-952">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-953">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-953">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-954">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-954">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-955">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-955">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-956">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-956">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-957">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-957">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-958">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-958">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-959">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-959">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-960">Nombre clave de la preferencia: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-960">Preference Key Name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-961">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-961">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-962">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-962">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-963">DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-963">DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-964">Configurar cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-964">Configure cookies</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-965">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-965">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-966">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-966">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-967">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-967">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-968">Controlar si los sitios web pueden crear cookies en el dispositivo del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-968">Control whether websites can create cookies on the user's device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-969">Esta directiva es todo o nada: puede permitir que todos los sitios web creen cookies o que ningún sitio web cree cookies.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-969">This policy is all or nothing - you can let all websites create cookies, or no websites create cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-970">No puede utilizar esta directiva para habilitar las cookies de determinados sitios web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-970">You can't use this policy to enable cookies from specific websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-971">Establecer la directiva en "SessionOnly" para borrar las cookies cuando se cierre la sesión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-971">Set the policy to 'SessionOnly' to clear cookies when the session closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-972">Si Microsoft Edge se ejecuta en segundo plano, es posible que la sesión no se cierre cuando se cierre la última ventana, lo que significa que las cookies no se borrarán cuando se cierre la ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-972">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the session might not close when the last window is closed, meaning the cookies won't be cleared when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-973">Vea la directiva [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) para obtener información sobre la configuración de lo que sucede cuando Microsoft Edge se ejecuta en el modo segundo plano.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-973">See [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about configuring what happens when Microsoft Edge runs in background mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-974">Si no configura esta directiva, se usará la de "AllowCookies" predeterminada y los usuarios podrán cambiarla en la Configuración de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-974">If you don't configure this policy, the default 'AllowCookies' is used, and users can change this setting in Microsoft Edge Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-975">(Si no desea que los usuarios cambien esta configuración, establezca la directiva).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-975">(If you don't want users to be able to change this setting, set the policy.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-976">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-976">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-977">AllowCookies (1) = permitir que todos los sitios creen cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-977">AllowCookies (1) = Let all sites create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-978">BlockCookies (2) = no permitir que ningún sitio cree cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-978">BlockCookies (2) = Don't let any site create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-979">SessionOnly (4) = guardar las cookies durante toda la duración de la sesión, salvo las que se muestran en [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-979">SessionOnly (4) = Keep cookies for the duration of the session, except ones listed in [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-980">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-980">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-981">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-981">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-982">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-982">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-983">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-983">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-984">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-984">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-985">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-985">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-986">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-986">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-987">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-987">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-988">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-988">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-989">Nombre único de GP: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-989">GP unique name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-990">Nombre de GP: configurar cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-990">GP name: Configure cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-991">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-991">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-992">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-992">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-993">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-993">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-994">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-994">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-995">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-995">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-996">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-996">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-997">Nombre del valor: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-997">Value Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-998">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-998">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-999">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-999">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1000">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1000">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1001">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1001">Preference Key Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1002">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1002">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1003">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1003">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1004">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1004">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1005">Configuración de geolocalización predeterminada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1005">Default geolocation setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1006">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1006">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1007">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1007">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1008">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1008">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1009">Establecer si los sitios web pueden realizar un seguimiento de las ubicaciones físicas de los usuarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1009">Set whether websites can track users' physical locations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1010">Puede permitir que se realice un seguimiento de forma predeterminada ("AllowGeolocation"), rechazarlo de forma predeterminada ("BlockGeolocation") o preguntar a los usuarios cada vez que un sitio web solicite su ubicación ("AskGeolocation").</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1010">You can allow tracking by default ('AllowGeolocation'), deny it by default ('BlockGeolocation'), or ask the user each time a website requests their location ('AskGeolocation').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1011">Si no configura esta directiva, se usará "AskGeolocation" y el usuario podrá cambiarla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1011">If you don't configure this policy, 'AskGeolocation' is used and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1012">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1012">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1013">AllowGeolocation (1) = permitir que los sitios realicen un seguimiento de la ubicación física de los usuarios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1013">AllowGeolocation (1) = Allow sites to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1014">BlockGeolocation (2) = no permitir que ningún sitio realice un seguimiento de la ubicación física de los usuarios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1014">BlockGeolocation (2) = Don't allow any site to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1015">AskGeolocation (3) = preguntar cuando un sitio quiera realizar un seguimiento de la ubicación física de los usuarios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1015">AskGeolocation (3) = Ask whenever a site wants to track users' physical location</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1016">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1016">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1017">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1017">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1018">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1018">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1019">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1019">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1020">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1020">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1021">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1021">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1022">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1022">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1023">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1023">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1024">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1024">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1025">Nombre único de GP: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1025">GP unique name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1026">Nombre de GP: configuración de geolocalización predeterminada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1026">GP name: Default geolocation setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1027">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1027">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1028">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1028">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1029">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1029">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1030">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1030">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1031">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1031">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1032">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1032">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1033">Nombre del valor: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1033">Value Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1034">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1034">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1035">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1035">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1036">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1036">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1037">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1037">Preference Key Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1038">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1038">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1039">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1039">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1040">DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1040">DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1041">Configuración predeterminada de imágenes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1041">Default images setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1042">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1042">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1043">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1043">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1044">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1044">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1045">Establecer si los sitios web pueden mostrar imágenes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1045">Set whether websites can display images.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1046">Puede permitir imágenes en todos los sitios ("AllowImages") o bloquearlas en todos los sitios ("BlockImages").</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1046">You can allow images on all sites ('AllowImages') or block them on all sites ('BlockImages').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1047">Si no configura esta directiva, las imágenes se permitirán de forma predeterminada, y el usuario podrá cambiar esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1047">If you don't configure this policy, images are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1048">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1048">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1049">AllowImages (1) = permitir que todos los sitios muestren todas las imágenes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1049">AllowImages (1) = Allow all sites to show all images</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1050">BlockImages (2) = no permitir que ningún sitio muestre imágenes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1050">BlockImages (2) = Don't allow any site to show images</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1051">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1051">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1052">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1052">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1053">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1053">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1054">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1054">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1055">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1055">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1056">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1056">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1057">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1057">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1058">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1058">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1059">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1059">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1060">Nombre único de GP: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1060">GP unique name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1061">Nombre de GP: configuración predeterminada de imágenes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1061">GP name: Default images setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1062">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1062">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1063">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1063">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1064">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1064">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1065">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1065">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1066">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1066">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1067">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1067">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1068">Nombre del valor: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1068">Value Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1069">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1069">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1070">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1070">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```
