  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1071">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1071">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1072">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1072">Preference Key Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1073">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1073">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1074">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1074">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1075">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1075">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1076">Controlar el uso de excepciones de contenido inseguro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1076">Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1077">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1077">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1078">En Windows y MacOS desde 80 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1078">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1079">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1079">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1080">Permite establecer si los usuarios pueden agregar excepciones para permitir contenido mixto para sitios determinados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1080">Allows you to set whether users can add exceptions to allow mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1081">Esta directiva puede ser anulada para patrones específicos de dirección URL usando las directivas [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) e [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1081">This policy can be overridden for specific URL patterns using the [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) and [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1082">Si no se establece esta directiva, los usuarios podrán agregar excepciones para permitir el contenido mixto bloqueable y deshabilitar las actualizaciones automáticas para el contenido mixto bloqueable de forma opcional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1082">If this policy isn't set, users will be allowed to add exceptions to allow blockable mixed content and disable autoupgrades for optionally blockable mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1083">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1083">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1084">BlockInsecureContent (2) = no permitir que ningún sitio cargue contenido mixto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1084">BlockInsecureContent (2) = Do not allow any site to load mixed content</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1085">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = permitir que los usuarios agreguen excepciones para admitir contenido mixto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1085">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = Allow users to add exceptions to allow mixed content</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1086">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1086">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1087">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1087">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1088">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1088">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1089">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1089">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1090">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1090">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1091">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1091">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1092">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1092">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1093">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1093">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1094">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1094">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1095">Nombre único de GP: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1095">GP unique name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1096">Nombre de GP: controlar el uso de excepciones de contenido inseguro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1096">GP name: Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1097">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1097">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1098">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1098">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1099">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1099">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1100">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1100">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1101">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1101">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1102">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1102">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1103">Nombre del valor: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1103">Value Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1104">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1104">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1105">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1105">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1106">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1106">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1107">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1107">Preference Key Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1108">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1108">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1109">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1109">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1110">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1110">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1111">Configuración predeterminada de JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1111">Default JavaScript setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1112">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1112">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1113">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1113">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1114">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1114">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1115">Establecer si los sitios web pueden ejecutar JavaScript.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1115">Set whether websites can run JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1116">Puede permitir el acceso ("AllowJavaScript") o bloquearlo ("BlockJavaScript") para todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1116">You can allow it for all sites ('AllowJavaScript') or block it for all sites ('BlockJavaScript').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1117">Si no configura esta directiva, todos los sitios pueden ejecutar JavaScript de forma predeterminada, y el usuario puede cambiar esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1117">If you don't configure this policy, all sites can run JavaScript by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1118">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1118">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1119">AllowJavaScript (1) = permitir que todos los sitios ejecuten JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1119">AllowJavaScript (1) = Allow all sites to run JavaScript</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1120">BlockJavaScript (2) = no permitir que ningún sitio ejecute JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1120">BlockJavaScript (2) = Don't allow any site to run JavaScript</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1121">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1121">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1122">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1122">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1123">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1123">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1124">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1124">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1125">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1125">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1126">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1126">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1127">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1127">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1128">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1128">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1129">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1129">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1130">Nombre único de GP: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1130">GP unique name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1131">Nombre de GP: configuración predeterminada de JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1131">GP name: Default JavaScript setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1132">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1132">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1133">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1133">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1134">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1134">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1135">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1135">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1136">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1136">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1137">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1137">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1138">Nombre del valor: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1138">Value Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1139">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1139">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1140">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1140">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1141">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1141">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1142">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1142">Preference Key Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1143">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1143">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1144">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1144">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1145">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1145">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1146">Configuración predeterminada de notificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1146">Default notification setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1147">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1147">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1148">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1148">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1149">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1149">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1150">Establecer si los sitios web pueden mostrar notificaciones de escritorio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1150">Set whether websites can display desktop notifications.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1151">Puede permitirlas de forma predeterminada ("AllowNotifications"), denegarlas de forma predeterminada ("BlockNotifications") o hacer que se le pregunte al usuario cada vez que un sitio web quiera mostrar una notificación ("AskNotifications").</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1151">You can allow them by default ('AllowNotifications'), deny them by default ('BlockNotifications'), or have the user be asked each time a website wants to show a notification ('AskNotifications').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1152">Si no configura esta directiva, las notificaciones se permitirán de forma predeterminada, y el usuario podrá cambiar esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1152">If you don't configure this policy, notifications are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1153">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1153">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1154">AllowNotifications (1) = permitir que los sitios muestren notificaciones de escritorio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1154">AllowNotifications (1) = Allow sites to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1155">BlockNotifications (2) = no permitir que ningún sitio muestre notificaciones de escritorio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1155">BlockNotifications (2) = Don't allow any site to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1156">AskNotifications (3) = preguntar cada vez que un sitio quiera mostrar notificaciones de escritorio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1156">AskNotifications (3) = Ask every time a site wants to show desktop notifications</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1157">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1157">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1158">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1158">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1159">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1159">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1160">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1160">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1161">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1161">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1162">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1162">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1163">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1163">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1164">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1164">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1165">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1165">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1166">Nombre único de GP: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1166">GP unique name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1167">Nombre de GP: configuración predeterminada de notificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1167">GP name: Default notification setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1168">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1168">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1169">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1169">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1170">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1170">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1171">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1171">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1172">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1172">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1173">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1173">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1174">Nombre del valor: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1174">Value Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1175">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1175">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1176">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1176">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1177">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1177">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1178">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1178">Preference Key Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1179">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1179">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1180">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1180">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1181">DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1181">DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1182">Configuración predeterminada de Adobe Flash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1182">Default Adobe Flash setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1183">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1183">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1184">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1184">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1185">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1185">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1186">Determina si los sitios web que no están cubiertos por [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) o [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) pueden ejecutar automáticamente el complemento de Adobe Flash.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1186">Determines whether websites that aren't covered by [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) or [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) can automatically run the Adobe Flash plug-in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1187">Puede seleccionar "BlockPlugins" para bloquear Adobe Flash en todos los sitios o puede seleccionar "ClickToPlay" para permitir que Adobe Flash se ejecute, pero requerir que el usuario haga clic en el marcador de posición para iniciarlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1187">You can select 'BlockPlugins' to block Adobe Flash on all sites, or you can select 'ClickToPlay' to let Adobe Flash run but require the user to click the placeholder to start it.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1188">En cualquier caso, las directivas [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) y [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) tienen prioridad sobre el "DefaultPluginsSetting".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1188">In any case, the [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) policies take precedence over 'DefaultPluginsSetting'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1189">La reproducción automática solo se permite para los dominios que aparecen explícitamente en la directiva de [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1189">Automatic playback is only allowed for domains explicitly listed in the [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1190">Si desea habilitar la reproducción automática para todos los sitios, considere la posibilidad de agregar http://\* y https://\* a esta lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1190">If you want to enable automatic playback for all sites, consider adding http://\* and https://\* to this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1191">Si no configura esta directiva, el usuario puede cambiar esta configuración manualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1191">If you don't configure this policy, the user can change this setting manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1192">La anterior opción '1' se estableció como " permitir todo", pero esta funcionalidad ahora solo es manejada por la directiva [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1192">The former '1' option set allow-all, but this functionality is now only handled by the [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1193">Las directivas existentes que usen "1" funcionarán en el modo "ClickToPlay".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1193">Existing policies using '1' will operate in 'ClickToPlay' mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1194">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1194">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1195">BlockPlugins (2) = bloquear el complemento de Adobe Flash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1195">BlockPlugins (2) = Block the Adobe Flash plugin</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1196">ClickToPlay (3) = hacer clic para reproducir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1196">ClickToPlay (3) = Click to play</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1197">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1197">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1198">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1198">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1199">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1199">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1200">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1200">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1201">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1201">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1202">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1202">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1203">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1203">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1204">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1204">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1205">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1205">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1206">Nombre único de GP: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1206">GP unique name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1207">Nombre de GP: configuración predeterminada de Adobe Flash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1207">GP name: Default Adobe Flash setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1208">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1208">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1209">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1209">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1210">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1210">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1211">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1211">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1212">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1212">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1213">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1213">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1214">Nombre del valor: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1214">Value Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1215">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1215">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1216">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1216">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1217">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1217">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1218">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1218">Preference Key Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1219">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1219">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1220">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1220">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1221">DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1221">DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1222">Configuración predeterminada de la ventana emergente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1222">Default pop-up window setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1223">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1223">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1224">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1224">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1225">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1225">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1226">Establecer si los sitios web pueden mostrar ventanas emergentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1226">Set whether websites can show pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1227">Puede permitirlas ("AllowPopups") o bloquearlas ("BlockPopups") en todos los sitios web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1227">You can allow them on all websites ('AllowPopups') or block them on all sites ('BlockPopups').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1228">Si no configura esta directiva, las ventanas emergentes se bloquearán de forma predeterminada y el usuario podrá cambiar esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1228">If you don't configure this policy, pop-up windows are blocked by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1229">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1229">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1230">AllowPopups (1) = permitir que todos los sitios muestren ventanas emergentes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1230">AllowPopups (1) = Allow all sites to show pop-ups</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1231">BlockPopups (2) = no permitir que ningún sitio muestre mensajes emergentes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1231">BlockPopups (2) = Do not allow any site to show popups</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1232">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1232">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1233">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1233">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1234">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1234">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1235">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1235">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1236">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1236">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1237">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1237">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1238">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1238">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1239">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1239">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1240">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1240">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1241">Nombre único de GP: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1241">GP unique name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1242">Nombre de GP: configuración predeterminada de la ventana emergente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1242">GP name: Default pop-up window setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1243">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1243">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1244">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1244">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1245">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1245">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1246">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1246">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1247">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1247">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1248">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1248">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1249">Nombre del valor: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1249">Value Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1250">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1250">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1251">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1251">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1252">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1252">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1253">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1253">Preference Key Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1254">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1254">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1256">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1256">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1257">Controlar el uso de la API de Bluetooth Web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1257">Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1258">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1258">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1259">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1259">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1260">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1260">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1261">Controla si los sitios web pueden acceder a los dispositivos Bluetooth cercanos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1261">Control whether websites can access nearby Bluetooth devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1262">Puede bloquear completamente el acceso o requerir que el sitio le pregunte a los usuarios cada vez que deseen tener acceso a un dispositivo Bluetooth.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1262">You can completely block access or require the site to ask the user each time it wants to access a Bluetooth device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1263">Si no configura esta directiva, se utilizará el valor predeterminado ("AskWebBluetooth", lo que significa que se preguntará a los usuarios cada vez) y los usuarios pueden cambiarlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1263">If you don't configure this policy, the default value ('AskWebBluetooth', meaning users are asked each time) is used and users can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1264">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1264">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1265">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = no permitir que ningún sitio solicite el acceso a dispositivos Bluetooth mediante la API de Bluetooth Web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1265">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to Bluetooth devices via the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1266">AskWebBluetooth (3) = permitir que los sitios soliciten al usuario que conceda acceso a un dispositivo Bluetooth cercano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1266">AskWebBluetooth (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a nearby Bluetooth device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1267">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1267">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1268">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1268">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1269">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1269">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1270">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1270">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1271">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1271">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1272">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1272">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1273">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1273">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1274">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1274">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1275">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1275">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1276">Nombre único de GP: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1276">GP unique name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1277">Nombre de GP: controlar el uso de la API de Bluetooth Web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1277">GP name: Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1278">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1278">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1279">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1279">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1280">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1280">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1281">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1281">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1282">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1282">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1283">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1283">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1284">Nombre del valor: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1284">Value Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1285">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1285">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1286">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1286">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1287">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1287">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1288">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1288">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1289">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1289">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1290">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1290">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1291">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1291">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1292">Controlar el uso de la API WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1292">Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1293">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1293">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1294">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1294">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1295">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1295">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1296">Establecer si los sitios web pueden acceder a dispositivos USB conectados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1296">Set whether websites can access connected USB devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1297">Puede bloquear completamente el acceso o preguntar al usuario cada vez que un sitio web quiera acceder a los dispositivos USB conectados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1297">You can completely block access or ask the user each time a website wants to get access to connected USB devices.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1298">Puede reemplazar esta directiva para patrones determinados de dirección URL utilizando las directivas [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) y [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1298">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) and [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1299">Si no configura esta directiva, los sitios pueden preguntar a los usuarios si pueden acceder a los dispositivos USB conectados ("AskWebUsb") de forma predeterminada, y los usuarios pueden cambiar esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1299">If you don't configure this policy, sites can ask users whether they can access the connected USB devices ('AskWebUsb') by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1300">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1300">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1301">BlockWebUsb (2) = no permitir que ningún sitio solicite el acceso a dispositivos USB mediante la API WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1301">BlockWebUsb (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to USB devices via the WebUSB API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1302">AskWebUsb (3) = permitir que los sitios soliciten al usuario conceder acceso a un dispositivo USB conectado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1302">AskWebUsb (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a connected USB device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1303">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1303">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1304">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1304">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1305">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1305">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1306">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1306">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1307">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1307">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1308">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1308">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1309">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1309">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1310">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1310">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1311">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1311">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1312">Nombre único de GP: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1312">GP unique name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1313">Nombre de GP: Nombre de GP: controlar el uso de la API WebUSB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1313">GP name: Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1314">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1314">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1315">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1315">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1316">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1316">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1317">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1317">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1318">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1318">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1319">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1319">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1320">Nombre del valor: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1320">Value Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1321">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1321">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1322">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1322">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1323">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1323">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1324">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1324">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1325">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1325">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1326">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1326">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1327">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1327">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1328">Permitir imágenes en estos sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1328">Allow images on these sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1329">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1329">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1330">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1330">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1331">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1331">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1332">Define una lista de sitios, basada en los patrones de dirección URL que pueden mostrar imagenes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1332">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1333">Si no configura esta directiva, se utiliza el valor predeterminado global para todos los sitios, ya sea de la directiva [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) (si está establecida) o de la configuración personal del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1333">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value is used for all sites either from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1334">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1334">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1335">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1335">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1336">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1336">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1337">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1337">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1338">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1338">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1339">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1339">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1340">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1340">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1341">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1341">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1342">Nombre único de GP: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1342">GP unique name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1343">Nombre de GP: permitir imágenes en estos sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1343">GP name: Allow images on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1344">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1344">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1345">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1345">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1346">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1346">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1347">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1347">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1348">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1348">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1349">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1349">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1350">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1350">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1351">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1351">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1352">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1352">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1353">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1353">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1354">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1354">Preference Key Name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1355">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1355">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1357">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1357">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1358">Bloquear imágenes en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1358">Block images on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1359">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1359">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1360">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1360">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1361">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1361">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1362">Define una lista de sitios, basada en los patrones de dirección URL que pueden mostrar imagenes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1362">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1363">Si no se configura esta directiva, se utilizará para todos los sitios el valor global predeterminado de la directiva [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) (si está establecido) o la configuración personal del usuario para todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1363">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1364">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1364">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1365">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1365">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1366">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1366">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1367">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1367">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1368">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1368">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1369">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1369">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1370">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1370">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1371">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1371">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1372">Nombre único de GP: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1372">GP unique name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1373">Nombre de GP: Nombre de GP: bloquear imágenes en sitios determinados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1373">GP name: Block images on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1374">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1374">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1375">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1375">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1376">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1376">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1377">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1377">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1378">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1378">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1379">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1379">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1380">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1380">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1381">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1381">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1382">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1382">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1383">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1383">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1384">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1384">Preference Key Name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1385">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1385">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1387">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1387">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1388">Permitir el contenido inseguro en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1388">Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1389">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1389">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1390">En Windows y MacOS desde 80 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1390">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1391">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1391">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1392">Crea una lista de patrones de dirección URL para especificar los sitios que pueden mostrar contenido mixto inseguro (es decir, contenido HTTP en sitios HTTPS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1392">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that can display insecure mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1393">Si no configura esta directiva, el contenido mixto bloqueable será bloqueado y opcionalmente el contenido mixto bloqueable será actualizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1393">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1394">Sin embargo, se permitirá a los usuarios establecer excepciones para permitir contenido mixto inseguro para determinados sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1394">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1395">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1395">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1396">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1396">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1397">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1397">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1398">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1398">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1399">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1399">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1400">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1400">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1401">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1401">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1402">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1402">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1403">Nombre único de GP: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1403">GP unique name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1404">Nombre de GP: permitir el contenido inseguro en sitios determinados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1404">GP name: Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1405">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1405">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1406">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1406">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1407">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1407">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1408">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1408">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1409">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1409">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1410">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1410">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1411">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1411">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1412">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1412">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1413">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1413">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\1 = https://www.example.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\2 = [*.]example.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1414">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1414">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1415">Nombre clave de la preferencia: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1415">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1416">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1416">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1417">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1417">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1418">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1418">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1419">Bloquear contenidos inseguros en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1419">Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1420">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1420">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1421">En Windows y MacOS desde 80 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1421">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1422">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1422">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1423">Crea una lista de patrones de URL para especificar los sitios a los que no se les permite mostrar contenido mixto (es decir, contenido HTTP en sitios HTTPS) bloqueable (es decir, activo) y para los que se deshabilitarán opcionalmente las actualizaciones de contenido mixto bloqueable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1423">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that aren't allowed to display blockable (i.e. active) mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites) and for which optionally blockable mixed content upgrades will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1424">Si no configura esta directiva, el contenido mixto bloqueable será bloqueado y opcionalmente el contenido mixto bloqueable será actualizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1424">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1425">Sin embargo, se permitirá a los usuarios establecer excepciones para permitir contenido mixto inseguro para determinados sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1425">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1426">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1426">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1427">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1427">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1428">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1428">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1429">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1429">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1430">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1430">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1431">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1431">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1432">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1432">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1433">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1433">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1434">Nombre único de GP: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1434">GP unique name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1435">Nombre de GP: bloquear los contenidos inseguros en sitios determinados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1435">GP name: Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1436">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1436">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1437">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1437">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1438">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1438">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1439">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1439">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1440">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1440">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1441">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1441">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1442">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1442">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1443">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1443">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1444">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1444">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\1 = https://www.example.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\2 = [*.]example.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1445">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1445">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1446">Nombre clave de la preferencia: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1446">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1447">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1447">Example value:</span></span>

  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
