  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1449">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1449">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1450">Permitir JavaScript en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1450">Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1451">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1451">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1452">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1452">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1453">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1453">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1454">Define una lista de sitios basada en los patrones de dirección URL a los que se les permite ejecutar JavaScript.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1454">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1455">Si no configura esta directiva, se utilizará para todos los sitios el valor global predeterminado de la directiva [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) (si está establecido) o la configuración personal del usuario para todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1455">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1456">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1456">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1457">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1457">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1458">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1458">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1459">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1459">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1460">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1460">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1461">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1461">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1462">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1462">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1463">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1463">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1464">Nombre único de GP: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1464">GP unique name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1465">Nombre de GP: permitir JavaScript en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1465">GP name: Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1466">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1466">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1467">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1467">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1468">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1468">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1469">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1469">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1470">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1470">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1471">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1471">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1472">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1472">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1473">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1473">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1474">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1474">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1475">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1475">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1476">Nombre clave de la preferencia: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1476">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1477">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1477">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1479">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1479">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1480">Bloquear JavaScript en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1480">Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1481">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1481">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1482">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1482">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1483">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1483">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1484">Define una lista de sitios basada en los patrones de dirección URL a los que se les permite ejecutar JavaScript.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1484">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1485">Si no configura esta directiva, se utilizará para todos los sitios el valor global predeterminado de la directiva [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) (si está establecido) o la configuración personal del usuario para todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1485">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1486">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1486">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1487">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1487">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1488">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1488">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1489">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1489">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1490">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1490">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1491">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1491">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1492">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1492">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1493">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1493">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1494">Nombre único de GP: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1494">GP unique name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1495">Nombre de GP: bloquear JavaScript en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1495">GP name: Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1496">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1496">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1497">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1497">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1498">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1498">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1499">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1499">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1500">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1500">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1501">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1501">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1502">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1502">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1503">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1503">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1504">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1504">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1505">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1505">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1506">Nombre clave de la preferencia: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1506">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1507">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1507">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1509">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1509">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1510">Habilitar la configuración predeterminada del comportamiento de las cookies de SameSite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1510">Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1511">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1511">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1512">En Windows y MacOS desde 80 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1512">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1513">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1513">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1514">Permite revertir todas las cookies al comportamiento de SameSite heredado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1514">Lets you revert all cookies to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1515">Revertir al comportamiento heredado hace que las cookies que no especifican un atributo SameSite sean tratadas como si fueran "SameSite=None", y elimina el requisito de que las cookies "SameSite=None" lleven el atributo "Secure".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1515">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", and removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1516">Si no establece esta directiva, el comportamiento predeterminado de las cookies que no especifiquen un atributo SameSite dependerá de otras fuentes de configuración de la función SameSite de forma predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1516">If you don't set this policy, the default behavior for cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute will depend on other configuration sources for the SameSite-by-default feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1517">Esta característica puede establecerse mediante una prueba de campo o activando el marcador de las cookies de SameSite de forma predeterminada en edge://flags.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1517">This feature might be set by a field trial or by enabling the same-site-by-default-cookies flag in edge://flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1518">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1518">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1519">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = revertir al comportamiento de SameSite heredado para las cookies en todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1519">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-1520">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = usar el comportamiento de SameSite predeterminado para las cookies en todos los sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1520">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = Use SameSite-by-default behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1521">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1521">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1522">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1522">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1523">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1523">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1524">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1524">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1525">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1525">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1526">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1526">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1527">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1527">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1528">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1528">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1529">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1529">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1530">Nombre único de GP: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1530">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1531">Nombre de GP: habilitar la configuración predeterminada del comportamiento heredado de las cookies de SameSite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1531">GP name: Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1532">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1532">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1533">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1533">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1534">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1534">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1535">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1535">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1536">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1536">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1537">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1537">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1538">Nombre del valor: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1538">Value Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1539">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1539">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1540">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1540">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1541">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1541">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1542">Nombre clave de la preferencia: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1542">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1543">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1543">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1545">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1545">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1546">Revertir a la conducta heredada de SameSite para las cookies en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1546">Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on specified sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1547">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1547">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1548">En Windows y MacOS desde 80 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1548">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1549">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1549">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1550">Las cookies establecidas para los dominios que coincidan con los patrones determinados revertirán al comportamiento heredado de SameSite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1550">Cookies set for domains match specified patterns will revert to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1551">Revertir al comportamiento heredado hace que las cookies que no especifican un atributo SameSite sean tratadas como si fueran "SameSite=None", y elimina el requisito de que las cookies "SameSite=None" lleven el atributo "Secure".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1551">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", and removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1552">Si no establece esta directiva, se usará el valor predeterminado global.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1552">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1553">El valor predeterminado global también se utilizará para las cookies de los dominios no cubiertos por los patrones especificados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1553">The global default will also be used for cookies on domains not covered by the patterns you specify.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1554">El valor predeterminado global puede ser configurado usando la directiva [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1554">The global default value can be configured using the [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1555">Si [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) no está establecido, el valor global predeterminado pasará a otras fuentes de configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1555">If [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) is unset, the global default value falls back to other configuration sources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1556">Tenga en cuenta que los patrones listados en esta directiva se tratan como dominios, no como dirección URL, por lo que no debe especificar un esquema o un puerto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1556">Note that patterns you list in this policy are treated as domains, not URLs, so you should not specify a scheme or port.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1557">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1557">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1558">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1558">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1559">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1559">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1560">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1560">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1561">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1561">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1562">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1562">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1563">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1563">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1564">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1564">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1565">Nombre único de GP: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1565">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1566">Nombre de GP: volver a la conducta heredada de SameSite para las cookies en sitios determinados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1566">GP name: Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1567">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1567">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1568">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1568">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1569">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1569">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1570">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1570">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1571">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1571">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1572">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1572">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1573">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1573">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1574">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1574">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1575">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1575">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList\1 = www.example.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList\2 = [*.]example.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1576">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1576">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1577">Nombre clave de la preferencia: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1577">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1578">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1578">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1580">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1580">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1581">Permitir las notificaciones en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1581">Allow notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1582">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1582">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1583">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1583">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1584">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1584">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1585">Permite crear una lista de patrones de url para especificar los sitios que están autorizados a mostrar notificaciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1585">Allows you to create a list of url patterns to specify sites that are allowed to display notifications.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1586">Si no establece esta directiva, se utilizará el valor predeterminado global para todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1586">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used for all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1587">Este valor predeterminado será de la directiva[DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting)de configuración de notificaciones predeterminadas, si está establecida, o de la configuración personal del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1587">This default value will be from the [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) policy if it's set, or from the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1588">Para obtener información detallada sobre los patrones de url válidos, consulte [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1588">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1589">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1589">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1590">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1590">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1591">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1591">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1592">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1592">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1593">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1593">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1594">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1594">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1595">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1595">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1596">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1596">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1597">Nombre único de GP: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1597">GP unique name: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1598">Nombre de GP: permitir las notificaciones en sitios determinados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1598">GP name: Allow notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1599">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1599">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1600">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1600">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1601">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1601">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1602">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1602">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1603">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1603">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1604">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1604">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1605">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1605">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1606">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1606">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1607">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1607">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1608">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1608">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1609">Nombre clave de la preferencia: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1609">Preference Key Name: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1610">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1610">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1612">NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1612">NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1613">Bloquear las notificaciones en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1613">Block notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1614">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1614">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1615">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1615">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1616">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1616">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1617">Permite crear una lista de patrones de url para especificar los sitios que no están autorizados a mostrar notificaciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1617">Allows you to create a list of url patterns to specify sites that are not allowed to display notifications.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1618">Si no establece esta directiva, se utilizará el valor predeterminado global para todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1618">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used for all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1619">Este valor predeterminado será de la directiva[DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting)de configuración de notificaciones predeterminadas, si está establecida, o de la configuración personal del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1619">This default value will be from the [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) policy if it's set, or from the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1620">Para obtener información detallada sobre los patrones de url válidos, consulte [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1620">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1621">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1621">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1622">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1622">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1623">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1623">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1624">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1624">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1625">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1625">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1626">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1626">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1627">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1627">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1628">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1628">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1629">Nombre único de GP: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1629">GP unique name: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1630">Nombre de GP: bloquear las notificaciones en sitios determinados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1630">GP name: Block notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1631">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1631">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1632">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1632">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1633">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1633">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1634">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1634">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1635">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1635">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1636">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1636">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1637">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1637">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1638">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1638">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1639">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1639">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1640">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1640">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1641">Nombre clave de la preferencia: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1641">Preference Key Name: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1642">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1642">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1643">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1643">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1644">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1644">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1645">Permitir el complemento Adobe Flash en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1645">Allow the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1646">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1646">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1647">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1647">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1648">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1648">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1649">Define una lista de sitios, basada en los patrones de dirección URL que pueden ejecutar el complemento de Adobe Flash.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1649">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can run the Adobe Flash plug-in.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1650">Si no configura esta directiva, se utilizará para todos los sitios el valor global predeterminado de la directiva [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) (si está establecido) o la configuración personal del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1650">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1651">Para obtener información detallada sobre los patrones de url válidos, consulte [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1651">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1652">Sin embargo, a partir de M85, los patrones con carácteres comodín de "*" y "[*.]" en el host ya no son compatibles con esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1652">However, starting in M85, patterns with '*' and '[*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1653">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1653">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1654">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1654">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1655">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1655">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1656">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1656">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1657">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1657">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1658">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1658">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1659">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1659">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1660">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1660">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1661">Nombre único de GP: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1661">GP unique name: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1662">Nombre de GP: permitir el complemento de Adobe Flash en sitios determinados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1662">GP name: Allow the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1663">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1663">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1664">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1664">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1665">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1665">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1666">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1666">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1667">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1667">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1668">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1668">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1669">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1669">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1670">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1670">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1671">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1671">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls\2 = http://contoso.edu:8080

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1672">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1672">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1673">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1673">Preference Key Name: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1674">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1674">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>http://contoso.edu:8080</string>
</array>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1676">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1676">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1677">Bloquear el complemento Adobe Flash en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1677">Block the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1678">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1678">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1679">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1679">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1680">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1680">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1681">Define una lista de sitios basada en los patrones de dirección URL que están bloqueados para ejecutar Adobe Flash.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1681">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked from running Adobe Flash.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1682">Si no configura esta directiva, se utilizará para todos los sitios el valor global predeterminado de la directiva [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) (si está establecido) o la configuración personal del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1682">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1683">Para obtener información detallada sobre los patrones de url válidos, consulte [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1683">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1684">Sin embargo, a partir de M85, los patrones con carácteres comodín de "*" y "[*.]" en el host ya no son compatibles con esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1684">However, starting in M85, patterns with '*' and '[*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1685">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1685">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1686">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1686">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1687">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1687">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1688">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1688">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1689">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1689">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1690">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1690">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1691">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1691">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1692">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1692">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1693">Nombre único de GP: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1693">GP unique name: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1694">Nombre de GP: bloquear el complemento Adobe Flash en sitios determinados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1694">GP name: Block the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1695">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1695">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1696">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1696">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1697">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1697">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1698">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1698">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1699">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1699">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1700">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1700">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1701">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1701">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1702">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1702">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1703">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1703">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls\2 = http://contoso.edu:8080

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1704">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1704">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1705">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1705">Preference Key Name: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1706">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1706">Example value:</span></span>

<array>

  <string>http://contoso.edu:8080</string>
</array>

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1708">PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1708">PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1709">Permitir ventanas emergentes en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1709">Allow pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1710">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1710">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1711">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1711">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1712">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1712">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1713">Define una lista de sitios basada en los patrones de dirección URL que puedan abrir ventanas emergentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1713">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can open pop-up windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1714">Si no configura esta directiva se utilizará para todos los sitios el valor global predeterminado de la directiva [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) (si está establecido) o la configuración personal del usuario para todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1714">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1715">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1715">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1716">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1716">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1717">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1717">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1718">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1718">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1719">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1719">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1720">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1720">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1721">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1721">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1722">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1722">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1723">Nombre único de GP: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1723">GP unique name: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1724">Nombre de GP: permitir las ventanas emergentes en sitios determinados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1724">GP name: Allow pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1725">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1725">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1726">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1726">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1727">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1727">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1728">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1728">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1729">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1729">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1730">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1730">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1731">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1731">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1732">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1732">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1733">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1733">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1734">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1734">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1735">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1735">Preference Key Name: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1736">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1736">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
