  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1738">PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1738">PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1739">Bloquear ventanas emergentes en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1739">Block pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1740">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1740">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1741">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1741">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1742">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1742">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1743">Define una lista de sitios basada en los patrones de dirección URL que están bloqueados para abrir ventanas emergentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1743">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked from opening pop-up windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1744">Si no configura esta directiva se utilizará para todos los sitios el valor global predeterminado de la directiva [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) (si está establecido) o la configuración personal del usuario para todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1744">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1745">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1745">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1746">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1746">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1747">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1747">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1748">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1748">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1749">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1749">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1750">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1750">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1751">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1751">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1752">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1752">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1753">Nombre único de GP: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1753">GP unique name: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1754">Nombre de GP: bloquear las ventanas emergentes en sitios determinados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1754">GP name: Block pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1755">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1755">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1756">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1756">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1757">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1757">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1758">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1758">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1759">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1759">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1760">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1760">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1761">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1761">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1762">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1762">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1763">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1763">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1764">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1764">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1765">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1765">Preference Key Name: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1766">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1766">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1767">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1767">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1768">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1768">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1769">Registrar controladores de protocolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1769">Register protocol handlers</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1770">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1770">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1771">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1771">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1772">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1772">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1773">Establezca esta directiva (recomendado únicamente) para registrar una lista de controladores de protocolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1773">Set this policy (recommended only) to register a list of protocol handlers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1774">Esta lista se combina con las registradas por el usuario y ambas pueden usarse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1774">This list is merged with ones registered by the user and both are available to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1775">Para registrar un controlador de protocolo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1775">To register a protocol handler:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="31858-1776">Establezca la propiedad Protocol en el esquema (por ejemplo, "mailto").</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1776">Set the protocol property to the scheme (for example, "mailto")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="31858-1777">Establezca la propiedad URL en la propiedad URL de la aplicación que controla el esquema especificado en el campo "protocol".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1777">Set the URL property to the URL property of the application that handlers the scheme specified in the "protocol" field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1778">El patrón puede incluir un marcador de posición "%s", que será reemplazado por la dirección URL controlada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1778">The pattern can include a "%s" placeholder, which the handled URL replaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1779">Los usuarios no pueden quitar un controlador de protocolo registrado por esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1779">Users can't remove a protocol handler registered by this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1780">Sin embargo, pueden instalar un controlador de protocolo predeterminado nuevo para reemplazar a los controladores de protocolo existentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1780">However, they can install a new default protocol handler to override the existing protocol handlers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1781">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1781">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1782">Puede ser obligatorio: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1782">Can be mandatory: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1783">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1783">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1784">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1784">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1785">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1785">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1786">Diccionario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1786">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1787">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1787">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1788">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1788">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1789">Nombre único de GP: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1789">GP unique name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1790">Nombre de GP: registrar controladores de protocolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1790">GP name: Register protocol handlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1791">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatorio): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1791">GP path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1792">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1792">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1793">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1793">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1794">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1794">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1795">Ruta de acceso (obligatorio): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1795">Path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1796">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1796">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1797">Nombre del valor: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1797">Value Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1798">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1798">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1799">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1799">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RegisteredProtocolHandlers = [
  {
    "default": true, 
    "protocol": "mailto", 
    "url": "https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1800">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1800">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1801">Nombre clave de la preferencia: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1801">Preference Key Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1802">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1802">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>RegisteredProtocolHandlers</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>default</key>
    <true/>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>mailto</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1803">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1803">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1804">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1804">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1805">Conceder acceso a determinados sitios para conectarse a dispositivos USB determinados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1805">Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1806">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1806">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1807">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1807">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1808">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1808">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1809">Permite establecer una lista de direcciones URL que especifican los sitios a los que se concederá automáticamente permiso de acceso a un dispositivo USB con el proveedor y los id. de producto dados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1809">Allows you to set a list of urls that specify which sites will automatically be granted permission to access a USB device with the given vendor and product IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1810">Cada elemento de la lista debe contener tanto dispositivos como direcciones url para que la directiva sea válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1810">Each item in the list must contain both devices and urls in order for the policy to be valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1811">Cada elemento de los dispositivos puede contener un id. de proveedor y un campo de id. de producto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1811">Each item in devices can contain a vendor ID and product ID field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1812">Cualquier id. que se omite se trata como un comodín con una excepción, y esa excepción es que no se puede especificar una id. de producto sin que se especifique también una id. de proveedor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1812">Any ID that is omitted is treated as a wildcard with one exception, and that exception is that a product ID cannot be specified without a vendor ID also being specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1813">De lo contrario, la directiva no será válida y será ignorada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1813">Otherwise, the policy will not be valid and will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1814">El modelo de permiso de USB utiliza la dirección URL del sitio solicitante ("URL de solicitud") y la dirección URL del sitio de marco de nivel superior ("URL de incrustación") para conceder permiso a la dirección URL solicitante para acceder al dispositivo USB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1814">The USB permission model uses the URL of the requesting site ("requesting URL") and the URL of the top-level frame site ("embedding URL") to grant permission to the requesting URL to access the USB device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1815">La dirección URL de solicitud puede ser diferente de la URL de incrustación cuando el sitio que realiza la solicitud se carga en un iframe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1815">The requesting URL may be different than the embedding URL when the requesting site is loaded in an iframe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1816">Por lo tanto, el campo "direcciones URL" puede contener hasta dos cadenas de direcciones URL delimitadas por una coma para especificar la dirección URL de solicitud y de incrustación respectivamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1816">Therefore, the "urls" field can contain up to two URL strings delimited by a comma to specify the requesting and embedding URL respectively.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1817">Si se especifica solo una dirección URL, el acceso a los dispositivos USB correspondientes se concederá cuando la dirección URL del sitio que realiza la solicitud coincida con esta URL, independientemente del estado de incrustación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1817">If only one URL is specified, then access to the corresponding USB devices will be granted when the requesting site's URL matches this URL regardless of embedding status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1818">Las direcciones URL en "direcciones URL" deben ser direcciones URL válidas, de lo contrario, se omitirá la directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1818">The URLs in "urls" must be valid URLs, otherwise the policy will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1819">Si no establece esta directiva se utilizará el valor global predeterminado para todos los sitios, ya sea de la directiva [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) si está establecida o en caso contrario de la configuración personal del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1819">If this policy is left not set, the global default value will be used for all sites either from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy if it is set, or the user's personal configuration otherwise.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1820">Los patrones de URL en esta directiva no deben entrar en conflicto con los configurados a través de [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1820">URL patterns in this policy should not clash with the ones configured via [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1821">Si hay un conflicto, esta directiva tendrá prioridad sobre [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) y [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1821">If there is a clash, this policy will take precedence over [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) and [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1822">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1822">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1823">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1823">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1824">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1824">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1825">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1825">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1826">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1826">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1827">Diccionario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1827">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1828">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1828">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1829">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1829">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1830">Nombre único de GP: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1830">GP unique name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1831">Nombre de GP: conceder acceso a sitios determinados para conectarse a dispositivos USB específicos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1831">GP name: Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1832">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1832">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1833">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1833">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1834">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1834">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1835">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1835">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1836">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1836">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1837">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1837">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1838">Nombre del valor: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1838">Value Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1839">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1839">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1840">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1840">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls = [
  {
    "devices": [
      {
        "product_id": 5678, 
        "vendor_id": 1234
      }
    ], 
    "urls": [
      "https://contoso.com", 
      "https://fabrikam.com"
    ]
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1841">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1841">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1842">Nombre clave de la preferencia: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1842">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1843">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1843">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>devices</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>product_id</key>
        <integer>5678</integer>
        <key>vendor_id</key>
        <integer>1234</integer>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>urls</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://contoso.com</string>
      <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
    </array>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1844">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1844">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1845">WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1845">WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1846">Permitir WebUSB en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1846">Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1847">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1847">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1848">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1848">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1849">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1849">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1850">Define una lista de sitios basada en patrones de dirección URL que pueden pedir al usuario acceso a un dispositivo USB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1850">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can ask the user for access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1851">Si no configura esta directiva se utilizará para todos los sitios el valor global predeterminado de la directiva [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) (si está establecido) o la configuración personal del usuario para todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1851">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1852">Los patrones de dirección URL definidos en esta directiva no pueden entrar en conflicto con los configurados en la directiva [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls), no se puede permitir ni bloquear una dirección URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1852">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policy - you can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1853">Para información detallada sobre los patrones de url válidos, consulte[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1853">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1854">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1854">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1855">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1855">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1856">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1856">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1857">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1857">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1858">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1858">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1859">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1859">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1860">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1860">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1861">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1861">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1862">Nombre único de GP: WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1862">GP unique name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1863">Nombre de GP: permitir WebUSB en sitios determinados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1863">GP name: Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1864">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1864">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1865">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1865">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1866">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1866">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1867">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1867">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1868">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1868">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1869">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1869">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1870">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1870">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1871">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1871">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1872">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1872">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1873">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1873">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1874">Nombre clave de la preferencia: WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1874">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1875">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1875">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1876">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1876">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1877">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1877">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1878">Bloquear WebUSB en determinados sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1878">Block WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1879">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1879">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1880">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1880">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1881">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1881">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1882">Define una lista de sitios basada en patrones de dirección URL que no pueden pedir al usuario que les conceda acceso a un dispositivo USB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1882">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't ask the user to grant them access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1883">Si no configura esta directiva se utilizará para todos los sitios el valor global predeterminado de la directiva [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) (si está establecido) o la configuración personal del usuario para todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1883">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1884">Los patrones de dirección URL en esta directiva no pueden entrar en conflicto con los configurados en la directiva [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1884">URL patterns in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1885">No puede permitir y bloquear una dirección URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1885">You can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1886">Para obtener información detallada sobre los patrones de url válidos, consulte [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1886">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1887">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1887">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1888">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1888">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1889">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1889">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1890">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1890">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1891">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1891">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1892">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1892">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1893">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1893">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1894">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1894">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1895">Nombre único de GP: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1895">GP unique name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1896">Nombre de GP: bloquear WebUSB en sitios determinados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1896">GP name: Block WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1897">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1897">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1898">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1898">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1899">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1899">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1900">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1900">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1901">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1901">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1902">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1902">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1903">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1903">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1904">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1904">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1905">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1905">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1906">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1906">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1907">Nombre clave de la preferencia: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1907">Preference Key Name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1908">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1908">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1909">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1909">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="31858-1910">Directivas del proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1910">Default search provider policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1911">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1911">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1912">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1912">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1913">Habilitar el proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1913">Enable the default search provider</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1914">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1914">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1915">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1915">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1916">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1916">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1917">Habilita la posibilidad de utilizar un proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1917">Enables the ability to use a default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1918">Si habilita esta directiva un usuario puede buscar un término escribiendo en la barra de direcciones (siempre y cuando lo que escriba no sea una URL).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1918">If you enable this policy, a user can search for a term by typing in the address bar (as long as what they type isn't a URL).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1919">Puede especificar el proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado que se utilizará habilitando el resto de las directivas de búsqueda predeterminadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1919">You can specify the default search provider to use by enabling the rest of the default search policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1920">Si éstos se dejan vacíos (no configurados) o se configuran incorrectamente, el usuario podrá elegir el proveedor predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1920">If these are left empty (not configured) or configured incorrectly, the user can choose the default provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1921">Si se deshabilita esta directiva, el usuario no podrá buscar desde la barra de direcciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1921">If you disable this policy, the user can't search from the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1922">Si habilita o deshabilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán cambiarla ni reemplazarla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1922">If you enable or disable this policy, users can't change or override it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1923">Si no configura esta política se habilita el proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado y el usuario puede elegir el proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado además de configurar la lista de proveedores de búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1923">If you don't configure this policy, the default search provider is enabled, and the user can choose the default search provider and set the search provider list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1924">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1924">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX..</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1925">A partir de Microsoft Edge 84, puede establecer esta directiva como Directiva recomendada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1925">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1926">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1926">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1927">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1927">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1928">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1928">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1929">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1929">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1930">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1930">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1931">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1931">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1932">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1932">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1933">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1933">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1934">Nombre único de GP: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1934">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1935">Nombre de GP: habilitar el proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1935">GP name: Enable the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1936">Ruta de acceso GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1936">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1937">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1937">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1938">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1938">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1939">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1939">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1940">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1940">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1941">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1941">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1942">Nombre del valor: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1942">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1943">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1943">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1944">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1944">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1945">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1945">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1946">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1946">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1947">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1947">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-1948">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1948">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1949">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1949">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1950">Codificaciones de proveedores de búsqueda predeterminadas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1950">Default search provider encodings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1951">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1951">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1952">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1952">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1953">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1953">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1954">Especifique las codificaciones de caracteres admitidas por el proveedor de búsquedas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1954">Specify the character encodings supported by the search provider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1955">Las codificaciones son nombres de página de códigos como UTF-8, GB2312 e ISO-8859-1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1955">Encodings are code page names like UTF-8, GB2312, and ISO-8859-1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1956">Se prueban en el orden indicado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1956">They are tried in the order provided.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1957">Esta directiva es opcional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1957">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1958">Si no se configura, se utilizará el valor predeterminado UTF-8.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1958">If not configured, the default, UTF-8, is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1959">Esta directiva solo se aplica si habilita las directivas [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) y [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1959">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1960">A partir de Microsoft Edge 84, puede establecer esta directiva como Directiva recomendada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1960">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1961">Si el usuario ya ha establecido un proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado, el proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado configurado por esta directiva recomendada no se agregará a la lista de proveedores de búsqueda entre los que puede elegir el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1961">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1962">Si este es el comportamiento deseado, utilice la Directiva de [ ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1962">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1963">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1963">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1964">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1964">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1965">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1965">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1966">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1966">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1967">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1967">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1968">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1968">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1969">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1969">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1970">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1970">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1971">Nombre único de GP: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1971">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1972">Nombre de GP: codificaciones de proveedores de búsqueda por defecto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1972">GP name: Default search provider encodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1973">Ruta de acceso GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1973">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1974">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1974">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1975">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1975">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1976">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1976">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1977">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1977">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1978">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1978">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1979">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1979">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1980">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1980">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1981">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1981">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\1 = UTF-8
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\2 = UTF-16
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\3 = GB2312
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\4 = ISO-8859-1

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1982">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1982">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1983">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1983">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1984">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1984">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>UTF-8</string>
  <string>UTF-16</string>
  <string>GB2312</string>
  <string>ISO-8859-1</string>
</array>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1986">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1986">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1987">Especifica la característica de búsqueda por imagen para el proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1987">Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1988">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1988">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-1989">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1989">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-1990">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1990">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-1991">Especifica la dirección URL del motor de búsqueda utilizado para la búsqueda de imágenes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1991">Specifies the URL to the search engine used for image search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1992">Las solicitudes de búsqueda se envían mediante el método GET.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1992">Search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1993">Esta directiva es opcional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1993">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-1994">Si no la configura, la búsqueda de imágenes no estará disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1994">If you don't configure it, image search isn't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1995">Especifique la dirección URL de la búsqueda de imágenes de Bing como: '{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1995">Specify Bing's Image Search URL as: '{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1996">Especifique la dirección URL de la búsqueda de imágenes de Google como: '{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1996">Specify Google's Image Search URL as: '{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1997">Vea la directiva [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) para terminar de configurar la búsqueda de imágenes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1997">See [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) policy to finish configuring image search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1998">Esta directiva solo se aplica si habilita las directivas [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) y [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1998">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-1999">A partir de Microsoft Edge 84, puede establecer esta directiva como Directiva recomendada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-1999">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2000">Si el usuario ya ha establecido un proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado, el proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado configurado por esta directiva recomendada no se agregará a la lista de proveedores de búsqueda entre los que puede elegir el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2000">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2001">Si este es el comportamiento deseado, utilice la Directiva de [ ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2001">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2002">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2002">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2003">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2003">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2004">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2004">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2005">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2005">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2006">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2006">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2007">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2007">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2008">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2008">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2009">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2009">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2010">Nombre único de GP: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2010">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2011">Nombre de GP: especifica la característica de búsqueda por imagen para el proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2011">GP name: Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2012">Ruta de acceso GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2012">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2013">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2013">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2014">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2014">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2015">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2015">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2016">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2016">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2017">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2017">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2018">Nombre del valor: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2018">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2019">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2019">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2020">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2020">Example value:</span></span>
```
https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2021">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2021">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2022">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2022">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2023">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2023">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload</string>
```
