  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2025">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2025">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2026">Parámetros para una URL de imagen que utiliza POST</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2026">Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2027">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2027">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2028">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2028">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2029">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2029">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2030">Si habilita esta directiva, especificará los parámetros que se utilizan cuando se realiza una búsqueda de imágenes que utiliza POST.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2030">If you enable this policy, it specifies the parameters used when an image search that uses POST is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2031">La directiva consiste en pares nombre/valor separados por comas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2031">The policy consists of comma-separated name/value pairs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2032">Si un valor es un parámetro de plantilla como {imageThumbnail} en el ejemplo anterior, se reemplaza con datos de miniaturas de imágenes reales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2032">If a value is a template parameter, like {imageThumbnail} in the preceding example, it's replaced with real image thumbnail data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2033">Esta directiva solo se aplica si habilita las directivas [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) y [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2033">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2034">Especifica la dirección URL de búsqueda de imágenes desde los parámetros post de Bing como: 'imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2034">Specify Bing's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2035">Especifica la dirección URL de búsqueda de imágenes de los parámetros post de Google como: 'encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2035">Specify Google's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2036">Si no establece esta directiva, las solicitudes de búsqueda de imágenes se envían mediante el método GET.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2036">If you don't set this policy, image search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2037">A partir de Microsoft Edge 84, puede establecer esta directiva como Directiva recomendada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2037">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2038">Si el usuario ya ha establecido un proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado, el proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado configurado por esta directiva recomendada no se agregará a la lista de proveedores de búsqueda entre los que puede elegir el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2038">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2039">Si este es el comportamiento deseado, utilice la Directiva de [ ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2039">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2040">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2040">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2041">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2041">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2042">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2042">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2043">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2043">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2044">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2044">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2045">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2045">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2046">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2046">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2047">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2047">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2048">Nombre único de GP: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2048">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2049">Nombre de GP: parámetros para una dirección URL de imagen que utiliza POST</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2049">GP name: Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2050">Ruta de acceso GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2050">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2051">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2051">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2052">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2052">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2053">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2053">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2054">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2054">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2055">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2055">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2056">Nombre del valor: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2056">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2057">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2057">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2058">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2058">Example value:</span></span>
```
content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2059">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2059">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2060">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2060">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2061">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2061">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2062">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2062">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2063">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2063">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2064">Proveedor de palabras clave predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2064">Default search provider keyword</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2065">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2065">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2066">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2066">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2067">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2067">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2068">Especifica la palabra clave, que es el método abreviado que se usa en la barra de direcciones para desencadenar la búsqueda de este proveedor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2068">Specifies the keyword, which is the shortcut used in the Address Bar to trigger the search for this provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2069">Esta directiva es opcional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2069">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2070">Si no lo configura, ninguna palabra clave activará el proveedor de búsquedas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2070">If you don't configure it, no keyword activates the search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2071">Esta directiva solo se aplica si habilita las directivas [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) y [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2071">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2072">A partir de Microsoft Edge 84, puede establecer esta directiva como Directiva recomendada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2072">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2073">Si el usuario ya ha establecido un proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado, el proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado configurado por esta directiva recomendada no se agregará a la lista de proveedores de búsqueda entre los que puede elegir el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2073">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2074">Si este es el comportamiento deseado, utilice la Directiva de [ ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2074">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2075">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2075">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2076">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2076">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2077">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2077">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2078">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2078">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2079">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2079">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2080">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2080">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2081">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2081">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2082">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2082">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2083">Nombre único de GP: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2083">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2084">Nombre de GP: palabra clave del proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2084">GP name: Default search provider keyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2085">Ruta de acceso GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2085">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2086">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2086">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2087">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2087">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2088">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2088">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2089">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2089">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2090">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2090">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2091">Nombre del valor: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2091">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2092">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2092">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2093">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2093">Example value:</span></span>
```
mis
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2094">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2094">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2095">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2095">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2096">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2096">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>mis</string>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2098">DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2098">DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2099">Nombre del proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2099">Default search provider name</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2100">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2100">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2101">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2101">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2102">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2102">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2103">Especifica el nombre del proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2103">Specifies the name of the default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2104">Si habilita esta directiva, establece el nombre del proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2104">If you enable this policy, you set the name of the default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2105">Si no habilita esta directiva o la deja vacía, se utilizará el nombre del servidor especificado por la dirección URL de búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2105">If you don't enable this policy or if you leave it empty, the host name specified by the search URL is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2106">"DefaultSearchProviderName" debe establecerse en un proveedor de búsqueda cifradas aprobado por la organización que se corresponda con el proveedor de búsquedas cifradas definido en DTBC-0008.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2106">'DefaultSearchProviderName' should be set to an organization-approved encrypted search provider that corresponds to the encrypted search provider set in DTBC-0008.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2107">Esta directiva solo se aplica si habilita las directivas [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) y [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2107">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2108">A partir de Microsoft Edge 84, puede establecer esta directiva como Directiva recomendada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2108">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2109">Si el usuario ya ha establecido un proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado, el proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado configurado por esta directiva recomendada no se agregará a la lista de proveedores de búsqueda entre los que puede elegir el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2109">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2110">Si este es el comportamiento deseado, utilice la Directiva de [ ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2110">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2111">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2111">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2112">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2112">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2113">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2113">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2114">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2114">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2115">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2115">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2116">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2116">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2117">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2117">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2118">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2118">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2119">Nombre único de GP: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2119">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2120">Nombre de GP: nombre del proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2120">GP name: Default search provider name</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2121">Ruta de acceso GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2121">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2122">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2122">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2123">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2123">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2124">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2124">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2125">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2125">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2126">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2126">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2127">Nombre del valor: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2127">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2128">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2128">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2129">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2129">Example value:</span></span>
```
My Intranet Search
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2130">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2130">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2131">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2131">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2132">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2132">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>My Intranet Search</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2133">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2133">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2134">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2134">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2135">URL de búsqueda del proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2135">Default search provider search URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2136">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2136">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2137">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2137">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2138">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2138">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2139">Especifica la dirección URL del motor de búsqueda utilizado para la búsqueda predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2139">Specifies the URL of the search engine used for a default search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2140">La dirección URL contiene la cadena "{searchTerms}", que se reemplaza en el momento de la consulta por los términos que está buscando el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2140">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the terms the user is searching for.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2141">Especifica la dirección URL de búsqueda de Bing como:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2141">Specify Bing's search URL as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2142">'{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2142">'{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2143">Especifique la dirección URL de la búsqueda de Google como: '{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2143">Specify Google's search URL as: '{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2144">Esta directiva es necesaria cuando se habilita la directiva de [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) si no habilita esta última directiva, se omitirá.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2144">This policy is required when you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) policy; if you don't enable the latter policy, this policy is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2145">A partir de Microsoft Edge 84, puede establecer esta directiva como Directiva recomendada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2145">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2146">Si el usuario ya ha establecido un proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado, el proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado configurado por esta directiva recomendada no se agregará a la lista de proveedores de búsqueda entre los que puede elegir el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2146">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2147">Si este es el comportamiento deseado, utilice la Directiva de [ ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2147">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2148">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2148">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2149">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2149">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2150">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2150">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2151">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2151">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2152">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2152">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2153">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2153">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2154">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2154">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2155">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2155">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2156">Nombre único de GP: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2156">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2157">Nombre de GP: dirección URL de búsqueda para el proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2157">GP name: Default search provider search URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2158">Ruta de acceso GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2158">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2159">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2159">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2160">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2160">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2161">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2161">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2162">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2162">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2163">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2163">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2164">Nombre del valor: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2164">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2165">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2165">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2166">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2166">Example value:</span></span>
```
https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2167">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2167">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2168">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2168">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2169">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2169">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2170">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2170">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2171">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2171">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2172">URL del proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado para sugerencias</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2172">Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2173">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2173">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2174">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2174">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2175">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2175">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2176">Especifica la dirección URL del motor de búsqueda utilizado para ofrecer sugerencias de búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2176">Specifies the URL for the search engine used to provide search suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2177">La dirección URL contiene la cadena "{searchTerms}", que se reemplaza en el momento de la consulta por el texto que el usuario ha introducido de momento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2177">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the text the user has entered so far.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2178">Esta directiva es opcional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2178">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2179">Si no lo configuras, los usuarios no verán sugerencias de búsqueda; verán sugerencias de su historial de exploración y de sus favoritos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2179">If you don't configure it, users won't see search suggestions; they will see suggestions from their browsing history and favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2180">La dirección URL sugerida por Bing puede ser especificada como:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2180">Bing's suggest URL can be specified as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2181">'{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2181">'{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2182">La dirección URL sugerida por Google se puede especificar como: '{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2182">Google's suggest URL can be specified as: '{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2183">Esta directiva solo se aplica si habilita las directivas [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) y [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2183">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2184">A partir de Microsoft Edge 84, puede establecer esta directiva como Directiva recomendada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2184">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2185">Si el usuario ya ha establecido un proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado, el proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado configurado por esta directiva recomendada no se agregará a la lista de proveedores de búsqueda entre los que puede elegir el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2185">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2186">Si este es el comportamiento deseado, utilice la Directiva de [ ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2186">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2187">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2187">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2188">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2188">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2189">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2189">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2190">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2190">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2191">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2191">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2192">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2192">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2193">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2193">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2194">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2194">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2195">Nombre único de GP: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2195">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2196">Nombre de GP: dirección URL del proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado para sugerencias</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2196">GP name: Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2197">Ruta de acceso GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2197">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2198">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2198">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2199">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2199">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2200">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2200">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2201">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2201">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2202">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2202">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2203">Nombre del valor: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2203">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2204">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2204">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2205">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2205">Example value:</span></span>
```
https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2206">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2206">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2207">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2207">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2208">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2208">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2209">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2209">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2210">NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2210">NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2211">Configurar la nueva experiencia del cuadro de búsqueda de la página de pestañas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2211">Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2212">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2212">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2213">En Windows y MacOS desde 85 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2213">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2214">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2214">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2215">Puede configurar el cuadro de búsqueda de la página de la nueva pestaña para que use "cuadro de búsqueda (recomendado)" o "barra de direcciones" para buscar en nuevas pestañas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2215">You can configure the new tab page search box to use "Search box (Recommended)" or "Address bar" to search on new tabs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2216">Esta directiva solo funciona si configura el motor de búsqueda en un valor distinto de Bing al establecer las dos directivas siguientes: [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) y [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2216">This policy only works if you set the search engine to a value other than Bing by setting the following two policies: [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="31858-2217">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2217">If you disable or don't configure this policy and:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="31858-2218">Si el motor de búsqueda predeterminado de la barra de direcciones es Bing, en la página de la nueva pestaña se usa el cuadro de búsqueda para buscar en nuevas pestañas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2218">If the address bar default search engine is Bing, the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="31858-2219">Si el motor de búsqueda predeterminado de la barra de direcciones no es de Bing, se ofrece a los usuarios una opción adicional (use "barra de direcciones") al buscar en nuevas pestañas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2219">If the address bar default search engine is not Bing, users are offered an additional choice (use "Address bar") when searching on new tabs.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="31858-2220">Si habilita esta directiva y la configura como:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2220">If you enable this policy and set it to:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="31858-2221">"Cuadro de búsqueda (recomendado)" (' Bing '), en la página de la nueva pestaña se usa el cuadro de búsqueda para buscar en nuevas pestañas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2221">"Search box (Recommended)" ('bing'), the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="31858-2222">"Barra de direcciones" ("redirigir"), el cuadro de búsqueda de la página de la nueva pestaña usa la barra de direcciones para buscar en nuevas pestañas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2222">"Address bar" ('redirect'), the new tab page search box uses the address bar to search on new tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2223">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2223">Policy options mapping:</span></span>
        

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-2224">Bing (bing) = cuadro de búsqueda (recomendado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2224">bing (bing) = Search box (Recommended)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-2225">redirigir (redirigir) = barra de direcciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2225">redirect (redirect) = Address bar</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2226">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2226">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2227">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2227">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2228">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2228">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2229">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2229">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2230">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2230">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2231">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2231">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2232">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2232">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2233">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2233">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2234">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2234">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2235">Nombre único de GP: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2235">GP unique name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2236">Nombre GP: configurar la nueva página de la pestaña buscar en el cuadro de búsqueda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2236">GP name: Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2237">Ruta de acceso GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2237">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2238">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2238">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2239">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2239">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2240">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2240">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2241">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2241">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2242">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2242">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2243">Nombre del valor: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2243">Value Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2244">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2244">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2245">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2245">Example value:</span></span>
```
bing
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2246">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2246">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2247">Nombre clave de la preferencia: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2247">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2248">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2248">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>bing</string>
```
