  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2251">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2251">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2252">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2252">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2253">Configurar los tipos de extensión permitidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2253">Configure allowed extension types</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2254">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2254">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2255">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2255">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2256">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2256">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2257">Controla qué tipos de extensión se pueden instalar y limita el acceso en tiempo de ejecución.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2257">Controls which extension types can be installed and limits runtime access.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2258">Esta configuración define los tipos de extensiones permitidas y los hosts con los que pueden interactuar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2258">This setting defines the allowed types of extensions and which hosts they can interact with.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2259">El valor es una lista de cadenas, cada una de las cuales debe ser una de las siguientes: "extension", "theme", "user_script", y "hosted_app".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2259">The value is a list of strings, each of which should be one of the following: "extension", "theme", "user_script", and "hosted_app".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2260">Vea la documentación de las extensiones de Microsoft Edge para obtener más información sobre estos tipos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2260">See the Microsoft Edge extensions documentation for more information on these types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2261">Tenga en cuenta que esta directiva también afecta a las extensiones que se instalen a la fuerza mediante el uso de la directiva [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2261">Note that this policy also affects extensions to be force-installed by using [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2262">Si habilita esta directiva, solo se instalarán las extensiones que coincidan con un tipo de la lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2262">If you enable this policy, only extensions that match a type in the list are installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2263">Si no configura esta directiva, no se aplicarán restricciones a los tipos de extensión aceptables.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2263">If you don't configure this policy, no restrictions on the acceptable extension types are enforced.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2264">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2264">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2265">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2265">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2266">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2266">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2267">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2267">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2268">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2268">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2269">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2269">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2270">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2270">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2271">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2271">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2272">Nombre único de GP: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2272">GP unique name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2273">Nombre de GP: configurar los tipos de extensiones permitidas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2273">GP name: Configure allowed extension types</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2274">Ruta de acceso de GP: (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Extensiones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2274">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2275">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2275">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2276">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2276">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2277">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2277">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2278">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2278">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2279">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2279">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2280">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2280">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2281">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2281">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2282">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2282">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes\1 = hosted_app

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2283">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2283">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2284">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2284">Preference Key Name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2285">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2285">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>hosted_app</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2286">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2286">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2287">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2287">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2288">Permitir que se instalen extensiones específicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2288">Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2289">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2289">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2290">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2290">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2291">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2291">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2292">Se permiten todas las extensiones de forma predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2292">By default, all extensions are allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2293">Sin embargo, si bloquea todas las extensiones configurando la directiva "ExtensionInstallBlockList" en "\*", los usuarios solo podrán instalar las extensiones definidas en esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2293">However, if you block all extensions by setting the 'ExtensionInstallBlockList' policy to "\*," users can only install extensions defined in this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2294">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2294">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2295">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2295">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2296">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2296">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2297">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2297">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2298">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2298">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2299">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2299">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2300">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2300">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2301">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2301">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2302">Nombre único de GP: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2302">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2303">Nombre de GP: permitir la instalación de extensiones específicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2303">GP name: Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2304">Ruta de acceso de GP: (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Extensiones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2304">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2305">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2305">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2306">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2306">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2307">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2307">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2308">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2308">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2309">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2309">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2310">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2310">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2311">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2311">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2312">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2312">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\1 = extension_id1
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\2 = extension_id2

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2313">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2313">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2314">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2314">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2315">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2315">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2316">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2316">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2317">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2317">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2318">Controlar qué extensiones no se pueden instalar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2318">Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2319">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2319">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2320">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2320">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2321">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2321">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2322">Lista extensiones específicas que los usuarios no pueden instalar en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2322">List specific extensions that users can NOT install in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2323">Al implementar esta directiva cualquier extensión de esta lista que haya sido instalada previamente será deshabilitada y el usuario no podrá habilitarla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2323">When you deploy this policy, any extensions on this list that were previously installed will be disabled, and the user won't be able to enable them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2324">Si elimina un elemento de la lista de extensiones bloqueadas, esa extensión se volverá a habilitar automáticamente en cualquier lugar en el que se haya instalado previamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2324">If you remove an item from the list of blocked extensions, that extension is automatically re-enabled anywhere it was previously installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2325">Use "\*" para bloquear todas las extensiones que no estén explícitamente listadas en la lista de permisos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2325">Use "\*" to block all extensions that aren't explicitly listed in the allow list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2326">Si no configura esta directiva los usuarios podrán instalar cualquier extensión en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2326">If you don't configure this policy, users can install any extension in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2327">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2327">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2328">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2328">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2329">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2329">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2330">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2330">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2331">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2331">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2332">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2332">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2333">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2333">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2334">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2334">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2335">Nombre único de GP: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2335">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2336">Nombre de GP: controlar qué extensiones no pueden ser instaladas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2336">GP name: Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2337">Ruta de acceso de GP: (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Extensiones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2337">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2338">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2338">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2339">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2339">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2340">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2340">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2341">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2341">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2342">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2342">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2343">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2343">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2344">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2344">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2345">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2345">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\1 = extension_id1
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\2 = extension_id2

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2346">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2346">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2347">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2347">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2348">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2348">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2349">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2349">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2350">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2350">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2351">Controlar qué extensiones se instalan de forma silenciosa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2351">Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2352">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2352">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2353">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2353">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2354">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2354">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2355">Especifica las extensiones que se instalan silenciosamente, sin interacción del usuario, y que los usuarios no pueden desinstalar ni deshabilitar ("forzar instalación").</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2355">Specifies extensions that are installed silently, without user interaction, and that the users can't uninstall or disable ("force-installed").</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2356">Todos los permisos solicitados por las extensiones se conceden de forma implícita, sin interacción del usuario, incluyendo todos los permisos adicionales solicitados por las futuras versiones de la extensión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2356">All permissions requested by the extensions are granted implicitly, without user interaction, including any additional permissions requested by future versions of the extension.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2357">Además, se conceden permisos para las API de extensión enterprise.deviceAttributes y enterprise.platformKeys.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2357">Furthermore, permissions are granted for the enterprise.deviceAttributes and enterprise.platformKeys extension APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2358">(Estas dos API sólo están disponibles para las extensiones que se instalan a la fuerza).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2358">(These two APIs are only available to extensions that are force-installed.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2359">Esta directiva tiene prioridad sobre una directiva potencialmente conflictiva de [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2359">This policy takes precedence over a potentially conflicting [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2360">Cuando se quita una extensión de la lista forzar instalación, Microsoft Edge la desinstala automáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2360">When you take an extension off of the force-installed list it's automatically uninstalled by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2361">En el caso de los dispositivos de Windows que no están unidos a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, la instalación forzada se limita a las extensiones disponibles en Microsoft Store.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2361">For Windows devices that aren't joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, forced installation is limited to extensions available in the Microsoft Store.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2362">Tenga en cuenta que los usuarios pueden modificar el código fuente de cualquier extensión mediante el uso de herramientas de desarrollo, lo que podría hacer que la extensión fuera disfuncional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2362">Note that users can modify the source code of any extension by using Developer Tools, potentially rendering the extension dysfunctional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2363">Si esto le preocupa, establezca la directiva [DeveloperToolsAvailability](#developertoolsavailability).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2363">If this is a concern, set the [DeveloperToolsAvailability](#developertoolsavailability) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2364">Utilice el siguiente formato para agregar una extensión a la lista:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2364">Use the following format to add an extension to the list:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2365">[extensionID];[updateURL]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2365">[extensionID];[updateURL]</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="31858-2366">extensionID: es la cadena de 32 letras que se encuentra en edge://extensiones cuando está en modo de programador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2366">extensionID - the 32-letter string found on edge://extensions when in developer mode.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="31858-2367">updateURL (opcional) es la dirección del documento XML del manifiesto de actualización para la aplicación o extensión, como se describe en [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2367">updateURL (optional) is the address of the Update Manifest XML document for the app or extension, as described at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2368">Si desea instalar una extensión desde el almacén Web de Chrome, proporcione la dirección URL de la actualización de almacenes Web de Chrome, https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2368">If you want to install an extension from the Chrome Web Store, provide the Chrome Web Store update URL, https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2369">Tenga en cuenta que la dirección URL de actualización establecida en esta directiva sólo se utiliza para la instalación inicial; las actualizaciones posteriores de la extensión utilizan la dirección URL de actualización indicada en el manifiesto de la extensión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2369">Note that the update URL set in this policy is only used for the initial installation; subsequent updates of the extension use the update URL indicated in the extension's manifest.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2370">Si no define el updateURL, se presupone que la extensión está hospedada en Microsoft Store y se usa la siguiente URL de actualización (https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2370">If you don't set the updateURL, the extension is assumed to be hosted in Microsoft Store and the following update URL is used (https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2371">Por ejemplo, gggmmkjegpiggikcnhidnjjhmicpibll;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx instala la aplicación Microsoft Online desde la dirección URL de "actualización" de Microsoft Store.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2371">For example, gggmmkjegpiggikcnhidnjjhmicpibll;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx installs the Microsoft Online app from the Microsoft Store "update" URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2372">Para obtener más información sobre las extensiones de hospedaje vea: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095044](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095044).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2372">For more information about hosting extensions, see: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095044](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095044).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2373">Si no configura esta directiva, no se instalarán extensiones automáticamente y los usuarios podrán desinstalar cualquier extensión en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2373">If you don't configure this policy, no extensions are installed automatically, and users can uninstall any extension in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2374">Tenga en cuenta que esta directiva no se aplica al modo InPrivate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2374">Note that this policy doesn't apply to InPrivate mode.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2375">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2375">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2376">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2376">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2377">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2377">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2378">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2378">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2379">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2379">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2380">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2380">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2381">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2381">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2382">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2382">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2383">Nombre único de GP: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2383">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2384">Nombre de GP: Controlar qué extensiones se instalan de forma silenciosa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2384">GP name: Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2385">Ruta de acceso de GP: (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Extensiones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2385">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2386">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2386">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2387">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2387">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2388">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2388">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2389">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2389">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2390">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2390">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2391">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2391">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2392">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2392">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2393">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2393">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\1 = gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\2 = abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2394">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2394">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2395">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2395">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2396">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2396">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx</string>
  <string>abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2397">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2397">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2398">ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2398">ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2399">Configurar la extensión y los orígenes de instalación de los scripts de usuario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2399">Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2400">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2400">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2401">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2401">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2402">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2402">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2403">Defina las direcciones URL que pueden instalar extensiones y temas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2403">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2404">De forma predeterminada, los usuarios tienen que descargar un archivo \*.crx para cada extensión o script que quieran instalar, y luego arrastrarlo hasta la página de configuración de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2404">By default, users have to download a \*.crx file for each extension or script they want to install, and then drag it onto the Microsoft Edge settings page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2405">Esta directiva permite que las direcciones URL específicas que se utilizan instalen la extensión o el script para el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2405">This policy lets specific URLs use install the extension or script for the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2406">Cada elemento de esta lista es un patrón de coincidencia de estilo de extensión (vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2406">Each item in this list is an extension-style match pattern (see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2407">Los usuarios pueden instalar fácilmente elementos desde cualquier dirección URL que coincida con un elemento de esta lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2407">Users can easily install items from any URL that matches an item in this list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2408">Tanto la ubicación del archivo \*.crx como la página desde la que se inicia la descarga (en otras palabras, la de referencia) deben estar permitidas por estos patrones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2408">Both the location of the \*.crx file and the page where the download is started from (in other words, the referrer) must be allowed by these patterns.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2409">La directiva [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) tiene prioridad sobre esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2409">The [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy takes precedence over this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2410">Las extensiones que se encuentren en la lista de bloqueados no se instalarán, incluso si proviene de un sitio de esta lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2410">Any extensions that's on the block list won't be installed, even if it comes from a site on this list.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2411">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2411">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2412">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2412">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2413">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2413">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2414">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2414">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2415">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2415">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2416">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2416">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2417">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2417">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2418">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2418">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2419">Nombre único de GP: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2419">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2420">Nombre de GP: configurar la extensión y los orígenes de instalación de los scripts del usuario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2420">GP name: Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2421">Ruta de acceso de GP: (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Extensiones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2421">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2422">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2422">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2423">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2423">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2424">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2424">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2425">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2425">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2426">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2426">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2427">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2427">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2428">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2428">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2429">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2429">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources\1 = https://corp.contoso.com/*

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2430">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2430">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2431">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2431">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2432">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2432">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://corp.contoso.com/*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2433">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2433">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2434">ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2434">ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2435">Configurar la administración de la extensión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2435">Configure extension management settings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2436">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2436">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2437">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2437">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2438">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2438">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2439">Configura los parámetros de la administración de extensiones para Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2439">Configures extension management settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2440">Esta directiva controla múltiples parámetros, incluyendo los parámetros controlados por cualquier directiva existente relacionada con las extensiones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2440">This policy controls multiple settings, including settings controlled by any existing extension-related policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2441">Esta directiva reemplaza las directivas heredadas si ambas están establecidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2441">This policy overrides any legacy policies if both are set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2442">Esta directiva asigna un id. de extensión o una dirección URL de actualización a su configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2442">This policy maps an extension ID or an update URL to its configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2443">Con un id. de extensión, la configuración se aplica solo a la extensión especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2443">With an extension ID, the configuration is applied only to the specified extension.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2444">Establezca una configuración predeterminada para el id. especial "\*" para que se aplique a todas las extensiones que no estén específicamente enumeradas en esta política.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2444">Set a default configuration for the special ID "\*", to apply to all extensions that aren't specifically listed in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2445">Con una dirección URL de actualización, la configuración se aplica a todas las extensiones con la dirección URL de actualización exacta indicada en el manifiesto de esta extensión, como se describe en [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2445">With an update URL, the configuration is applied to all extensions with the exact update URL stated in manifest of this extension, as described at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2446">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2446">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2447">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2447">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2448">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2448">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2449">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2449">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2450">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2450">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2451">Diccionario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2451">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2452">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2452">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2453">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2453">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2454">Nombre único de GP: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2454">GP unique name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2455">Nombre de GP: configurar los ajustes de administración de la extensión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2455">GP name: Configure extension management settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2456">Ruta de acceso de GP: (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Extensiones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2456">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2457">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2457">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2458">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2458">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2459">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2459">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2460">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2460">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2461">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2461">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2462">Nombre del valor: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2462">Value Name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2463">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2463">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2464">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2464">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {
  "*": {
    "allowed_types": [
      "hosted_app"
    ], 
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "downloads", 
      "bookmarks"
    ], 
    "install_sources": [
      "https://company-intranet/apps"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "blocked", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ]
  }, 
  "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "history"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed", 
    "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"
  }, 
  "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "force_installed", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"
  }, 
  "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", 
    "installation_mode": "removed"
  }, 
  "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "wallpaper"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed"
  }
}
```
