  ## <span data-ttu-id="31858-2469">Directivas de autenticación HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2469">HTTP authentication policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2470">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2470">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2471">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2471">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2472">Permitir solicitudes HTTP básicas entre orígenes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2472">Allow cross-origin HTTP Basic Auth prompts</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2473">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2473">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2474">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2474">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2475">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2475">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2476">Controla si el subcontenido de terceros en una página puede abrir un cuadro de diálogo de autenticación básica HTTP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2476">Controls whether third-party sub-content on a page can open an HTTP Basic Auth dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2477">Generalmente, esto está deshabilitado como defensa contra la suplantación de identidad (phishing).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2477">Typically, this is disabled as a phishing defense.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2478">Si no configura esta directiva, se deshabilitará y el subcontenido de terceros no podrá abrir un cuadro de diálogo de autenticación básica HTTP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2478">If you don't configure this policy, it's disabled and third-party sub-content can't open a HTTP Basic Auth dialog box.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2479">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2479">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2480">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2480">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2481">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2481">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2482">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2482">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2483">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2483">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2484">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2484">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2485">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2485">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2486">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2486">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2487">Nombre único de GP: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2487">GP unique name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2488">Nombre de GP: permitir solicitudes HTTP básicas entre orígenes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2488">GP name: Allow cross-origin HTTP Basic Auth prompts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2489">Ruta de acceso GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/autenticación HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2489">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2490">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2490">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2491">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2491">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2492">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2492">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2493">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2493">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2494">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2494">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2495">Nombre del valor: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2495">Value Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2496">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2496">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2497">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2497">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2498">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2498">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2499">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2499">Preference Key Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2500">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2500">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2501">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2501">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2502">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2502">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2503">Especifica una lista de servidores en los que Microsoft Edge puede delegar credenciales de usuario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2503">Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2504">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2504">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2505">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2505">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2506">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2506">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2507">Configura la lista de servidores en los que Microsoft Edge puede delegar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2507">Configure the list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2508">Separa los nombres de los servidores con comas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2508">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2509">Se permiten los comodines (\*).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2509">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2510">Si no configura esta directiva, Microsoft Edge no delegará las credenciales de usuario aunque se detecte un servidor como intranet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2510">If you don't configure this policy Microsoft Edge won't delegate user credentials even if a server is detected as Intranet.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2511">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2511">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2512">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2512">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2513">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2513">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2514">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2514">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2515">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2515">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2516">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2516">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2517">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2517">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2518">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2518">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2519">Nombre único de GP: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2519">GP unique name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2520">Nombre de GP: especificar una lista de servidores en los que Microsoft Edge puede delegar credenciales de usuario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2520">GP name: Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2521">Ruta de acceso GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/autenticación HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2521">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2522">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2522">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2523">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2523">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2524">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2524">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2525">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2525">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2526">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2526">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2527">Nombre del valor: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2527">Value Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2528">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2528">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2529">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2529">Example value:</span></span>
```
contoso.com
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2530">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2530">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2531">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2531">Preference Key Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2532">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2532">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2533">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2533">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2534">AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2534">AuthSchemes</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2535">Esquemas de autenticación compatibles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2535">Supported authentication schemes</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2536">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2536">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2537">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2537">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2538">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2538">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2539">Especifica qué esquemas de autenticación HTTP son compatibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2539">Specifies which HTTP authentication schemes are supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2540">Puede configurar la directiva usando estos valores: "básico", "implícito", "NTLM" y "negociar".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2540">You can configure the policy by using these values: 'basic', 'digest', 'ntlm', and 'negotiate'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2541">Separa los valores múltiples con comas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2541">Separate multiple values with commas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2542">Si no configura esta directiva se utilizarán los cuatro esquemas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2542">If you don't configure this policy, all four schemes are used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2543">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2543">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2544">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2544">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2545">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2545">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2546">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2546">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2547">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2547">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2548">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2548">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2549">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2549">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2550">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2550">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2551">Nombre único de GP: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2551">GP unique name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2552">Nombre de GP: esquemas de autenticación admitidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2552">GP name: Supported authentication schemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2553">Ruta de acceso GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/autenticación HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2553">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2554">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2554">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2555">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2555">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2556">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2556">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2557">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2557">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2558">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2558">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2559">Nombre del valor: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2559">Value Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2560">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2560">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2561">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2561">Example value:</span></span>
```
basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2562">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2562">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2563">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2563">Preference Key Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2564">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2564">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2565">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2565">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2566">AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2566">AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2567">Configurar la lista de servidores de autenticación permitidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2567">Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2568">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2568">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2569">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2569">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2570">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2570">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2571">Especifica qué servidores habilitar para la autenticación integrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2571">Specifies which servers to enable for integrated authentication.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2572">La autenticación integrada solo está habilitada cuando Microsoft Edge recibe un desafío de autenticación de un proxy o de un servidor de esta lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2572">Integrated authentication is only enabled when Microsoft Edge receives an authentication challenge from a proxy or from a server in this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2573">Separa los nombres de los servidores con comas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2573">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2574">Se permiten los comodines (\*).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2574">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2575">Si no configura esta directiva, Microsoft Edge intentará detectar si un servidor está en la intranet, solo entonces responderá a las solicitudes de IWA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2575">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to detect if a server is on the intranet - only then will it respond to IWA requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2576">Si el servidor se encuentra en Internet, Microsoft Edge ignorará las solicitudes de IWA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2576">If the server is on the internet, IWA requests from it are ignored by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2577">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2577">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2578">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2578">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2579">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2579">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2580">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2580">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2581">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2581">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2582">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2582">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2583">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2583">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2584">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2584">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2585">Nombre único de GP: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2585">GP unique name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2586">Nombre de GP: configurar la lista de servidores de autenticación permitidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2586">GP name: Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2587">Ruta de acceso GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/autenticación HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2587">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2588">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2588">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2589">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2589">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2590">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2590">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2591">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2591">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2592">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2592">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2593">Nombre del valor: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2593">Value Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2594">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2594">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2595">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2595">Example value:</span></span>
```
*contoso.com,contoso.com
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2596">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2596">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2597">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2597">Preference Key Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2598">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2598">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>*contoso.com,contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2599">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2599">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2600">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2600">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2601">Deshabilitar la búsqueda CNAME al negociar la autenticación Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2601">Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2602">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2602">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2603">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2603">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2604">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2604">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2605">Determina si el SPN de Kerberos generado se basa en el nombre DNS canónico (CNAME) o en el nombre original introducido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2605">Determines whether the generated Kerberos SPN is based on the canonical DNS name (CNAME) or on the original name entered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2606">Si habilita esta directiva, se omitirá la búsqueda del CNAME y se utilizará el nombre del servidor (tal y como se ha introducido).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2606">If you enable this policy, CNAME lookup is skipped and the server name (as entered) is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2607">Si deshabilita esta directiva o no la configura, se utilizará el nombre canónico del servidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2607">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, the canonical name of the server is used.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2608">Esto se determina a través de la búsqueda del CNAME.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2608">This is determined through CNAME lookup.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2609">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2609">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2610">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2610">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2611">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2611">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2612">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2612">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2613">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2613">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2614">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2614">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2615">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2615">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2616">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2616">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2617">Nombre único de GP: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2617">GP unique name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2618">Nombre de GP: deshabilitar la búsqueda de CNAME al negociar la autenticación Kerberos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2618">GP name: Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2619">Ruta de acceso GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/autenticación HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2619">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2620">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2620">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2621">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2621">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2622">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2622">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2623">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2623">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2624">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2624">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2625">Nombre del valor: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2625">Value Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2626">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2626">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2627">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2627">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2628">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2628">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2629">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2629">Preference Key Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2630">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2630">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2631">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2631">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2632">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2632">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2633">Incluir un puerto no estándar en Kerberos SPN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2633">Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2634">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2634">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2635">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2635">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2636">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2636">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2637">Especifica si el SPN de Kerberos generado debe incluir un puerto no estándar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2637">Specifies whether the generated Kerberos SPN should include a non-standard port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2638">Si habilita esta directiva y un usuario incluye un puerto no estándar (un puerto distinto al 80 o al 443) en una dirección URL, ese puerto se incluye en el SPN de Kerberos generado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2638">If you enable this policy, and a user includes a non-standard port (a port other than 80 or 443) in a URL, that port is included in the generated Kerberos SPN.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2639">Si no configura o desactiva esta directiva, el SPN de Kerberos generado no incluirá un puerto en ningún caso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2639">If you don't configure or disable this policy, the generated Kerberos SPN won't include a port in any case.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2640">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2640">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2641">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2641">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2642">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2642">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2643">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2643">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2644">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2644">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2645">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2645">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2646">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2646">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2647">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2647">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2648">Nombre único de GP: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2648">GP unique name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2649">Nombre de GP: incluir un puerto que no sea estándar en Kerberos SPN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2649">GP name: Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2650">Ruta de acceso GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/autenticación HTTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2650">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2651">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2651">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2652">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2652">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2653">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2653">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2654">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2654">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2655">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2655">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2656">Nombre del valor: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2656">Value Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2657">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2657">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2658">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2658">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2659">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2659">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2660">Nombre clave de la preferencia: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2660">Preference Key Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2661">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2661">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2663">NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2663">NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2664">Controlar si la autenticación NTLMv2 está habilitada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2664">Control whether NTLMv2 authentication is enabled</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2665">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2665">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2666">En MacOS desde la versión 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2666">On macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2667">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2667">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2668">Controla si NTLMv2 está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2668">Controls whether NTLMv2 is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2669">Todas las versiones recientes de samba y los servidores de Windows son compatibles con NTLMv2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2669">All recent versions of Samba and Windows servers support NTLMv2.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2670">Sólo debe deshabilitar NTLMv2 para resolver problemas de compatibilidad con versiones anteriores, ya que reduce la seguridad de la autenticación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2670">You should only disable NTLMv2 to address issues with backwards compatibility as it reduces the security of authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2671">Si no configura esta directiva, NTLMv2 se habilitará de forma predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2671">If you don't configure this policy, NTLMv2 is enabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2672">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2672">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2673">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2673">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2674">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2674">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2675">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2675">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2676">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2676">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2677">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2677">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2678">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2678">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2679">Nombre clave de la preferencia: NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2679">Preference Key Name: NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2680">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2680">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
