  ## <span data-ttu-id="31858-2682">Directivas de mensajería nativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2682">Native Messaging policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2683">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2683">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2684">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2684">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2685">Controlar cuáles hosts de mensajería nativo pueden utilizar los usuarios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2685">Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2686">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2686">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2687">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2687">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2688">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2688">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2689">Enumera los hosts de mensajería nativos específicos que los usuarios pueden utilizar en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2689">List specific native messaging hosts that users can use in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2690">De forma predeterminada, se permiten todos los hosts de mensajería nativa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2690">By default, all native messaging hosts are allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2691">Si establece la directiva [NativeMessagingBlocklist](#nativemessagingblocklist) en \*, todos los hosts de mensajería nativa se bloquearán y solo se cargarán los hosts de mensajería nativa que figuran en esta lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2691">If you set the [NativeMessagingBlocklist](#nativemessagingblocklist) policy to \*, all native messaging hosts are blocked, and only native messaging hosts listed in here are loaded.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2692">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2692">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2693">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2693">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2694">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2694">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2695">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2695">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2696">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2696">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2697">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2697">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2698">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2698">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2699">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2699">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2700">Nombre único de GP: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2700">GP unique name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2701">Nombre de GP: controlar cuáles son los servidores de mensajería nativos que pueden usar los usuarios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2701">GP name: Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2702">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Mensajería nativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2702">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2703">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2703">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2704">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2704">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2705">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2705">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2706">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2706">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2707">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2707">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2708">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2708">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2709">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2709">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2710">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2710">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\1 = com.native.messaging.host.name1
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\2 = com.native.messaging.host.name2

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2711">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2711">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2712">Nombre clave de la preferencia: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2712">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2713">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2713">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2714">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2714">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2715">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2715">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2716">Configurar la lista de bloqueados de la mensajería nativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2716">Configure native messaging block list</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2717">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2717">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2718">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2718">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2719">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2719">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2720">Especifica los hosts de mensajería nativa que no se deben usar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2720">Specifies which native messaging hosts that shouldn't be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2721">Use "\*" para bloquear todos los hosts de mensajería nativa, excepto si aparecen explícitamente en la lista de permitidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2721">Use '\*' to block all native messaging hosts unless they are explicitly listed in the allow list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2722">Si no configura esta directiva Microsoft Edge cargará todos los hosts de mensajería nativa instalados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2722">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will load all installed native messaging hosts.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2723">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2723">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2724">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2724">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2725">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2725">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2726">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2726">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2727">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2727">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2728">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2728">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2729">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2729">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2730">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2730">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2731">Nombre único de GP: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2731">GP unique name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2732">Nombre de GP: configurar la lista de elementos bloqueados de la mensajería nativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2732">GP name: Configure native messaging block list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2733">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Mensajería nativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2733">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2734">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2734">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2735">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2735">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2736">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2736">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2737">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2737">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2738">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2738">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2739">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2739">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2740">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2740">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2741">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2741">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\1 = com.native.messaging.host.name1
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\2 = com.native.messaging.host.name2

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2742">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2742">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2743">Nombre clave de la preferencia: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2743">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2744">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2744">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2745">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2745">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2746">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2746">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2747">Permitir los hosts de mensajería nativo en el nivel de usuario (instalado sin permisos de administrador) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2747">Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2748">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2748">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2749">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2749">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2750">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2750">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2751">Permite la instalación a nivel de usuario de hosts de mensajería nativa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2751">Enables user-level installation of native messaging hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2752">Si deshabilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge solo usará hosts de mensajería nativa instalados en el nivel de sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2752">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will only use native messaging hosts installed on the system level.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2753">De forma predeterminada, si no configura esta directiva, Microsoft Edge permitirá el uso de hosts de mensajería nativa a nivel de usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2753">By default, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will allow usage of user-level native messaging hosts.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2754">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2754">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2755">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2755">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2756">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2756">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2757">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2757">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2758">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2758">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2759">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2759">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2760">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2760">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2761">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2761">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2762">Nombre único de GP: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2762">GP unique name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2763">Nombre de GP: permitir el servidor de mensajería nativo en el nivel de usuario (instalado sin permisos de administrador) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2763">GP name: Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2764">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Mensajería nativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2764">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2765">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2765">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2766">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2766">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2767">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2767">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2768">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2768">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2769">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2769">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2770">Nombre del valor: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2770">Value Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2771">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2771">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2772">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2772">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2773">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2773">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2774">Nombre clave de la preferencia: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2774">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2775">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2775">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2776">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2776">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="31858-2777">Administrador de contraseñas y directivas de protección</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2777">Password manager and protection policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2778">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2778">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2779">PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2779">PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2780">Habilitar el guardado de contraseñas en el administrador de contraseñas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2780">Enable saving passwords to the password manager</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2781">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2781">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2782">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2782">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2783">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2783">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2784">Habilitar Microsoft Edge para guardar las contraseñas de los usuarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2784">Enable Microsoft Edge to save user passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2785">Si habilita esta directiva, los usuarios podrán guardar sus contraseñas en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2785">If you enable this policy, users can save their passwords in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2786">La próxima vez que visiten el sitio Microsoft Edge introducirá la contraseña automáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2786">The next time they visit the site, Microsoft Edge will enter the password automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2787">Si deshabilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán guardar nuevas contraseñas, pero podrán seguir utilizando las contraseñas guardadas previamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2787">If you disable this policy, users can't save new passwords, but they can still use previously saved passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2788">Si habilita o deshabilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán cambiarla o reemplazarla en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2788">If you enable or disable this policy, users can't change or override it in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2789">Si no la configura, los usuarios podrán guardar las contraseñas, así como desactivar esta característica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2789">If you don't configure it, users can save passwords, as well as turn this feature off.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2790">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2790">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2791">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2791">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2792">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2792">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2793">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2793">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2794">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2794">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2795">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2795">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2796">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2796">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2797">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2797">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2798">Nombre único de GP: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2798">GP unique name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2799">Nombre de GP: habilitar la posibilidad de guardar contraseñas en el administrador de contraseñas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2799">GP name: Enable saving passwords to the password manager</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2800">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatorio): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Administrador de contraseñas y protección </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2800">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2801">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Administrador de contraseñas y protección </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2801">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2802">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2802">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2803">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2803">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2804">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2804">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2805">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2805">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2806">Nombre del valor: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2806">Value Name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2807">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2807">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2808">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2808">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2809">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2809">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2810">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2810">Preference Key Name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2811">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2811">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2812">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2812">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2813">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2813">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2814">Permitir que los usuarios puedan recibir alertas si se detecta que las contraseñas no son seguras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2814">Allow users to be alerted if their passwords are found to be unsafe</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2815">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2815">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2816">En Windows desde la versión 85 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2816">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2817">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2817">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2818">Permitir que Microsoft Edge supervise las contraseñas de usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2818">Allow Microsoft Edge to monitor user passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2819">Si habilita esta directiva y un usuario conviene que habilite la Directiva, se le notificará al usuario si alguna de las contraseñas almacenadas en Microsoft Edge no es segura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2819">If you enable this policy and a user consents to enabling the policy, the user will get alerted if any of their passwords stored in Microsoft Edge are found to be unsafe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2820">Microsoft Edge mostrará una alerta y esta información también estará disponible en Configuración > Contraseñas > Monitor de contraseña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2820">Microsoft Edge will show an alert and this information will also be available in Settings > Passwords > Password Monitor.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2821">Si deshabilita esta Directiva, no se pedirá permiso a los usuarios para habilitar esta característica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2821">If you disable this policy, users will not be asked for permission to enable this feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2822">Las contraseñas no se analizarán y no recibirán ninguna alerta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2822">Their passwords will not be scanned and they will not be alerted either.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2823">Si habilita o no configura la Directiva, los usuarios pueden activar o desactivar esta característica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2823">If you enable or don't configure the policy, users can turn this feature on or off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2824">Para obtener más información sobre cómo encuentra Microsoft Edge las contraseñas no seguras, vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2824">To learn more about how Microsoft Edge finds unsafe passwords see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2825">Instrucciones adicionales:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2825">Additional guidance:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2826">Esta Directiva puede configurarse como Recomendada así como Obligatoria, pero con un llamado importante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2826">This policy can be set as both Recommended as well as Mandatory, however with an important callout.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2827">Obligatoria habilitada: dado que el consentimiento por parte del usuario individual es una condición previa para habilitar esta característica para un usuario determinado, esta Directiva no tiene una configuración habilitada obligatoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2827">Mandatory enabled: Given that individual user consent is a pre-condition to enabling this feature for a given user, this policy does not have a Mandatory enabled setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2828">Si la Directiva está establecida en Obligatoria, la interfaz de usuario de configuración no cambiará y se mostrará el mensaje de error siguiente en edge://policy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2828">If the policy is set to Mandatory enabled, the UI in Settings will not change and the following error message will be displayed in edge://policy</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2829">Ejemplo de mensaje de estado de error: "Este valor de Directiva no se tiene en cuenta porque el Monitor de contraseña requiere el consentimiento del usuario individual para ser activado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2829">Example Error state message: "This policy value is ignored because Password Monitor requires the consent of the individual user for it to be turned on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2830">Puede pedir a los usuarios de su organización que tengan acceso a la configuración > Perfil > contraseña y a activar la característica ".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2830">You can ask users in your Organization to go to Settings > Profile > Password and turn on the feature."</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2831">Directiva en modo Recomendada: Si la Directiva está establecida en Recomendada, la interfaz de usuario de configuración permanecerá en estado "desactivado", pero se le mostrará un icono de maletín junto a esta descripción al pasar el puntero por encima: "Su organización recomienda un valor específico para esta configuración y usted ha elegido un valor distinto"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2831">Recommended enabled: If the policy is set to Recommended enabled, the UI in Settings will remain in 'Off' state, but a briefcase icon will be made visible next to it with this description displayed on hover - "Your organization recommends a specific value for this setting and you have chosen a different value"</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2832">Obligatorio y Recomendado desactivados: Estos estados funcionarán de la forma habitual y se mostrarán los títulos usuales a los usuarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2832">Mandatory and Recommended disabled: Both these states will work the normal way, with the usual captions being shown to users.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2833">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2833">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2834">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2834">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2835">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2835">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2836">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2836">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2837">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2837">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2838">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2838">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2839">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2839">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2840">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2840">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2841">Nombre único de GP: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2841">GP unique name: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2842">Nombre de directiva de usuario: permitir que los usuarios se avisen si se detecta que las contraseñas no son seguras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2842">GP name: Allow users to be alerted if their passwords are found to be unsafe</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2843">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatorio): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Administrador de contraseñas y protección </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2843">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2844">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Administrador de contraseñas y protección </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2844">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2845">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2845">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2846">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2846">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2847">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2847">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2848">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2848">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2849">Nombre del valor: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2849">Value Name: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2850">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2850">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2851">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2851">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  
  
   
 
 
   
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2852">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2852">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2853">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2853">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2854">Configurar el cambio de contraseña URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2854">Configure the change password URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2855">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2855">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2856">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2856">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2857">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2857">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2858">Configura la dirección URL de cambio de contraseña (solo esquemas HTTP y HTTPS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2858">Configures the change password URL (HTTP and HTTPS schemes only).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2859">El servicio de protección de contraseñas enviará a los usuarios a esta dirección URL para que cambien su contraseña después de ver una advertencia en el explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2859">Password protection service will send users to this URL to change their password after seeing a warning in the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2860">Si habilita esta directiva, el servicio de protección de contraseñas enviará a los usuarios a esta dirección URL para que cambien su contraseña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2860">If you enable this policy, then password protection service sends users to this URL to change their password.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2861">Si deshabilita esta directiva o no la configura, el servicio de protección de contraseñas no redirigirá a los usuarios a una dirección URL de cambio de contraseña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2861">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, then password protection service will not redirect users to a change password URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2862">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2862">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2863">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2863">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2864">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2864">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2865">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2865">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2866">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2866">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2867">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2867">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2868">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2868">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2869">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2869">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2870">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2870">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2871">Nombre único de GP: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2871">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2872">Nombre de GP: configurar el cambio de dirección URL de la contraseña</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2872">GP name: Configure the change password URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2873">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatorio): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Administrador de contraseñas y protección </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2873">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2874">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2874">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2875">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2875">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2876">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2876">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2877">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2877">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2878">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2878">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2879">Nombre del valor: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2879">Value Name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2880">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2880">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2881">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2881">Example value:</span></span>
```
https://contoso.com/change_password.html
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2882">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2882">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2883">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2883">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2884">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2884">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/change_password.html</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2885">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2885">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2886">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2886">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2887">Configurar la lista de URLs de acceso a la empresa donde el servicio de protección de contraseñas debe capturar los salted hashes de una contraseña</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2887">Configure the list of enterprise login URLs where the password protection service should capture salted hashes of a password</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2888">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2888">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2889">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2889">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2890">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2890">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2891">Configurar la lista de URL de inicio de sesión de la empresa (sólo esquemas HTTP y HTTPS) en la que Microsoft Edge debe capturar los salted hashes de las contraseñas y utilizarlos para la detección para volver a utilizar las mismas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2891">Configure the list of enterprise login URLs (HTTP and HTTPS schemes only) where Microsoft Edge should capture the salted hashes of passwords and use it for password reuse detection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2892">Si habilita esta directiva, el servicio de protección con contraseña capturará las huellas digitales de las contraseñas en las direcciones URL definidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2892">If you enable this policy, the password protection service captures fingerprints of passwords on the defined URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2893">Si deshabilita esta directiva o no la configura, no se capturarán las huellas digitales de la contraseña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2893">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, no password fingerprints are captured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2894">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2894">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2895">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2895">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2896">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2896">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2897">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2897">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2898">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2898">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2899">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2899">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2900">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2900">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2901">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2901">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2902">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2902">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2903">Nombre único de GP: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2903">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2904">GP name: configurar la lista de URLs de acceso a la empresa donde el servicio de protección de contraseñas debe capturar los salted hashes de una contraseña</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2904">GP name: Configure the list of enterprise login URLs where the password protection service should capture salted hashes of a password</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2905">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatorio): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Administrador de contraseñas y protección </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2905">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2906">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2906">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2907">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2907">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2908">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2908">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2909">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2909">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2910">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2910">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2911">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2911">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2912">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2912">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2913">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2913">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\1 = https://contoso.com/login.html
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\2 = https://login.contoso.com

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2914">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2914">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2915">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2915">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2916">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2916">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com/login.html</string>
  <string>https://login.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2917">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2917">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2918">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2918">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2919">Configurar el desencadenador de advertencia de protección con contraseña</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2919">Configure password protection warning trigger</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2920">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2920">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2921">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2921">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2922">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2922">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2923">Le permite controlar cuándo activar la advertencia de protección de contraseña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2923">Allows you to control when to trigger password protection warning.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2924">La protección de la contraseña alerta a los usuarios cuando reutilizan su contraseña protegida en sitios potencialmente sospechosos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2924">Password protection alerts users when they reuse their protected password on potentially suspicious sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2925">Puede utilizar las directivas [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) y [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) para configurar qué contraseñas desea proteger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2925">You can use the [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) and [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) policies to configure which passwords to protect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2926">Exenciones: las contraseñas de los sitios enumerados en [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) y [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl), así como de los sitios enumerados en [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains), no activarán una advertencia de protección de contraseña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2926">Exemptions: Passwords for the sites listed in [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) and [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl), as well as for the sites listed in [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains), will not trigger a password-protection warning.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2927">Establezca en "PasswordProtectionWarningOff" para no mostrar las advertencias de protección de contraseña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2927">Set to 'PasswordProtectionWarningOff' to not show password protection warningss.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2928">Establezca en "PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse" para mostrar advertencias de protección de contraseña cuando el usuario reutiliza su contraseña protegida en un sitio no permitido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2928">Set to 'PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse' to show password protection warnings when the user reuses their protected password on a non-allowlisted site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2929">Si desactiva o no configura esta directiva, entonces el desencadenador de advertencia no se muestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2929">If you disable or don't configure this policy, then the warning trigger is not shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2930">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2930">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-2931">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = la advertencia de protección de contraseña está desactivada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2931">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = Password protection warning is off</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-2932">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = la advertencia de protección de contraseña se activa por la reutilización de contraseñas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2932">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = Password protection warning is triggered by password reuse</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2933">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2933">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2934">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2934">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2935">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2935">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2936">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2936">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2937">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2937">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2938">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2938">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2939">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2939">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2940">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2940">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2941">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2941">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2942">Nombre único de GP: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2942">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2943">Nombre de GP: configurar el indicador de advertencia para la protección de contraseñas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2943">GP name: Configure password protection warning trigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2944">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatorio): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Administrador de contraseñas y protección </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2944">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2945">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2945">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2946">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2946">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2947">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2947">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2948">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2948">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2949">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2949">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2950">Nombre del valor: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2950">Value Name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2951">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2951">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2952">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2952">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2953">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2953">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2954">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2954">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2955">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2955">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ## <span data-ttu-id="31858-2957">Directivas de impresión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2957">Printing policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-2958">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2958">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2959">DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2959">DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2960">Reglas predeterminadas para seleccionar impresoras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2960">Default printer selection rules</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2961">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2961">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2962">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2962">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2963">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2963">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-2964">Reemplaza las reglas de selección de impresoras predeterminadas de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2964">Overrides Microsoft Edge default printer selection rules.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2965">Esta directiva determina las reglas para seleccionar la impresora predeterminada en Microsoft Edge, que ocurre la primera vez que un usuario intenta imprimir una página.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2965">This policy determines the rules for selecting the default printer in Microsoft Edge, which happens the first time a user tries to print a page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2966">Cuando se establece esta directiva, Microsoft Edge intenta encontrar una impresora que coincida con todos los atributos especificados y la utiliza como impresora predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2966">When this policy is set, Microsoft Edge tries to find a printer that matches all of the specified attributes and uses it as default printer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2967">Si hay varias impresoras que cumplen los criterios, se utiliza la primera que coincida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2967">If there are multiple printers that meet the criteria, the first printer that matches is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2968">Si no configura esta directiva o no se encuentran impresoras que coincidan con la misma dentro del tiempo de espera, la impresora se configurará de forma predeterminada con la impresora PDF incorporada o sin impresora, si la impresora PDF no está disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2968">If you don't configure this policy or no matching printers are found within the timeout, the printer defaults to the built-in PDF printer or no printer, if the PDF printer isn't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2969">El valor se analiza como un objeto JSON, de acuerdo con el siguiente esquema: { "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer id.", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer display name.", "type": "string" } } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2969">The value is parsed as a JSON object, conforming to the following schema: { "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer id.", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer display name.", "type": "string" } } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-2970">Omitir un campo significará que todos los valores coinciden; por ejemplo, si no se especifica la conectividad, la vista previa de impresión empezará a descubrir todo tipo de impresoras locales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2970">Omitting a field means all values match; for example, if you don't specify connectivity Print Preview starts discovering all kinds of local printers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-2971">Los patrones de expresión regulares deben seguir la sintaxis de JavaScript RegExp y las coincidencias se distinguen mayúsculas de minúsculas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2971">Regular expression patterns must follow the JavaScript RegExp syntax and matches are case sensitive.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2972">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2972">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2973">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2973">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2974">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2974">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2975">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2975">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2976">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2976">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2977">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2977">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2978">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2978">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2979">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2979">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2980">Nombre único de GP: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2980">GP unique name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2981">Nombre de GP: reglas predeterminadas para seleccionar impresoras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2981">GP name: Default printer selection rules</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2982">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Impresión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2982">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2983">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2983">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2984">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2984">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2985">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2985">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2986">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2986">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2987">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2987">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2988">Nombre del valor: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2988">Value Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2989">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2989">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2990">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2990">Example value:</span></span>
```
{ "idPattern": ".*public", "namePattern": ".*Color" }
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2991">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2991">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2992">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2992">Preference Key Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2993">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2993">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>{ "idPattern": ".*public", "namePattern": ".*Color" }</string>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2995">PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2995">PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2996">Imprimir encabezados y pies de página</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2996">Print headers and footers</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2997">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2997">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-2998">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2998">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-2999">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-2999">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3000">Forzar a los "encabezados y pies de página" a que estén activados o desactivados en el diálogo de impresión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3000">Force 'headers and footers' to be on or off in the printing dialog.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3001">Si no configura esta directiva, los usuarios podrán decidir si imprimir los encabezados y los pies de página.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3001">If you don't configure this policy, users can decide whether to print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3002">Si deshabilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán imprimir los encabezados y los pies de página.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3002">If you disable this policy, users can't print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3003">Si habilita esta directiva, los usuarios siempre imprimirán los encabezados y los pies de página.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3003">If you enable this policy, users always print headers and footers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3004">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3004">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3005">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3005">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3006">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3006">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3007">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3007">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3008">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3008">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3009">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3009">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3010">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3010">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3011">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3011">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3012">Nombre único de GP: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3012">GP unique name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3013">Nombre de GP: imprimir encabezados y pies de página</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3013">GP name: Print headers and footers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3014">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Impresión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3014">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3015">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Impresión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3015">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3016">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3016">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3017">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3017">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3018">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3018">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3019">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3019">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3020">Nombre del valor: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3020">Value Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3021">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3021">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3022">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3022">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3023">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3023">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3024">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3024">Preference Key Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3025">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3025">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
