  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3027">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3027">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3028">Establecer la impresora predeterminada del sistema como la impresora predeterminada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3028">Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3029">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3029">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3030">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3030">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3031">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3031">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3032">Indica a Microsoft Edge que utilice la impresora predeterminada del sistema como opción predeterminada en la vista previa de impresión en lugar de la impresora utilizada recientemente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3032">Tells Microsoft Edge to use the system default printer as the default choice in Print Preview instead of the most recently used printer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3033">Si deshabilita esta directiva o no la configura, la vista previa de impresión utilizará la impresora más reciente como opción de destino predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3033">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Print Preview uses the most recently used printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3034">Si habilita esta directiva, la vista previa de impresión utilizará la impresora predeterminada del sistema operativo como opción de destino predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3034">If you enable this policy, Print Preview uses the OS system default printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3035">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3035">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3036">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3036">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3037">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3037">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3038">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3038">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3039">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3039">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3040">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3040">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3041">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3041">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3042">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3042">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3043">Nombre único de GP: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3043">GP unique name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3044">Nombre de GP: establecer la impresora del sistema como la impresora predeterminada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3044">GP name: Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3045">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Impresión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3045">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3046">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Impresión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3046">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3047">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3047">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3048">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3048">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3049">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3049">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3050">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3050">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3051">Nombre del valor: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3051">Value Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3052">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3052">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3053">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3053">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3054">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3054">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3055">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3055">Preference Key Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3056">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3056">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3058">PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3058">PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3059">Habilitar la impresión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3059">Enable printing</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3060">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3060">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3061">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3061">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3062">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3062">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3063">Habilita la impresión en Microsoft Edge y evita que los usuarios cambien esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3063">Enables printing in Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3064">Si habilita esta directiva o no la configura los usuarios podrán imprimir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3064">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3065">Si deshabilita esta política, los usuarios no podrán imprimir desde Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3065">If you disable this policy, users can't print from Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3066">Si deshabilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán imprimir desde Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3066">Printing is disabled in the wrench menu, extensions, JavaScript applications, and so on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3067">Los usuarios pueden seguir imprimiendo desde los complementos que omiten Microsoft Edge mientras imprimen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3067">Users can still print from plug-ins that bypass Microsoft Edge while printing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3068">Por ejemplo, ciertas aplicaciones de Adobe Flash tienen la opción de imprimir en su menú contextual, lo cual no está cubierto en esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3068">For example, certain Adobe Flash applications have the print option in their context menu, which isn't covered by this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3069">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3069">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3070">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3070">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3071">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3071">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3072">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3072">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3073">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3073">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3074">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3074">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3075">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3075">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3076">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3076">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3077">Nombre único de GP: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3077">GP unique name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3078">Nombre de GP: habilitar la impresión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3078">GP name: Enable printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3079">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Impresión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3079">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3080">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3080">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3081">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3081">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3082">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3082">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3083">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3083">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3084">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3084">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3085">Nombre del valor: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3085">Value Name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3086">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3086">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3087">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3087">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3088">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3088">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3089">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3089">Preference Key Name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3090">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3090">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3092">UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3092">UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3093">Imprimir usando el diálogo de impresión del sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3093">Print using system print dialog</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3094">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3094">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3095">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3095">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3096">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3096">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3097">Muestra el diálogo de impresión del sistema en lugar de la vista previa de impresión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3097">Shows the system print dialog instead of print preview.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3098">Si habilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge abrirá el diálogo de impresión del sistema en lugar de la vista previa de impresión integrada cuando un usuario imprima una página.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3098">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge opens the system print dialog instead of the built-in print preview when a user prints a page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3099">Si no configura o deshabilita esta directiva, los comandos de impresión activarán la pantalla de vista previa de impresión de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3099">If you don't configure or disable this policy, print commands trigger the Microsoft Edge print preview screen.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3100">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3100">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3101">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3101">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3102">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3102">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3103">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3103">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3104">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3104">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3105">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3105">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3106">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3106">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3107">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3107">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3108">Nombre único de GP: UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3108">GP unique name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3109">Nombre de GP: imprimir usando el diálogo de impresión del sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3109">GP name: Print using system print dialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3110">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Impresión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3110">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3111">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3111">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3112">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3112">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3113">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3113">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3114">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3114">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3115">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3115">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3116">Nombre del valor: UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3116">Value Name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3117">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3117">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3118">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3118">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3119">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3119">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3120">Nombre clave de la preferencia: UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3120">Preference Key Name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3121">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3121">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ## <span data-ttu-id="31858-3123">Directivas de servidor proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3123">Proxy server policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3124">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3124">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3125">ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3125">ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3126">Configurar las reglas de omisión de proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3126">Configure proxy bypass rules</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3127">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3127">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3128">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3128">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3129">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3129">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3130">Define una lista de hosts para los que Microsoft Edge omite cualquier proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3130">Defines a list of hosts for which Microsoft Edge bypasses any proxy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3131">Esta directiva se aplica solo si ha seleccionado "Usar servidores proxy fijos" en la directiva de [ProxyMode](#proxymode).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3131">This policy is applied only if you have selected 'Use fixed proxy servers' in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3132">Si seleccionó cualquier otro modo para configurar directivas de proxy, no habilite ni configure esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3132">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3133">Si habilita esta directiva, podrá crear una lista de hosts para los que Microsoft Edge no utiliza un proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3133">If you enable this policy, you can create a list of hosts for which Microsoft Edge doesn't use a proxy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3134">Si no configura esta directiva, no se crea ninguna lista de hosts para los que Microsoft Edge omite un proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3134">If you don't configure this policy, no list of hosts is created for which Microsoft Edge bypasses a proxy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3135">Deje esta directiva sin configurar si especificó algún otro método para configurar las directivas de proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3135">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3136">Para obtener ejemplos más detallados, vaya a [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3136">For more detailed examples go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3137">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3137">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3138">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3138">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3139">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3139">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3140">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3140">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3141">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3141">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3142">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3142">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3143">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3143">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3144">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3144">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3145">Nombre único de GP: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3145">GP unique name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3146">Nombre de GP: configurar las reglas de omisión de proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3146">GP name: Configure proxy bypass rules</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3147">Ruta de acceso GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge Update/Servidor proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3147">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3148">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3148">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3149">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3149">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3150">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3150">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3151">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3151">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3152">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3152">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3153">Nombre del valor: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3153">Value Name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3154">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3154">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3155">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3155">Example value:</span></span>
```
https://www.contoso.com, https://www.fabrikam.com
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3156">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3156">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3157">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3157">Preference Key Name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3158">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3158">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.contoso.com, https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3159">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3159">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3160">ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3160">ProxyMode</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3161">Configurar los ajustes del servidor proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3161">Configure proxy server settings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3162">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3162">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3163">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3163">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3164">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3164">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3165">Especifica la configuración del servidor proxy que usa Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3165">Specify the proxy server settings used by Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3166">Si habilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán cambiar la configuración de proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3166">If you enable this policy, users can't change the proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3167">Si elige no usar nunca un servidor proxy y conectarse siempre directamente, se ignorarán todas las demás opciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3167">If you choose to never use a proxy server and to always connect directly, all other options are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3168">Si elige utilizar la configuración de proxy del sistema, se ignorarán todas las demás opciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3168">If you choose to use system proxy settings, all other options are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3169">Si elige la detección automática del servidor proxy, se ignorarán todas las demás opciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3169">If you choose to auto detect the proxy server, all other options are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3170">Si elige el modo de servidor proxy fijo, puede especificar más opciones en [ProxyServer](#proxyserver) y en 'Lista de reglas de omisión de proxy separadas por comas'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3170">If you choose fixed server proxy mode, you can specify further options in [ProxyServer](#proxyserver) and 'Comma-separated list of proxy bypass rules'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3171">Si escoge utilizar un script de proxy .pac, deberá especificar la dirección URL del script en "dirección URL de un archivo proxy .pac".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3171">If you choose to use a .pac proxy script, you must specify the URL to the script in 'URL to a proxy .pac file'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3172">Para obtener ejemplos más detallados, vaya a [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3172">For detailed examples, go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3173">Si habilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge ignorará todas las opciones relacionadas con el proxy especificadas desde la línea de comandos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3173">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will ignore all proxy-related options specified from the command line.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3174">Si no configura esta directiva, los usuarios podrán elegir su propia configuración de proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3174">If you don't configure this policy users can choose their own proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3175">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3175">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-3176">ProxyDisabled (direct) = nunca usar un servidor proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3176">ProxyDisabled (direct) = Never use a proxy</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-3177">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect) = detectar automáticamente la configuración del proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3177">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect) = Auto detect proxy settings</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-3178">ProxyPacScript (pac_script) = usar un script de proxy .pac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3178">ProxyPacScript (pac_script) = Use a .pac proxy script</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-3179">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers) = usar servidores proxy fijos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3179">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers) = Use fixed proxy servers</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-3180">ProxyUseSystem (system) = usar la configuración de proxy del sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3180">ProxyUseSystem (system) = Use system proxy settings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3181">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3181">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3182">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3182">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3183">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3183">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3184">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3184">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3185">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3185">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3186">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3186">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3187">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3187">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3188">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3188">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3189">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3189">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3190">Nombre único de GP: ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3190">GP unique name: ProxyMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3191">Nombre de GP: configurar los ajustes del servidor proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3191">GP name: Configure proxy server settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3192">Ruta de acceso GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge Update/Servidor proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3192">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3193">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3193">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3194">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3194">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3195">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3195">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3196">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3196">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3197">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3197">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3198">Nombre del valor: ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3198">Value Name: ProxyMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3199">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3199">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3200">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3200">Example value:</span></span>
```
direct
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3201">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3201">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3202">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3202">Preference Key Name: ProxyMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3203">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3203">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>direct</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3204">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3204">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3205">ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3205">ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3206">Establecer la URL del archivo proxy .pac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3206">Set the proxy .pac file URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3207">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3207">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3208">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3208">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3209">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3209">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3210">Especifica la dirección URL de un archivo de autoconfiguración de proxy (PAC).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3210">Specifies the URL for a proxy auto-config (PAC) file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3211">Esta directiva se aplica sólo si seleccionaste "Usar un script de proxy .pac" en la directiva de [ProxyMode](#proxymode).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3211">This policy is applied only if you selected 'Use a .pac proxy script' in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3212">Si seleccionó cualquier otro modo para configurar directivas de proxy, no habilite ni configure esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3212">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3213">Si habilita esta directiva, puede especificar la dirección URL de un archivo PAC, que define cómo el navegador elige automáticamente el servidor proxy apropiado para buscar un sitio web en particular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3213">If you enable this policy, you can specify the URL for a PAC file, which defines how the browser automatically chooses the appropriate proxy server for fetching a particular website.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3214">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, no se especificará ningún archivo PAC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3214">If you disable or don't configure this policy, no PAC file is specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3215">Deje esta directiva sin configurar si especificó algún otro método para configurar las directivas de proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3215">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3216">Para obtener ejemplos más detallados, vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3216">For detailed examples, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3217">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3217">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3218">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3218">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3219">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3219">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3220">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3220">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3221">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3221">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3222">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3222">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3223">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3223">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3224">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3224">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3225">Nombre único de GP: ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3225">GP unique name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3226">Nombre de GP: establecer la dirección URL del proxy del archivo .pac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3226">GP name: Set the proxy .pac file URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3227">Ruta de acceso GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge Update/Servidor proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3227">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3228">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3228">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3229">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3229">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3230">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3230">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3231">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3231">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3232">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3232">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3233">Nombre del valor: ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3233">Value Name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3234">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3234">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3235">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3235">Example value:</span></span>
```
https://internal.contoso.com/example.pac
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3236">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3236">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3237">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3237">Preference Key Name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3238">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3238">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://internal.contoso.com/example.pac</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3239">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3239">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3240">ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3240">ProxyServer</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3241">Configurar la dirección o la dirección URL del servidor proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3241">Configure address or URL of proxy server</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3242">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3242">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3243">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3243">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3244">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3244">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3245">Especifica la dirección URL del servidor proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3245">Specifies the URL of the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3246">Esta directiva se aplica solo si ha seleccionado "Usar servidores proxy fijos" en la directiva de [ProxyMode](#proxymode).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3246">This policy is applied only if you have selected 'Use fixed proxy servers' in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3247">Si seleccionó cualquier otro modo para configurar directivas de proxy, no habilite ni configure esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3247">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3248">Si habilita esta directiva, el servidor proxy configurado por la misma se utilizará para todas las direcciones URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3248">If you enable this policy, the proxy server configured by this policy will be used for all URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3249">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, los usuarios pueden elegir su propia configuración de proxy mientras se encuentran en este modo de proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3249">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings while in this proxy mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3250">Deje esta directiva sin configurar si especificó algún otro método para configurar las directivas de proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3250">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3251">Para obtener más opciones y ejemplos detallados, vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3251">For more options and detailed examples, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3252">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3252">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3253">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3253">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3254">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3254">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3255">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3255">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3256">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3256">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3257">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3257">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3258">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3258">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3259">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3259">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3260">Nombre único de GP: ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3260">GP unique name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3261">Nombre de GP: dirección o la URL del servidor proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3261">GP name: Configure address or URL of proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3262">Ruta de acceso GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge Update/Servidor proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3262">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3263">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3263">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3264">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3264">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3265">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3265">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3266">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3266">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3267">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3267">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3268">Nombre del valor: ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3268">Value Name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3269">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3269">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3270">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3270">Example value:</span></span>
```
123.123.123.123:8080
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3271">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3271">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3272">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3272">Preference Key Name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3273">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3273">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3274">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3274">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3275">ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3275">ProxySettings</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3276">Configuración de proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3276">Proxy settings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3277">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3277">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3278">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3278">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3279">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3279">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3280">Configura la configuración del proxy para Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3280">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3281">Si habilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge ignorará todas las opciones relacionadas con el proxy especificadas desde la línea de comandos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3281">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge ignores all proxy-related options specified from the command line.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3282">Si no configura esta directiva, los usuarios podrán elegir su propia configuración de proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3282">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3283">Esta directiva reemplaza las siguientes directivas individuales:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3283">This policy overrides the following individual policies:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3284">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3284">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3285">El campo ProxyMode permite especificar el servidor proxy utilizado por Microsoft Edge y evita que los usuarios cambien la configuración del proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3285">The ProxyMode field lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3286">El campo ProxyPacUrl es una dirección URL a un archivo proxy. PAC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3286">The ProxyPacUrl field is a URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3287">El campo ProxyServer es una URL para el servidor proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3287">The ProxyServer field is a URL for the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3288">El campo ProxyBypassList es una lista de hosts proxy que Microsoft Edge omite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3288">The ProxyBypassList field is a list of proxy hosts that Microsoft Edge bypasses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3289">Si elige el valor "Direct" como "ProxyMode", nunca se utilizará un proxy y se ignorarán todos los demás campos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3289">If you choose the 'direct' value as 'ProxyMode', a proxy is never used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3290">Si elige el valor "Direct" como "ProxyMode", nunca se utilizará un proxy y se ignorarán todos los demás campos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3290">If you choose the 'system' value as 'ProxyMode', the systems's proxy is used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3291">Si elige el valor "auto_detect" como "ProxyMode", se ignorará todos los demás campos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3291">If you choose the 'auto_detect' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3292">Si elige el valor "fixed_server" como "ProxyMode", se usarán los campos "ProxyServer" y "ProxyBypassList".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3292">If you choose the 'fixed_server' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyServer' and 'ProxyBypassList' fields are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3293">Si elige el valor "pac_script" como "ProxyMode", se usarán los campos "ProxyPacUrl" y "ProxyBypassList".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3293">If you choose the 'pac_script' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyPacUrl' and 'ProxyBypassList' fields are used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3294">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3294">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3295">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3295">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3296">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3296">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3297">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3297">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3298">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3298">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3299">Diccionario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3299">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3300">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3300">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3301">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3301">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3302">Nombre único de GP: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3302">GP unique name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3303">Nombre de GP: configurar parámetros proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3303">GP name: Proxy settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3304">Ruta de acceso GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge Update/Servidor proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3304">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3305">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3305">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3306">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3306">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3307">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3307">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3308">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3308">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3309">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3309">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3310">Nombre del valor: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3310">Value Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3311">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3311">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3312">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3312">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ProxySettings = {
  "ProxyBypassList": "https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/", 
  "ProxyMode": "direct", 
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", 
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3313">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3313">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3314">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3314">Preference Key Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3315">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3315">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ProxySettings</key>
<dict>
  <key>ProxyBypassList</key>
  <string>https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/</string>
  <key>ProxyMode</key>
  <string>direct</string>
  <key>ProxyPacUrl</key>
  <string>https://internal.site/example.pac</string>
  <key>ProxyServer</key>
  <string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
</dict>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3316">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3316">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="31858-3317">Configuración de directivas de SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3317">SmartScreen settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3318">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3318">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3319">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3319">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3320">Impedir la omisión de los mensajes de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender para los sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3320">Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3321">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3321">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3322">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3322">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3323">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3323">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3324">Esta configuración de directiva le permite decidir si los usuarios pueden reemplazar las advertencias de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender sobre sitios web potencialmente malintencionados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3324">This policy setting lets you decide whether users can override the Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about potentially malicious websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3325">Si habilita esta configuración, los usuarios no podrán ignorar las advertencias de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender y se les bloqueará el acceso al sitio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3325">If you enable this setting, users can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and they are blocked from continuing to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3326">Si deshabilita o no establece esta configuración, los usuarios podrán ignorar las advertencias de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender y continuar en el sitio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3326">If you disable or don't configure this setting, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and continue to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3327">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3327">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3328">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3328">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3329">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3329">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3330">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3330">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3331">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3331">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3332">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3332">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3333">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3333">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3334">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3334">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3335">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3335">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3336">Nombre único de GP: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3336">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3337">Nombre de GP: Impedir la omisión de los avisos de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender para los sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3337">GP name: Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3338">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3338">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3339">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3339">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3340">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3340">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3341">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3341">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3342">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3342">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3343">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3343">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3344">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3344">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3345">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3345">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3346">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3346">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3347">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3347">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3348">Nombre clave de la preferencia:PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3348">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3349">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3349">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3350">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3350">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3351">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3351">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3352">Impedir que se ignoren las advertencias de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender sobre las descargas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3352">Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3353">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3353">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3354">En Windows desde la versión 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3354">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3355">En MacOS desde la versión 79 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3355">On macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3356">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3356">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3357">Esta directiva le permite determinar si los usuarios pueden anular las advertencias de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender sobre las descargas sin comprobar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3357">This policy lets you determine whether users can override Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3358">Si habilita esta directiva, los usuarios de su organización no podrán ignorar las advertencias de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender y se les impedirá completar las descargas sin comprobar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3358">If you enable this policy, users in your organization can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings, and they're prevented from completing the unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3359">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, los usuarios podrán ignorar las advertencias de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender y completar las descargas sin comprobar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3359">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and complete unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3360">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3360">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3361">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3361">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3362">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3362">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3363">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3363">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3364">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3364">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3365">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3365">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3366">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3366">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3367">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3367">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3368">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3368">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3369">Nombre único de GP: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3369">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3370">Nombre de GP: impedir la omisión de las advertencias sobre las descargas de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3370">GP name: Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3371">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3371">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3372">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3372">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3373">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3373">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3374">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3374">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3375">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3375">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3376">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3376">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3377">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3377">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3378">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3378">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3379">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3379">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3380">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3380">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3381">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3381">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3382">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3382">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3383">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3383">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3384">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3384">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3385">Configurar la lista de dominios en los que SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender no desencadenará advertencias</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3385">Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3386">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3386">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3387">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3387">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3388">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3388">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3389">Configura la lista de dominios de confianza de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3389">Configure the list of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusted domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3390">Esto significa que: SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender no comprobará la existencia de recursos potencialmente malintencionados como software de suplantación de identidad (phishing) y otro malware si las direcciones URL de origen coinciden con estos dominios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3390">This means: Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't check for potentially malicious resources like phishing software and other malware if the source URLs match these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-3391">El servicio de protección de descargas de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender no comprueba las descargas hospedadas en estos dominios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3391">The Microsoft Defender SmartScreen download protection service won't check downloads hosted on these domains.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3392">Si habilita esta directiva, SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender confiará en estos dominios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3392">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusts these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-3393">Si deshabilita o no establece esta directiva, la protección predeterminada de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender se aplicará a todos los recursos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3393">If you disable or don't set this policy, default Microsoft Defender SmartScreen protection is applied to all resources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3394">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3394">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-3395">Tenga en cuenta también que esta directiva no se aplicará si su organización habilitó la Protección contra amenazas avanzada de Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3395">Also note that this policy does not apply if your organization has enabled Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3396">En su lugar, debe configurar las listas de permitidos y bloqueados en el Centro de seguridad de Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3396">You must configure your allow and block lists in Microsoft Defender Security Center instead.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3397">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3397">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3398">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3398">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3399">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3399">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
