  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3400">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3400">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3401">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3401">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3402">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3402">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3403">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3403">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3404">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3404">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3405">Nombre único de GP: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3405">GP unique name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3406">Nombre de GP: configurar la lista de dominios en los que SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender no desencadenará advertencias</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3406">GP name: Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3407">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3407">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3408">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3408">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3409">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3409">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3410">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3410">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3411">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3411">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3412">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3412">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3413">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3413">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3414">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3414">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3415">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3415">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\1 = mydomain.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\2 = myuniversity.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3416">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3416">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3417">Nombre clave de la preferencia: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3417">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3418">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3418">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>mydomain.com</string>
  <string>myuniversity.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3419">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3419">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3420">SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3420">SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3421">Configurar SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3421">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3422">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3422">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3423">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3423">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3424">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3424">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3425">Esta configuración de directiva permite configurar si se activa SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3425">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3426">SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender muestra mensajes de advertencia para ayudar a proteger a los usuarios de posibles estafas de suplantación de identidad (phishing) y software malintencionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3426">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen provides warning messages to help protect your users from potential phishing scams and malicious software.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3427">De manera predeterminada, SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender está activado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3427">By default, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3428">Si habilita esta configuración, SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender estará activado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3428">If you enable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3429">Si deshabilita esta configuración, SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender estará deshabilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3429">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3430">Si no establece esta configuración, los usuarios podrán elegir si quieren usar SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3430">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3431">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3431">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3432">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3432">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3433">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3433">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3434">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3434">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3435">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3435">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3436">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3436">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3437">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3437">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3438">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3438">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3439">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3439">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3440">Nombre único de GP: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3440">GP unique name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3441">Nombre de GP: configurar SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3441">GP name: Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3442">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3442">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3443">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Configuración de SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3443">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3444">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3444">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3445">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3445">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3446">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3446">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3447">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3447">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3448">Nombre del valor: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3448">Value Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3449">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3449">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3450">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3450">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3451">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3451">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3452">Nombre clave de la preferencia: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3452">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3453">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3453">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3454">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3454">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3455">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3455">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3456">Forzar a SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender a comprobar las descargas de origen confiable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3456">Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3457">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3457">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3458">En Windows desde la versión 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3458">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3459">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3459">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3460">Esta configuración de directiva le permite configurar si SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender comprueba la reputación de las descargas de una fuente de confianza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3460">This policy setting lets you configure whether Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks download reputation from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3461">Si habilita o no configura esta opción, SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender comprobará la reputación de la descarga independientemente de la fuente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3461">If you enable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks the download's reputation regardless of source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3462">Si deshabilita esta configuración, SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender no comprobará la reputación de la descarga cuando ésta se realice desde una fuente de confianza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3462">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen doesn't check the download's reputation when downloading from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3463">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows que están unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory o en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3463">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3464">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3464">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3465">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3465">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3466">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3466">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3467">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3467">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3468">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3468">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3469">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3469">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3470">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3470">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3471">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3471">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3472">Nombre único de GP: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3472">GP unique name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3473">Nombre de GP: forzar a SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender a que compruebe las descargas de orígenes de confianza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3473">GP name: Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3474">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3474">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3475">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Configuración de SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3475">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3476">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3476">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3477">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3477">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3478">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3478">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3479">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3479">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3480">Nombre del valor: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3480">Value Name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3481">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3481">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3482">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3482">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3483">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3483">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3484">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3484">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3485">Configurar SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender para bloquear aplicaciones potencialmente no deseadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3485">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen to block potentially unwanted apps</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3486">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3486">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3487">En Windows y MacOS desde 80 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3487">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3488">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3488">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3489">Esta configuración de directiva le permite configurar si activar o no el bloqueo de aplicaciones potencialmente no deseadas de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3489">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on blocking for potentially unwanted apps with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3490">El bloqueo de aplicaciones potencialmente no deseadas de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender proporciona mensajes de advertencia para ayudar a proteger a los usuarios del adware, los mineros de monedas, el bundleware y otras aplicaciones de baja reputación que están hospedadas en sitios web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3490">Potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen provides warning messages to help protect users from adware, coin miners, bundleware, and other low-reputation apps that are hosted by websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3491">El bloqueo de aplicaciones potencialmente no deseadas de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender está desactivado por defecto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3491">Potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3492">Si habilita esta configuración, se activará el bloqueo de aplicaciones potencialmente no deseadas de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3492">If you enable this setting, potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3493">Si deshabilitas esta configuración, se desactivará el bloqueo de aplicaciones potencialmente no deseadas de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3493">If you disable this setting, potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3494">Si no configura esta opción, los usuarios podrán elegir si desean utilizar el bloqueo de aplicaciones potencialmente no deseadas de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3494">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3495">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3495">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3496">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3496">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3497">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3497">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3498">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3498">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3499">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3499">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3500">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3500">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3501">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3501">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3502">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3502">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3503">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3503">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3504">Nombre único de GP: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3504">GP unique name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3505">Nombre de GP: configurar SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender para bloquear aplicaciones potencialmente no deseadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3505">GP name: Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen to block potentially unwanted apps</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3506">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge / Configuración de contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3506">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3507">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)/Configuración de SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3507">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3508">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3508">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3509">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3509">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3510">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3510">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3511">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3511">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3512">Nombre del valor: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3512">Value Name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3513">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3513">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3514">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3514">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3515">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3515">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3516">Nombre clave de la preferencia: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3516">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3517">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3517">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ## <span data-ttu-id="31858-3519">Directivas de Inicio&comma; página principal y página de pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3519">Startup&comma; home page and new tab page policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3520">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3520">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3521">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3521">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3522">Establecer la nueva ficha como página principal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3522">Set the new tab page as the home page</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3523">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3523">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3524">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3524">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3525">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3525">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3526">Configura la página principal predeterminada en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3526">Configures the default home page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3527">Puede establecer la página principal en una dirección URL que especifique o en la página de la nueva pestaña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3527">You can set the home page to a URL you specify or to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3528">Si habilita esta directiva, la nueva pestaña se utilizará siempre como página de inicio y se ignorará la ubicación de la dirección URL de la página de inicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3528">If you enable this policy, the new tab page is always used for the home page, and the home page URL location is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3529">Si deshabilita esta directiva, la página de inicio del usuario no podrá ser la nueva página de pestañas, a menos que la URL esté configurada como "edge://newtab".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3529">If you disable this policy, the user's home page can't be the new tab page, unless the URL is set to 'edge://newtab'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3530">Si no está configurado, los usuarios pueden elegir si la nueva pestaña es su página de inicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3530">If not configured users can choose whether the new tab page is their home page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3531">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3531">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3532">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3532">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3533">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3533">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3534">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3534">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3535">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3535">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3536">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3536">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3537">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3537">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3538">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3538">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3539">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3539">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3540">Nombre único de GP: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3540">GP unique name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3541">Nombre de GP: establecer la página de la nueva pestaña como página principal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3541">GP name: Set the new tab page as the home page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3542">Ruta de acceso de GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Inicio, página principal y página de pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3542">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3543">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazar)/Startup, página principal y página de la pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3543">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3544">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3544">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3545">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3545">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3546">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3546">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3547">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3547">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3548">Nombre del valor: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3548">Value Name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3549">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3549">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3550">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3550">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3551">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3551">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3552">Nombre clave de la preferencia: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3552">Preference Key Name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3553">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3553">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3554">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3554">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3555">HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3555">HomepageLocation</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3556">Configurar la dirección URL de la página principal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3556">Configure the home page URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3557">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3557">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3558">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3558">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3559">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3559">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3560">Configura la dirección URL de la página principal predeterminada en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3560">Configures the default home page URL in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3561">La página de inicio es la página que se abre con el botón Inicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3561">The home page is the page opened by the Home button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3562">Las páginas que se abren en el inicio están controladas por las directivas [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3562">The pages that open on startup are controlled by the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3563">Puede establecer una dirección URL aquí o establecer la página de inicio para abrir la página de la nueva pestaña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3563">You can either set a URL here or set the home page to open the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3564">Si selecciona abrir la página de la nueva pestaña, entonces esta directiva no tendrá efecto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3564">If you select to open the new tab page, then this policy doesn't take effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3565">Si habilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán cambiar la URL de su página de inicio, pero podrán elegir utilizar la página de la nueva pestaña como su página de inicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3565">If you enable this policy, users can't change their home page URL, but they can choose to use the new tab page as their home page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3566">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, los usuarios podrán elegir su propia página de inicio, siempre y cuando la directiva [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) no esté habilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3566">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can choose their own home page, as long as the [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) policy isn't enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3567">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3567">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3568">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3568">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3569">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3569">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3570">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3570">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3571">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3571">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3572">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3572">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3573">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3573">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3574">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3574">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3575">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3575">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3576">Nombre único de GP: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3576">GP unique name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3577">Nombre de GP: configurar la dirección URL de la página principal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3577">GP name: Configure the home page URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3578">Ruta de acceso de GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Inicio, página principal y página de pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3578">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3579">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazar)/Startup, página principal y página de la pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3579">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3580">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3580">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3581">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3581">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3582">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3582">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3583">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3583">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3584">Nombre del valor: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3584">Value Name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3585">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3585">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3586">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3586">Example value:</span></span>
```
https://www.contoso.com
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3587">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3587">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3588">Nombre clave de la preferencia: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3588">Preference Key Name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3589">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3589">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3590">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3590">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3591">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3591">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3592">Configurar los tipos de fondo permitidos para el diseño de página de nueva pestaña</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3592">Configure the background types allowed for the new tab page layout</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3593">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3593">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3594">En Windows y MacOS desde 85 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3594">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3595">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3595">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3596">Puede configurar qué tipos de imagen de fondo se permiten en el diseño de página de nueva pestaña en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3596">You can configure which types of background image that are allowed on the new tab page layout in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3597">Si no configura esta directiva, se habilitarán todos los tipos de imagen de fondo en la página de nueva pestaña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3597">If you don't configure this policy, all background image types on the new tab page are enabled.</span></span>

                                           

                                            

                                          

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3598">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3598">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-3599">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = deshabilitar el tipo de imagen de fondo diaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3599">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = Disable daily background image type</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-3600">DisableCustomImage (2) = deshabilitar el tipo de imagen de fondo personalizada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3600">DisableCustomImage (2) = Disable custom background image type</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-3601">DisableAll (3) = deshabilitar todos los tipos de imagen de fondo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3601">DisableAll (3) = Disable all background image types</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3602">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3602">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3603">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3603">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3604">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3604">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3605">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3605">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3606">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3606">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3607">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3607">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3608">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3608">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3609">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3609">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3610">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3610">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3611">Nombre único de GP: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3611">GP unique name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3612">Nombre de GP: configurar los tipos de fondo permitidos para el diseño de página de nueva pestaña</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3612">GP name: Configure the background types allowed for the new tab page layout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3613">Ruta de acceso de GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Inicio, página principal y página de pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3613">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3614">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3614">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3615">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3615">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3616">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3616">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3617">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3617">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3618">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3618">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3619">Nombre del valor: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3619">Value Name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3620">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3620">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3621">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3621">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3622">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3622">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3623">Nombre clave de la preferencia: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3623">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3624">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3624">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3625">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3625">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3626">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3626">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3627">Establecer una nueva ficha con el logotipo de la empresa (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3627">Set new tab page company logo (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="31858-3628">En desuso: esta directiva está en desuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3628">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3629">Actualmente se admite pero quedará obsoleto en una versión futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3629">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3630">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3630">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3631">En Windows y macOS desde 79 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3631">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3632">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3632">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3633">Esta directiva está en desuso porque no funciona como se esperaba y recomendamos que no se use.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3633">This policy is deprecated because it doesn't work as expected and recommend that it not be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3634">No funciona en la versión 86 de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3634">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 86.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3635">Especifica el logotipo de la empresa que se utilizará en la página de la nueva pestaña de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3635">Specifies the company logo to use on the new tab page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3636">La directiva debe ser configurada como una cadena que exprese el o los logotipos en formato JSON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3636">The policy should be configured as a string that expresses the logo(s) in JSON format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3637">Por ejemplo: { "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3637">For example: { "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3638">Esta directiva se configura especificando la dirección URL desde la que Microsoft Edge puede descargar el logotipo y su hash criptográfico (SHA-256), que se utiliza para comprobar la integridad de la descarga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3638">You configure this policy by specifying the URL from which Microsoft Edge can download the logo and its cryptographic hash (SHA-256), which is used to verify the integrity of the download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3639">El logotipo debe estar en formato PNG o SVG, y su tamaño de archivo no debe exceder los 16 MB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3639">The logo must be in PNG or SVG format, and its file size must not exceed 16 MB.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3640">El logo se descarga y se almacena en caché, y se volverá a descargar cada vez que cambie la dirección URL o el hash.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3640">The logo is downloaded and cached, and it will be redownloaded whenever the URL or the hash changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3641">La dirección URL debe ser accesible sin ninguna autenticación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3641">The URL must be accessible without any authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3642">"default_logo" es necesario y se usará cuando no haya imagen de fondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3642">The 'default_logo' is required and will be used when there's no background image.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3643">Si "light_logo" es proporcionado, se usará cuando la nueva página de la pestaña del usuario tenga una imagen de fondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3643">If 'light_logo' is provided, it will be used when the user's new tab page has a background image.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3644">Recomendamos un logotipo horizontal con un fondo transparente que esté alineado a la izquierda y centrado verticalmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3644">We recommend a horizontal logo with a transparent background that is left-aligned and vertically centered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3645">El logotipo debe tener una altura mínima de 32 píxeles y una relación de aspecto de 1:1 a 4:1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3645">The logo should have a minimum height of 32 pixels and an aspect ratio from 1:1 to 4:1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3646">El "default_logo" debe tener un contraste adecuado contra un fondo blanco/negro, mientras que la "light_logo" debe tener un contraste adecuado contra una imagen de fondo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3646">The 'default_logo' should have proper contrast against a white/black background while the 'light_logo' should have proper contrast against a background image.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3647">Si habilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge descargará y mostrará los logotipos especificados en la página de la nueva pestaña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3647">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge downloads and shows the specified logo(s) on the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3648">Los usuarios no pueden reemplazar u ocultar el o los logotipo(s).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3648">Users can't override or hide the logo(s).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3649">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, Microsoft Edge no mostrará ningún logotipo de la compañía o un logotipo de Microsoft en la página de la nueva pestaña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3649">If you disable or don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will show no company logo or a Microsoft logo on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3650">Para obtener ayuda para determinar el algoritmo hash SHA-256, vea https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3650">For help with determining the SHA-256 hash, see https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3651">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3651">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3652">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3652">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3653">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3653">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3654">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3654">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3655">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3655">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3656">Diccionario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3656">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3657">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3657">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3658">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3658">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3659">Nombre único de GP: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3659">GP unique name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3660">Nombre de GP: establecer una nueva pestaña con el logotipo de la empresa (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3660">GP name: Set new tab page company logo (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3661">Ruta de acceso de GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Inicio, página principal y página de pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3661">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3662">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3662">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3663">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3663">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3664">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3664">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3665">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3665">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3666">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3666">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3667">Nombre del valor: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3667">Value Name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3668">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3668">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3669">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3669">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageCompanyLogo = {
  "default_logo": {
    "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png"
  }, 
  "light_logo": {
    "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png"
  }
}
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3670">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3670">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3671">Nombre clave de la preferencia: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3671">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3672">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3672">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>NewTabPageCompanyLogo</key>
<dict>
  <key>default_logo</key>
  <dict>
    <key>hash</key>
    <string>cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/logo.png</string>
  </dict>
  <key>light_logo</key>
  <dict>
    <key>hash</key>
    <string>517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png</string>
  </dict>
</dict>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3673">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3673">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3674">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3674">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3675">Ocultar los sitios principales predeterminados de la nueva ficha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3675">Hide the default top sites from the new tab page</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3676">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3676">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3677">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3677">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3678">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3678">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3679">Oculta los sitios principales predeterminados de la página de la nueva pestaña de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3679">Hides the default top sites from the new tab page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3680">Si establece esta directiva en true, los iconos del sitio superior predeterminado estarán ocultos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3680">If you set this policy to true, the default top site tiles are hidden.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3681">Si establece esta directiva como falsa o no la configura, los iconos del sitio superior predeterminados permanecerán visibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3681">If you set this policy to false or don't configure it, the default top site tiles remain visible.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3682">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3682">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3683">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3683">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3684">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3684">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3685">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3685">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3686">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3686">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3687">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3687">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3688">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3688">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3689">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3689">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3690">Nombre único de GP: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3690">GP unique name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3691">Nombre de GP: Ocultar los principales sitios predeterminados de la nueva página de la pestaña</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3691">GP name: Hide the default top sites from the new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3692">Ruta de acceso de GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Inicio, página principal y página de pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3692">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3693">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3693">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3694">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3694">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3695">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3695">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3696">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3696">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3697">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3697">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3698">Nombre del valor: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3698">Value Name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3699">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3699">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3700">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3700">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3701">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3701">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3702">Nombre clave de la preferencia: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3702">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3703">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3703">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3704">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3704">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3705">NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3705">NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3706">Configurar la dirección URL de la ficha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3706">Configure the new tab page URL</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3707">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3707">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3708">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3708">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3709">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3709">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3710">Configura la dirección URL predeterminada de la página de la nueva pestaña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3710">Configures the default URL for the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3711">Esta directiva determina la página que se abre cuando se crean nuevas pestañas (incluso cuando se abren nuevas ventanas).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3711">This policy determines the page that's opened when new tabs are created (including when new windows are opened).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3712">También afecta a la página de inicio si está configurada para abrirse en la página de la nueva pestaña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3712">It also affects the startup page if that's set to open to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3713">Esta directiva no determina qué página se abre al inicio; esto lo controla la directiva [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3713">This policy doesn't determine which page opens on startup; that's controlled by the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3714">También afecta a la página de inicio si está configurada para abrirse en la página de la nueva pestaña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3714">It also doesn't affect the home page if that's set to open to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3715">Si no configura esta directiva, se utiliza la página de la nueva pestaña predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3715">If you don't configure this policy, the default new tab page is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3716">Si configura esta directiva*y* la directiva [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype), esta directiva tendrá prioridad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3716">If you configure this policy *and* the [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype) policy, this policy has precedence.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3717">Si se proporciona una dirección URL incorrecta, se abrirán nuevas pestañas about://blank.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3717">If an invalid URL is provided, new tabs will open about://blank.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3718">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3718">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3719">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3719">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3720">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3720">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3721">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3721">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3722">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3722">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3723">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3723">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3724">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3724">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3725">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3725">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3726">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3726">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3727">Nombre único de GP: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3727">GP unique name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3728">Nombre de GP: configurar página de la nueva pestaña de dirección URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3728">GP name: Configure the new tab page URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3729">Ruta de acceso de GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Inicio, página principal y página de pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3729">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3730">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazar)/Startup, página principal y página de la pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3730">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3731">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3731">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3732">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3732">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3733">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3733">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3734">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3734">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3735">Nombre del valor: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3735">Value Name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3736">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3736">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3737">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3737">Example value:</span></span>
```
https://www.fabrikam.com
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3738">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3738">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3739">Nombre clave de la preferencia: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3739">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3740">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3740">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3741">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3741">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3742">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3742">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3743">Establecer una nueva ficha de vínculos rápidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3743">Set new tab page quick links</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3744">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3744">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3745">En Windows y macOS desde 79 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3745">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3746">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3746">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3747">De forma predeterminada, Microsoft Edge muestra vínculos rápidos en la página de la nueva pestaña de los accesos directos agregados por el usuario y los sitios principales en función del historial de exploración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3747">By default, Microsoft Edge displays quick links on the new tab page from user-added shortcuts and top sites based on browsing history.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3748">Con esta directiva, puede configurar hasta tres iconos de vínculos rápidos en la página de la nueva pestaña, expresados como objeto JSON:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3748">With this policy, you can configure up to three quick link tiles on the new tab page, expressed as a JSON object:</span></span>
