<span data-ttu-id="31858-3749">[{"URL": "https://www.contoso.com", "Título": "portal de Contoso", "fijo": true/false},...]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3749">[ { "url": "https://www.contoso.com", "title": "Contoso Portal", "pinned": true/false }, ... ]</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3750">El campo "URL" es obligatorio. las "Título" y "anclód" son opcionales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3750">The 'url' field is required; 'title' and 'pinned' are optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3751">Si no se proporciona "Título", la dirección URL se usa como título predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3751">If 'title' is not provided, the URL is used as the default title.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3752">Si no se especifica "fijo", el valor predeterminado es false.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3752">If 'pinned' is not provided, the default value is false.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3753">Microsoft Edge los presenta en el orden de listado, de izquierda a derecha, con todos los mosaicos anclados mostrándose por delante de los no anclados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3753">Microsoft Edge presents these in the order listed, from left to right, with all pinned tiles displayed ahead of non-pinned tiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3754">Si la directiva está establecida como obligatoria, el campo " anclado " será ignorada y todos los mosaicos se anclarán.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3754">If the policy is set as mandatory, the 'pinned' field will be ignored and all tiles will be pinned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3755">Los mosaicos no pueden ser eliminados por el usuario y siempre aparecen en la parte delantera de la lista de vínculos rápidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3755">The tiles can't be deleted by the user and will always appear at the front of the quick links list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3756">Si la Directiva está establecida como se recomienda, los mosaicos anclados permanecerán en la lista, pero el usuario podrá editarlos y eliminarlos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3756">If the policy is set as recommended, pinned tiles will remain in the list but the user has the ability to edit and delete them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3757">Los iconos de vínculos rápidos sin fijar se comportan como sitios principales predeterminados y se resaltan en la lista si se visitan otros sitios web con más frecuencia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3757">Quick link tiles that aren't pinned behave like default top sites and are pushed off the list if other websites are visited more frequently.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3758">Al aplicar vínculos no anclados a través de esta directiva a un perfil de explorador existente, es posible que los vínculos no aparezcan en absoluto, en función de cómo se encuentren en comparación con el historial de exploración del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3758">When applying non-pinned links via this policy to an existing browser profile, the links may not appear at all, depending on how they rank compared to the user's browsing history.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3759">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3759">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3760">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3760">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3761">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3761">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3762">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3762">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3763">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3763">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3764">Diccionario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3764">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3765">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3765">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3766">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3766">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3767">Nombre único de GP: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3767">GP unique name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3768">Nombre de GP: establecer una nueva pestaña de vínculos rápidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3768">GP name: Set new tab page quick links</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3769">Ruta de acceso de GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Inicio, página principal y página de pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3769">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3770">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazar)/Startup, página principal y página de la pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3770">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3771">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3771">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3772">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3772">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3773">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3773">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3774">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3774">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3775">Nombre del valor: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3775">Value Name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3776">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3776">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3777">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3777">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks = [
  {
    "pinned": true, 
    "title": "Contoso Portal", 
    "url": "https://contoso.com"
  }, 
  {
    "title": "Fabrikam", 
    "url": "https://fabrikam.com"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3778">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3778">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3779">Nombre clave de la preferencia: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3779">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3780">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3780">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>pinned</key>
    <true/>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Contoso Portal</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Fabrikam</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3781">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3781">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3782">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3782">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3783">Habilitar precarga de la página de nueva pestaña para procesamiento más rápido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3783">Enable preload of the new tab page for faster rendering</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3784">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3784">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3785">En Windows y MacOS desde 85 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3785">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3786">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3786">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3787">Si configura esta Directiva, se habilitará la carga previa de la página de la pestaña nueva y los usuarios no podrán cambiar esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3787">If you configure this policy, preloading the New tab page is enabled, and users can't change this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3788">Si no configura esta Directiva, se habilita la carga previa y un usuario puede cambiar esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3788">If you don't configure this policy, preloading is enabled and a user can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3789">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3789">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3790">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3790">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3791">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3791">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3792">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3792">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3793">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3793">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3794">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3794">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3795">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3795">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3796">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3796">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3797">Nombre único de GP: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3797">GP unique name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3798">Nombre de GP: Habilitar precarga de la página de nueva pestaña para procesamiento más rápido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3798">GP name: Enable preload of the new tab page for faster rendering</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3799">Ruta de acceso de GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Inicio, página principal y página de pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3799">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3800">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazar)/Startup, página principal y página de la pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3800">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3801">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3801">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3802">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3802">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3803">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3803">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3804">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3804">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3805">Nombre del valor: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3805">Value Name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3806">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3806">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3807">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3807">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3808">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3808">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3809">Nombre de clave de preferencias: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3809">Preference Key Name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3810">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3810">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3811">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3811">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3812">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3812">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3813">Configurar la experiencia de la nueva ficha de Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3813">Configure the Microsoft Edge new tab page experience</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3814">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3814">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3815">En Windows y macOS desde 79 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3815">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3816">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3816">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3817">Le permite elegir la experiencia de Microsoft News u Office 365 fuente para la página de la nueva pestaña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3817">Lets you choose either the Microsoft News or Office 365 feed experience for the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3818">Al establecer esta directiva en "News", los usuarios verán la experiencia de actividad de Microsoft News en la página de nueva pestaña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3818">When you set this policy to 'News', users will see the Microsoft News feed experience on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3819">Al establecer esta directiva en "Office", los usuarios con un inicio de sesión en el explorador de Active Directory Azure verán la experiencia de actividad de Office 365 en la página de nueva pestaña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3819">When you set this policy to 'Office', users with an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in will see the Office 365 feed experience on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3820">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3820">If you disable or don't configure this policy:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="31858-3821">A los usuarios que inicien sesión en el explorador Azure Active Directory se les ofrece la experiencia de actividad de la página de la nueva pestaña de Office 365, así como la experiencia de actividad estándar de la página de la nueva pestaña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3821">Users with an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in are offered the Office 365 new tab page feed experience, as well as the standard new tab page feed experience.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="31858-3822">Los usuarios que no inicien sesión en el explorador de Active Directory Azure verán la experiencia estándar de la página de la nueva pestaña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3822">Users without an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in will see the standard new tab page experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3823">Si configura esta directiva*y* la directiva [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation), entonces la directiva [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) tendrá prioridad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3823">If you configure this policy *and* the [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) policy, [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) has precedence.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3824">Configuración predeterminada:  deshabilitado o no configurado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3824">Default setting:  Disabled or not configured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3825">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3825">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-3826">News (0) = experiencia de actividad de Microsoft News</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3826">News (0) = Microsoft News feed experience</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-3827">Office (1) = experiencia de actividad de Office 365</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3827">Office (1) = Office 365 feed experience</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3828">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3828">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3829">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3829">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3830">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3830">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3831">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3831">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3832">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3832">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3833">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3833">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3834">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3834">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3835">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3835">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3836">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3836">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3837">Nombre único de GP: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3837">GP unique name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3838">Nombre de GP: configurar la experiencia de la página de la nueva pestaña de Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3838">GP name: Configure the Microsoft Edge new tab page experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3839">Ruta de acceso de GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Inicio, página principal y página de pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3839">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3840">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazar)/Startup, página principal y página de la pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3840">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3841">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3841">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3842">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3842">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3843">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3843">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3844">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3844">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3845">Nombre del valor: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3845">Value Name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3846">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3846">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3847">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3847">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3848">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3848">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3849">Nombre clave de la preferencia: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3849">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3850">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3850">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3851">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3851">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3852">RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3852">RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3853">Acción que se realizará en el inicio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3853">Action to take on startup</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3854">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3854">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3855">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3855">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3856">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3856">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3857">Especifica cómo se comporta Microsoft Edge cuando se inicia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3857">Specify how Microsoft Edge behaves when it starts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3858">Si desea que siempre se abra una nueva pestaña al iniciar, elija "RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3858">If you want a new tab to always open on startup, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3859">Si desea volver a abrir las direcciones URL abiertas la última vez que se cerró Microsoft Edge, elija "RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3859">If you want to reopen URLs that were open the last time Microsoft Edge closed, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3860">La sesión del explorador se restaurará tal como estaba.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3860">The browsing session will be restored as it was.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3861">Tenga en cuenta que esta opción deshabilita algunas configuraciones que dependen de las sesiones o que realizan acciones al salir (como Borrar datos de exploración al salir o las cookies de sólo sesión).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3861">Note that this option disables some settings that rely on sessions or that perform actions on exit (such as Clear browsing data on exit or session-only cookies).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3862">Si desea abrir un conjunto específico de direcciones URL, elija "RestoreOnStartupIsURLs".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3862">If you want to open a specific set of URLs, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsURLs'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3863">Deshabilitar esta configuración equivale a dejarla sin configurar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3863">Disabling this setting is equivalent to leaving it not configured.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3864">Los usuarios podrán cambiarla en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3864">Users will be able to change it in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3865">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3865">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3866">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3866">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-3867">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = abrir una nueva pestaña</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3867">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = Open a new tab</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-3868">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = restaurar la última sesión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3868">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = Restore the last session</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-3869">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = abrir una lista de direcciones URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3869">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = Open a list of URLs</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3870">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3870">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3871">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3871">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3872">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3872">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3873">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3873">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3874">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3874">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3875">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3875">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3876">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3876">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3877">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3877">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3878">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3878">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3879">Nombre único de GP: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3879">GP unique name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3880">Nombre de GP: acciones necesarias para realizar el inicio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3880">GP name: Action to take on startup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3881">Ruta de acceso de GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Inicio, página principal y página de pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3881">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3882">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazar)/Startup, página principal y página de la pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3882">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3883">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3883">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3884">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3884">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3885">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3885">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3886">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3886">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3887">Nombre del valor: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3887">Value Name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3888">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3888">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3889">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3889">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000004
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3890">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3890">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3891">Nombre clave de la preferencia: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3891">Preference Key Name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3892">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3892">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>4</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3893">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3893">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3894">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3894">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3895">Sitios que se abren cuando el explorador se inicia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3895">Sites to open when the browser starts</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3896">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3896">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3897">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3897">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3898">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3898">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3899">Especificar una lista de sitios web para que se abran automáticamente cuando se inicie el explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3899">Specify a list of websites to open automatically when the browser starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3900">Si no configura esta directiva, no se abrirá ningún sitio al iniciar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3900">If you don't configure this policy, no site is opened on startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3901">Esta directiva solo funciona si también establece la directiva [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) en 'Abrir una lista de direcciones URL' (4).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3901">This policy only works if you also set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to 'Open a list of URLs' (4).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3902">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3902">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3903">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3903">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3904">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3904">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3905">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3905">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3906">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3906">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3907">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3907">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3908">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3908">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3909">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3909">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3910">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3910">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3911">Nombre único de GP: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3911">GP unique name: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3912">Nombre de GP: sitios que se abren al iniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3912">GP name: Sites to open when the browser starts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3913">Ruta de acceso de GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Inicio, página principal y página de pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3913">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3914">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazar)/Startup, página principal y página de la pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3914">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3915">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3915">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3916">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3916">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3917">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3917">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3918">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recommended\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3918">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3919">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3919">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3920">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3920">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3921">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3921">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\1 = https://contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\2 = https://www.fabrikam.com

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3922">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3922">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3923">Nombre clave de la preferencia: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3923">Preference Key Name: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3924">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3924">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3925">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3925">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3926">ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3926">ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3927">Mostrar el botón Inicio en la barra de herramientas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3927">Show Home button on toolbar</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3928">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3928">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3929">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3929">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3930">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3930">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3931">Muestra el botón Inicio en la barra de herramientas de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3931">Shows the Home button on Microsoft Edge's toolbar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3932">Habilite esta directiva para mostrar siempre el botón Inicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3932">Enable this policy to always show the Home button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3933">Deshabilítelo de forma que nunca se muestre el botón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3933">Disable it to never show the button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3934">Si no configura la directiva, los usuarios pueden elegir si se muestra el botón Inicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3934">If you don't configure the policy, users can choose whether to show the home button.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3935">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3935">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3936">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3936">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3937">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3937">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3938">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3938">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3939">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3939">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3940">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3940">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3941">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3941">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3942">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3942">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3943">Nombre único de GP: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3943">GP unique name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3944">Nombre de GP: mostrar el botón de inicio en la barra de herramientas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3944">GP name: Show Home button on toolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3945">Ruta de acceso de GP: Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge/Inicio, página principal y página de pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3945">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3946">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazar)/Startup, página principal y página de la pestaña nueva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3946">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3947">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3947">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3948">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3948">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3949">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3949">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3950">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3950">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3951">Nombre del valor: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3951">Value Name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3952">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3952">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3953">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3953">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3954">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3954">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3955">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3955">Preference Key Name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3956">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3956">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
