  ## <span data-ttu-id="31858-3958">Otras directivas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3958">Additional policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3959">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3959">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3960">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3960">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3961">Habilitar las sugerencias de Búsqueda de Microsoft en Bing en la barra de direcciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3961">Enable Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3962">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3962">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3963">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 81 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3963">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3964">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3964">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3965">Habilita la visualización de las sugerencias relevantes de Búsqueda de Microsoft en Bing en la lista de sugerencias de la barra de direcciones cuando el usuario escribe una cadena de búsqueda en la barra de direcciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3965">Enables the display of relevant Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar's suggestion list when the user types a search string in the address bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3966">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, los usuarios podrán ver los resultados internos con tecnología de Búsqueda de Microsoft en Bing en la lista de sugerencias de la barra de direcciones de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3966">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can see internal results powered by Microsoft Search in Bing in the Microsoft Edge address bar suggestion list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-3967">Para ver los resultados de la Búsqueda de Microsoft en Bing, el usuario debe iniciar sesión en Microsoft Edge con su cuenta de Azure AD de esa organización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3967">To see the Microsoft Search in Bing results, the user must be signed into Microsoft Edge with their Azure AD account for that organization.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-3968">Si deshabilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán ver los resultados internos en la lista de sugerencias de la barra de direcciones de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3968">If you disable this policy, users can't see internal results in the Microsoft Edge address bar suggestion list.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-3969">Si habilitó el conjunto de directivas que fuerza a un proveedor de búsqueda predeterminado ([DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled), [DefaultSearchProviderName](#defaultsearchprovidername) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl)), y el proveedor de búsqueda especificado no es Bing, entonces esta directiva no se aplicará y no habrá sugerencias de Búsqueda de Microsoft en Bing en la lista de sugerencias de la barra de direcciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3969">If you have enabled the set of policies which forces a default search provider ([DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled), [DefaultSearchProviderName](#defaultsearchprovidername) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl)), and the search provider specified is not Bing, then this policy is not applicable and there will be no Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar's suggestion list.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3970">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3970">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3971">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3971">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3972">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3972">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3973">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3973">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3974">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3974">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3975">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3975">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3976">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3976">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3977">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3977">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3978">Nombre único de GP: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3978">GP unique name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3979">Nombre de GP: habilitar las sugerencias en la barra de direcciones de la Búsqueda de Microsoft en Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3979">GP name: Enable Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3980">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3980">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3981">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3981">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3982">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3982">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3983">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3983">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3984">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3984">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3985">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3985">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3986">Nombre del valor: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3986">Value Name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3987">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3987">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3988">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3988">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3989">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3989">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3990">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3990">Preference Key Name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3991">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3991">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-3992">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3992">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3993">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3993">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3994">Configuración de anuncios para sitios con anuncios intrusivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3994">Ads setting for sites with intrusive ads</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3995">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3995">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-3996">En Windows y macOS desde 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3996">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-3997">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3997">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-3998">Controla si se bloquean anuncios en sitios con anuncios intrusivos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3998">Controls whether ads are blocked on sites with intrusive ads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-3999">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-3999">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-4000">AllowAds (1) = permitir anuncios en todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4000">AllowAds (1) = Allow ads on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-4001">BlockAds (2) = bloquear anuncios en sitios con anuncios intrusivos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4001">BlockAds (2) = Block ads on sites with intrusive ads.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4002">(Valor predeterminado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4002">(Default value)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4003">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4003">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4004">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4004">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4005">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4005">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4006">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4006">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4007">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4007">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4008">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4008">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4009">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4009">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4010">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4010">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4011">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4011">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4012">Nombre único de GP: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4012">GP unique name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4013">Nombre de GP: configuración de anuncios para los sitios con anuncios intrusivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4013">GP name: Ads setting for sites with intrusive ads</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4014">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4014">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4015">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4015">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4016">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4016">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4017">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4017">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4018">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4018">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4019">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4019">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4020">Nombre del valor: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4020">Value Name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4021">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4021">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4022">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4022">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4023">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4023">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4024">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4024">Preference Key Name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4025">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4025">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4026">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4026">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4027">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4027">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4028">Habilitar la eliminación del explorador y el historial de descargas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4028">Enable deleting browser and download history</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4029">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4029">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4030">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4030">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4031">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4031">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4032">Habilita la eliminación del historial del navegador y del historial de descargas y evita que los usuarios cambien esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4032">Enables deleting browser history and download history and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4033">Tenga en cuenta que incluso con esta directiva deshabilitada, no se garantiza la conservación del historial de exploración y descarga: los usuarios pueden editar o eliminar los archivos de la base de datos del historial directamente, y el propio explorador puede eliminar (en función del período de caducidad) o archivar cualquiera o todos los elementos del historial en cualquier momento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4033">Note that even with this policy is disabled, the browsing and download history aren't guaranteed to be retained: users can edit or delete the history database files directly, and the browser itself may remove (based on expiration period) or archive any or all history items at any time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4034">Si habilita esta directiva o no la configura, los usuarios podrán eliminar el historial de exploración y descarga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4034">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can delete the browsing and download history.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4035">Si deshabilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán eliminar el historial de exploración y descarga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4035">If you disable this policy, users can't delete browsing and download history.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4036">Si deshabilita esta directiva, no habilite la directiva de [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit), porque ambas se ocupan de la eliminación de datos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4036">If you enable this policy, don't enable the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy, because they both deal with deleting data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4037">Si habilita ambas directivas, la directiva [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) tendrá prioridad y eliminará todos los datos cuando se cierre Microsoft Edge, independientemente de cómo haya configurado esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4037">If you enable both, the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy takes precedence and deletes all data when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how this policy is configured.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4038">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4038">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4039">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4039">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4040">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4040">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4041">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4041">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4042">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4042">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4043">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4043">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4044">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4044">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4045">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4045">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4046">Nombre único de GP: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4046">GP unique name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4047">Nombre de GP: habilitar la eliminación del buscador y el historial de descargas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4047">GP name: Enable deleting browser and download history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4048">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4048">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4049">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4049">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4050">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4050">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4051">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4051">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4052">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4052">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4053">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4053">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4054">Nombre del valor: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4054">Value Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4055">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4055">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4056">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4056">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4057">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4057">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4058">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4058">Preference Key Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4059">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4059">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4060">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4060">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4061">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4061">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4062">Permitir cuadros de diálogo de selección de archivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4062">Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4063">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4063">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4064">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4064">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4065">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4065">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4066">Permite el acceso a los archivos locales permitiendo que Microsoft Edge muestre los cuadro de diálogo de selección de archivos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4066">Allow access to local files by letting Microsoft Edge display file selection dialogs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4067">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, los usuarios podrán abrir los cuadro de diálogo de selección de archivos como siempre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4067">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can open file selection dialogs as normal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4068">Si se deshabilita esta directiva, siempre que el usuario realice una acción que active un cuadro de diálogo de selección de archivos (como importar favoritos, cargar archivos o guardar enlaces), se mostrará un mensaje en su lugar y se supondrá que el usuario ha hecho clic en Cancelar en el cuadro de diálogo de selección de archivos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4068">If you disable this policy, whenever the user performs an action that triggers a file selection dialog (like importing favorites, uploading files, or saving links), a message is displayed instead, and the user is assumed to have clicked Cancel on the file selection dialog.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4069">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4069">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4070">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4070">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4071">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4071">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4072">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4072">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4073">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4073">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4074">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4074">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4075">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4075">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4076">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4076">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4077">Nombre único de GP: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4077">GP unique name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4078">Nombre de GP: permitir cuadros de diálogo en la selección de archivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4078">GP name: Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4079">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4079">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4080">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4080">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4081">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4081">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4082">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4082">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4083">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4083">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4084">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4084">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4085">Nombre del valor: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4085">Value Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4086">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4086">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4087">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4087">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4088">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4088">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4089">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4089">Preference Key Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4090">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4090">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4091">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4091">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4092">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4092">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4093">Permitir que una página muestre elementos emergentes durante su descarga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4093">Allows a page to show popups during its unloading</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4094">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4094">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4095">En Windows y macOS desde 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4095">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4096">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4096">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4097">Esta directiva permite a un administrador especificar que una página puede mostrar mensajes emergentes durante su descarga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4097">This policy allows an admin to specify that a page can show popups during its unloading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4098">Cuando la Directiva está configurada en habilitada, se permite que las páginas muestren mensajes emergentes mientras se descargan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4098">When the policy is set to enabled, pages are allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4099">Cuando la Directiva está configurada en habilitada o deshabilitada, se permite que las páginas muestren mensajes emergentes mientras se descargan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4099">When the policy is set to disabled or unset, pages aren't allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4100">Esto es lo que se contempla en SPEC:https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4100">This is as per the spec: (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4101">En el futuro se eliminará esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4101">This policy will be removed in the future.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4102">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4102">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4103">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4103">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4104">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4104">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4105">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4105">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4106">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4106">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4107">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4107">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4108">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4108">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4109">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4109">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4110">Nombre único de GP: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4110">GP unique name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4111">Nombre de GP: permitir que la página muestre los elementos emergentes durante su descarga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4111">GP name: Allows a page to show popups during its unloading</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4112">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4112">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4113">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4113">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4114">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4114">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4115">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4115">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4116">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4116">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4117">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4117">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4118">Nombre del valor: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4118">Value Name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4119">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4119">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4120">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4120">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4121">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4121">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4122">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4122">Preference Key Name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4123">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4123">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4125">AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4125">AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4126">Permitir el juego surf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4126">Allow surf game</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4127">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4127">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4128">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 83 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4128">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4129">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4129">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4130">Si deshabilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán jugar al juego de surf cuando el dispositivo esté desconectado o si el usuario navega a edge://surf.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4130">If you disable this policy, users won't be able to play the surf game when the device is offline or if the user navigates to edge://surf.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4131">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, los usuarios podrán jugar al juego de surf.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4131">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can play the surf game.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4132">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4132">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4133">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4133">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4134">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4134">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4135">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4135">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4136">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4136">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4137">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4137">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4138">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4138">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4139">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4139">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4140">Nombre único de GP: AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4140">GP unique name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4141">Nombre de GP: permitir el juego de surf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4141">GP name: Allow surf game</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4142">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4142">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4143">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4143">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4144">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4144">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4145">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4145">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4146">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4146">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4147">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4147">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4148">Nombre del valor: AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4148">Value Name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4149">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4149">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4150">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4150">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4151">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4151">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4152">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4152">Preference Key Name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4153">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4153">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4155">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4155">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4156">Permitir que las páginas envíen solicitudes de XHR sincrónicas durante el descarte de página (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4156">Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="31858-4157">En desuso: esta directiva está en desuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4157">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4158">Actualmente se admite pero quedará obsoleto en una versión futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4158">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4159">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4159">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4160">En Windows y macOS desde 79 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4160">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4161">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4161">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4162">Esta directiva está en desuso porque solo pretende ser un mecanismo a corto plazo para dar a las empresas más tiempo para actualizar su contenido web cuando se ha comprobado que es incompatible con el cambio para no permitir solicitudes de XHR sincrónicas durante el descarte de la página.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4162">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the change to disallow synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4163">No funciona en la versión 88 de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4163">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 88.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4164">Esta directiva le permite especificar que una página puede enviar solicitudes de XHR sincrónico durante el descarte de la página.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4164">This policy lets you specify that a page can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4165">Si habilita esta directiva, las páginas podrán enviar solicitudes de XHR sincronizadas durante el descarte de la página.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4165">If you enable this policy, pages can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4166">Si deshabilita esta directiva o no la configura, las páginas no podrán enviar solicitudes de XHR sincronizadas durante el descarte de la página.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4166">If you disable this policy or don't configure this policy, pages aren't allowed to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4167">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4167">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4168">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4168">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4169">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4169">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4170">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4170">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4171">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4171">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4172">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4172">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4173">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4173">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4174">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4174">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4175">Nombre único de GP: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4175">GP unique name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4176">Nombre de DG: permitir que las páginas envíen solicitudes sincrónicas de XHR durante el descarte de página (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4176">GP name: Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4177">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4177">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4178">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4178">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4179">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4179">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4180">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4180">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4181">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4181">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4182">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4182">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4183">Nombre del valor: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4183">Value Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4184">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4184">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4185">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4185">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4186">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4186">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4187">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4187">Preference Key Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4188">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4188">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4189">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4189">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4190">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4190">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4191">Configurar la lista de sitios con los que Microsoft Edge intentará establecer un enlace de tokens.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4191">Configure the list of sites for which Microsoft Edge will attempt to establish a Token Binding with</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4192">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4192">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4193">En Windows desde la versión 83 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4193">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4194">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4194">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4195">Configura la lista de patrones de dirección URL para los sitios con los que el navegador intentará realizar el protocolo de enlace de tokens.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4195">Configure the list of URL patterns for sites that the browser will attempt to perform the Token Binding protocol with.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-4196">Para los dominios de esta lista, el explorador enviará el enlace de tokens ClientHello en el protocolo de enlace TLS (Ver https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4196">For the domains on this list, the browser will send the Token Binding ClientHello in the TLS handshake (See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472).</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-4197">Si el servidor responde con una respuesta válida de ServerHello, el explorador creará y enviará mensajes de enlace de token en las siguientes solicitudes https.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4197">If the server responds with a valid ServerHello response, the browser will create and send Token Binding messages on subsequent https requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4198">Vea https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471 para obtener más información.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4198">See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471 for more info.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4199">Si esta lista está vacía, se deshabilitará el enlace de token.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4199">If this list is empty, Token Binding will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4200">Esta directiva solo está disponible en los dispositivos Windows 10 con capacidad de Modo seguro virtual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4200">This policy is only available on Windows 10 devices with Virtual Secure Mode capability.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4201">A partir de Microsoft Edge 86, esta directiva ya no es compatible con la actualización dinámica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4201">Starting in Microsoft Edge 86, this policy no longer supports dynamic refresh.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4202">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4202">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4203">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4203">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4204">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4204">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4205">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4205">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4206">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4206">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4207">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4207">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4208">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4208">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4209">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4209">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4210">Nombre único de GP: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4210">GP unique name: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4211">Nombre de GP: configurar la lista de sitios con los que Microsoft Edge intentará establecer un enlace de tokens.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4211">GP name: Configure the list of sites for which Microsoft Edge will attempt to establish a Token Binding with</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4212">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4212">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4213">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4213">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4214">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4214">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4215">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4215">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4216">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4216">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4217">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4217">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4218">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4218">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4219">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4219">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4220">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4220">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\1 = mydomain.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\2 = [*.]mydomain2.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\3 = [*.].mydomain2.com

```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4221">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4221">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4222">AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4222">AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4223">Configurar excepciones de prevención de seguimiento para determinados específicos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4223">Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4224">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4224">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4225">En Windows y macOS desde 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4225">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4226">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4226">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4227">Configura la lista de patrones de dirección URL que están excluidos de la prevención de seguimiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4227">Configure the list of URL patterns that are excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4228">Si configura esta directiva, la lista de patrones de dirección URL configurados se excluirán de la prevención de seguimiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4228">If you configure this policy, the list of configured URL patterns is excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4229">Si no configura esta directiva se utilizará para todos los sitios el valor global predeterminado de la directiva "Bloquear el seguimiento de la actividad de exploración de la web de los usuarios" (si está establecido) o la configuración personal del usuario para todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4229">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the "Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity" policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4230">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4230">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4231">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4231">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4232">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4232">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4233">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4233">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4234">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4234">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4235">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4235">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4236">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4236">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4237">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4237">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4238">Nombre único de GP: AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4238">GP unique name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4239">Nombre de GP: configurar las excepciones para la prevención de seguimiento en sitios determinados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4239">GP name: Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4240">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4240">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4241">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4241">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4242">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4242">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4243">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4243">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4244">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4244">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4245">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4245">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4246">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4246">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4247">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4247">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4248">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4248">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4249">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4249">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4250">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4250">Preference Key Name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4251">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4251">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4252">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4252">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4253">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4253">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4254">Sugiere páginas similares cuando no se puede encontrar una página web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4254">Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4255">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4255">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4256">En Windows y MacOS desde 80 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4256">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4257">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4257">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4258">Permite que Microsoft Edge emita una conexión a un servicio web para generar dirección URL y buscar sugerencias para problemas de conectividad como errores de DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4258">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a connection to a web service to generate URL and search suggestions for connectivity issues such as DNS errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4259">Si habilita esta directiva, se utilizará un servicio web para gener una dirección URL y buscar sugerencias de errores en la red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4259">If you enable this policy, a web service is used to generate url and search suggestions for network errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4260">Si deshabilita esta directiva, no se realizarán llamadas al servicio web y se mostrará una página de error estándar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4260">If you disable this policy, no calls to the web service are made and a standard error page is shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4261">Si no configura esta directiva, Microsoft Edge respetará la preferencia de usuario establecida en Servicios en Edge://configuración/privacidad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4261">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-4262">En concreto, hay una **sugerir páginas similares cuando no se puede encontrar una página web** conmutar, en la que el usuario puede activar o desactivar la opción.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4262">Specifically, there's a **Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4263">Tenga en cuenta que si habilitó esta directiva (AlternateErrorPagesEnabled), la opción Sugerir páginas similares cuando no se puede encontrar una página web estará activada, pero el usuario no podrá cambiar la configuración con la tecla de alternancia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4263">Note that if you have enable this policy (AlternateErrorPagesEnabled), the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4264">Si deshabilita esta directiva, la opción Sugerir páginas similares cuando no se puede encontrar una página web estará desactivada, y el usuario no podrá cambiar la configuración con la tecla de alternancia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4264">If you disable this policy, the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4265">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4265">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4266">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4266">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4267">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4267">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4268">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4268">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4269">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4269">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4270">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4270">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4271">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4271">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4272">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4272">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4273">Nombre único de GP: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4273">GP unique name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4274">Nombre de GP: Sugerir páginas similares cuando no se pueda encontrar una página web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4274">GP name: Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4275">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4275">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4276">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4276">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4277">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4277">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4278">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4278">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4279">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4279">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4280">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4280">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4281">Nombre del valor: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4281">Value Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4282">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4282">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4283">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4283">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4284">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4284">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4285">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4285">Preference Key Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4286">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4286">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4287">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4287">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4288">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4288">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4289">Abrir siempre los archivos PDF externamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4289">Always open PDF files externally</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4290">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4290">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4291">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4291">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4292">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4292">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4293">Deshabilita el visor de PDF interno en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4293">Disables the internal PDF viewer in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4294">Si habilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge tratará los archivos PDF como descargas y permitirá a los usuarios abrirlos con la aplicación predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4294">If you enable this policy Microsoft Edge treats PDF files as downloads and lets users open them with the default application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4295">Si no configura esta directiva o la deshabilita, Microsoft Edge abrirá archivos PDF (a menos que el usuario la deshabilite).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4295">If you don't configure this policy or disable it, Microsoft Edge will open PDF files (unless the user disables it).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4296">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4296">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4297">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4297">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4298">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4298">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4299">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4299">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4300">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4300">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4301">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4301">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4302">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4302">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4303">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4303">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4304">Nombre único de GP: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4304">GP unique name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4305">Nombre de GP: siempre abrir los archivos en formato PDF de forma externa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4305">GP name: Always open PDF files externally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4306">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4306">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4307">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4307">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4308">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4308">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4309">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4309">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4310">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4310">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4311">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4311">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4312">Nombre del valor: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4312">Value Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4313">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4313">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4314">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4314">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4315">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4315">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4316">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4316">Preference Key Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4317">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4317">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4318">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4318">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4319">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4319">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4320">Habilitar la autenticación de ambiente para los perfiles InPrivate o Invitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4320">Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4321">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4321">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4322">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 81 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4322">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4323">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4323">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4324">Configura esta directiva para permitir o desactivar la autenticación del entorno para los perfiles de InPrivate e Invitado en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4324">Configure this policy to allow/disallow ambient authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4325">La autenticación del entorno es la autenticación http con credenciales predeterminadas cuando no se proporcionan credenciales explícitas mediante los esquemas de desafío/respuesta de NTLM/Kerberos/Negociar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4325">Ambient Authentication is http authentication with default credentials when explicit credentials aren't provided via NTLM/Kerberos/Negotiate challenge/response schemes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4326">Si establece la directiva en "RegularOnly", solo se permitirá la autenticación del entorno para las sesiones Regulares.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4326">If you set the policy to 'RegularOnly', it allows ambient authentication for Regular sessions only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4327">Las sesiones de InPrivate e Invitado no se les permitirá autenticarse con el entorno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4327">InPrivate and Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4328">Si establece la Directiva en "InPrivateAndRegular", se permite la autenticación de ambiente para las sesiones InPrivate y Regular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4328">If you set the policy to 'InPrivateAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for InPrivate and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4329">A las sesiones de Invitado no se les permitirá autenticarse con el entorno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4329">Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>
