<span data-ttu-id="31858-4330">Si establece la Directiva en "GuestAndRegular", permitirá la autenticación del entorno para las sesiones Invitado y Regular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4330">If you set the policy to 'GuestAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for Guest and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4331">Las sesiones de InPrivate no se les permitirá autenticarse en el entorno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4331">InPrivate sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4332">Si establece la Directiva en "Todas", permitirá la autenticación del entorno para todas las sesiones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4332">If you set the policy to 'All', it allows ambient authentication for all sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4333">Tenga en cuenta que la autenticación del entorno siempre está permitida en los perfiles regulares.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4333">Note that ambient authentication is always allowed on regular profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4334">En la versión 81 y posteriores de Microsoft Edge, si no se establece la directiva, la autenticación del entorno se habilitará solo en las sesiones regulares.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4334">In Microsoft Edge version 81 and later, if the policy is left not set, ambient authentication will be enabled in regular sessions only.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4335">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4335">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-4336">RegularOnly (0) = habilitar la autenticación del entorno solo en las sesiones regulares</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4336">RegularOnly (0) = Enable ambient authentication in regular sessions only</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-4337">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = habilitar la autenticación del entorno en las sesiones InPrivate y regulares</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4337">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = Enable ambient authentication in InPrivate and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-4338">GuestAndRegular (2) = habilitar la autenticación del entorno en las sesiones de invitado y regulares</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4338">GuestAndRegular (2) = Enable ambient authentication in guest and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-4339">Todas (3) = habilitar la autenticación del entorno en las sesiones regulares, InPrivate y de invitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4339">All (3) = Enable ambient authentication in regular, InPrivate and guest sessions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4340">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4340">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4341">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4341">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4342">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4342">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4343">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4343">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4344">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4344">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4345">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4345">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4346">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4346">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4347">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4347">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4348">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4348">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4349">Nombre único de GP: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4349">GP unique name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4350">Nombre de GP: habilitar la autenticación de ambiente para los perfiles InPrivate o de invitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4350">GP name: Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4351">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4351">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4352">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4352">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4353">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4353">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4354">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4354">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4355">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4355">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4356">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4356">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4357">Nombre del valor: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4357">Value Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4358">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4358">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4359">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4359">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4360">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4360">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4361">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4361">Preference Key Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4362">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4362">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4363">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4363">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4364">AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4364">AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4365">Permite volver a habilitar la característica AppCache, incluso si está desactivada de forma predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4365">Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4366">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4366">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4367">En Windows y MacOS desde 84 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4367">On Windows and macOS since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4368">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4368">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4369">Si establece esta directiva en "true", la AppCache está habilitada, aunque AppCache en Microsoft Edge no esté disponible de forma predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4369">If you set this policy to true, the AppCache is enabled, even when AppCache in Microsoft Edge is not available by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4370">Si establece esta directiva en falso, o no la establece, AppCache seguirá las opciones predeterminadas de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4370">If you set this policy to false, or don't set it, AppCache will follow Microsoft Edge's defaults.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4371">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4371">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4372">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4372">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4373">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4373">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4374">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4374">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4375">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4375">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4376">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4376">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4377">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4377">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4378">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4378">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4379">Nombre único de GP: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4379">GP unique name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4380">Nombre de GP: permite volver a habilitar la característica AppCache, incluso si está desactivada de forma predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4380">GP name: Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4381">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4381">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4382">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4382">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4383">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4383">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4384">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4384">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4385">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4385">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4386">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4386">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4387">Nombre del valor: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4387">Value Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4388">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4388">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4389">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4389">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4390">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4390">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4391">Nombre de clave de preferencias: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4391">Preference Key Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4392">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4392">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4393">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4393">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4394">ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4394">ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4395">Establecer la configuración regional de la aplicación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4395">Set application locale</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4396">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4396">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4397">En Windows desde la versión 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4397">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4398">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4398">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4399">Configura la configuración regional de la aplicación en Microsoft Edge y evita que los usuarios cambien la localización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4399">Configures the application locale in Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing the locale.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4400">Si habilita esta Directiva, Microsoft Edge use la configuración regional indicada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4400">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified locale.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4401">Si no es compatible con la configuración regional configurada, se usa en su lugar "en-US".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4401">If the configured locale isn't supported, 'en-US' is used instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4402">Si deshabilita o no configura esta opción, Microsoft Edge usa la configuración regional preferida especificada por el usuario (si está configurada) o la configuración regional de suplencia "en-US".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4402">If you disable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Edge uses either the user-specified preferred locale (if configured) or the fallback locale 'en-US'.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4403">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4403">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4404">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4404">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4405">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4405">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4406">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4406">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4407">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4407">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4408">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4408">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4409">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4409">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4410">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4410">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4411">Nombre único de GP: ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4411">GP unique name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4412">Nombre de GP: establecer la configuración regional de la aplicación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4412">GP name: Set application locale</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4413">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4413">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4414">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4414">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4415">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4415">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4416">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4416">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4417">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4417">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4418">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4418">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4419">Nombre del valor: ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4419">Value Name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4420">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4420">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4421">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4421">Example value:</span></span>
```
en
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4422">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4422">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4423">AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4423">AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4424">Permitir o bloquear captura de audio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4424">Allow or block audio capture</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4425">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4425">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4426">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4426">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4427">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4427">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4428">Permite definir si se pide a un usuario que conceda a un sitio web acceso al dispositivo de captura de audio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4428">Allows you to set whether a user is prompted to grant a website access to their audio capture device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4429">Esta directiva se aplica a todas las direcciones URL excepto aquellas configuradas en la lista [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4429">This policy applies to all URLs except for those configured in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4430">Si habilita esta directiva o no la configura (la configuración predeterminada), se le pedirá al usuario el acceso de captura de audio excepto de las direcciones URL en la lista [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4430">If you enable this policy or don't configure it (the default setting), the user is prompted for audio capture access except from the URLs in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4431">A estas URL de la lista se les concede acceso sin pedir confirmación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4431">These listed URLs are granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4432">Si deshabilita esta directiva, no se le pedirá al usuario y solo se podrá obtener acceso a la captura de audio para las direcciones URL configuradas en [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4432">If you disable this policy, the user is not prompted, and audio capture is accessible only to the URLs configured in [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4433">Esta directiva afecta a todos los tipos de entradas de audio, no solo al micrófono integrado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4433">This policy affects all types of audio inputs, not only the built-in microphone.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4434">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4434">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4435">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4435">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4436">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4436">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4437">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4437">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4438">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4438">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4439">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4439">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4440">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4440">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4441">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4441">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4442">Nombre único de GP: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4442">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4443">Nombre de GP: permitir o bloquear la captura de audio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4443">GP name: Allow or block audio capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4444">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4444">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4445">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4445">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4446">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4446">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4447">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4447">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4448">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4448">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4449">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4449">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4450">Nombre del valor: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4450">Value Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4451">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4451">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4452">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4452">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4453">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4453">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4454">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4454">Preference Key Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4455">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4455">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4456">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4456">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4457">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4457">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4458">Sitios que pueden acceder a dispositivos de captura de audio sin solicitar permiso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4458">Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4459">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4459">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4460">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4460">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4461">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4461">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4462">Especificar sitios web basándose en modelos URL que pueden usar dispositivos de captura de audio sin pedir permiso al usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4462">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use audio capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4463">Los patrones en esta lista se hacen coincidir con el origen de seguridad de la dirección URL que realiza la solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4463">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4464">Si son coincidentes, el sitio tiene acceso automático a los dispositivos de captura de audio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4464">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to audio capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4465">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4465">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4466">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4466">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4467">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4467">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4468">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4468">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4469">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4469">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4470">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4470">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4471">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4471">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4472">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4472">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4473">Nombre único de GP: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4473">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4474">Nombre de GP: sitios que pueden acceder a los dispositivos de captura de audio sin solicitar permiso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4474">GP name: Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4475">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4475">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4476">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4476">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4477">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4477">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4478">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4478">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4479">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4479">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4480">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4480">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4481">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4481">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4482">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4482">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4483">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4483">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com/
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = https://[*.]contoso.edu/

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4484">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4484">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4485">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4485">Preference Key Name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4486">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4486">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4487">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4487">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4488">AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4488">AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4489">Permitir ejecutar el espacio aislado de audio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4489">Allow the audio sandbox to run</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4490">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4490">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4491">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 81 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4491">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4492">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4492">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4493">Esta directiva controla el espacio aislado del proceso de audio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4493">This policy controls the audio process sandbox.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4494">Si habilita esta directiva, el proceso de audio se ejecutará en espacio aislado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4494">If you enable this policy, the audio process will run sandboxed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4495">Si deshabilita esta directiva, el proceso de audio se ejecutará sin recinto y el módulo de procesamiento de audio WebRTC se ejecutará en el proceso de representación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4495">If you disable this policy, the audio process will run unsandboxed and the WebRTC audio-processing module will run in the renderer process.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-4496">Esto deja a los usuarios vulnerables a los riesgos de seguridad relacionados con la ejecución del subsistema de audio no aislado..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4496">This leaves users open to security risks related to running the audio subsystem unsandboxed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4497">Si no configura esta directiva, se usará la configuración predeterminada para el espacio aislado de audio, lo que puede variar en función de la plataforma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4497">If you don't configure this policy, the default configuration for the audio sandbox will be used, which might differ based on the platform.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4498">Esta directiva está pensada para ofrecer a las empresas la flexibilidad necesaria para deshabilitar el espacio aislado de audio si usan configuraciones de software de seguridad que interfieren con el espacio aislado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4498">This policy is intended to give enterprises flexibility to disable the audio sandbox if they use security software setups that interfere with the sandbox.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4499">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4499">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4500">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4500">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4501">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4501">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4502">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4502">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4503">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4503">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4504">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4504">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4505">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4505">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4506">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4506">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4507">Nombre único de GP: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4507">GP unique name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4508">Nombre de GP: permitir la ejecución del espacio aislado de audio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4508">GP name: Allow the audio sandbox to run</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4509">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4509">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4510">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4510">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4511">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4511">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4512">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4512">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4513">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4513">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4514">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4514">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4515">Nombre del valor: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4515">Value Name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4516">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4516">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4517">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4517">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4518">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4518">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4519">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4519">Preference Key Name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4520">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4520">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4521">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4521">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4522">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4522">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4523">Importar automáticamente los datos y la configuración desde otro explorador en la primera ejecución</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4523">Automatically import another browser's data and settings at first run</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4524">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4524">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4525">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4525">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4526">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4526">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4527">Si habilita esta directiva, todas las configuraciones y tipos de datos admitidos del explorador especificado se importarán de forma silenciosa y automática en la primera ejecución.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4527">If you enable this policy, all supported datatypes and settings from the specified browser will be silently and automatically imported at first run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4528">Durante la primera experiencia de ejecución, también se omitirá la sección de importación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4528">During the First Run Experience, the import section will also be skipped.</span></span>

 

                                                

                       

                        

                       

                   

                         

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4529">Los datos del explorador de Microsoft Edge (versión anterior) siempre se migrarán de forma silenciosa en la primera ejecución, independientemente del valor de esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4529">The browser data from Microsoft Edge Legacy will always be silently migrated at the first run, irrespective of the value of this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4530">Si se establece esta directiva en "FromDefaultBrowser", se importarán los tipos de datos correspondientes al explorador predeterminado del dispositivo administrado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4530">If this policy is set to 'FromDefaultBrowser', then the datatypes corresponding to the default browser on the managed device will be imported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4531">Si el explorador especificado como valor de esta directiva no está presente en el dispositivo administrado, Microsoft Edge simplemente omitirá la importación sin notificar al usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4531">If the browser specified as the value of this policy is not present in the managed device, Microsoft Edge will simply skip the import without any notification to the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4532">Si establece esta directiva en "DisabledAutoImport", la sección de importación de la primera ejecución se omitirá por completo y Microsoft Edge no importará los datos y la configuración del explorador automáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4532">If you set this policy to 'DisabledAutoImport', the import section of the first-run experience is skipped entirely and Microsoft Edge doesn't import browser data and settings automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4533">Si se establece esta directiva en el valor "FromInternetExplorer", se importarán los siguientes tipos de datos de Internet Explorer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4533">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromInternetExplorer', the following datatypes will be imported from Internet Explorer:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4534">Favoritos o marcadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4534">Favorites or bookmarks</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4535">Contraseñas guardadas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4535">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4536">Motores de búsqueda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4536">Search engines</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4537">Historial de exploración</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4537">Browsing history</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4538">Página principal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4538">Home page</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4539">Si se establece esta directiva en el valor "FromGoogleChrome", se importarán los siguientes tipos de datos de Google Chrome:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4539">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromGoogleChrome', the following datatypes will be imported from Google Chrome:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4540">Favoritos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4540">Favorites</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4541">Contraseñas guardadas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4541">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4542">Direcciones y mucho más</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4542">Addresses and more</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4543">Información de pago</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4543">Payment info</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4544">Historial de exploración</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4544">Browsing history</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4545">Configuración</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4545">Settings</span></span>
7. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4546">Pestañas ancladas y abiertas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4546">Pinned and Open tabs</span></span>
8. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4547">Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4547">Extensions</span></span>
9. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4548">Cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4548">Cookies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4549">Nota: para obtener más información sobre lo que se importa en Google Chrome, vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4549">Note: For more details on what is imported from Google Chrome, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4550">Si se establece esta directiva en el valor "FromSafari", los datos de usuario ya no se importarán en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4550">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromSafari', user data is no longer imported into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4551">Esto se debe a la forma en que el acceso total al disco funciona en Mac.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4551">This is due to the way Full Disk Access works on Mac.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-4552">Ya no es posible tener una importación automatizada y desatendida de datos de Safari en Microsoft Edge en macOS Mojave y versiones posteriores.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4552">On macOS Mojave and above, it's no longer possible to have automated and unattended import of Safari data into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>
 

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4553">A partir de la versión 83 de Microsoft Edge, si se establece esta directiva en el valor "FromMozillaFirefox", se importarán los siguientes tipos de datos de Mozilla Firefox:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4553">Starting with Microsoft Edge version 83, if this policy is set to the value of 'FromMozillaFirefox', the following datatypes will be imported from Mozilla Firefox:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4554">Favoritos o marcadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4554">Favorites or bookmarks</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4555">Contraseñas guardadas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4555">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4556">Direcciones y mucho más</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4556">Addresses and more</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="31858-4557">Historial de Exploración</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4557">Browsing History</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4558">Si desea restringir los tipos de datos específicos para que no se importen en los dispositivos administrados, puede usar esta directiva con otras directivas, como [ImportAutofillFormData](#importautofillformdata), [ImportBrowserSettings](#importbrowsersettings), [ImportFavorites](#importfavorites), etc.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4558">If you want to restrict specific datatypes from getting imported on the managed devices, you can use this policy with other policies such as [ImportAutofillFormData](#importautofillformdata), [ImportBrowserSettings](#importbrowsersettings), [ImportFavorites](#importfavorites), and etc.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4559">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4559">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-4560">FromDefaultBrowser (0) = importa automáticamente todos los tipos de datos y configuraciones compatibles con el explorador predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4560">FromDefaultBrowser (0) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from the default browser</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-4561">FromInternetExplorer (1) = importa automáticamente todos los tipos de datos y configuraciones compatibles desde Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4561">FromInternetExplorer (1) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Internet Explorer</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-4562">FromGoogleChrome (2) = importa automáticamente todos los tipos de datos y configuraciones compatibles desde Google Chrome</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4562">FromGoogleChrome (2) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Google Chrome</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-4563">FromSafari (3) = importa automáticamente todos los tipos de datos y configuraciones compatibles desde Safari</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4563">FromSafari (3) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Safari</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-4564">DisabledAutoImport (4) = deshabilita la importación automática, y se omite la sección de importación de la experiencia de primera ejecución</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4564">DisabledAutoImport (4) = Disables automatic import, and the import section of the first-run experience is skipped</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-4565">FromMozillaFirefox (5) = importa automáticamente todos los tipos de datos y configuraciones compatibles desde Mozilla Firefox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4565">FromMozillaFirefox (5) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Mozilla Firefox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4566">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4566">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4567">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4567">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4568">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4568">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4569">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4569">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4570">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4570">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4571">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4571">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4572">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4572">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4573">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4573">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4574">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4574">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4575">Nombre único de GP: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4575">GP unique name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4576">Nombre de GP: importar los datos y la configuración de otro navegador automáticamente durante la primera ejecución</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4576">GP name: Automatically import another browser's data and settings at first run</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4577">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4577">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4578">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4578">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4579">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4579">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4580">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4580">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4581">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4581">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4582">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4582">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4583">Nombre del valor: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4583">Value Name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4584">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4584">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4585">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4585">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4586">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4586">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4587">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4587">Preference Key Name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4588">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4588">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4589">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4589">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4590">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4590">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4591">Definir una lista de protocolos para iniciar una aplicación externa desde orígenes de la lista sin pedir al usuario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4591">Define a list of protocols that can launch an external application from listed origins without prompting the user</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4592">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4592">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4593">En Windows y MacOS desde 85 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4593">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4594">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4594">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4595">Permite configurar una lista de protocolos y, para cada protocolo, una lista asociada de patrones de origen permitidos que pueden iniciar una aplicación externa sin tener que preguntar al usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4595">Allows you to set a list of protocols, and for each protocol an associated list of allowed origin patterns, that can launch an external application without prompting the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4596">El separador final no se debe incluir cuando se enumera el protocolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4596">The trailing separator should not be included when listing the protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4597">Por ejemplo, Enumera "skype" en lugar de "skype:" o "skype://".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4597">For example, list "skype" instead of "skype:" or "skype://".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4598">Si configura esta Directiva, solo se permitirá que un protocolo inicie una aplicación externa sin tener que preguntar por la Directiva si:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4598">If you configure this policy, a protocol will only be permitted to launch an external application without prompting by policy if:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="31858-4599">se mostrará el protocolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4599">the protocol is listed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="31858-4600">el origen del sitio que intenta iniciar el protocolo coincide con uno de los patrones de origen en la lista allowed_origins del protocolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4600">the origin of the site trying to launch the protocol matches one of the origin patterns in that protocol's allowed_origins list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4601">Si alguna de las condiciones es false, el mensaje de inicio del protocolo externo no se omitirá por directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4601">If either condition is false, the external protocol launch prompt will not be omitted by policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4602">Si no configura esta Directiva, no se puede iniciar ningún protocolo sin una indicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4602">If you don't configure this policy, no protocols can launch without a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4603">Los usuarios pueden optar por no recibir mensajes para cada protocolo o por sitio, salvo que la Directiva [ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox) se configure como deshabilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4603">Users can opt out of prompts on a per-protocol/per-site basis unless the [ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox) policy is set to Disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4604">Esta directiva no afecta a las exenciones de mensaje por protocolo/por sitio establecidas por los usuarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4604">This policy has no impact on per-protocol/per-site prompt exemptions set by users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4605">Los modelos de coincidencia de origen usan un formato similar al de la Directiva de [ URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist), que se explican en [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4605">The origin matching patterns use a similar format to those for the [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) policy, which are documented at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4606">Sin embargo, los patrones de coincidencia de origen para esta Directiva no pueden contener elementos "/path" o "@query".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4606">However, origin matching patterns for this policy cannot contain "/path" or "@query" elements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4607">Cualquier patrón que contenga un elemento "/path" o "@query" se pasará por alto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4607">Any pattern that does contain a "/path" or "@query" element will be ignored.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4608">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4608">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4609">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4609">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4610">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4610">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4611">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4611">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4612">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4612">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4613">Diccionario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4613">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4614">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4614">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4615">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4615">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4616">Nombre único de GP: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4616">GP unique name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4617">Nombre de directiva de usuario: definir una lista de protocolos que pueden iniciar una aplicación externa desde orígenes de la lista sin preguntar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4617">GP name: Define a list of protocols that can launch an external application from listed origins without prompting the user</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4618">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4618">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4619">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4619">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4620">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4620">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4621">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4621">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4622">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4622">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4623">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4623">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4624">Nombre del valor: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4624">Value Name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4625">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4625">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4626">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4626">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins = [
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "example.com", 
      "http://www.example.com:8080"
    ], 
    "protocol": "spotify"
  }, 
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "https://example.com", 
      "https://.mail.example.com"
    ], 
    "protocol": "teams"
  }, 
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "*"
    ], 
    "protocol": "outlook"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4627">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4627">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4628">Nombre de clave de preferencias: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4628">Preference Key Name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4629">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4629">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>example.com</string>
      <string>http://www.example.com:8080</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>spotify</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://example.com</string>
      <string>https://.mail.example.com</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>teams</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>*</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>outlook</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4630">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4630">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4631">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4631">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4632">URL donde se pueden aplicar AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4632">URLs where AutoOpenFileTypes can apply</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4633">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4633">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4634">En Windows y MacOS desde 85 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4634">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4635">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4635">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4636">Lista de direcciones URL a las que se aplicará [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4636">A list of URLs to which [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) will apply to.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4637">Esta Directiva no tiene ningún impacto en los valores abiertos automáticamente establecidos por los usuarios a través de la estante de descarga... > Entrada de menú "abrir archivos siempre para este tipo".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4637">This policy has no impact on automatically open values set by users via the download shelf ... > "Always open files of this type" menu entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4638">Si configura direcciones URL en esta Directiva, los archivos solo se abrirán automáticamente por Directiva si la dirección URL forma parte de este conjunto y el tipo de archivo se muestra en [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4638">If you set URLs in this policy, files will only automatically open by policy if the URL is part of this set and the file type is listed in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4639">Si alguna de las condiciones es falsa, la descarga no se abrirá automáticamente por la Directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4639">If either condition is false, the download won't automatically open by policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4640">Si no define esta Directiva, todas las descargas en las que el tipo de archivo está en [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) se abrirán automáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4640">If you don't set this policy, all downloads where the file type is in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) will automatically open.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4641">Se tiene que dar formato a un modelo de dirección URL con el [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4641">A URL pattern has to be formatted according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4642">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4642">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4643">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4643">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4644">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4644">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4645">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4645">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4646">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4646">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4647">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4647">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4648">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4648">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4649">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4649">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4650">Nombre único de GP: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4650">GP unique name: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4651">Nombre GP: direcciones URL donde se puede aplicar AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4651">GP name: URLs where AutoOpenFileTypes can apply</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4652">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4652">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4653">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4653">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4654">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4654">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4655">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4655">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4656">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4656">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4657">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4657">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4658">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4658">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4659">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4659">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4660">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4660">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\1 = example.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\2 = https://ssl.server.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\3 = hosting.com/good_path
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\4 = https://server:8080/path
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\5 = .exact.hostname.com

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4661">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4661">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4662">Nombre de clave de preferencias: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4662">Preference Key Name: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4663">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4663">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>example.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4664">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4664">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4665">AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4665">AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4666">Lista de tipos de archivo que se deben abrir automáticamente al descargarse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4666">List of file types that should be automatically opened on download</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4667">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4667">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4668">En Windows y MacOS desde 85 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4668">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4669">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4669">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4670">Esta Directiva establece una lista de los tipos de archivo que se abrirán automáticamente en la descarga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4670">This policy sets a list of file types that should be automatically opened on download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4671">Nota: no es necesario incluir el separador inicial cuando se indica el tipo de archivo, por lo que debe indicar "txt" en lugar de ". txt".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4671">Note: The leading separator should not be included when listing the file type, so list "txt" instead of ".txt".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4672">De forma predeterminada, estos tipos de archivo se abrirán automáticamente en todas las direcciones URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4672">By default, these file types will be automatically opened on all URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4673">Puede usar la Directiva [AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls) para restringir las direcciones URL para las que se abrirán automáticamente estos tipos de archivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4673">You can use the [AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls) policy to restrict the URLs for which these file types will be automatically opened on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4674">Los archivos con tipos que se deben abrir de forma automática seguirán sujetos a las comprobaciones de SmartScreen de Microsoft defender habilitadas y no se abrirán si se producen errores en esas comprobaciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4674">Files with types that should be automatically opened will still be subject to the enabled Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks and won't be opened if they fail those checks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4675">Los tipos de archivos que el usuario ya especificó para que se abran automáticamente seguirán haciéndolos cuando se descarguen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4675">File types that a user has already specified to automatically be opened will continue to do so when downloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4676">El usuario seguirá pudiendo especificar que se abran automáticamente otros tipos de archivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4676">The user will continue to be able to specify other file types to be automatically opened.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4677">Si no define esta Directiva, solo los tipos de archivo que el usuario ya especificó que se abriera automáticamente lo hará cuando se descargue.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4677">If you don't set this policy, only file types that a user has already specified to automatically be opened will do so when downloaded.</span></span>
