<span data-ttu-id="31858-4678">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4678">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4679">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4679">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4680">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4680">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4681">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4681">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4682">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4682">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4683">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4683">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4684">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4684">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4685">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4685">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4686">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4686">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4687">Nombre único de GP: AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4687">GP unique name: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4688">Nombre GP: lista de los tipos de archivo que se abrirán automáticamente al descargarse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4688">GP name: List of file types that should be automatically opened on download</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4689">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4689">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4690">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4690">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4691">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4691">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4692">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4692">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4693">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4693">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4694">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4694">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4695">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4695">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4696">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4696">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4697">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4697">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\1 = exe
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\2 = txt

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4698">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4698">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4699">Nombre de clave de preferencias: AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4699">Preference Key Name: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4700">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4700">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>exe</string>
  <string>txt</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4701">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4701">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4702">AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4702">AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4703">Habilitar Autorrellenar para las direcciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4703">Enable AutoFill for addresses</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4704">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4704">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4705">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4705">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4706">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4706">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4707">Habilita la característica Autorrellenar y permite a los usuarios completar automáticamente la información de dirección en formularios web con información almacenada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4707">Enables the AutoFill feature and allows users to auto-complete address information in web forms using previously stored information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4708">Si deshabilita esta directiva, Autorrellenar nunca sugiere o rellena la información de la dirección, ni tampoco guarda información adicional de la dirección que pueda enviar el usuario mientras está explorando la Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4708">If you disable this policy, AutoFill never suggests or fills in address information, nor does it save additional address information that the user might submit while browsing the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4709">Si habilita esta directiva o no la configura, los usuarios podrán controlar la función de Autorellenar para direcciones en la interfaz de usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4709">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can control AutoFill for addresses in the user interface.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4710">Tenga en cuenta que si deshabilita esta directiva, también detendrá toda la actividad de todos los formularios web, excepto los formularios de pago y contraseña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4710">Note that if you disable this policy you also stop all activity for all web forms, except payment and password forms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4711">No se guardan más entradas, y Microsoft Edge no sugiere ni autorellena ninguna entrada anterior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4711">No further entries are saved, and Microsoft Edge won't suggest or AutoFill any previous entries.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4712">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4712">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4713">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4713">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4714">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4714">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4715">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4715">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4716">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4716">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4717">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4717">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4718">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4718">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4719">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4719">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4720">Nombre único de GP: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4720">GP unique name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4721">Nombre de GP: habilitar el autorrelleno para las direcciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4721">GP name: Enable AutoFill for addresses</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4722">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4722">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4723">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4723">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4724">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4724">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4725">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4725">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4726">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4726">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4727">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4727">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4728">Nombre del valor: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4728">Value Name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4729">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4729">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4730">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4730">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4731">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4731">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4732">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4732">Preference Key Name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4733">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4733">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4734">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4734">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4735">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4735">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4736">Habilitar Autorrellenar para las tarjetas de crédito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4736">Enable AutoFill for credit cards</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4737">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4737">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4738">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4738">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4739">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4739">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4740">Habilita la función de Autorrelleno de Microsoft Edge y permite a los usuarios autocompletar la información de la tarjeta de crédito en formularios web utilizando la información almacenada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4740">Enables Microsoft Edge's AutoFill feature and lets users auto complete credit card information in web forms using previously stored information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4741">Si deshabilita esta directiva, la función de Autorrellenar nunca sugerirá ni rellenará información de tarjetas de crédito, ni guardará información adicional de tarjetas de crédito que los usuarios puedan enviar mientras exploran la web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4741">If you disable this policy, AutoFill never suggests or fills credit card information, nor will it save additional credit card information that users might submit while browsing the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4742">Si habilita esta directiva o no la configura, los usuarios podrán controlar la función de Autorrellenar para las tarjetas de crédito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4742">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can control AutoFill for credit cards.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4743">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4743">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4744">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4744">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4745">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4745">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4746">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4746">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4747">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4747">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4748">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4748">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4749">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4749">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4750">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4750">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4751">Nombre único de GP: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4751">GP unique name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4752">Nombre de GP: habilitar el autorrelleno para las tarjetas de crédito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4752">GP name: Enable AutoFill for credit cards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4753">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4753">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4754">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4754">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4755">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4755">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4756">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4756">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4757">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4757">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4758">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4758">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4759">Nombre del valor: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4759">Value Name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4760">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4760">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4761">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4761">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4762">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4762">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4763">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4763">Preference Key Name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4764">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4764">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4765">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4765">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4766">AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4766">AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4767">Permitir la reproducción automática multimedia para sitios web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4767">Allow media autoplay for websites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4768">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4768">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4769">En Windows y macOS desde 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4769">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4770">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4770">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4771">Esta directiva establece la directiva de reproducción automática multimedia para los sitios web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4771">This policy sets the media autoplay policy for websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4772">La configuración predeterminada, "No configurada", respeta la configuración actual de reproducción automática multimedia y permite a los usuarios establecer su configuración de reproducción automática.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4772">The default setting, "Not configured" respects the current media autoplay settings and lets users configure their autoplay settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4773">La configuración de "Habilitado" establece la reproducción automática multimedia en "Permitir".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4773">Setting to "Enabled" sets media autoplay to "Allow".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4774">Se permite que todos los sitio web puedan reproducir automáticamente multimedia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4774">All websites are allowed to autoplay media.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4775">Los usuarios no pueden invalidar esta Directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4775">Users can't override this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4776">Si está en "Deshabilitado", la reproducción automática multimedia estará en "Bloquear".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4776">Setting to "Disabled" sets media autoplay to "Block".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4777">No se permite a los sitios web la reproducción automática multimedia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4777">No websites are allowed to autoplay media.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4778">Los usuarios no pueden invalidar esta Directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4778">Users can't override this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4779">Será necesario cerrar y volver a abrir una cuenta para que esta directiva tenga efecto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4779">A tab will need to be closed and re-opened for this policy to take effect.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4780">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4780">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4781">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4781">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4782">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4782">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4783">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4783">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4784">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4784">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4785">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4785">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4786">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4786">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4787">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4787">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4788">Nombre único de GP: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4788">GP unique name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4789">Nombre de GP: permitir la reproducción automática de multimedia en los sitios web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4789">GP name: Allow media autoplay for websites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4790">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4790">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4791">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4791">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4792">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4792">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4793">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4793">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4794">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4794">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4795">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4795">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4796">Nombre del valor: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4796">Value Name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4797">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4797">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4798">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4798">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4799">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4799">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4800">Nombre clave de la preferencia: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4800">Preference Key Name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4801">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4801">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4802">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4802">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4803">BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4803">BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4804">Seguir ejecutando aplicaciones en segundo plano después de cerrar Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4804">Continue running background apps after Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4805">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4805">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4806">En Windows desde la versión 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4806">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4807">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4807">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4808">Permite que los procesos de Microsoft Edge se inicien en el inicio de sesión del sistema operativo y sigan funcionando después de cerrar la última ventana del explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4808">Allows Microsoft Edge processes to start at OS sign-in and keep running after the last browser window is closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4809">En este escenario, las aplicaciones en segundo plano y la sesión de exploración actual siguen activas, incluyendo las cookies de la sesión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4809">In this scenario, background apps and the current browsing session remain active, including any session cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4810">Un proceso abierto en segundo plano muestra un icono en la bandeja del sistema y siempre se puede cerrar desde ahí.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4810">An open background process displays an icon in the system tray and can always be closed from there.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4811">Si se habilita esta directiva, se activará el modo en segundo plano.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4811">If you enable this policy, background mode is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4812">Si deshabilita esta directiva, se desactivará el modo en segundo plano.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4812">If you disable this policy, background mode is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4813">Si no configura esta directiva, el modo en segundo plano se desactivará inicialmente, y el usuario podrá configurar su comportamiento en edge://configuración/sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4813">If you don't configure this policy, background mode is initially turned off, and the user can configure its behavior in edge://settings/system.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4814">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4814">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4815">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4815">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4816">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4816">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4817">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4817">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4818">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4818">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4819">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4819">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4820">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4820">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4821">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4821">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4822">Nombre único de GP: BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4822">GP unique name: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4823">Nombre de GP: seguir ejecutando las aplicaciones en segundo plano después de cerrar Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4823">GP name: Continue running background apps after Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4824">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4824">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4825">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4825">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4826">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4826">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4827">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4827">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4828">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4828">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4829">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4829">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4830">Nombre del valor: BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4830">Value Name: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4831">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4831">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4832">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4832">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4833">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4833">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4834">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4834">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4835">Permitir actualizaciones en segundo plano de la lista de plantillas disponibles para Colecciones y otras características que utilizan plantillas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4835">Enables background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4836">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4836">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4837">En Windows y macOS desde 79 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4837">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4838">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4838">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4839">Le permite activar o desactivar las actualizaciones en segundo plano de la lista de plantillas disponibles para las colecciones y otras funciones que utilizan plantillas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4839">Lets you enable or disable background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4840">Las plantillas se usan para extraer metadatos enriquecidos de una página web cuando la página se guarda en una colección.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4840">Templates are used to extract rich metadata from a webpage when the page is saved to a collection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4841">Si habilita esta configuración o la configuración no está configurada, la lista de plantillas disponibles se descargará en segundo plano desde un servicio de Microsoft cada 24 horas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4841">If you enable this setting or the setting is unconfigured, the list of available templates will be downloaded in the background from a Microsoft service every 24 hours.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4842">Si deshabilita esta configuración, la lista de plantillas disponibles se descargará a petición.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4842">If you disable this setting the list of available templates will be downloaded on demand.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4843">Este tipo de descarga puede dar lugar a pequeñas sanciones de rendimiento para las colecciones y otras funciones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4843">This type of download might result in small performance penalties for Collections and other features.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4844">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4844">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4845">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4845">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4846">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4846">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4847">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4847">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4848">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4848">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4849">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4849">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4850">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4850">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4851">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4851">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4852">Nombre único de GP: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4852">GP unique name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4853">Nombre de GP: permitir las actualizaciones en segundo plano de la lista de plantillas disponibles para las colecciones y otras características que utilicen plantillas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4853">GP name: Enables background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4854">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4854">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4855">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4855">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4856">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4856">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4857">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4857">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4858">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4858">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4859">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4859">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4860">Nombre del valor: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4860">Value Name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4861">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4861">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4862">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4862">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4863">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4863">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4864">Nombre clave de la preferencia: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4864">Preference Key Name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4865">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4865">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4866">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4866">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4867">BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4867">BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4868">Bloquear todos los anuncios en los resultados de búsqueda de Bing.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4868">Block all ads on Bing search results</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4869">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4869">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4870">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 83 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4870">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4871">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4871">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4872">Habilita una experiencia de búsqueda sin anuncios en Bing.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4872">Enables an ad-free search experience on Bing.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4873">Si se habilita esta directiva, el usuario podrá realizar búsquedas en bing.com y tener una experiencia de búsqueda sin anuncios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4873">If you enable this policy, then a user can search on bing.com and have an ad-free search experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4874">Al mismo tiempo, la configuración de la Búsqueda Segura se establecerá en "Estricto" y no podrá ser cambiada por el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4874">At the same time, the SafeSearch setting will be set to 'Strict' and can't be changed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4875">Si no configura esta directiva, la experiencia predeterminada tendrá anuncios en los resultados de búsqueda de bing.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4875">If you don't configure this policy, then the default experience will have ads in the search results on bing.com.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4876">La búsqueda segura se establecerá en "Moderado" por defecto y podrá ser cambiada por el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4876">SafeSearch will be set to 'Moderate' by default and can be changed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4877">Esta directiva solo está disponible para los SKUs K-12 identificados como inquilinos de EDU por Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4877">This policy is only available for K-12 SKUs that are identified as EDU tenants by Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4878">Por favor, vea[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711) para obtener más información sobre esta directiva, o si se aplican las siguientes situaciones:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4878">Please refer to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711) to learn more about this policy or if the following scenarios apply to you:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-4879">Tiene un inquilino de la UDE, pero la directiva no funciona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4879">You have an EDU tenant, but the policy doesn't work.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-4880">En la lista blanca de direcciones IP se disponía de una experiencia de búsqueda gratis en anuncios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4880">You had your IP whitelisted for having an ad free search experience.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-4881">Estaba experimentando una experiencia de búsqueda sin anuncios en Microsoft Edge (versión anterior) y desea actualizarse a la nueva versión de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4881">You were experiencing an ad-free search experience on Microsoft Edge Legacy and want to upgrade to the new version of Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4882">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4882">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4883">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4883">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4884">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4884">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4885">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4885">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4886">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4886">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4887">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4887">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4888">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4888">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4889">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4889">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4890">Nombre único de GP: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4890">GP unique name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4891">Nombre de GP: bloquear todos los anuncios en los resultados de búsqueda de Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4891">GP name: Block all ads on Bing search results</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4892">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4892">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4893">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4893">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4894">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4894">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4895">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4895">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4896">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4896">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4897">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4897">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4898">Nombre del valor: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4898">Value Name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4899">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4899">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4900">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4900">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4901">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4901">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4902">Nombre clave de la preferencia: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4902">Preference Key Name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4903">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4903">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4904">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4904">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4905">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4905">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4906">Bloquear cookies de terceros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4906">Block third party cookies</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4907">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4907">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4908">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4908">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4909">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4909">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4910">Bloquee los elementos de la página web que no estén en el dominio de la barra de direcciones y configuren cookies.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4910">Block web page elements that aren't from the domain that's in the address bar from setting cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4911">Si habilita esta directiva, los elementos de la página web que no son del dominio que está en la barra de direcciones no pueden establecer cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4911">If you enable this policy, web page elements that are not from the domain that is in the address bar can't set cookies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4912">Si deshabilita esta directiva, los elementos de la Página Web de dominios que no sean en la barra de direcciones podrán establecer cookies.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4912">If you disable this policy, web page elements from domains other than in the address bar can set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4913">Si no configura esta directiva, las cookies de terceros se habilitan, pero los usuarios pueden cambiar esta opción.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4913">If you don't configure this policy, third-party cookies are enabled but users can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4914">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4914">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4915">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4915">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4916">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4916">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4917">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4917">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4918">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4918">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4919">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4919">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4920">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4920">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4921">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4921">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4922">Nombre único de GP: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4922">GP unique name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4923">Nombre de GP: bloquear las cookies de terceros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4923">GP name: Block third party cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4924">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4924">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4925">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4925">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4926">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4926">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4927">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4927">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4928">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4928">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4929">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4929">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4930">Nombre del valor: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4930">Value Name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4931">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4931">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4932">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4932">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4933">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4933">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4934">Nombre clave de la preferencia: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4934">Preference Key Name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4935">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4935">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4936">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4936">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4937">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4937">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4938">Permitir la creación de perfiles desde el menú desplegable identidad o la página Configuración</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4938">Enable profile creation from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4939">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4939">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4940">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4940">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4941">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4941">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4942">Permite a los usuarios crear nuevos perfiles, con la opción **agregar perfil**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4942">Allows users to create new profiles, using the **Add profile** option.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-4943">Si habilita esta Directiva o no la configura, Microsoft Edge permite a los usuarios usar **agregar perfiles** en el menú desplegable identidad o en la página Configuración para crear nuevos perfiles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4943">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge allows users to use **Add profile** on the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page to create new profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4944">Si desactiva esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán agregar nuevos perfiles desde el menú desplegable Identidad o desde la página Configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4944">If you disable this policy, users cannot add new profiles from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4945">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4945">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4946">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4946">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4947">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4947">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4948">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4948">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4949">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4949">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4950">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4950">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4951">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4951">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4952">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4952">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4953">Nombre único de GP: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4953">GP unique name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4954">Nombre de GP: habilitar la creación de perfiles en el menú desplegable de identidad o en la página de configuración</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4954">GP name: Enable profile creation from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4955">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4955">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4956">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4956">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4957">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4957">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4958">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4958">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4959">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4959">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4960">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4960">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4961">Nombre del valor: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4961">Value Name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4962">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4962">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4963">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4963">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4964">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4964">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4965">Nombre clave de la preferencia: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4965">Preference Key Name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4966">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4966">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4967">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4967">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4968">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4968">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4969">Activar el modo invitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4969">Enable guest mode</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4970">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4970">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4971">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4971">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4972">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4972">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-4973">Habilita la opción para permitir el uso de perfiles de invitado en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4973">Enable the option to allow the use of guest profiles in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-4974">Cuando se trata de un perfil de invitado, el navegador no puede importar los datos de navegación de los perfiles existentes y los elimina cuando se cierran todos los perfiles de invitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4974">In a guest profile, the browser doesn't import browsing data from existing profiles, and it deletes browsing data when all guest profiles are closed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4975">Si habilita esta Directiva o no la configura, Microsoft Edge le permite a los usuarios buscar en perfiles de invitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4975">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge lets users browse in guest profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-4976">Si deshabilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge no permite a los usuarios explorar los perfiles de invitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4976">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge doesn't let users browse in guest profiles.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4977">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4977">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4978">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4978">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4979">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4979">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4980">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4980">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4981">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4981">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4982">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4982">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4983">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4983">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4984">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4984">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4985">Nombre único de GP: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4985">GP unique name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4986">Nombre de GP: habilitar el modo de invitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4986">GP name: Enable guest mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4987">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4987">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4988">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4988">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4989">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4989">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4990">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4990">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4991">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4991">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4992">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4992">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4993">Nombre del valor: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4993">Value Name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4994">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4994">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4995">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4995">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-4996">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4996">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4997">Nombre clave de la preferencia: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4997">Preference Key Name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-4998">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4998">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-4999">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-4999">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5000">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5000">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5001">Permitir consultas a un servicio de tiempo de red del explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5001">Allow queries to a Browser Network Time service</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5002">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5002">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5003">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5003">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5004">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5004">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5005">Impide que Microsoft Edge envíe ocasionalmente consultas a un servicio de tiempo de la red del explorador para recuperar una marca de tiempo exacta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5005">Prevents Microsoft Edge from occasionally sending queries to a browser network time service to retrieve an accurate timestamp.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5006">Si deshabilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge dejará de enviar consultas a un servicio de tiempo de la red del explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5006">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will stop sending queries to a browser network time service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5007">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, Microsoft Edge enviará ocasionalmente consultas a un servicio de tiempo de red del explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5007">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will occasionally send queries to a browser network time service.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5008">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5008">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5009">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5009">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5010">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5010">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5011">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5011">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5012">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5012">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5013">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5013">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5014">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5014">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5015">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5015">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5016">Nombre único de GP: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5016">GP unique name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5017">Nombre de GP: permitir las consultas al servicio de tiempo en la red del explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5017">GP name: Allow queries to a Browser Network Time service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5018">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5018">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5019">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5019">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5020">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5020">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5021">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5021">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5022">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5022">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5023">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5023">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5024">Nombre del valor: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5024">Value Name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5025">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5025">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5026">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5026">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5027">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5027">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5028">Nombre clave de la preferencia: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5028">Preference Key Name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5029">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5029">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5030">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5030">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5031">BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5031">BrowserSignin</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5032">Configuración de inicio de sesión del explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5032">Browser sign-in settings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5033">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5033">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5034">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5034">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5035">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5035">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5036">Especifica si un usuario puede iniciar sesión en Microsoft Edge con su cuenta y usar los servicios relacionados con la cuenta, como la sincronización y el inicio de sesión único.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5036">Specify whether a user can sign into Microsoft Edge with their account and use account-related services like sync and single sign on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5037">Para controlar la disponibilidad de la sincronización, use la directiva de [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) en su lugar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5037">To control the availability of sync, use the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5038">Si establece esta directiva en "Deshabilitar", asegúrese de que también haya establecido la directiva [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) como deshabilitada, ya que [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) deshabilita la creación de un perfil para iniciar sesión automáticamente en el explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5038">If you set this policy to 'Disable', make sure that you also set the [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) policy to disabled because [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) disables the creation of an automatically signed in browser profile.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5039">Si se establecen ambas directivas, Microsoft Edge usará la directiva "desactivar el inicio de sesión del navegador" y se comportará como si la directiva [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) hubiese sido deshabilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5039">If both policies are set, Microsoft Edge will use the 'Disable browser sign-in' policy and behave as if [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) is set to disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5040">Si establece esta directiva en "Habilitar", los usuarios pueden iniciar sesión en el explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5040">If you set this policy to 'Enable', users can sign into the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5041">Iniciar sesión en el explorador no garantiza que la sincronización esté activada de forma predeterminada. El usuario deberá habilitarla por separado para poder usar esta característica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5041">Signing into the browser doesn't mean that sync is turned on by default; the user must separately opt-in to use this feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5042">Si establece esta directiva en "Forzar", los usuarios tendrán que iniciar sesión en un perfil para usar el explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5042">If you set this policy to 'Force', users must sign into a profile to use the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5043">De forma predeterminada, esto permite que el usuario elija si desea sincronizar con su cuenta, a menos que la sincronización esté deshabilitada por el administrador del dominio o con la directiva [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5043">By default, this will allow the user to choose whether they want to sync to their account, unless sync is disabled by the domain admin or with the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5044">El valor predeterminado de la directiva [BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled) está establecido como falso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5044">The default value of [BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled) policy is set to false.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5045">Si no configura esta directiva, los usuarios podrán decidir si desean habilitar la opción de inicio de sesión del explorador y usarla según les parezca adecuado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5045">If you don't configure this policy users can decide if they want to enable the browser sign-in option and use it as they see fit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5046">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5046">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5047">Deshabilitar (0) = deshabilitar el inicio de sesión del explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5047">Disable (0) = Disable browser sign-in</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5048">Habilitar (1) = habilitar el inicio de sesión del explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5048">Enable (1) = Enable browser sign-in</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5049">Forzar (2) = exigir a los usuarios iniciar sesión para usar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5049">Force (2) = Force users to sign-in to use the browser</span></span>
