<span data-ttu-id="31858-5050">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5050">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5051">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5051">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5052">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5052">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5053">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5053">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5054">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5054">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5055">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5055">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5056">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5056">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5057">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5057">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5058">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5058">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5059">Nombre único de GP: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5059">GP unique name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5060">Nombre de GP: configuración del inicio de sesión en el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5060">GP name: Browser sign-in settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5061">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5061">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5062">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5062">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5063">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5063">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5064">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5064">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5065">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5065">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5066">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5066">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5067">Nombre del valor: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5067">Value Name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5068">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5068">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5069">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5069">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5070">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5070">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5071">Nombre clave de la preferencia: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5071">Preference Key Name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5072">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5072">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5073">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5073">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5074">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5074">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5075">Usar cliente DNS integrado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5075">Use built-in DNS client</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5076">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5076">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5077">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5077">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5078">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5078">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5079">Controla si se debe usar el cliente DNS integrado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5079">Controls whether to use the built-in DNS client.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5080">Esto no afecta a los servidores DNS que se usan; sino la pila de software que se utiliza para comunicarse con ellos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5080">This does not affect which DNS servers are used; just the software stack which is used to communicate with them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5081">Por ejemplo, si el sistema operativo se configura para usar un servidor DNS empresarial, el cliente DNS integrado usaría ese mismo servidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5081">For example if the operating system is configured to use an enterprise DNS server, that same server would be used by the built-in DNS client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5082">Sin embargo, es posible que el cliente DNS integrado se dirigirá a los servidores en diferentes formas al usar protocolos más modernos relacionados con DNS, como DNS a través de TLS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5082">It is however possible that the built-in DNS client will address servers in different ways by using more modern DNS-related protocols such as DNS-over-TLS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5083">Si habilita esta Directiva, el cliente DNS integrado se usa, si está disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5083">If you enable this policy, the built-in DNS client is used, if it's available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5084">Si deshabilita esta Directiva, el cliente no se usa nunca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5084">If you disable this policy, the client is never used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5085">Si no configura esta Directiva, el cliente DNS integrado está habilitado de forma predeterminada en el MacOS, y los usuarios pueden cambiar si lo usan para usar el cliente DNS integrado Si edita edge://flags o especifique el marcador de la línea de comandos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5085">If you don't configure this policy, the built-in DNS client is enabled by default on MacOS, and users can change whether to use the built-in DNS client by editing edge://flags or by specifying a command-line flag.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5086">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5086">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5087">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5087">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5088">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5088">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5089">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5089">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5090">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5090">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5091">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5091">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5092">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5092">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5093">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5093">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5094">Nombre único de GP: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5094">GP unique name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5095">Nombre de GP: usar el cliente integrado de DNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5095">GP name: Use built-in DNS client</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5096">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5096">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5097">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5097">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5098">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5098">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5099">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5099">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5100">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5100">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5101">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5101">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5102">Nombre del valor: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5102">Value Name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5103">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5103">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5104">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5104">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5105">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5105">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5106">Nombre clave de la preferencia: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5106">Preference Key Name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5107">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5107">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5108">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5108">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5109">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5109">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5110">Determina si el comprobador de certificados integrado se usará para comprobar certificados de servidor (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5110">Determines whether the built-in certificate verifier will be used to verify server certificates (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="31858-5111">En desuso: esta directiva está en desuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5111">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5112">Actualmente se admite pero quedará obsoleto en una versión futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5112">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5113">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5113">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5114">En macOS desde 83 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5114">On macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5115">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5115">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5116">Esta directiva es obsoleta porque tiene por objeto servir únicamente como mecanismo a corto plazo para que las empresas dispongan de más tiempo para actualizar sus entornos e informar de los problemas si se comprueba que son incompatibles con el verificador de certificados incorporado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5116">This policy is deprecated because it's intended to serve only as a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their environments and report issues if they are found to be incompatible with the built-in certificate verifier.</span></span>
 
  

  

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5117">No funcionará en la versión 87 de Microsoft Edge cuando se planee la eliminación del soporte técnico para el comprobador de certificados heredado en Mac OS X.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5117">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 87, when support for the legacy certificate verifier on Mac OS X is planned to be removed.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5118">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5118">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5119">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5119">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5120">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5120">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5121">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5121">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5122">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5122">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5123">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5123">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5124">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5124">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5125">Nombre clave de la preferencia: BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5125">Preference Key Name: BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5126">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5126">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5127">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5127">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5128">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5128">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5129">Deshabilitar el certificado de transparencia para obtener una lista de hashes de PublicKeyInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5129">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5130">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5130">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5131">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5131">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5132">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5132">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5133">Deshabilita la aplicación de los requisitos de transparencia de certificados para una lista de hashes de subjectPublicKeyInfo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5133">Disables enforcement of Certificate Transparency requirements for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5134">Esta directiva permite deshabilitar los requisitos de divulgación sobre la transparencia de los certificados para las cadenas de certificados que contengan certificados con algunos de los hash de la asignatura especificadaPublicKeyInfo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5134">This policy lets you disable Certificate Transparency disclosure requirements for certificate chains that contain certificates with one of the specified subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5135">Esto permite que los certificados que, de otra forma, no serían de confianza porque no se divulgaron públicamente de manera adecuada puedan seguir siendo usados por los servidores corporativos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5135">This allows certificates that would otherwise be untrusted because they were not properly publicly disclosed to still be used for Enterprise hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5136">Para deshabilitar el cumplimiento de la transparencia de certificados al establecer esta directiva, se debe cumplir uno de los siguientes conjuntos de condiciones:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5136">To disable Certificate Transparency enforcement when this policy is set, one of the following sets of conditions must be met:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="31858-5137">El hash corresponde al certificado del servidor subjectPublicKeyInfo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5137">The hash is of the server certificate's subjectPublicKeyInfo.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="31858-5138">El hash que corresponde a subjectPublicKeyInfo aparece en un certificado de CA en la cadena de certificados y está restringido a través de la extensión X.509v3 nameConstraints, uno o más directoryName nameConstraints están presentes en los permittedSubtrees, y el directoryName contiene un atributo organizationName.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5138">The hash is of a subjectPublicKeyInfo that appears in a CA certificate in the certificate chain, that CA certificate is constrained via the X.509v3 nameConstraints extension, one or more directoryName nameConstraints are present in the permittedSubtrees, and the directoryName contains an organizationName attribute.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="31858-5139">El hash que corresponde a subjectPublicKeyInfo aparece en un certificado de CA en la cadena de certificados, el certificado de CA tiene uno o varios atributos organizationName en el asunto del certificado, además de que, el certificado del servidor contiene el mismo número de atributos organizationName en el mismo orden y con valores idénticos byte por byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5139">The hash is of a subjectPublicKeyInfo that appears in a CA certificate in the certificate chain, the CA certificate has one or more organizationName attributes in the certificate Subject, and the server's certificate contains the same number of organizationName attributes, in the same order, and with byte-for-byte identical values.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5140">Un algoritmo hash subjectPublicKeyInfo se especifica al concatenar el nombre del algoritmo hash, el carácter "/" y la codificación base64 del algoritmo hash que se aplicará al subjectPublicKeyInfo codificado en DER del certificado especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5140">A subjectPublicKeyInfo hash is specified by concatenating the hash algorithm name, the "/" character, and the Base64 encoding of that hash algorithm applied to the DER-encoded subjectPublicKeyInfo of the specified certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5141">Esta codificación Base64 tiene el mismo formato que una huella digital SPKI, como se define en la sección 2,4 de RFC 7469.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5141">This Base64 encoding is the same format as an SPKI Fingerprint, as defined in RFC 7469, Section 2.4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5142">Se omiten los algoritmos hash no reconocidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5142">Unrecognized hash algorithms are ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5143">En este momento, el único algoritmo hash compatible es "SHA256".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5143">The only supported hash algorithm at this time is "sha256".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5144">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, cualquier certificado que deba divulgarse a través de la transparencia de certificados se considerará de poca confianza si no se divulga de acuerdo con la directiva de transparencia de certificados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5144">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, any certificate that's required to be disclosed via Certificate Transparency will be treated as untrusted if it's not disclosed according to the Certificate Transparency policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5145">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5145">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5146">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5146">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5147">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5147">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5148">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5148">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5149">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5149">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5150">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5150">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5151">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5151">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5152">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5152">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5153">Nombre único de GP: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5153">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5154">Nombre de GP: deshabilitar el certificado de transparencia para obtener una lista de hashes de PublicKeyInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5154">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5155">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5155">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5156">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5156">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5157">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5157">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5158">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5158">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5159">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5159">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5160">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5160">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5161">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5161">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5162">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5162">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5163">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5163">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas\1 = sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas\2 = sha256//////////////////////w==

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5164">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5164">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5165">Nombre clave de la preferencia: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5165">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5166">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5166">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==</string>
  <string>sha256//////////////////////w==</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5167">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5167">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5168">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5168">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5169">Deshabilitar el certificado Aplicación de la transparencia para una lista de autoridades de certificación de legado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5169">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of legacy certificate authorities</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5170">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5170">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5171">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5171">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5172">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5172">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5173">Deshabilita la aplicación de los requisitos de transparencia de los certificados para obtener una lista de las entidades de certificación (CAS) heredadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5173">Disables enforcing Certificate Transparency requirements for a list of legacy certificate authorities (Cas).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5174">Esta directiva permite deshabilitar los requisitos de divulgación sobre la transparencia de los certificados para las cadenas de certificados que contengan certificados con algunos de los hash de la asignatura especificadaPublicKeyInfo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5174">This policy lets you disable Certificate Transparency disclosure requirements for certificate chains that contain certificates with one of the specified subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5175">Esto permite que los certificados que, de otra forma, no serían de confianza porque no se divulgaron públicamente de manera adecuada sigan usándose para los servidores corporativos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5175">This allows certificates that would otherwise be untrusted because they were not properly publicly disclosed, continue to be used for enterprise hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5176">Para que se deshabilite la aplicación de transparencia de certificados, debe establecerse el valor de hash en un subjectPublicKeyInfo que aparezca en un certificado de CA reconocido como entidad de certificación (CA) heredada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5176">In order for Certificate Transparency enforcement to be disabled, you must set the hash to a subjectPublicKeyInfo appearing in a CA certificate that is recognized as a legacy certificate authority (CA).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5177">Una entidad de certificación heredada (CA), es una CA que ha sido reconocida públicamente como predeterminada por uno o más sistemas operativos compatibles con Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5177">A legacy CA is a CA that has been publicly trusted by default by one or more operating systems supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5178">Se especifica un hash de subjectPublicKeyInfo concatenando el nombre del algoritmo hash, el carácter "/" y la codificación base64 del algoritmo hash que se aplicará al subjectPublicKeyInfo codificado en DER del certificado especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5178">You specify a subjectPublicKeyInfo hash by concatenating the hash algorithm name, the "/" character, and the Base64 encoding of that hash algorithm applied to the DER-encoded subjectPublicKeyInfo of the specified certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5179">Esta codificación Base64 tiene el mismo formato que una huella digital SPKI, como se define en la sección 2,4 de RFC 7469.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5179">This Base64 encoding is the same format as an SPKI Fingerprint, as defined in RFC 7469, Section 2.4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5180">Se omiten los algoritmos hash no reconocidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5180">Unrecognized hash algorithms are ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5181">En este momento, el único algoritmo hash compatible es "SHA256".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5181">The only supported hash algorithm at this time is "sha256".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5182">Si no configura esta directiva, cualquier certificado que deba divulgarse a través de la transparencia de certificados se considerará de poca confianza si no se divulga de acuerdo con la directiva de transparencia de certificados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5182">If you don't configure this policy, any certificate that's required to be disclosed via Certificate Transparency will be treated as untrusted if it isn't disclosed according to the Certificate Transparency policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5183">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5183">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5184">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5184">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5185">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5185">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5186">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5186">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5187">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5187">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5188">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5188">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5189">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5189">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5190">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5190">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5191">Nombre único de GP: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5191">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5192">Nombre de GP: deshabilitar el certificado de transparencia para obtener una lista de las entidades de certificación heredadas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5192">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of legacy certificate authorities</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5193">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5193">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5194">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5194">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5195">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5195">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5196">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5196">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5197">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5197">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5198">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5198">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5199">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5199">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5200">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5200">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5201">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5201">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas\1 = sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas\2 = sha256//////////////////////w==

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5202">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5202">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5203">Nombre clave de la preferencia: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5203">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5204">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5204">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==</string>
  <string>sha256//////////////////////w==</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5205">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5205">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5206">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5206">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5207">Deshabilitar la aplicación de la transparencia de certificados para dirección URL determinadas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5207">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for specific URLs</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5208">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5208">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5209">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5209">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5210">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5210">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5211">Deshabilita la aplicación de los requisitos de transparencia de los certificados en las direcciones URL indicadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5211">Disables enforcing Certificate Transparency requirements for the listed URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5212">Esta directiva le permite no divulgar los certificados de los nombres de host en las direcciones URL especificadas por la transparencia de certificados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5212">This policy lets you not disclose certificates for the hostnames in the specified URLs via Certificate Transparency.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5213">Esto le permite usar certificados que de otro modo no serían de confianza, ya que no fueron divulgados públicamente de forma correcta, lo que dificulta la detección de los certificados que fueron emitidos de forma errónea en estos servidores.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5213">This lets you use certificates that would otherwise be untrusted, because they weren't properly publicly disclosed, but it makes it harder to detect mis-issued certificates for those hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5214">Forme el modelo de URL de acuerdo con [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5214">Form your URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5215">Dado que los certificados son válidos para un nombre de host determinado, independientemente del esquema, puerto o ruta de acceso, sólo se considerará una parte del nombre de host de la dirección URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5215">Because certificates are valid for a given hostname, independent of the scheme, port, or path, only the hostname part of the URL is considered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5216">Los hosts comodín no son compatibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5216">Wildcard hosts are not supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5217">Al no configurar esta directiva, cualquier certificado que deba divulgarse a través de la transparencia de certificados es considerado como no confiable si no es revelado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5217">If you don't configure this policy, any certificate that should be disclosed via Certificate Transparency is treated as untrusted if it's not disclosed.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5218">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5218">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5219">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5219">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5220">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5220">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5221">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5221">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5222">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5222">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5223">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5223">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5224">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5224">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5225">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5225">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5226">Nombre único de GP: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5226">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5227">Nombre de GP: deshabilitar la aplicación de transparencia de certificados para direcciones de URL determinadas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5227">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for specific URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5228">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5228">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5229">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5229">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5230">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5230">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5231">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5231">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5232">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5232">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5233">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5233">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5234">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5234">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5235">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5235">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5236">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5236">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls\1 = contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls\2 = .contoso.com

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5237">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5237">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5238">Nombre clave de la preferencia: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5238">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5239">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5239">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5240">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5240">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5241">ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5241">ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5242">Borrar los datos de exploración cuando se cierra Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5242">Clear browsing data when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5243">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5243">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5244">En Windows y macOS desde 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5244">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5245">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5245">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5246">Microsoft Edge no desactiva los datos de examen de manera predeterminada cuando se cierra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5246">Microsoft Edge doesn't clear the browsing data by default when it closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5247">La búsqueda de datos incluye la información que se especifica en los formularios, las contraseñas e incluso los sitios web que se visitan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5247">Browsing data includes information entered in forms, passwords, and even the websites visited.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5248">Si habilita esta Directiva, todos los datos de examen se eliminan cada vez que se cierra Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5248">If you enable this policy, all browsing data is deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5249">Tenga en cuenta que, si habilita esta Directiva, tiene prioridad sobre la configuración [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5249">Note that if you enable this policy, it takes precedence over how you configured [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5250">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, los usuarios pueden configurar la opción Borrar datos de navegación en Configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5250">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can configure the Clear browsing data option in Settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5251">Si habilita esta directiva, no configure la [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) o el [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) directiva, ya que todos tratan sobre cómo eliminar datos de exploración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5251">If you enable this policy, don't configure the [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) or the [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) policy, because they all deal with deleting browsing data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5252">Si configura las directivas anteriores y esta directiva, todos los datos de navegación se eliminan al cerrar Microsoft Edge, independientemente de cómo haya configurado [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) o [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5252">If you configure the preceding policies and this policy, all browsing data is deleted when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how you configured [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) or [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5253">Para impedir que se eliminen las cookies al salir, configure la directiva [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5253">To exclude cookies from being deleted on exit, configure the [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5254">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5254">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5255">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5255">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5256">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5256">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5257">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5257">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5258">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5258">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5259">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5259">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5260">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5260">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5261">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5261">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5262">Nombre único de GP: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5262">GP unique name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5263">Nombre de GP: borrar los datos de exploración al cerrar Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5263">GP name: Clear browsing data when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5264">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5264">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5265">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5265">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5266">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5266">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5267">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5267">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5268">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5268">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5269">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5269">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5270">Nombre del valor: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5270">Value Name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5271">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5271">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5272">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5272">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5273">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5273">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5274">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5274">Preference Key Name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5275">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5275">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5276">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5276">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5277">ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5277">ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5278">Limpie las imágenes y los archivos almacenados en caché cuando se cierra Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5278">Clear cached images and files when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5279">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5279">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5280">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 83 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5280">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5281">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5281">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5282">De forma predeterminada, Microsoft Edge no borra las imágenes y los archivos almacenados en caché cuando se cierra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5282">Microsoft Edge doesn't clear cached images and files by default when it closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5283">Si habilita esta Directiva, los archivos y las imágenes que están almacenadas en la caché se eliminarán cada vez que se cierre Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5283">If you enable this policy, cached images and files will be deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5284">Si deshabilita esta Directiva, los usuarios no podrán configurar la opción de archivos e imágenes en caché en edge://settings/clearBrowsingDataOnClose.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5284">If you disable this policy, users cannot configure the cached images and files option in edge://settings/clearBrowsingDataOnClose.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5285">Si no configura esta Directiva, los usuarios pueden elegir si las imágenes y los archivos almacenados en caché son eliminados al salir de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5285">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose whether cached images and files are cleared on exit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5286">Si deshabilita esta Directiva, no habilite la Directiva de [ ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit), ya que ambos tratan sobre la eliminación de datos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5286">If you disable this policy, don't enable the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy, because they both deal with deleting data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5287">Si configura ambas opciones, la Directiva [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) tendrá prioridad y eliminará todos los datos cuando se cierre Microsoft Edge, independientemente de cómo haya configurado [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5287">If you configure both, the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy takes precedence and deletes all data when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how you configured [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5288">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5288">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5289">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5289">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5290">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5290">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5291">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5291">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5292">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5292">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5293">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5293">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5294">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5294">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5295">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5295">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5296">Nombre único de GP: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5296">GP unique name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5297">Nombre de GP: limpiar las imágenes y los archivos almacenados en el caché al cerrar Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5297">GP name: Clear cached images and files when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5298">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5298">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5299">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5299">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5300">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5300">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5301">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5301">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5302">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5302">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5303">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5303">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5304">Nombre del valor: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5304">Value Name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5305">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5305">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5306">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5306">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5307">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5307">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5308">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5308">Preference Key Name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5309">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5309">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5310">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5310">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5311">ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5311">ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5312">Permitir que los usuarios abran archivos mediante el protocolo ClickOnce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5312">Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5313">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5313">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5314">En Windows desde la versión 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5314">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5315">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5315">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5316">Permita que los usuarios abran los archivos mediante el protocolo ClickOnce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5316">Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5317">El protocolo ClickOnce permite que los sitios web soliciten que el explorador abra archivos de una dirección URL específica mediante el controlador de archivos de ClickOnce en el equipo o dispositivo del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5317">The ClickOnce protocol allows websites to request that the browser open files from a specific URL using the ClickOnce file handler on the user's computer or device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5318">Si habilita esta Directiva, los usuarios pueden abrir archivos mediante el protocolo ClickOnce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5318">If you enable this policy, users can open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5319">Esta directiva reemplaza la configuración de ClickOnce del usuario en la página edge://flags/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5319">This policy overrides the user's ClickOnce setting in the edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5320">Si deshabilita esta Directiva, los usuarios no podrán abrir archivos con el protocolo ClickOnce.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5320">If you disable this policy, users can't open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5321">En su lugar, el archivo se guardará en el sistema de archivos usando el explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5321">Instead, the file will be saved to the file system using the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5322">Esta directiva reemplaza la configuración de ClickOnce del usuario en la página edge://flags/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5322">This policy overrides the user's ClickOnce setting in the edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5323">Si no configura esta Directiva, los usuarios con versiones de Microsoft Edge anteriores a Microsoft Edge 87 no podrán abrir archivos mediante el protocolo ClickOnce de forma predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5323">If you don't configure this policy, users with Microsoft Edge versions before Microsoft Edge 87 can't open files using the ClickOnce protocol by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5324">Sin embargo, los usuarios tienen la opción de habilitar el uso del protocolo ClickOnce con la página edge://flags/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5324">However, they have the option to enable the use of the ClickOnce protocol with the edge://flags/ page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5325">Los usuarios con las versiones 87 y posteriores de Microsoft Edge pueden abrir archivos con el protocolo ClickOnce de forma predeterminada, pero tienen la opción de deshabilitarlo mediante la página edge://flags/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5325">Users with Microsoft Edge versions 87 and later can open files using the ClickOnce protocol by default but have the option to disable the ClickOnce protocol with edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5326">Deshabilitar ClickOnce puede impedir que las aplicaciones ClickOnce (archivos. Application) se inicien correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5326">Disabling ClickOnce may prevent ClickOnce applications (.application files) from launching properly.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5327">Para obtener más información sobre ClickOnce, vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) y [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5327">For more information about ClickOnce, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) and [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5328">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5328">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5329">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5329">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5330">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5330">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5331">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5331">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5332">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5332">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5333">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5333">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5334">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5334">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5335">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5335">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5336">Nombre único de GP: ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5336">GP unique name: ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5337">Nombre de GP: permitir que los usuarios abran los archivos mediante el protocolo ClickOnce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5337">GP name: Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5338">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5338">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5339">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5339">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5340">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5340">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5341">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5341">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5342">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5342">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5343">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5343">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5344">Nombre del valor: ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5344">Value Name: ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5345">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5345">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5346">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5346">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5347">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5347">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5348">CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5348">CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5349">Bloquear el acceso a una lista especificada de servicios y destinos de exportación en Colecciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5349">Block access to a specified list of services and export targets in Collections</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5350">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5350">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5351">En Windows y MacOS desde 86 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5351">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5352">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5352">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5353">Enumera los servicios y destinos de exportación específicos a los que los usuarios no pueden obtener acceso en la característica Colecciones de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5353">List specific services and export targets that users can't access in the Collections feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5354">Esto incluye mostrar datos adicionales de Bing y exportar colecciones a asociados externos o productos de Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5354">This includes displaying additional data from Bing and exporting collections to Microsoft products or external partners.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5355">Si habilita esta directiva, los servicios y destinos de exportación que coincidan con la lista determinada estarán bloqueados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5355">If you enable this policy, services and export targets that match the given list are blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5356">Si no configura esta Directiva, no se aplicarán restricciones sobre los servicios y destinos de exportación aceptables.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5356">If you don't configure this policy, no restrictions on the acceptable services and export targets are enforced.</span></span>

                                                     

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5357">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5357">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5358">pinterest_suggestions (pinterest_suggestions) = sugerencias de Pinterest</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5358">pinterest_suggestions (pinterest_suggestions) = Pinterest suggestions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5359">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5359">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5360">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5360">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5361">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5361">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5362">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5362">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5363">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5363">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5364">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5364">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5365">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5365">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5366">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5366">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5367">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5367">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5368">Nombre único de GP: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5368">GP unique name: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5369">Nombre de GP: bloquear el acceso a una lista especificada de servicios y destinos de exportación en Colecciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5369">GP name: Block access to a specified list of services and export targets in Collections</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5370">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5370">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5371">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5371">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5372">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5372">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5373">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5373">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5374">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5374">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5375">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5375">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5376">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5376">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5377">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5377">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5378">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5378">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\1 = pinterest_suggestions

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5379">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5379">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5380">Nombre clave de la preferencia: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5380">Preference Key Name: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5381">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5381">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>pinterest_suggestions</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5382">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5382">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5383">CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5383">CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5384">Habilitar advertencias de seguridad para indicadores de la línea de comandos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5384">Enable security warnings for command-line flags</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5385">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5385">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5386">En Windows y macOS desde 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5386">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5387">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5387">Description</span></span>
