  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5388">Si se deshabilita, esta directiva evita que las advertencias de seguridad aparezcan cuando se inicia Microsoft Edge el marcador de la línea de comandos potencialmente peligrosas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5388">If disabled, this policy prevents security warnings from appearing when Microsoft Edge is launched with potentially dangerous command-line flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5389">Aun si está habilitado o no, las advertencias de seguridad se mostrarán cuando estos marcadores de línea de comandos se utilicen para iniciar Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5389">If enabled or unset, security warnings are displayed when these command-line flags are used to launch Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5390">Por ejemplo, el marcador de --disable-gpu-sandbox genera esta advertencia:  Estás usando un marcador de línea de comandos que no es compatible: --disable-gpu-sandbox.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5390">For example, the --disable-gpu-sandbox flag generates this warning:  You're using an unsupported command-line flag: --disable-gpu-sandbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5391">Esto constituye un riesgo para la estabilidad y la seguridad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5391">This poses stability and security risks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5392">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5392">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5393">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5393">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5394">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5394">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5395">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5395">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5396">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5396">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5397">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5397">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5398">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5398">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5399">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5399">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5400">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5400">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5401">Nombre único de GP: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5401">GP unique name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5402">Nombre de GP: habilitar las advertencias de seguridad para los indicadores de la línea de comandos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5402">GP name: Enable security warnings for command-line flags</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5403">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5403">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5404">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5404">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5405">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5405">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5406">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5406">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5407">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5407">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5408">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5408">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5409">Nombre del valor: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5409">Value Name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5410">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5410">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5411">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5411">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5412">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5412">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5413">Nombre clave de la preferencia: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5413">Preference Key Name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5414">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5414">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5415">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5415">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5416">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5416">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5417">Habilitar las actualizaciones de los componentes en Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5417">Enable component updates in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5418">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5418">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5419">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5419">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5420">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5420">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5421">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, se habilitarán las actualizaciones de componentes en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5421">If you enable or don't configure this policy, component updates are enabled in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5422">Si deshabilita esta directiva o se establece como falsa, se deshabilitarán las actualizaciones de componentes para todos los componentes de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5422">If you disable this policy or set it to false, component updates are disabled for all components in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5423">Sin embargo, en esta directiva se omiten algunos componentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5423">However, some components are exempt from this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5424">Esto incluye cualquier componente que no contenga un código ejecutable, que no cambie significativamente el comportamiento del explorador, o que sea crítico para la seguridad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5424">This includes any component that doesn't contain executable code, that doesn't significantly alter the behavior of the browser, or that's critical for security.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5425">Es decir, las actualizaciones que se consideran "críticas para la seguridad" y se seguirán aplicando incluso si deshabilita esta directiva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5425">That is, updates that are deemed "critical for security" are still applied even if you disable this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5426">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5426">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5427">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5427">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5428">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5428">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5429">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5429">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5430">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5430">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5431">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5431">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5432">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5432">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5433">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5433">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5434">Nombre único de GP: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5434">GP unique name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5435">Nombre de GP: habilitar las actualizaciones de los componentes en Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5435">GP name: Enable component updates in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5436">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5436">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5437">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5437">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5438">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5438">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5439">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5439">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5440">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5440">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5441">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5441">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5442">Nombre del valor: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5442">Value Name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5443">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5443">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5444">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5444">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5445">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5445">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5446">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5446">Preference Key Name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5447">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5447">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5448">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5448">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5449">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5449">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5450">Configurar No realizar seguimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5450">Configure Do Not Track</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5451">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5451">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5452">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5452">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5453">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5453">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5454">Especifique si se enviarán solicitudes de No realizar seguimiento a sitios web que soliciten información de seguimiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5454">Specify whether to send Do Not Track requests to websites that ask for tracking info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5455">No realizar un seguimiento de las solicitudes permite que los sitios web que visite sepan que no desea que se realice un seguimiento de su actividad de navegación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5455">Do Not Track requests let the websites you visit know that you don't want your browsing activity to be tracked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5456">De forma predeterminada, Microsoft Edge no envía solicitudes de No seguimiento, pero los usuarios pueden activar esta característica para enviarlas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5456">By default, Microsoft Edge doesn't send Do Not Track requests, but users can turn on this feature to send them.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5457">Si habilita esta directiva, las solicitudes de no realizar seguimiento siempre se enviarán a sitios web que soliciten información de seguimiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5457">If you enable this policy, Do Not Track requests are always sent to websites asking for tracking info.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5458">Si deshabilita esta directiva, las solicitudes nunca se enviarán.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5458">If you disable this policy, requests are never sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5459">Si no configura esta directiva, los usuarios podrán elegir si enviar estas solicitudes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5459">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose whether to send these requests.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5460">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5460">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5461">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5461">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5462">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5462">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5463">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5463">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5464">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5464">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5465">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5465">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5466">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5466">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5467">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5467">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5468">Nombre único de GP: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5468">GP unique name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5469">Nombre de GP: configurar No realizar seguimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5469">GP name: Configure Do Not Track</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5470">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5470">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5471">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5471">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5472">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5472">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5473">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5473">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5474">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5474">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5475">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5475">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5476">Nombre del valor: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5476">Value Name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5477">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5477">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5478">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5478">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5479">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5479">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5480">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5480">Preference Key Name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5481">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5481">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5482">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5482">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5483">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5483">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5484">Configurar el inicio de sesión automático con una cuenta de dominio de Active Directory cuando no haya cuenta de dominio de Azure AD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5484">Configure automatic sign in with an Active Directory domain account when there is no Azure AD domain account</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5485">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5485">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5486">En Windows desde la versión 81 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5486">On Windows since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5487">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5487">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5488">Habilita el uso de cuentas de Active Directory para el inicio de sesión automático en caso de que los equipos de los usuarios se unan a un dominio y el entorno no se haya unido de forma híbrida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5488">Enable the use of Active Directory accounts for automatic sign in if your users' machines are Domain Joined and your environment is not hybrid joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5489">Si desea que los usuarios inicien sesión automáticamente con sus cuentas de Azure Active Directory, en su lugar, llame a Azure AD join (vea[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197) para obtener más información) o a una combinación híbrida (vea[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365) para obtener más información) en su entorno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5489">If you want users automatically signed in with their Azure Active Directory accounts instead, please Azure AD join (See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197) for more information) or hybrid join (See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365) for more information) your environment.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5490">Si ha configurado la directiva[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) como deshabilitada, esta directiva no tendrá ningún efecto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5490">If you have configured the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy to disabled, this policy will not take any effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5491">Si habilita esta directiva y la establece en "SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable", Microsoft Edge iniciará automáticamente la sesión de los usuarios que estén en equipos unidos a un dominio mediante sus cuentas de Active Directory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5491">If you enable this policy and set it to 'SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable', Microsoft Edge will automatically sign in users that are on domain joined machines using their Active Directory accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5492">Si establece esta directiva como "Deshabilitada" o no la establece, Microsoft Edge no iniciará sesión automáticamente a los usuarios que se encuentren en equipos unidos a un dominio con cuentas de Active Directory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5492">If you set this policy to 'Disabled' or don't set it, Microsoft Edge will not automatically sign in users that are on domain joined machines with Active Directory accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5493">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5493">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5494">Deshabilitado (0) = deshabilitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5494">Disabled (0) = Disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5495">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = iniciar sesión y convertir la cuenta de dominio en no extraíble</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5495">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = Sign in and make domain account non-removable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5496">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5496">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5497">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5497">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5498">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5498">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5499">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5499">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5500">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5500">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5501">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5501">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5502">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5502">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5503">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5503">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5504">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5504">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5505">Nombre único de GP: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5505">GP unique name: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5506">Nombre de GP: configurar el inicio de sesión automático con una cuenta de dominio de Active Directory cuando no tenga una cuenta de dominio de Azure AD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5506">GP name: Configure automatic sign in with an Active Directory domain account when there is no Azure AD domain account</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5507">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5507">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5508">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5508">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5509">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5509">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5510">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5510">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5511">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5511">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5512">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5512">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5513">Nombre del valor: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5513">Value Name: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5514">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5514">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5515">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5515">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5516">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5516">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5517">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5517">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5518">Configurar Texto a voz en línea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5518">Configure Online Text To Speech</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5519">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5519">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5520">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5520">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5521">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5521">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5522">Configure si el explorador puede usar el texto en línea para la característica fuentes de voz, como parte de los servicios de Azure Cognitive.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5522">Set whether the browser can leverage Online Text to Speech voice fonts, part of Azure Cognitive Services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5523">Estas fuentes de voz son de mayor calidad que las preinstaladas en el sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5523">These voice fonts are higher quality than the pre-installed system voice fonts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5524">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, las aplicaciones basadas en web que usan la API SpeechSynthesis podrán usar texto en línea para la característica fuentes de voz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5524">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web-based applications that use the SpeechSynthesis API can use Online Text to Speech voice fonts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5525">Si deshabilita esta directiva, la característica fuentes de voz no estará disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5525">If you disable this policy, the voice fonts aren't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5526">Obtenga más información sobre esta característica aquí: API SpeechSynthesis: [ https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) servicios cognitivos: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5526">Read more about this feature here: SpeechSynthesis API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5527">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5527">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5528">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5528">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5529">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5529">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5530">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5530">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5531">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5531">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5532">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5532">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5533">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5533">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5534">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5534">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5535">Nombre único de GP: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5535">GP unique name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5536">Nombre de GP: configurar el texto a voz en línea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5536">GP name: Configure Online Text To Speech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5537">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5537">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5538">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5538">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5539">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5539">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5540">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5540">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5541">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5541">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5542">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5542">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5543">Nombre del valor: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5543">Value Name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5544">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5544">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5545">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5545">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5546">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5546">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5547">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5547">Preference Key Name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5548">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5548">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5549">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5549">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5550">ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5550">ConfigureShare</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5551">Configurar Compartir experiencia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5551">Configure the Share experience</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5552">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5552">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5553">En Windows desde la versión 83 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5553">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5554">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5554">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5555">Si establece esta directiva en "ShareAllowed" (el valor predeterminado), los usuarios podrán acceder a la experiencia de Uso compartido de Windows 10 desde el Menú Configuración y Más en Microsoft Edge para compartir con otras aplicaciones del sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5555">If you set this policy to 'ShareAllowed' (the default), users will be able to access the Windows 10 Share experience from the Settings and More Menu in Microsoft Edge to share with other apps on the system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5556">Si establece esta directiva en "ShareDisallowed", los usuarios no podrán acceder a la experiencia de Uso compartido de Windows 10.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5556">If you set this policy to 'ShareDisallowed', users won't be able to access the Windows 10 Share experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5557">Si el botón compartir se encuentra en la barra de herramientas, también estará oculto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5557">If the Share button is on the toolbar, it will also be hidden.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5558">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5558">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5559">ShareAllowed (0) = permitir el acceso a la experiencia de Uso compartido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5559">ShareAllowed (0) = Allow using the Share experience</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5560">ShareDisallowed (1) = no permitir el acceso a la experiencia de Uso compartido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5560">ShareDisallowed (1) = Don't allow using the Share experience</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5561">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5561">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5562">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5562">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5563">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5563">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5564">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5564">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5565">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5565">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5566">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5566">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5567">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5567">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5568">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5568">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5569">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5569">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5570">Nombre único de GP: ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5570">GP unique name: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5571">Nombre de GP: configurar la experiencia de uso compartido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5571">GP name: Configure the Share experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5572">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5572">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5573">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5573">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5574">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5574">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5575">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5575">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5576">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5576">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5577">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5577">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5578">Nombre del valor: ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5578">Value Name: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5579">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5579">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5580">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5580">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5581">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5581">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5582">CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5582">CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5583">Especificar el vínculo de ayuda personalizada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5583">Specify custom help link</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5584">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5584">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5585">En Windows y macOS desde 79 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5585">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5586">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5586">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5587">Especifique un vínculo para el menú de ayuda o la tecla F1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5587">Specify a link for the Help menu or the F1 key.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5588">Si habilita esta directiva, un administrador podrá especificar un vínculo para el menú de ayuda o la tecla F1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5588">If you enable this policy, an admin can specify a link for the Help menu or the F1 key.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5589">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, se usará el enlace predeterminado para el menú de ayuda o la tecla F1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5589">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default link for the Help menu or the F1 key is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5590">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5590">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5591">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5591">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5592">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5592">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5593">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5593">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5594">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5594">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5595">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5595">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5596">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5596">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5597">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5597">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5598">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5598">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5599">Nombre único de GP: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5599">GP unique name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5600">Nombre de GP: especificar el vínculo de ayuda personalizada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5600">GP name: Specify custom help link</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5601">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5601">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5602">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5602">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5603">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5603">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5604">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5604">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5605">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5605">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5606">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5606">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5607">Nombre del valor: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5607">Value Name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5608">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5608">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5609">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5609">Example value:</span></span>
```
https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080734
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5610">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5610">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5611">Nombre clave de la preferencia: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5611">Preference Key Name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5612">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5612">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080734</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5613">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5613">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5614">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5614">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5615">Comprobaciones de interceptación de DNS habilitadas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5615">DNS interception checks enabled</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5616">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5616">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5617">En Windows y MacOS desde 80 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5617">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5618">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5618">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5619">Esta directiva configura un conmutador local que puede usarse para deshabilitar las comprobaciones de interceptación de DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5619">This policy configures a local switch that can be used to disable DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5620">Estas comprobaciones intentan detectar si el explorador se encuentra detrás de un proxy que redirige nombres de host desconocidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5620">These checks attempt to discover whether the browser is behind a proxy that redirects unknown host names.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5621">Es posible que esta detección no sea necesaria para un entorno empresarial en el que se conozca la configuración de la red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5621">This detection might not be necessary in an enterprise environment where the network configuration is known.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5622">Se puede deshabilitar para evitar el tráfico adicional de DNS y HTTP durante el inicio y en cada uno de los cambios de configuración DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5622">It can be disabled to avoid additional DNS and HTTP traffic on start-up and each DNS configuration change.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5623">Si habilita o no establece esta directiva, se realizarán las comprobaciones de interceptación de DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5623">If you enable or don't set this policy, the DNS interception checks are performed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5624">Si deshabilita esta directiva, no se llevarán a cabo las comprobaciones de interceptación de DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5624">If you disable this policy, DNS interception checks aren't performed.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5625">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5625">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5626">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5626">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5627">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5627">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5628">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5628">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5629">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5629">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5630">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5630">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5631">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5631">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5632">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5632">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5633">Nombre único de GP: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5633">GP unique name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5634">Nombre de GP: comprobaciones de interceptación de DNS habilitadas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5634">GP name: DNS interception checks enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5635">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5635">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5636">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5636">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5637">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5637">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5638">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5638">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5639">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5639">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5640">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5640">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5641">Nombre del valor: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5641">Value Name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5642">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5642">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5643">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5643">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5644">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5644">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5645">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5645">Preference Key Name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5646">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5646">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5647">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5647">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5648">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5648">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5649">Establecer Microsoft Edge como explorador predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5649">Set Microsoft Edge as default browser</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5650">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5650">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5651">En Windows 7 y macOS desde la versión 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5651">On Windows 7 and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5652">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5652">Description</span></span>
      

  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5653">Si establece esta directiva en "true", Microsoft Edge siempre comprueba si es el navegador predeterminado en el inicio y, si es posible, se registra automáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5653">If you set this policy to True, Microsoft Edge always checks whether it's the default browser on startup and, if possible, automatically registers itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5654">Si establece esta directiva en false, Microsoft Edge deja de comprobar si es el valor predeterminado y desactiva los controles de usuario para esta opción.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5654">If you set this policy to False, Microsoft Edge is stopped from ever checking if it's the default and turns user controls off for this option.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5655">Si no define esta Directiva, Microsoft Edge permite a los usuarios controlar si son las predeterminadas y, en caso contrario, si las notificaciones de usuario deben aparecer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5655">If you don't set this policy, Microsoft Edge lets users control whether it's the default and, if not, whether user notifications should appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5656">Nota para los administradores de Windows: esta directiva solo funciona en los ordenadores que ejecuten Windows 7.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5656">Note for Windows administrators: This policy only works for PCs running Windows 7.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5657">Para las versiones posteriores de Windows, hay que implementar un archivo de "asociaciones de aplicación predeterminadas" que hace de Microsoft Edge el controlador de los protocolos https y http (y, opcionalmente, del protocolo ftp y formatos de archivo como .html, .htm, .pdf, .svg, .webp).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5657">For later versions of Windows, you have to deploy a "default application associations" file that makes Microsoft Edge the handler for the https and http protocols (and, optionally, the ftp protocol and file formats such as .html, .htm, .pdf, .svg, .webp).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5658">Vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932) para obtener más información.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5658">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932) for more information.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5659">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5659">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5660">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5660">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5661">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5661">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5662">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5662">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5663">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5663">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5664">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5664">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5665">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5665">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5666">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5666">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5667">Nombre único de GP: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5667">GP unique name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5668">Nombre de GP: establecer Microsoft Edge como explorador predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5668">GP name: Set Microsoft Edge as default browser</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5669">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5669">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5670">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5670">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5671">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5671">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5672">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5672">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5673">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5673">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5674">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5674">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5675">Nombre del valor: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5675">Value Name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5676">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5676">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5677">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5677">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5678">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5678">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5679">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5679">Preference Key Name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5680">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5680">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5681">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5681">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5682">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5682">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5683">Permitir el acceso de búsqueda al menú contextual del proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5683">Allow default search provider context menu search access</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5684">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5684">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5685">En Windows y MacOS desde 85 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5685">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5686">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5686">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5687">Permite el uso de un proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado en el menú contextual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5687">Enables the use of a default search provider on the context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5688">Si establece esta directiva en deshabilitado, el elemento de menú contextual de búsqueda, que depende del proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado y la búsqueda en la barra lateral, no estará disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5688">If you set this policy to disabled the search context menu item that relies on your default search provider and sidebar search will not be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5689">Si establece esta directiva en habilitada o no la establece, el elemento de menú contextual para el proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado y la búsqueda en la barra lateral estará disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5689">If this policy is set to enabled or not set, the context menu item for your default search provider and sidebar search will be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5690">El valor de la directiva solo se aplica cuando la directiva [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) está habilitada, y no se aplica en caso contrario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5690">The policy value is only appled when the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) policy is enabled, and is not applicable otherwise.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5691">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5691">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5692">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5692">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5693">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5693">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5694">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5694">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5695">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5695">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5696">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5696">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5697">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5697">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5698">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5698">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5699">Nombre único de GP: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5699">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5700">Nombre de GP: permitir el acceso de búsqueda al menú contextual del proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5700">GP name: Allow default search provider context menu search access</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5701">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5701">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5702">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5702">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5703">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5703">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5704">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5704">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5705">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5705">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5706">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5706">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5707">Nombre del valor: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5707">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5708">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5708">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5709">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5709">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5710">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5710">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5711">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5711">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5712">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5712">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5713">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5713">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5714">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5714">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5715">Requerir que la lista de sitios modo empresarial esté disponible antes que la navegación por la tabulación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5715">Require that the Enterprise Mode Site List is available before tab navigation</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5716">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5716">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5717">En Windows desde la versión 84 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5717">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5718">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5718">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5719">Le permite especificar si las pestañas de Microsoft Edge esperan para navegar hasta que el explorador ha descargado la lista de sitios de modo empresarial inicial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5719">Lets you specify whether Microsoft Edge tabs wait to navigate until the browser has downloaded the initial Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5720">Esta configuración está pensada para el escenario en el que la Página principal del explorador se debe cargar en el modo de Internet Explorer y es importante que se realice en la primera ejecución del explorador después de habilitar el modo IE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5720">This setting is intended for the scenario where the browser home page should load in Internet Explorer mode, and it is important that is does so on browser first run after IE mode is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5721">Si este escenario no existe, le recomendamos que no habilite esta opción, ya que puede afectar negativamente al rendimiento de carga de la Página principal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5721">If this scenario does not exist, we recommend not enabling this setting because it can negatively impact the performance of loading the home page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5722">La configuración solo se aplica cuando Microsoft Edge no tiene una lista de sitios en el modo de empresa en caché, como en ejecutar por primera vez el explorador después de habilitar el modo IE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5722">The setting only applies when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached Enterprise Mode Site List, such as on browser first run after IE mode is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5723">Esta configuración funciona conjuntamente con: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) establecida en "IEMode" y la directiva [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) donde la lista tiene al menos una entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5723">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5724">El comportamiento del tiempo de espera de esta Directiva se puede configurar con la Directiva [NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5724">The timeout behavior of this policy can be configured with the [NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5725">Si establece esta directiva en "Todos", cuando Microsoft Edge no tenga una versión en caché de la lista de sitios del modo de empresa, las pestañas retrasarán la navegación hasta que el explorador descargue la lista de sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5725">If you set this policy to 'All', when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached version of the Enterprise Mode Site List, tabs delay navigating until the browser has downloaded the site list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5726">Los sitios configurados para abrirse en modo de Internet Explorer por la lista de sitios se cargarán en el modo de Internet Explorer, incluso durante la navegación inicial del explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5726">Sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode by the site list will load in Internet Explorer mode, even during the initial navigation of the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5727">Los sitios que no pueden configurarse para abrirse en Internet Explorer, como cualquier sitio con un esquema distinto de http:, https:, archivo: o FTP: no retrasa la navegación y carga inmediatamente en el modo de borde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5727">Sites that cannot possibly be configured to open in Internet Explorer, such as any site with a scheme other than http:, https:, file:, or ftp: do not delay navigating and load immediately in Edge mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5728">Si establece esta directiva en "Ninguno" o no la configura, cuando Microsoft Edge no tenga una versión en caché de la lista de sitios del modo de empresa, las pestañas se navegarán inmediatamente y no esperarán a que el explorador descargue Enterprise Mode Site List.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5728">If you set this policy to 'None' or don't configure it, when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached version of the Enterprise Mode Site List, tabs will navigate immediately, and not wait for the browser to download the Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5729">Los sitios configurados para abrirse en el modo de Internet Explorer por la lista de sitios se abrirán en el modo de Microsoft Edge hasta que el explorador termine de descargar la lista de sitios de modo empresarial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5729">Sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode by the site list will open in Microsoft Edge mode until the browser has finished downloading the Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5730">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5730">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5731">None (0) = ninguno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5731">None (0) = None</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5732">All (1) = Todas las navegaciones aptas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5732">All (1) = All eligible navigations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5733">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5733">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5734">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5734">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5735">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5735">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5736">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5736">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5737">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5737">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5738">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5738">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5739">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5739">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5740">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5740">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5741">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5741">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5742">Nombre único de GP: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5742">GP unique name: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5743">Nombre de la Directiva de Grupo: necesita que la lista de sitios modo empresarial esté disponible antes que la navegación por la tabulación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5743">GP name: Require that the Enterprise Mode Site List is available before tab navigation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5744">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5744">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5745">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5745">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
