  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5746">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5746">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5747">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5747">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5748">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5748">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5749">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5749">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5750">Nombre del valor: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5750">Value Name: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5751">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5751">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5752">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5752">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5753">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5753">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5754">DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5754">DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5755">Eliminar datos antiguos del explorador en la migración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5755">Delete old browser data on migration</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5756">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5756">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5757">En Windows desde la versión 83 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5757">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5758">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5758">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5759">Esta directiva determina si se eliminarán los datos de navegación del usuario de Microsoft Edge (versión anterior) después de migrar a la versión 81 o posterior de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5759">This policy determines whether user browsing data from Microsoft Edge Legacy will be deleted after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5760">Si establece esta directiva como "habilitada", todos los datos de navegación de Microsoft Edge (versión anterior) después de migrar a la versión 81 de Microsoft Edge o posterior serán eliminados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5760">If you set this policy to "Enabled", all browsing data from Microsoft Edge Legacy after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later will be deleted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5761">Esta política debe establecerse antes de migrar a la versión 81 o posterior de Microsoft Edge para que tenga algún efecto en los datos de exploración existentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5761">This policy must be set before migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later to have any effect on existing browsing data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5762">Si establece esta directiva como "deshabilitada", o si no está configurada, los datos de navegación del usuario no se eliminarán después de migrar a la versión 83 o posterior de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5762">If you set this policy to "Disabled", or the policy is not configured, user browsing data isn't deleted after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 83 or later.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5763">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5763">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5764">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5764">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5765">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5765">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5766">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5766">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5767">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5767">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5768">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5768">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5769">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5769">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5770">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5770">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5771">Nombre único de GP: DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5771">GP unique name: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5772">Nombre de GP: eliminar los datos antiguos del explorador durante la migración</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5772">GP name: Delete old browser data on migration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5773">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5773">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5774">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5774">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5775">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5775">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5776">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5776">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5777">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5777">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5778">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5778">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5779">Nombre del valor: DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5779">Value Name: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5780">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5780">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5781">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5781">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5782">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5782">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5783">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5783">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5784">Controlar dónde se pueden usar las herramientas de desarrollo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5784">Control where developer tools can be used</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5785">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5785">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5786">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5786">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5787">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5787">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5788">Controla dónde se pueden usar las herramientas de desarrollo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5788">Control where developer tools can be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5789">Si establece esta directiva en "DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions" (el valor predeterminado), los usuarios podrán acceder a las herramientas de desarrollo y a la consola de JavaScript en general, pero no en el contexto de las extensiones instaladas por la directiva empresarial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5789">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions' (the default), users can access the developer tools and the JavaScript console in general, but not in the context of extensions installed by enterprise policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5790">Si establece esta directiva en "DeveloperToolsAllowed" (el valor predeterminado), los usuarios podrán acceder a las herramientas de desarrollo y a la consola de JavaScript en todos los contextos, incluyendo el contexto de las extensiones instaladas por la directiva empresarial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5790">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsAllowed', users can access the developer tools and the JavaScript console in all contexts, including extensions installed by enterprise policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5791">Si establece esta directiva en "DeveloperToolsDisallowed", los usuarios no podrán acceder a las herramientas de desarrollo o inspeccionar los elementos del sitio web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5791">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsDisallowed', users can't access the developer tools or inspect website elements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5792">Se deshabilitarán los métodos abreviados de teclado y las entradas de los menús contextuales y del menú que abren las herramientas para desarrolladores o la consola JavaScript.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5792">Keyboard shortcuts and menu or context menu entries that open the developer tools or the JavaScript Console are disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5793">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5793">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5794">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0) = bloquear las herramientas para desarrolladores en extensiones instaladas por la directiva empresarial, y permitirlas en otros contextos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5794">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0) = Block the developer tools on extensions installed by enterprise policy, allow in other contexts</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5795">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = permitir el uso de las herramientas de desarrollo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5795">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = Allow using the developer tools</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5796">DeveloperToolsDisallowed (2) = no permitir el uso de las herramientas de desarrollo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5796">DeveloperToolsDisallowed (2) = Don't allow using the developer tools</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5797">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5797">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5798">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5798">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5799">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5799">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5800">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5800">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5801">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5801">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5802">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5802">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5803">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5803">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5804">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5804">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5805">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5805">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5806">Nombre único de GP: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5806">GP unique name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5807">Nombre de GP: controlar dónde se pueden usar las herramientas de desarrollo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5807">GP name: Control where developer tools can be used</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5808">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5808">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5809">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5809">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5810">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5810">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5811">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5811">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5812">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5812">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5813">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5813">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5814">Nombre del valor: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5814">Value Name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5815">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5815">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5816">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5816">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5817">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5817">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5818">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5818">Preference Key Name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5819">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5819">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5820">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5820">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5821">DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5821">DiagnosticData</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5822">Enviar datos de diagnóstico necesarios y opcionales sobre el uso del explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5822">Send required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5823">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5823">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5824">En Windows 7 y macOS desde la versión 86 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5824">On Windows 7 and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5825">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5825">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5826">Esta directiva controla el envío a Microsoft de datos de diagnóstico necesarios y opcionales sobre el uso del explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5826">This policy controls sending required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5827">Los datos de diagnóstico se recopilan para proteger, actualizar y mejorar el rendimiento de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5827">Required diagnostic data is collected keep Microsoft Edge secure, up to date and performing as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5828">Algunos de los datos de diagnóstico opcionales están relacionados con el uso del explorador, los sitios web que visita y los informes de bloqueos, que ayudan a Microsoft a mejorar el producto y el servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5828">Optional diagnostic data includes data about how you use the browser, websites you visit and crash reports to Microsoft for product and service improvement.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5829">Esta Directiva no es compatible con dispositivos Windows 10.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5829">This policy is not supported on Windows 10 devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5830">Para controlar esta colección de datos en Windows 10, los administradores de TI tienen que usar la directiva de grupo de datos de diagnóstico de Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5830">To control this data collection on Windows 10, IT admins must use the Windows diagnostic data group policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5831">Esta directiva será "Permitir telemetría" o "Permitir datos de diagnóstico", en función de la versión de Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5831">This policy will either be 'Allow Telemetry' or 'Allow Diagnostic Data', depending on the version of Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5832">Más información sobre la colección de datos de diagnóstico de Windows 10: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5832">Learn more about Windows 10 diagnostic data collection: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5833">Use una de las opciones siguientes para configurar esta directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5833">Use one of the following settings to configure this policy:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5834">"Desactivado" desactiva la recopilación de datos de diagnóstico necesarios y opcionales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5834">'Off' turns off required and optional diagnostic data collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5835">No se recomienda esta opción.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5835">This option is not recommended.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5836">"RequiredData" envía los datos de diagnóstico necesarios y desactiva la recopilación de datos de diagnóstico opcionales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5836">'RequiredData' sends required diagnostic data but turns off optional diagnostic data collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5837">Microsoft Edge enviará los datos de diagnóstico necesarios para que Microsoft Edge esté protegido y actualizado, y para que funcione como se espera de él.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5837">Microsoft Edge will send required diagnostic data to keep Microsoft Edge secure, up to date and performing as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5838">"OptionalData" envía datos de diagnóstico opcionales y contiene datos sobre el uso del explorador, los sitios web que se visitan y los informes de bloqueos enviados a Microsoft para mejorar el producto y el servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5838">'OptionalData' sends optional diagnostic data includes data about browser usage, websites that are visited, crash reports sent to Microsoft for product and service improvement.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5839">En Windows 7 y macOS, esta directiva controla el envío de datos necesarios y opcionales a Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5839">On Windows 7/macOS, this policy controls sending required and optional data to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5840">Si no configura esta directiva o la deshabilita, Microsoft Edge se ajustará de forma predeterminada a las preferencias del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5840">If you don't configure this policy or disable it, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5841">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5841">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5842">Desactivado (0) = desactivado (no recomendado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5842">Off (0) = Off (Not recommended)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5843">RequiredData (1) = datos necesarios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5843">RequiredData (1) = Required data</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-5844">OptionalData (2) = datos opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5844">OptionalData (2) = Optional data</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5845">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5845">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5846">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5846">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5847">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5847">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5848">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5848">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5849">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5849">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5850">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5850">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5851">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5851">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5852">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5852">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5853">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5853">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5854">Nombre único de GP: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5854">GP unique name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5855">Nombre GP: enviar datos de diagnóstico necesarios y opcionales sobre el uso del explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5855">GP name: Send required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5856">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5856">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5857">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5857">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5858">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5858">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5859">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5859">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5860">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5860">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5861">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5861">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5862">Nombre de valor: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5862">Value Name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5863">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5863">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5864">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5864">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5865">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5865">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5866">Nombre de clave de preferencias: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5866">Preference Key Name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5867">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5867">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5868">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5868">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5869">DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5869">DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5870">Permitir que los usuarios abran archivos mediante el protocolo DirectInvoke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5870">Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5871">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5871">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5872">En Windows desde la versión 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5872">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5873">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5873">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5874">Permitir que los usuarios abran archivos mediante el protocolo DirectInvoke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5874">Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5875">El protocolo ClickOnce permite que los sitios web soliciten que el explorador abra los archivos desde una dirección URL determinada mediante un controlador de archivos específico en el equipo o dispositivo del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5875">The DirectInvoke protocol allows websites to request that the browser open files from a specific URL using a specific file handler on the user's computer or device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5876">Si habilita esta directiva, los usuarios podrán abrir archivos mediante el protocolo DirectInvoke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5876">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5877">Si deshabilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán abrir archivos mediante el protocolo DirectInvoke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5877">If you disable this policy, users can't open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5878">En su lugar, el archivo se guardará en el sistema de archivos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5878">Instead, the file will be saved to the file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5879">Nota: si deshabilita DirectInvoke, es posible que algunas características de Microsoft SharePoint Online no funcionen correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5879">Note: Disabling DirectInvoke may prevent certain Microsoft SharePoint Online features from working as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5880">Para obtener más información acerca de DirectInvoke, vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) y [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5880">For more information about DirectInvoke, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) and [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5881">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5881">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5882">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5882">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5883">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5883">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5884">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5884">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5885">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5885">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5886">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5886">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5887">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5887">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5888">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5888">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5889">Nombre único de GP: DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5889">GP unique name: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5890">Nombre de GP: permitir que los usuarios abran los archivos mediante el protocolo DirectInvoke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5890">GP name: Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5891">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5891">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5892">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5892">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5893">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5893">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5894">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5894">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5895">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5895">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5896">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5896">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5897">Nombre del valor: DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5897">Value Name: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5898">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5898">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5899">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5899">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5900">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5900">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5901">Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5901">Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5902">Deshabilitar la compatibilidad para las API gráficas 3D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5902">Disable support for 3D graphics APIs</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5903">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5903">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5904">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5904">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5905">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5905">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5906">Evita que las páginas web puedan acceder a la unidad de procesamiento de gráficos (GPU).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5906">Prevent web pages from accessing the graphics processing unit (GPU).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5907">Específicamente, las páginas web no pueden acceder a la API de WebGL y los complementos no pueden usar la API de Pepper 3D.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5907">Specifically, web pages can't access the WebGL API and plug-ins can't use the Pepper 3D API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5908">Si no configura o deshabilita esta directiva, las páginas web podrán usar la API de WebGL y los complementos para usar la API de Pepper 3D.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5908">If you don't configure or disable this policy, it potentially allows web pages to use the WebGL API and plug-ins to use the Pepper 3D API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5909">De forma predeterminada, Microsoft Edge necesita aún requiere de los argumentos de la línea de comandos para poder usar estas API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5909">Microsoft Edge might, by default, still require command line arguments to be passed in order to use these APIs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5910">Si establece la directiva [HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled) como falsa, la configuración de la directiva "Disable3DAPIs" se omitirá, lo que equivaldría a establecer la directiva "Disable3DAPIs" como verdadera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5910">If [HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled) policy is set to false, the setting for 'Disable3DAPIs' policy is ignored - it's the equivalent of setting 'Disable3DAPIs' policy to true.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5911">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5911">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5912">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5912">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5913">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5913">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5914">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5914">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5915">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5915">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5916">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5916">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5917">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5917">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5918">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5918">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5919">Nombre único de GP: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5919">GP unique name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5920">Nombre de GP: deshabilitar la compatibilidad con las API de gráficos 3D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5920">GP name: Disable support for 3D graphics APIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5921">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5921">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5922">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5922">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5923">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5923">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5924">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5924">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5925">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5925">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5926">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5926">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5927">Nombre del valor: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5927">Value Name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5928">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5928">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5929">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5929">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5930">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5930">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5931">Nombre clave de la preferencia: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5931">Preference Key Name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5932">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5932">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5933">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5933">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5934">DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5934">DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5935">Deshabilitar las capturas de pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5935">Disable taking screenshots</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5936">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5936">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5937">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5937">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5938">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5938">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5939">Controla si los usuarios pueden tomar capturas de pantalla de la página del explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5939">Controls if users can take screenshots of the browser page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5940">Si esta opción está habilitada, el usuario no podrá realizar capturas de pantalla con métodos abreviados de teclado o las API de extensión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5940">If enabled, user can't take screenshots by using keyboard shortcuts or extension APIs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5941">Si esta directiva está deshabilitada o no es configurada, los usuarios podrán hacer capturas de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5941">If disabled or don't configure this policy, users can take screenshots.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5942">Tenga en cuenta que esta directiva controla las capturas de pantalla tomadas desde el propio explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5942">Please note this policy controls screenshots taken from within the browser itself.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5943">Aunque habilite esta directiva, los usuarios podrán seguir realizando capturas de pantalla mediante algún método ajeno al explorador (como usar una característica del sistema operativo u otra aplicación).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5943">Even if you enable this policy, users might still be able to take screenshots using some method outside of the browser (like using an operating system feature or another application).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5944">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5944">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5945">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5945">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5946">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5946">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5947">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5947">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5948">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5948">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5949">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5949">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5950">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5950">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5951">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5951">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5952">Nombre único de GP: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5952">GP unique name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5953">Nombre de GP: deshabilitar las capturas de pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5953">GP name: Disable taking screenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5954">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5954">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5955">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5955">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5956">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5956">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5957">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5957">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5958">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5958">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5959">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5959">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5960">Nombre del valor: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5960">Value Name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5961">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5961">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5962">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5962">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5963">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5963">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5964">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5964">Preference Key Name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5965">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5965">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5966">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5966">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5967">DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5967">DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5968">Establecer directorio de caché de disco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5968">Set disk cache directory</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5969">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5969">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5970">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5970">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5971">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5971">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-5972">Configura el directorio que se usará para almacenar los archivos en caché.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5972">Configures the directory to use to store cached files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5973">Si habilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge usará el directorio proporcionado independientemente de si el usuario ha especificado el marcador "--disk-cache-dir".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5973">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory regardless of whether the user has specified the '--disk-cache-dir' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-5974">Para evitar la pérdida de datos u otros errores inesperados, no configure esta directiva en un directorio raíz de volumen o en un directorio que se use para otros propósitos, ya que Microsoft Edge administra su contenido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5974">To avoid data loss or other unexpected errors, don't configure this policy to a volume's root directory or to a directory used for other purposes, because Microsoft Edge manages its contents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5975">Vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) para obtener una lista de variables que puede usar para especificar directorios y rutas de acceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5975">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables you can use when specifying directories and paths.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-5976">Si no configura esta directiva, se usará el directorio de caché predeterminado, y los usuarios podrán anularlo con el marcador de la línea de comandos "--disk-cache-dir".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5976">If you don't configure this policy, the default cache directory is used, and users can override that default with the '--disk-cache-dir' command line flag.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5977">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5977">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5978">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5978">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5979">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5979">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5980">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5980">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5981">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5981">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5982">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5982">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5983">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5983">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5984">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5984">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5985">Nombre único de GP: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5985">GP unique name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5986">Nombre de GP: establecer directorio de caché de disco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5986">GP name: Set disk cache directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5987">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5987">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5988">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5988">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5989">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5989">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5990">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5990">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5991">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5991">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5992">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5992">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5993">Nombre del valor: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5993">Value Name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5994">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5994">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5995">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5995">Example value:</span></span>
```
${user_home}/Edge_cache
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-5996">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5996">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5997">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5997">Preference Key Name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-5998">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5998">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>${user_home}/Edge_cache</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-5999">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-5999">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6000">DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6000">DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6001">Configurar el tamaño de la caché de disco, en bytes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6001">Set disk cache size, in bytes</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6002">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6002">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6003">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6003">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6004">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6004">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6005">Configure el tamaño de la caché, en bytes, que se usa para almacenar archivos en el disco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6005">Configures the size of the cache, in bytes, used to store files on the disk.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6006">Si habilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge usa el tamaño de caché proporcionado, independientemente de si el usuario ha especificado el marcador "--cache-tamaño".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6006">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided cache size regardless of whether the user has specified the '--disk-cache-size' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6007">El valor especificado en esta Directiva no es un límite duro, sino una sugerencia al sistema de almacenamiento en caché. cualquier valor por debajo de unos pocos megabytes es demasiado pequeño y se redondeará hacia arriba a un mínimo razonable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6007">The value specified in this policy isn't a hard boundary but rather a suggestion to the caching system; any value below a few megabytes is too small and will be rounded up to a reasonable minimum.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6008">Si establece el valor de esta directiva en 0, se usará el tamaño de caché predeterminado y los usuarios no podrán cambiarlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6008">If you set the value of this policy to 0, the default cache size is used, and users can't change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6009">Si no configura esta Directiva, se usará el tamaño predeterminado, pero los usuarios podrán anularla con el marcador "--almacenamiento de caché en disco".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6009">If you don't configure this policy, the default size is used, but users can override it with the '--disk-cache-size' flag.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6010">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6010">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6011">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6011">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6012">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6012">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6013">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6013">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6014">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6014">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6015">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6015">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6016">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6016">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6017">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6017">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6018">Nombre único de GP: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6018">GP unique name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6019">Nombre de GP: configurar el tamaño de la caché de disco en bytes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6019">GP name: Set disk cache size, in bytes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6020">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6020">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6021">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6021">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6022">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6022">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6023">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6023">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6024">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6024">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6025">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6025">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6026">Nombre del valor: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6026">Value Name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6027">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6027">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6028">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6028">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x06400000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6029">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6029">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6030">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6030">Preference Key Name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6031">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6031">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>104857600</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6032">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6032">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6033">DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6033">DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6034">Controlar el modo de DNS a través de HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6034">Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6035">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6035">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6036">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 83 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6036">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6037">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6037">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6038">Controla el modo de DNS a través de HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6038">Control the mode of the DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6039">Tenga en cuenta que esta directiva solo establecerá el modo predeterminado en cada consulta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6039">Note that this policy will only set the default mode for each query.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6040">Este modo puede ser anulado en tipos especiales de consultas, como las solicitudes para solucionar el nombre de host de un servidor de DNS a través de HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6040">The mode can be overridden for special types of queries such as requests to resolve a DNS-over-HTTPS server hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6041">El modo "desactivado" deshabilita los DNS a través de HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6041">The "off" mode will disable DNS-over-HTTPS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6042">El modo "automático" enviará primero las consultas DNS a través de HTTPS si se encuentra disponible un servidor DNS a través de HTTPS y puede reservar el envío de consultas poco seguras por error.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6042">The "automatic" mode will send DNS-over-HTTPS queries first if a DNS-over-HTTPS server is available and may fallback to sending insecure queries on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6043">El modo "seguro" solo enviará consultas de DNS a través de HTTPS y no podrá solucionar el error.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6043">The "secure" mode will only send DNS-over-HTTPS queries and will fail to resolve on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6044">Si no configura esta directiva, es posible que el explorador envíe solicitudes DNS sobre HTTPS a un solucionador que esté asociado con la solución del sistema configurado por el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6044">If you don't configure this policy, the browser might send DNS-over-HTTPS requests to a resolver associated with the user's configured system resolver.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6045">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6045">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6046">off (deshabilitado) = deshabilitar DNS sobre HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6046">off (off) = Disable DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6047">automatic (automático) = habilitar DNS a través de HTTPS con reserva no segura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6047">automatic (automatic) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS with insecure fallback</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6048">secure (seguro) = habilitar DNS a través de HTTPS sin reserva no segura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6048">secure (secure) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS without insecure fallback</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6049">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6049">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6050">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6050">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6051">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6051">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6052">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6052">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6053">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6053">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6054">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6054">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6055">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6055">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6056">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6056">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6057">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6057">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6058">Nombre único de GP: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6058">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6059">Nombre de GP: controlar el modo de DNS a través de HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6059">GP name: Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6060">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6060">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6061">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6061">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6062">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6062">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6063">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6063">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6064">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6064">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6065">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6065">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6066">Nombre del valor: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6066">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6067">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6067">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6068">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6068">Example value:</span></span>
```
off
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6069">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6069">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6070">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6070">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6071">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6071">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>off</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6072">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6072">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6073">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6073">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6074">Especificar la plantilla de URI de la resolución de DNS a través de HTTPS deseada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6074">Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6075">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6075">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6076">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 83 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6076">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6077">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6077">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6078">La plantilla de URI del solucionador de DNS a través de HTTPS deseada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6078">The URI template of the desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6079">Para especificar varias soluciones DNS a través de HTTPS, separe las plantillas URI correspondientes con espacios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6079">To specify multiple DNS-over-HTTPS resolvers, separate the corresponding URI templates with spaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6080">Si establece [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) como "seguro", entonces esta directiva deberá ser establecida y no podrá dejarse vacía.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6080">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "secure" then this policy must be set and cannot be empty.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6081">Si establece [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) en "automático" y esta directiva está establecida, entonces se usarán las plantillas URI especificadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6081">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "automatic" and this policy is set then the URI templates specified will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6082">Si no establece esta directiva, se usarán las asignaciones codificadas para intentar actualizar el solucionador de DNS actual del usuario a un solucionador de DoH operado por el mismo proveedor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6082">If you don't set this policy, then hardcoded mappings will be used to attempt to upgrade the user's current DNS resolver to a DoH resolver operated by the same provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6083">Si la plantilla URI contiene una variable DNS, las solicitudes al solucionador usarán GET; en caso contrario, las solicitudes usarán POST.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6083">If the URI template contains a dns variable, requests to the resolver will use GET; otherwise requests will use POST.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6084">Las plantillas con un formato incorrecto serán omitidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6084">Incorrectly formatted templates will be ignored.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6085">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6085">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6086">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6086">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6087">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6087">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6088">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6088">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6089">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6089">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6090">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6090">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6091">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6091">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6092">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6092">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6093">Nombre único de GP: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6093">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6094">Nombre de GP: especificar la plantilla URI de la resolución deseada de DNS a través de HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6094">GP name: Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6095">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6095">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6096">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6096">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6097">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6097">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6098">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6098">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6099">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6099">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6100">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6100">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6101">Nombre del valor: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6101">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6102">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6102">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6103">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6103">Example value:</span></span>
```
https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6104">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6104">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6105">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6105">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6106">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6106">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6107">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6107">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6108">DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6108">DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6109">Establecer directorio de descarga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6109">Set download directory</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6110">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6110">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6111">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6111">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6112">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6112">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6113">Configura el directorio que se usará al descargar archivos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6113">Configures the directory to use when downloading files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6114">Si habilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge usará el directorio proporcionado independientemente de si el usuario ha especificado uno o ha elegido que se le solicite la ubicación cada vez que realice una descarga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6114">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory regardless of whether the user has specified one or chosen to be prompted for download location every time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6115">Vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) para obtener una lista de las variables que se pueden usar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6115">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>
