<span data-ttu-id="31858-6116">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, se usará el directorio de descargas predeterminado y éste podría ser cambiado por el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6116">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default download directory is used, and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6117">Si establece una ruta de acceso no válida, Microsoft Edge usará de forma predeterminada el directorio de descargas predeterminado del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6117">If you set an invalid path, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's default download directory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6118">Si no existe la carpeta especificada por la ruta de acceso, la descarga activará un mensaje de solicitud que preguntará al usuario dónde quiere guardar su descarga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6118">If the folder specified by the path doesn't exist, the download will trigger a prompt that asks the user where they want to save their download.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6119">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6119">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6120">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6120">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6121">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6121">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6122">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6122">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6123">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6123">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6124">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6124">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6125">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6125">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6126">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6126">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6127">Nombre único de GP: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6127">GP unique name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6128">Nombre de GP: establecer el directorio de descarga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6128">GP name: Set download directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6129">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6129">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6130">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6130">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6131">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6131">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6132">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6132">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6133">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6133">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6134">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6134">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6135">Nombre del valor: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6135">Value Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6136">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6136">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6137">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6137">Example value:</span></span>
```

      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads
      Windows: C:\Users\${user_name}\Downloads
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6138">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6138">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6139">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6139">Preference Key Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6140">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6140">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>
      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads
      Windows: C:\Users\${user_name}\Downloads</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6141">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6141">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6142">DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6142">DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6143">Permitir las restricciones de descarga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6143">Allow download restrictions</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6144">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6144">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6145">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6145">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6146">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6146">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6147">Configura el tipo de descargas que Microsoft Edge bloquea completamente, sin dejar que los usuarios anulen la decisión de seguridad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6147">Configures the type of downloads that Microsoft Edge completely blocks, without letting users override the security decision.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6148">Establezca "BlockDangerousDownloads" para permitir todas las descargas excepto aquellas que llevan advertencias de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6148">Set 'BlockDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6149">Establezca "BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads" para permitir todas las descargas excepto aquellas que llevan advertencias de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender sobre descargas potencialmente peligrosas o no deseadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6149">Set 'BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings of potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6150">Establezca "BlockAllDownloads" para bloquear todas las descargas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6150">Set 'BlockAllDownloads' to block all downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6151">Si no configura esta directiva o establece la opción "DefaultDownloadSecurity", se aplicarán a las descargas las restricciones de seguridad habituales, basándose en los resultados del análisis de SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6151">If you don't configure this policy or set the 'DefaultDownloadSecurity' option, the downloads go through the usual security restrictions based on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen analysis results.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6152">Tenga en cuenta que estas restricciones se aplican a las descargas desde el contenido de la página web, así como el "vínculo de descarga..." en la opción del menú contextual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6152">Note that these restrictions apply to downloads from web page content, as well as the 'download link...' context menu option.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6153">Estas restricciones no se aplican a la hora de guardar o descargar la página que se muestra en ese momento, ni tampoco se aplican a la opción Guardar como PDF de las opciones de impresión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6153">These restrictions don't apply to saving or downloading the currently displayed page, nor do they apply to the Save as PDF option from the printing options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6154">Vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934) para obtener más información sobre SmartScreen de Microsoft Defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6154">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934) for more info on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6155">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6155">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6156">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = ninguna restricción especial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6156">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = No special restrictions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6157">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = bloquear descargas peligrosas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6157">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = Block dangerous downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6158">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = bloquear descargas potencialmente peligrosas o no deseadas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6158">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = Block potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6159">BlockAllDownloads (3) = bloquear todas las descargas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6159">BlockAllDownloads (3) = Block all downloads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6160">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6160">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6161">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6161">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6162">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6162">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6163">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6163">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6164">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6164">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6165">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6165">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6166">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6166">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6167">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6167">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6168">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6168">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6169">Nombre único de GP: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6169">GP unique name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6170">Nombre de GP: permitir las restricciones de descarga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6170">GP name: Allow download restrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6171">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6171">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6172">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6172">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6173">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6173">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6174">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6174">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6175">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6175">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6176">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6176">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6177">Nombre del valor: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6177">Value Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6178">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6178">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6179">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6179">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6180">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6180">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6181">Nombre clave de la preferencia: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6181">Preference Key Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6182">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6182">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6183">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6183">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6184">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6184">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6185">Habilitar la característica colecciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6185">Enable the Collections feature</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6186">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6186">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6187">En Windows y macOS desde 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6187">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6188">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6188">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6189">Permite que los usuarios accedan a la característica de colecciones, donde pueden recopilar, organizar, compartir y exportar contenido de forma más eficaz y con la integración de Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6189">Lets you allow users to access the Collections feature, where they can collect, organize, share, and export content more efficiently and with Office integration.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6190">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, los usuarios podrán obtener acceso y usar la característica de colecciones de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6190">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can access and use the Collections feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6191">Si deshabilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán acceder ni usar las colecciones de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6191">If you disable this policy, users can't access and use Collections in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6192">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6192">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6193">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6193">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6194">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6194">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6195">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6195">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6196">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6196">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6197">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6197">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6198">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6198">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6199">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6199">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6200">Nombre único de GP: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6200">GP unique name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6201">Nombre de GP: habilitar la característica de colecciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6201">GP name: Enable the Collections feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6202">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6202">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6203">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6203">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6204">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6204">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6205">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6205">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6206">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6206">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6207">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6207">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6208">Nombre del valor: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6208">Value Name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6209">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6209">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6210">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6210">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6211">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6211">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6212">Nombre clave de la preferencia: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6212">Preference Key Name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6213">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6213">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6215">EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6215">EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6216">Permitir que los usuarios editen los favoritos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6216">Allows users to edit favorites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6217">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6217">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6218">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6218">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6219">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6219">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6220">Habilite esta directiva para permitir que los usuarios puedan agregar, quitar o modificar los favoritos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6220">Enable this policy to let users add, remove, and modify favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6221">Si no se configura esta directiva, este será el comportamiento por defecto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6221">This is the default behavior if you don't configure the policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6222">Deshabilite esta directiva para evitar que los usuarios puedan agregar, quitar o modificar los favoritos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6222">Disable this policy to stop users from adding, removing, or modifying favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6223">Aún podrán usar los favoritos existentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6223">They can still use existing favorites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6224">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6224">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6225">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6225">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6226">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6226">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6227">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6227">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6228">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6228">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6229">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6229">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6230">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6230">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6231">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6231">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6232">Nombre único de GP: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6232">GP unique name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6233">Nombre de GP: permitir que los usuarios editen los favoritos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6233">GP name: Allows users to edit favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6234">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6234">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6235">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6235">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6236">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6236">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6237">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6237">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6238">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6238">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6239">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6239">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6240">Nombre del valor: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6240">Value Name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6241">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6241">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6242">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6242">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6243">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6243">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6244">Nombre clave de la preferencia: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6244">Preference Key Name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6245">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6245">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6246">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6246">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6247">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6247">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6248">Volver a habilitar las características de plataforma web en desuso durante un período de tiempo limitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6248">Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6249">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6249">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6250">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6250">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6251">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6251">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6252">Especifica una lista de características obsoletas de la plataforma web para volver a habilitar temporalmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6252">Specify a list of deprecated web platform features to temporarily re-enable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6253">Esta directiva le permite volver a habilitar las características en desuso de la plataforma web durante un período de tiempo limitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6253">This policy lets you re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6254">Las características se identifican con una etiqueta de cadena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6254">Features are identified by a string tag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6255">Si no configura esta política, si la lista está vacía o si una característica no coincide con una de las etiquetas de cadena admitidas, todas las características en desuso de la plataforma web permanecerán deshabilitadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6255">If you don't configure this policy, if the list is empty, or if a feature doesn't match one of the supported string tags, all deprecated web platform features remain disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6256">Aunque la directiva en sí es compatible con las plataformas anteriores, es posible que la característica que habilita no esté disponible en todas las plataformas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6256">While the policy itself is supported on the above platforms, the feature it's enabling might not be available on all of those platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6257">No todas las características en desuso de plataforma web pueden volver a habilitarse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6257">Not all deprecated Web Platform features can be re-enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6258">Solo se pueden volver a habilitar las que se enumeran explícitamente a continuación, y solo por un período de tiempo limitado, que puede ser distinto para cada característica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6258">Only those explicitly listed below can be re-enabled, and only for a limited period of time, which differs per feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6259">Puede revisar el propósito detrás de los cambios realizados en la característica de la plataforma web en https://bit.ly/blinkintents.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6259">You can review the intent behind the Web Platform feature changes at https://bit.ly/blinkintents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6260">El formato general de la etiqueta de la cadena es [DeprecatedFeatureName]_EffectiveUntil[yyyymmdd].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6260">The general format of the string tag is [DeprecatedFeatureName]_EffectiveUntil[yyyymmdd].</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6261">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6261">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6262">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = Habilitar la API de ExampleDeprecatedFeature mediante 2008/09/02</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6262">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = Enable ExampleDeprecatedFeature API through 2008/09/02</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6263">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6263">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6264">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6264">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6265">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6265">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6266">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6266">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6267">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6267">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6268">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6268">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6269">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6269">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6270">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6270">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6271">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6271">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6272">Nombre único de GP: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6272">GP unique name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6273">Nombre de GP: volver a habilitar las características de la plataforma web en desuso durante un período de tiempo limitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6273">GP name: Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6274">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6274">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6275">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6275">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6276">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6276">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6277">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6277">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6278">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6278">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6279">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6279">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6280">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6280">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6281">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6281">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6282">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6282">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures\1 = ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6283">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6283">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6284">Nombre clave de la preferencia: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6284">Preference Key Name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6285">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6285">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6286">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6286">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6287">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6287">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6288">Habilitar la descarga de acciones de dominio de Microsoft (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6288">Enable Domain Actions Download from Microsoft (obsolete)</span></span>
                       
        
  
  
  ><span data-ttu-id="31858-6289">OBSOLETA: Esta directiva está obsoleta y no funciona después de Microsoft Edge 84.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6289">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6290">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6290">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6291">En Windows y MacOS desde el 77 hasta el 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6291">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6292">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6292">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6293">Esta Directiva no funciona porque deben evitarse Estados en conflicto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6293">This policy doesn't work because conflicting states should be avoided.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6294">Aunque esta directiva se usa para habilitar o deshabilitar la descarga de la lista de acciones del dominio, no siempre alcanza el estado deseado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6294">This policy was used to enable/disable download of the domain actions list, but it didn't always achieve the desired state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6295">El servicio de experimentación y configuración, que controla la descarga, tiene su propia directiva de grupo para configurar las descargas realizadas desde el servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6295">The Experimentation and Configuration Service, which handles the download, has its own policy to configure what is downloaded from the service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6296">En su lugar, use la directiva [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6296">Use the [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol) policy instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6297">En Microsoft Edge, las acciones de dominio representan una serie de características de compatibilidad que ayudan al explorador a funcionar correctamente a través de la web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6297">In Microsoft Edge, Domain Actions represent a series of compatibility features that help the browser work correctly on the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6298">Por motivos de compatibilidad, Microsoft mantiene una lista de acciones que se deben llevar en a cabo en ciertos dominios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6298">Microsoft keeps a list of actions to take on certain domains for compatibility reasons.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6299">Por ejemplo, es posible que el explorador invalide la cadena de agente de usuario en un sitio web cuando se rompe el sitio, debido a la nueva cadena agente de usuario en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6299">For example, the browser may override the User Agent string on a website if that website is broken due to the new User Agent string on Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6300">Todas estas acciones están pensadas para ser temporales mientras Microsoft intenta resolver el problema con el propietario del sitio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6300">Each of these actions is intended to be temporary while Microsoft tries to resolve the issue with the site owner.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6301">Al iniciar el explorador y, después, el explorador se pondrá en contacto de forma periódica con el servicio de experimentación y configuración que contenga la lista más actualizada de las acciones de compatibilidad que se deben realizar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6301">When the browser starts up and then periodically afterwards, the browser will contact the Experimentation and Configuration Service that contains the most up to date list of compatibility actions to perform.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6302">Esta lista se guarda de forma local después de ser recuperada por primera vez para que las siguientes solicitudes solo actualicen la lista si la copia del servidor ha cambiado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6302">This list is saved locally after it is first retrieved so that subsequent requests will only update the list if the server's copy has changed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6303">Si habilita esta directiva, la lista de acciones del dominio se seguirá descargando desde el servicio de experimentación y configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6303">If you enable this policy, the list of Domain Actions will continue to be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6304">Si deshabilita esta directiva, la lista de acciones del dominio no se seguirá descargando desde el servicio de experimentación y configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6304">If you disable this policy, the list of Domain Actions will no longer be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6305">Si no configura esta directiva, la lista de acciones del dominio se seguirá descargando desde el servicio de experimentación y configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6305">If you don't configure this policy, the list of Domain Actions will continue to be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6306">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6306">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6307">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6307">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6308">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6308">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6309">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6309">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6310">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6310">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6311">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6311">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6312">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6312">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6313">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6313">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6314">Nombre único de GP: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6314">GP unique name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6315">Nombre de GP: habilitar la descarga de acciones de dominio de Microsoft (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6315">GP name: Enable Domain Actions Download from Microsoft (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6316">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6316">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6317">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6317">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6318">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6318">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6319">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6319">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6320">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6320">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6321">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6321">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6322">Nombre del valor: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6322">Value Name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6323">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6323">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6324">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6324">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6325">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6325">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6326">Nombre clave de la preferencia: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6326">Preference Key Name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6327">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6327">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6328">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6328">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6329">EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6329">EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6330">Habilitar las comprobaciones de OCSP/CRL en línea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6330">Enable online OCSP/CRL checks</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6331">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6331">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6332">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6332">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6333">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6333">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6334">Las comprobaciones de la revocación en línea no proporcionan una ventaja de seguridad considerable y están deshabilitadas de forma predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6334">Online revocation checks don't provide a significant security benefit and are disabled by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6335">Si habilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge realizará comprobaciones OCSP/CRL en línea de errores recuperables.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6335">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will perform soft-fail, online OCSP/CRL checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6336">"Error recuperable" significa que si no se puede tener acceso al servidor de revocación, el certificado se considerará válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6336">"Soft fail" means that if the revocation server can't be reached, the certificate will be considered valid.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6337">Si deshabilita la directiva o no la configura, Microsoft Edge no realizará comprobaciones de la revocación en línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6337">If you disable the policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge won't perform online revocation checks.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6338">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6338">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6339">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6339">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6340">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6340">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6341">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6341">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6342">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6342">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6343">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6343">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6344">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6344">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6345">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6345">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6346">Nombre único de GP: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6346">GP unique name: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6347">Nombre de GP: habilitar las comprobaciones de OCSP/CRL en línea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6347">GP name: Enable online OCSP/CRL checks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6348">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6348">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6349">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6349">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6350">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6350">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6351">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6351">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6352">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6352">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6353">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6353">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6354">Nombre del valor: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6354">Value Name: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6355">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6355">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6356">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6356">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6357">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6357">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6358">Nombre clave de la preferencia: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6358">Preference Key Name: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6359">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6359">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6360">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6360">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6361">EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6361">EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6362">Permitir certificados firmados mediante SHA-1 cuando sean emitidos por anclajes de veracidad locales (en desuso).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6362">Allow certificates signed using SHA-1 when issued by local trust anchors (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="31858-6363">En desuso: esta directiva está en desuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6363">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6364">Actualmente se admite pero quedará obsoleto en una versión futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6364">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6365">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6365">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6366">En Windows y MacOS desde 85 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6366">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6367">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6367">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6368">Cuando esta configuración está habilitada, Microsoft Edge permite conexiones protegidas por certificados firmados con SHA-1 siempre y cuando el certificado se encadene a un certificado raíz instalado de forma local y, por lo tanto, sea válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6368">When this setting is enabled, Microsoft Edge allows connections secured by SHA-1 signed certificates so long as the the certificate chains to a locally-installed root certificate and is otherwise valid.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6369">Tenga en cuenta que esta directiva depende de la pila de comprobación de certificados del sistema operativo (SO) que permite firmas SHA-1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6369">Note that this policy depends on the operating system (OS) certificate verification stack allowing SHA-1 signatures.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6370">Si una actualización del sistema operativo cambia el tratamiento de éste para los certificados SHA-1, puede que esta directiva ya no tenga efecto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6370">If an OS update changes the OS handling of SHA-1 certificates, this policy might no longer have effect.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6371">Además, esta directiva está pensada como una solución temporal para dar más tiempo a las empresas para dejar de usar SHA-1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6371">Further, this policy is intended as a temporary workaround to give enterprises more time to move away from SHA-1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6372">Esta directiva se eliminará en Microsoft Edge 92, cuyo lanzamiento será a mediados de 2021.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6372">This policy will be removed in Microsoft Edge 92 releasing in mid 2021.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6373">Si no establece esta directiva o la establece en falso, o si el certificado SHA-1 se encadena a una raíz de certificado de confianza pública, Microsoft Edge no permitirá certificados firmados por SHA-1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6373">If you don't set this policy or set it to false, or the SHA-1 certificate chains to a publicly trusted certificate root, then Microsoft Edge won't allow certificates signed by SHA-1.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6374">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6374">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6375">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6375">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6376">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6376">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6377">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6377">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6378">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6378">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6379">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6379">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6380">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6380">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6381">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6381">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6382">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6382">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6383">Nombre único de GP: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6383">GP unique name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6384">Nombre de GP: permitir certificados firmados mediante SHA-1 cuando sean emitidos por anclajes de veracidad locales (en desuso).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6384">GP name: Allow certificates signed using SHA-1 when issued by local trust anchors (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6385">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6385">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6386">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6386">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6387">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6387">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6388">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6388">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6389">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6389">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6390">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6390">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6391">Nombre del valor: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6391">Value Name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6392">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6392">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6393">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6393">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6394">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6394">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6395">Nombre clave de la preferencia: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6395">Preference Key Name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6396">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6396">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6397">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6397">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6398">EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6398">EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6399">Permitir que las extensiones administradas utilicen la API de la plataforma de hardware empresarial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6399">Allow managed extensions to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6400">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6400">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6401">En Windows y macOS desde 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6401">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6402">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6402">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6403">Cuando esta directiva se establece como habilitada, las extensiones instaladas por la directiva de empresa pueden usar la API de la plataforma del hardware de empresa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6403">When this policy is set to enabled, extensions installed by enterprise policy are allowed to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-6404">Cuando esta directiva se establece como deshabilitada o no establecida, las extensiones instaladas por la directiva de empresa no pueden usar la API de la plataforma del hardware de empresa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6404">When this policy is set to disabled or isn't set, no extensions are allowed to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-6405">Esta directiva también se aplica a las extensiones de los componentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6405">This policy also applies to component extensions.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6406">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6406">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6407">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6407">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6408">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6408">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6409">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6409">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6410">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6410">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6411">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6411">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6412">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6412">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6413">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6413">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6414">Nombre único de GP: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6414">GP unique name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6415">Nombre de GP: permitir que las extensiones administradas utilicen la API de la plataforma de hardware empresarial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6415">GP name: Allow managed extensions to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6416">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6416">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6417">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6417">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6418">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6418">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6419">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6419">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6420">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6420">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6421">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6421">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6422">Nombre del valor: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6422">Value Name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6423">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6423">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6424">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6424">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6425">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6425">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6426">Nombre clave de la preferencia: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6426">Preference Key Name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6427">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6427">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6428">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6428">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6429">EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6429">EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6430">Permitir el acceso a la herramienta Enterprise Mode Site List Manager</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6430">Allow access to the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager tool</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6431">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6431">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6432">En Windows desde la versión 86 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6432">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6433">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6433">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6434">Permite establecer si Enterprise Mode Site List Manager está disponible para los usuarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6434">Allows you to set whether Enterprise Mode Site List Manager is available to users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6435">Si habilita esta directiva, los usuarios pueden ver el botón de navegación de Enterprise Mode Site List Manager en la página edge://compat, ir a la herramienta y usarla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6435">If you enable this policy, users can see the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager nav button on edge://compat page, navigate to the tool and use it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6436">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, los usuarios no verán el botón de navegación de Enterprise Mode Site List Manager y no podrán usar la herramienta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6436">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users won't see the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager nav button and won't be able to use it.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6437">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6437">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6438">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6438">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6439">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6439">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6440">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6440">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6441">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6441">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6442">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6442">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6443">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6443">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6444">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6444">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6445">Nombre único de GP: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6445">GP unique name: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6446">Nombre de GP: permitir el acceso a la herramienta Enterprise Mode Site List Manager</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6446">GP name: Allow access to the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager tool</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6447">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6447">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6448">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6448">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6449">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6449">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6450">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6450">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6451">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6451">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6452">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6452">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6453">Nombre del valor: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6453">Value Name: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6454">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6454">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6455">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6455">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6456">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6456">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6457">ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6457">ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6458">Deshabilitar el tipo de archivo de descarga advertencias basadas en la extensión para tipos de archivo especificados en dominios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6458">Disable download file type extension-based warnings for specified file types on domains</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6459">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6459">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6460">En Windows y MacOS desde 85 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6460">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6461">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6461">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6462">Puede habilitar esta directiva para crear un diccionario de extensiones de tipo de archivo con una lista de dominios correspondiente que se excluirá de las advertencias de descarga basada en la extensión de tipo de archivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6462">You can enable this policy to create a dictionary of file type extensions with a corresponding list of domains that will be exempted from file type extension-based download warnings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6463">Esto permite a los administradores de la empresa bloquear las advertencias de descarga basada en la extensión de tipo de archivo para los archivos que están asociados a un dominio de la lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6463">This lets enterprise administrators block file type extension-based download warnings for files that are associated with a listed domain.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6464">Por ejemplo, si la extensión "JNLP" está asociada a "website1.com", los usuarios no verán ninguna advertencia al descargar los archivos "JNLP" de "website1.com", pero verán una advertencia de descarga al descargar archivos "JNLP" de "website2.com".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6464">For example, if  the "jnlp" extension is associated with "website1.com", users would not see a warning when downloading "jnlp" files from "website1.com", but see a download warning when downloading "jnlp" files from "website2.com".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6465">Los archivos con las extensiones de tipo de archivo especificados para los dominios identificados por esta directiva seguirán sujetos a advertencias de seguridad basadas en la extensión que no sean de tipo de archivo, como advertencias de descarga de contenido mixto y advertencias de SmartScreen de Microsoft defender.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6465">Files with file type extensions specified for domains identified by this policy will still be subject to non-file type extension-based security warnings such as mixed-content download warnings and Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6466">Si deshabilita esta Directiva o no la configura, los tipos de archivo que desencadenen advertencias de descarga basadas en extensión mostrarán advertencias al usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6466">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, file types that trigger extension-based download warnings will show warnings to the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6467">Si habilita esta directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6467">If you enable this policy:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6468">El patrón de dirección URL debe tener un formato acorde con [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6468">The URL pattern should be formatted according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>
* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6469">La extensión de tipo de archivo escrita tiene que ser ASCII en minúsculas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6469">The file type extension entered must be in lower-cased ASCII.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6470">El separador inicial no se debe incluir cuando se indica la extensión de tipo de archivo, por lo que se debe usar "jnlp" en lugar de ".jnlp".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6470">The leading separator should not be included when listing the file type extension, so list "jnlp" should be used instead of ".jnlp".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6471">Por ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6471">Example:</span></span>
