<span data-ttu-id="31858-6472">El siguiente valor de ejemplo impide las advertencias de descarga basada en la extensión de tipo de archivo que se basan en extensiones SWF, exe y JNLP para los dominios \*. contoso.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6472">The following example value would prevent file type extension-based download warnings on swf, exe, and jnlp extensions for \*.contoso.com domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6473">Se mostrará al usuario una advertencia de descarga basada en la extensión de un tipo de archivo en cualquier otro dominio para los archivos exe y JNLP, pero no para los archivos SWF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6473">It will show the user a file type extension-based download warning on any other domain for exe and jnlp files, but not for swf files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6474">[{"file_extension": "JNLP", "Domains": ["contoso.com"]}, {"file_extension": "exe", "Domains": ["contoso.com"]}, {"file_extension": "SWF", "Domains": ["\*"]}]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6474">[ { "file_extension": "jnlp", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "exe", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "swf", "domains": ["\*"] } ]</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6475">Tenga en cuenta que, mientras que en el ejemplo anterior se muestra una advertencia de descarga basada en la extensión de tipo de archivo para los archivos "SWF" para todos los dominios, no se recomienda la eliminación de estas advertencias para todos los dominios por cualquier extensión peligrosa, por motivos de seguridad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6475">Note that while the preceding example shows the suppression of file type extension-based download warnings for "swf" files for all domains, applying suppression of such warnings for all domains for any dangerous file type extension is not recommended due to security concerns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6476">Solo se muestra en el ejemplo para mostrar la posibilidad de hacerlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6476">It is shown in the example merely to demonstrate the ability to do so.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6477">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6477">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6478">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6478">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6479">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6479">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6480">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6480">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6481">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6481">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6482">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6482">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6483">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6483">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6484">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6484">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6485">Nombre único de GP: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6485">GP unique name: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6486">Nombre de GP: deshabilitar el tipo de archivo de descarga advertencias basadas en extensión para tipos de archivo especificados en dominios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6486">GP name: Disable download file type extension-based warnings for specified file types on domains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6487">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6487">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6488">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6488">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6489">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6489">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6490">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6490">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6491">Ruta (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6491">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6492">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6492">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6493">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6493">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6494">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6494">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6495">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6495">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings\1 = {'domains': ['https://contoso.com', 'contoso2.com'], 'file_extension': 'jnlp'}
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings\2 = {'domains': ['*'], 'file_extension': 'swf'}

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6496">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6496">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6497">Nombre de clave de preferencias: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6497">Preference Key Name: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6498">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6498">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{'domains': ['https://contoso.com', 'contoso2.com'], 'file_extension': 'jnlp'}</string>
  <string>{'domains': ['*'], 'file_extension': 'swf'}</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6499">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6499">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6500">ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6500">ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6501">Controlar la comunicación con el servicio de experimentación y configuración</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6501">Control communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6502">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6502">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6503">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6503">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6504">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6504">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6505">En Microsoft Edge, el servicio de experimentación y configuración se usa para implementar la carga de experimentación y configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6505">In Microsoft Edge, the Experimentation and Configuration Service is used to deploy Experimentation and Configuration payload.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6506">La carga útil de experimentación consiste en una lista de características de las primeras fases de desarrollo que Microsoft ha habilitado para realizar pruebas y obtener comentarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6506">Experimentation payload consists of a list of early in development features that Microsoft is enabling for testing and feedback.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6507">La carga útil de la configuración consiste en una lista de configuraciones que Microsoft quiere implementar en Microsoft Edge para optimizar la experiencia del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6507">Configuration payload consists of a list of settings that Microsoft wants to deploy to Microsoft Edge to optimize user experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6508">Por ejemplo, la carga útil de la configuración puede especificar la frecuencia con la que Microsoft Edge envía solicitudes al servicio de experimentación y configuración para recuperar la carga útil más reciente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6508">For example, configuration payload may specify how often Microsoft Edge sends requests to the Experimentation and Configuration Service to retrieve the newest payload.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6509">Adicionalmente, la carga útil de la configuración también puede contener una lista de acciones que se deben llevar a cabo en determinados dominios por motivos de compatibilidad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6509">Additionaly, configuration payload may also contain a list of actions to take on certain domains for compatibility reasons.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6510">Por ejemplo, es posible que el explorador invalide la cadena de agente de usuario en un sitio web cuando se rompe el sitio, debido a la nueva cadena agente de usuario en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6510">For example, the browser may override the User Agent string on a website if that website is broken due to the new User Agent string on Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6511">Todas estas acciones están pensadas para ser temporales mientras Microsoft intenta resolver el problema con el propietario del sitio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6511">Each of these actions is intended to be temporary while Microsoft tries to resolve the issue with the site owner.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6512">Si establece esta directiva en "FullMode", se descargará la carga útil completa del Servicio de experimentación y configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6512">If you set this policy to 'FullMode', the full payload is downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6513">Esto incluye las cargas útiles de experimentación y configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6513">This includes both the experimentation and configuration payloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6514">Si establece esta directiva en "ConfigurationsOnlyMode", solo se entregará la carga útil de la configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6514">If you set this policy to 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode', only the configuration payload is delivered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6515">Si establece esta directiva en "RestrictedMode", la comunicación con el Servicio de experimentación y configuración se detendrá completamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6515">If you set this policy to 'RestrictedMode', the communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service is stopped completely.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6516">Si no configura esta directiva, el comportamiento de un dispositivo administrado en los canales Estable y Beta será el mismo que cuando se usa "ConfigurationsOnlyMode".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6516">If you don't configure this policy, on a managed device on Stable and Beta channels the behavior is the same as the 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6517">Si no configura esta directiva, el comportamiento de un dispositivo no administrado será el mismo que cuando se usa "FullMode".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6517">If you don't configure this policy, on an unmanaged device the behavior is the same as the 'FullMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6518">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6518">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6519">FullMode (2) = recuperar configuraciones y experimentos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6519">FullMode (2) = Retrieve configurations and experiments</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6520">ConfigurationsOnlyMode (1) = solo recuperar configuraciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6520">ConfigurationsOnlyMode (1) = Retrieve configurations only</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6521">RestrictedMode (0) = deshabilitar la comunicación con el servicio de experimentación y configuración</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6521">RestrictedMode (0) = Disable communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6522">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6522">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6523">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6523">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6524">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6524">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6525">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6525">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6526">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6526">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6527">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6527">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6528">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6528">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6529">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6529">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6530">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6530">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6531">Nombre único de GP: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6531">GP unique name: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6532">Nombre de GP: controlar la comunicación con el servicio de experimentación y configuración</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6532">GP name: Control communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6533">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6533">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6534">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6534">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6535">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6535">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6536">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6536">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6537">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6537">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6538">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6538">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6539">Nombre del valor: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6539">Value Name: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6540">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6540">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6541">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6541">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6542">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6542">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6543">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6543">Preference Key Name: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6544">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6544">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6545">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6545">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6546">ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6546">ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6547">Mostrar la casilla "abrir siempre" en el cuadro de diálogo de protocolo externo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6547">Show an "Always open" checkbox in external protocol dialog</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6548">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6548">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6549">En Windows y macOS desde 79 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6549">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6550">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6550">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6551">Esta directiva controla si la casilla de verificación "permitir siempre que este sitio abra vínculos de este tipo" se muestra en los avisos de confirmación al iniciar el protocolo externo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6551">This policy controls whether the "Always allow this site to open links of this type" checkbox is shown on external protocol launch confirmation prompts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6552">Esta directiva solo se aplica a los vínculos https://.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6552">This policy only applies to https:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6553">Si se habilita esta directiva, cuando se muestre un aviso de confirmación de un protocolo externo, el usuario podrá seleccionar "Permitir siempre" para omitir todos los avisos de confirmación futuros del protocolo en este sitio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6553">If you enable this policy, when an external protocol confirmation prompt is shown, the user can select "Always allow" to skip all future confirmation prompts for the protocol on this site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6554">Si desactiva esta directiva, la casilla de verificación "Permitir siempre" no se mostrará.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6554">If you disable this policy, the "Always allow" checkbox isn't displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6555">Se solicitará confirmación al usuario cada vez que se invoque un protocolo externo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6555">The user will be prompted for confirmation every time an external protocol is invoked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6556">Antes de Microsoft Edge 83, si no configura esta directiva, la casilla "Permitir siempre" no se muestra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6556">Prior to Microsoft Edge 83, if you don't configure this policy, the "Always allow" checkbox isn't displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6557">Se solicitará confirmación al usuario cada vez que se invoque un protocolo externo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6557">The user will be prompted for confirmation every time an external protocol is invoked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6558">En Microsoft Edge 83, si no configura esta directiva, la visibilidad de la casilla de verificación se controla con el indicador "Habilitar recordatorio de las preferencias de lanzamiento de protocolos" en edge://flags</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6558">On Microsoft Edge 83, if you don't configure this policy, the checkbox visibility is controlled by the "Enable remembering protocol launch prompting preferences" flag in edge://flags</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6559">A partir de Microsoft Edge 84, si no configura esta directiva, cuando se muestre un aviso de confirmación de un protocolo externo, el usuario podrá seleccionar "Permitir siempre" para omitir todos los avisos de confirmación futuros del protocolo en este sitio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6559">As of Microsoft Edge 84, if you don't configure this policy, when an external protocol confirmation prompt is shown, the user can select "Always allow" to skip all future confirmation prompts for the protocol on this site.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6560">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6560">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6561">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6561">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6562">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6562">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6563">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6563">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6564">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6564">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6565">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6565">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6566">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6566">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6567">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6567">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6568">Nombre único de GP: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6568">GP unique name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6569">Nombre de GP: mostrar la casilla "abrir siempre" en el cuadro de diálogo de protocolo externo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6569">GP name: Show an "Always open" checkbox in external protocol dialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6570">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6570">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6571">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6571">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6572">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6572">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6573">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6573">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6574">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6574">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6575">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6575">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6576">Nombre del valor: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6576">Value Name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6577">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6577">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6578">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6578">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6579">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6579">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6580">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6580">Preference Key Name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6581">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6581">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6582">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6582">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6583">FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6583">FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6584">Permitir que los usuarios configuren la seguridad familiar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6584">Allow users to configure Family safety</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6585">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6585">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6586">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 83 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6586">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6587">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6587">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6588">Esta directiva deshabilita y oculta completamente la página de seguridad familiar en la configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6588">This policy disables and completely hides the Family safety page in Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6589">También se bloqueará la navegación a edge://settings/familysafety.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6589">Navigation to edge://settings/familysafety will also be blocked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6590">La página seguridad familiar describe las características que están disponibles para los grupos de familia y cómo unirse a un grupo de familia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6590">The Family safety page describes what features are available for family groups and how to join a family group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6591">Obtenga más información sobre la seguridad familiar aquí: ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6591">Learn more about family safety here: ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6592">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, se mostrará la página de seguridad familiar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6592">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the Family safety page will be shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6593">Si deshabilita esta directiva, no se mostrará la página de seguridad familiar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6593">If you disable this policy, the Family safety page will not be shown.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6594">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6594">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6595">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6595">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6596">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6596">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6597">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6597">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6598">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6598">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6599">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6599">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6600">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6600">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6601">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6601">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6602">Nombre único de GP: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6602">GP unique name: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6603">Nombre de GP: permitir que los usuarios configuren la Protección infantil de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6603">GP name: Allow users to configure Family safety</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6604">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6604">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6605">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6605">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6606">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6606">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6607">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6607">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6608">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6608">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6609">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6609">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6610">Nombre del valor: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6610">Value Name: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6611">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6611">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6612">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6612">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6613">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6613">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6614">Nombre clave de la preferencia: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6614">Preference Key Name: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6615">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6615">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6617">FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6617">FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6618">Habilitar la barra de favoritos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6618">Enable favorites bar</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6619">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6619">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6620">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6620">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6621">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6621">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6622">Habilita o deshabilita la barra de favoritos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6622">Enables or disables the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6623">Si habilita esta directiva, los usuarios verán la barra de favoritos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6623">If you enable this policy, users will see the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6624">Si deshabilita esta directiva, los usuarios no verán la barra de favoritos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6624">If you disable this policy, users won't see the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6625">Si no se configura esta directiva, el usuario podrá optar por usar la barra de favoritos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6625">If this policy is not configured, then the user can decide to use the favorites bar or not.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6626">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6626">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6627">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6627">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6628">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6628">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6629">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6629">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6630">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6630">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6631">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6631">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6632">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6632">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6633">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6633">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6634">Nombre único de GP: FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6634">GP unique name: FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6635">Nombre de GP: habilitar la barra de favoritos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6635">GP name: Enable favorites bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6636">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6636">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6637">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6637">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6638">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6638">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6639">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6639">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6640">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6640">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6641">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6641">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6642">Nombre del valor: FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6642">Value Name: FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6643">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6643">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6644">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6644">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6645">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6645">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6646">Nombre clave de la preferencia: FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6646">Preference Key Name: FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6647">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6647">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6649">ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6649">ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6650">Forzar la búsqueda segura de Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6650">Enforce Bing SafeSearch</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6651">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6651">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6652">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6652">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6653">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6653">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6654">Asegúrese de que las consultas que se realizan en la búsqueda web de Bing se hagan con la búsqueda segura establecida en el valor especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6654">Ensure that queries in Bing web search are done with SafeSearch set to the value specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6655">Los usuarios no pueden cambiar esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6655">Users can't change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6656">Si configura esta directiva como "BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode", la búsqueda segura en Bing volverá al valor de bing.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6656">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode', SafeSearch in Bing search falls back to the bing.com value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6657">Si configura esta directiva como "BingSafeSearchModerateMode", se usará la configuración moderada para la búsqueda segura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6657">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchModerateMode', the moderate setting is used in SafeSearch.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6658">La configuración moderada filtra los vídeos e imágenes para adultos, pero no el texto de los resultados en la búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6658">The moderate setting filters adult videos and images but not text from search results.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6659">Si configura esta directiva como "BingSafeSearchStrictMode", se usará la configuración del valor estricto para la búsqueda segura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6659">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchStrictMode', the strict setting in SafeSearch is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6660">La configuración estricta filtra el texto, las imágenes y los vídeos para adultos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6660">The strict setting filters adult text, images, and videos.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6661">Si deshabilita esta directiva o no la configura, no se aplicará la búsqueda segura en Bing y los usuarios podrán establecer el valor que deseen en bing.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6661">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, SafeSearch in Bing search isn't enforced, and users can set the value they want on bing.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6662">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6662">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6663">BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode (0) = no configurar restricciones de búsqueda en Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6663">BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode (0) = Don't configure search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6664">BingSafeSearchModerateMode (1) = configurar restricciones de búsqueda moderadas en Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6664">BingSafeSearchModerateMode (1) = Configure moderate search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6665">BingSafeSearchStrictMode (2) = configurar restricciones de búsqueda estrictas en Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6665">BingSafeSearchStrictMode (2) = Configure strict search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6666">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6666">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6667">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6667">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6668">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6668">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6669">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6669">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6670">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6670">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6671">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6671">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6672">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6672">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6673">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6673">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6674">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6674">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6675">Nombre único de GP: ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6675">GP unique name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6676">Nombre de GP: forzar la búsqueda segura de Bing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6676">GP name: Enforce Bing SafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6677">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6677">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6678">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6678">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6679">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6679">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6680">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6680">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6681">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6681">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6682">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6682">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6683">Nombre del valor: ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6683">Value Name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6684">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6684">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6685">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6685">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6686">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6686">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6687">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6687">Preference Key Name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6688">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6688">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6689">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6689">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6690">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6690">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6691">Configurar si Microsoft Edge debe seleccionar automáticamente un certificado cuando haya múltiples coincidencias de certificados para un sitio configurado con "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6691">Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6692">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6692">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6693">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 81 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6693">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6694">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6694">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6695">Se alterna la opción entre la selección de un certificado si hay varios certificados disponibles y la configuración de un sitio con [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6695">Toggles whether users are prompted to select a certificate if there are multiple certificates available and a site is configured with [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6696">Si no se configura [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) en un sitio, siempre se le solicitará al usuario que seleccione un certificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6696">If you don't configure [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) for a site, the user will always be prompted to select a certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6697">Si establece esta directiva como verdadera, Microsoft Edge le solicitará al usuario que seleccione un certificado para los sitios de la lista definida en [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) si y solo si hay más de un certificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6697">If you set this policy to True, Microsoft Edge will prompt a user to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) if and only if there is more than one certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6698">Si establece esta directiva como falsa o no la configura, Microsoft Edge seleccionará un certificado automáticamente, aunque hayan varias coincidencias para un certificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6698">If you set this policy to False or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will automatically select a certificate even if there are multiple matches for a certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6699">No se solicitará al usuario que seleccione un certificado para los sitios de la lista definida en [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6699">The user will not be prompted to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6700">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6700">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6701">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6701">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6702">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6702">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6703">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6703">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6704">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6704">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6705">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6705">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6706">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6706">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6707">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6707">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6708">Nombre único de GP: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6708">GP unique name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6709">Nombre de GP: configurar la selección automática de un certificado por parte de Microsoft Edge cuando haya múltiples coincidencias de certificados para un sitio configurado con "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6709">GP name: Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6710">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6710">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6711">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6711">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6712">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6712">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6713">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6713">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6714">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6714">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6715">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6715">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6716">Nombre del valor: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6716">Value Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6717">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6717">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6718">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6718">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6719">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6719">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6720">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6720">Preference Key Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6721">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6721">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6723">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6723">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6724">Permitir el uso de perfiles efímeros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6724">Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6725">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6725">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6726">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6726">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6727">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6727">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6728">Controla el cambio de los perfiles de usuario al modo efímero.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6728">Controls whether user profiles are switched to ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6729">Un perfil efímero se crea al iniciar una sesión, se elimina al finalizar la misma y se asocia al perfil original del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6729">An ephemeral profile is created when a session begins, is deleted when the session ends, and is associated with the user's original profile.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6730">Si habilita esta directiva, los perfiles se ejecutan en modo efímero.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6730">If you enable this policy, profiles run in ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6731">Esto permite que los usuarios trabajen desde sus propios dispositivos sin guardar los datos de exploración en los mismos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6731">This lets users work from their own devices without saving browsing data to those devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6732">Si habilita esta directiva como una directiva del sistema operativo (por ejemplo, al usar GPO en Windows), se aplicará a todos los perfiles del sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6732">If you enable this policy as an OS policy (by using GPO on Windows, for example), it applies to every profile on the system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6733">Si deshabilita esta directiva o no la configura, los usuarios verán sus perfiles normales al iniciar sesión en el explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6733">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users get their regular profiles when they sign in to the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6734">En el modo efímero, los datos del perfil solo se guardarán en el disco mientras la sesión del usuario se mantenga activa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6734">In ephemeral mode, profile data is saved on disk only for the length of the user session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6735">Las características como el historial del explorador, las extensiones, sus datos, datos Web como las cookies y las bases de datos web no se guardan después de cerrar el explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6735">Features like browser history, extensions and their data, web data like cookies, and web databases aren't saved after the browser is closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6736">Esto no impedirá que los usuarios descarguen los datos manualmente en el disco, o que no puedan imprimirlos o guardar las páginas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6736">This doesn't prevent a user from manually downloading any data to disk, or from saving pages or printing them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6737">Si el usuario ha habilitado la sincronización, todos los datos se conservarán en sus cuentas de sincronización al igual que ocurre en los perfiles normales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6737">If the user has enabled sync, all data is preserved in their sync accounts just like with regular profiles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6738">Los usuarios también pueden usar la exploración InPrivate en modo efímero, a menos que lo desactive explícitamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6738">Users can also use InPrivate browsing in ephemeral mode unless you explicitly disable this.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6739">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6739">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6740">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6740">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6741">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6741">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6742">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6742">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6743">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6743">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6744">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6744">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6745">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6745">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6746">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6746">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6747">Nombre único de GP: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6747">GP unique name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6748">Nombre de GP: permitir el uso de perfiles efímeros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6748">GP name: Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6749">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6749">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6750">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6750">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6751">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6751">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6752">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6752">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6753">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6753">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6754">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6754">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6755">Nombre del valor: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6755">Value Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6756">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6756">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6757">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6757">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6758">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6758">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6759">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6759">Preference Key Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6760">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6760">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6761">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6761">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6762">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6762">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6763">Forzar la búsqueda segura de Google</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6763">Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6764">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6764">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6765">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6765">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6766">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6766">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6767">Obliga a que las consultas de la Búsqueda web de Google se realicen con la opción de búsqueda segura habilitada y evita que los usuarios cambien esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6767">Forces queries in Google Web Search to be performed with SafeSearch set to active, and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6768">Al habilitar esta directiva, la función de búsqueda segura siempre estará habilitada en la búsqueda de Google.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6768">If you enable this policy, SafeSearch in Google Search is always active.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6769">Si deshabilita esta directiva o no la configura, no se aplicará la búsqueda segura en Google.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6769">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, SafeSearch in Google Search isn't enforced.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6770">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6770">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6771">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6771">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6772">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6772">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6773">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6773">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6774">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6774">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6775">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6775">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6776">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6776">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6777">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6777">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6778">Nombre único de GP: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6778">GP unique name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6779">Nombre de GP: forzar la búsqueda segura de Google</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6779">GP name: Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6780">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6780">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6781">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6781">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6782">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6782">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6783">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6783">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6784">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6784">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6785">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6785">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6786">Nombre del valor: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6786">Value Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6787">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6787">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6788">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6788">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6789">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6789">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6790">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6790">Preference Key Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6791">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6791">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6792">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6792">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6793">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6793">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6794">Usar una directiva de referencia predeterminada de sin referencia cuando se cambia a una versión anterior (en desuso).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6794">Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="31858-6795">En desuso: esta directiva está en desuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6795">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6796">Actualmente se admite pero quedará obsoleto en una versión futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6796">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6797">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6797">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6798">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 81 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6798">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6799">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6799">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6800">Esta directiva está en desuso porque solo pretende ser un mecanismo a corto plazo para dar a las empresas más tiempo para actualizar su contenido web cuando se ha comprobado que es incompatible con la directiva de referencia predeterminada actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6800">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the current default referrer policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6801">No funciona en la versión 86 de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6801">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 86.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6802">La directiva de referencia predeterminada de Microsoft Edge se está reforzando a partir de su valor actual de no-referrer-when-downgrade, con strict-origin-when-cross-origin (más seguro), a través de una implementación gradual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6802">Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy is being strengthened from its current value of no-referrer-when-downgrade to the more secure strict-origin-when-cross-origin through a gradual rollout.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6803">Antes del lanzamiento, esta directiva de la empresa no tendrá ningún efecto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6803">Before the rollout, this enterprise policy will have no effect.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6804">Después de que se haya implementado y habilitado esta directiva de empresa, la directiva de referencia predeterminada de Microsoft Edge se establecerá en su valor anterior de no-referrer-when-downgrade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6804">After the rollout, when this enterprise policy is enabled, Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy will be set to its old value of no-referrer-when-downgrade.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6805">Esta directiva de empresa está deshabilitada de forma predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6805">This enterprise policy is disabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6806">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6806">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6807">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6807">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6808">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6808">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6809">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6809">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6810">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6810">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6811">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6811">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6812">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6812">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6813">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6813">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6814">Nombre único de GP: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6814">GP unique name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6815">Nombre de GP: usar de forma predeterminada la directiva sin referencia cuando se cambia a una versión anterior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6815">GP name: Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6816">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6816">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6817">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6817">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6818">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6818">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6819">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6819">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6820">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6820">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6821">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6821">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6822">Nombre del valor: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6822">Value Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6823">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6823">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6824">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6824">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6825">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6825">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6826">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6826">Preference Key Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6827">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6827">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6828">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6828">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6829">ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6829">ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6830">Forzar el código de red para que se ejecute en el proceso del explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6830">Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>
