  ><span data-ttu-id="31858-6831">OBSOLETA: Esta directiva está obsoleta y no funciona después de Microsoft Edge 83.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6831">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 83.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6832">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6832">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6833">En Windows desde 78, hasta 83</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6833">On Windows since 78, until 83</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6834">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6834">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6835">Esta directiva está en desuso, ya que solo pretende ser un mecanismo a corto plazo para dar a las empresas más tiempo para migrar a software de terceros que no dependa del enlace de las API de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6835">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to migrate to 3rd party software that doesn't depend on hooking networking APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6836">Se recomienda el uso de servidores proxy sobre los LSP y el parcheo de la API de Win32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6836">Proxy servers are recommended over LSPs and Win32 API patching.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6837">Esta directiva fuerza el código de red para que se ejecute en el proceso del explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6837">This policy forces networking code to run in the browser process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6838">Esta directiva está deshabilitada forma predeterminada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6838">This policy is disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6839">Al habilitarla, los usuarios quedarán expuestos a problemas de seguridad cuando el proceso de red se realice en un espacio aislado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6839">If enabled, users are open to security issues when the networking process is sandboxed.</span></span>


 

  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6840">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6840">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6841">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6841">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6842">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6842">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6843">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6843">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6844">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6844">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6845">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6845">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6846">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6846">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6847">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6847">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6848">Nombre único de GP: ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6848">GP unique name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6849">Nombre GP: obligar a ejecutar el código de red en el proceso del explorador (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6849">GP name: Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6850">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6850">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6851">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6851">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6852">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6852">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6853">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6853">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6854">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6854">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6855">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6855">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6856">Nombre del valor: ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6856">Value Name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6857">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6857">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6858">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6858">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6859">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6859">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6860">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6860">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6861">Forzar el modo restringido de YouTube mínimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6861">Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6862">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6862">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6863">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6863">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6864">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6864">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6865">Exige un modo de limitación mínimo en YouTube y evita que los usuarios puedan seleccionar un modo menos restringido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6865">Enforces a minimum Restricted Mode on YouTube and prevents users from picking a less restricted mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6866">Establézcalo en "Estricto" para aplicar el Modo Estricto Restringido en YouTube.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6866">Set to 'Strict' to enforce Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6867">Establézcalo en "Moderado" para exigir al usuario que solo use el Modo Moderado Restringido y el Modo Restringido Estricto en YouTube.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6867">Set to 'Moderate' to enforce the user to only use Moderate Restricted Mode and Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6868">Los usuarios no pueden deshabilitar el modo restringido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6868">They can't disable Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6869">No configure esta directiva o establézcala en "Off" para no aplicar el Modo Restringido en YouTube.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6869">Set to 'Off' or don't configure this policy to not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6870">Tanto las directivas externas, como las directivas de YouTube, aún podrían exigir el modo restringido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6870">External policies such as YouTube policies might still enforce Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6871">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6871">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6872">Off (0) = no aplicar el Modo Restringido en YouTube</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6872">Off (0) = Do not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6873">Moderate (1) = exigir al menos un Modo Restringido Moderado en YouTube</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6873">Moderate (1) = Enforce at least Moderate Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-6874">Strict (2) = aplicar el Modo Restringido Estricto para YouTube</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6874">Strict (2) = Enforce Strict Restricted Mode for YouTube</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6875">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6875">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6876">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6876">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6877">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6877">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6878">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6878">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6879">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6879">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6880">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6880">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6881">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6881">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6882">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6882">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6883">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6883">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6884">Nombre único de GP: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6884">GP unique name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6885">Nombre de GP: forzar el mínimo del modo restringido de YouTube</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6885">GP name: Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6886">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6886">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6887">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6887">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6888">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6888">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6889">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6889">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6890">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6890">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6891">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6891">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6892">Nombre del valor: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6892">Value Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6893">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6893">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6894">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6894">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6895">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6895">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6896">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6896">Preference Key Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6897">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6897">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6898">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6898">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6899">FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6899">FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6900">Permitir el modo de pantalla completa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6900">Allow full screen mode</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6901">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6901">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6902">En Windows desde la versión 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6902">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6903">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6903">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6904">Establece la disponibilidad del modo de pantalla completa: toda la interfaz de usuario de Microsoft Edge está oculta y solo el contenido web es visible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6904">Set the availability of full screen mode - all Microsoft Edge UI is hidden and only web content is visible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6905">Si habilita esta directiva o no la configura, el usuario, las aplicaciones y las extensiones con los permisos adecuados podrán activar el modo de pantalla completa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6905">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the user, apps, and extensions with appropriate permissions can enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6906">Si deshabilita esta directiva, los usuarios, las aplicaciones y las extensiones no podrán entrar en el modo de pantalla completa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6906">If you disable this policy, users, apps, and extensions can't enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6907">No se puede abrir Microsoft Edge en el modo de pantalla completa usando la línea de comandos cuando el modo de pantalla completa está deshabilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6907">Opening Microsoft Edge in kiosk mode using the command line is unavailable when full screen mode is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6908">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6908">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6909">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6909">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6910">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6910">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6911">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6911">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6912">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6912">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6913">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6913">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6914">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6914">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6915">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6915">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6916">Nombre único de GP: FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6916">GP unique name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6917">Nombre de GP: permitir el modo de pantalla completa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6917">GP name: Allow full screen mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6918">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6918">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6919">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6919">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6920">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6920">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6921">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6921">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6922">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6922">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6923">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6923">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6924">Nombre del valor: FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6924">Value Name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6925">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6925">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6926">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6926">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6927">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6927">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6928">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6928">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6929">Habilitar la caché de autenticación HTTP de ámbito global</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6929">Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6930">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6930">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6931">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 81 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6931">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6932">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6932">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6933">Esta directiva configura una caché por perfil global con las credenciales de autenticación del servidor HTTP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6933">This policy configures a single global per profile cache with HTTP server authentication credentials.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6934">Si deshabilita o no establece esta directiva, el explorador usará el comportamiento predeterminado de la autenticación entre sitios, que a partir de la versión 80, estará en el ámbito de las credenciales de autenticación del servidor HTTP por el sitio de primer nivel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6934">If you disable or don't set this policy, the browser will use the default behavior of cross-site auth, which as of version 80, will be to scope HTTP server authentication credentials by top-level site.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6935">Así pues, si dos sitios utilizan recursos del mismo dominio de autenticación, las credenciales tendrán que proporcionarse de forma independiente según el contexto de cada uno de ellos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6935">So, if two sites use resources from the same authenticating domain, credentials will need to be provided independently in the context of both sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6936">Las credenciales en caché de proxy almacenadas se reutilizarán en todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6936">Cached proxy credentials will be reused across sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6937">Si habilita esta directiva, las credenciales de autenticación HTTP especificadas en el contexto de un sitio se usarán automáticamente en el contexto de otro sitio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6937">If you enable this policy HTTP auth credentials entered in the context of one site will automatically be used in the context of another site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6938">Al habilitar esta directiva los sitios quedan vulnerables a algunos tipos de ataques entre sitios, y permite que los usuarios sean rastreados entre los mismos, incluso sin cookies, añadiendo entradas al caché de autorización HTTP mediante credenciales incrustadas en las direcciones URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6938">Enabling this policy leaves sites open to some types of cross-site attacks, and allows users to be tracked across sites even without cookies by adding entries to the HTTP auth cache using credentials embedded in URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6939">Esta directiva está pensada para que las empresas que dependen del comportamiento heredado tengan la posibilidad de actualizar los procedimientos de inicio de sesión, que luego serán eliminados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6939">This policy is intended to give enterprises depending on the legacy behavior a chance to update their login procedures and will be removed in the future.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6940">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6940">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6941">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6941">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6942">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6942">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6943">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6943">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6944">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6944">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6945">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6945">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6946">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6946">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6947">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6947">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6948">Nombre único de GP: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6948">GP unique name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6949">Nombre de GP: habilitar la caché de autenticación HTTP de ámbito global</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6949">GP name: Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6950">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6950">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6951">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6951">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6952">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6952">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6953">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6953">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6954">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6954">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6955">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6955">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6956">Nombre del valor: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6956">Value Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6957">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6957">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6958">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6958">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6959">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6959">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6960">Nombre clave de la preferencia: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6960">Preference Key Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6961">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6961">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6962">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6962">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6963">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6963">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6964">Forzar la navegación directa en el sitio de la intranet en lugar de buscar en las entradas de una sola palabra en la barra de direcciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6964">Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6965">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6965">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6966">En Windows y macOS desde 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6966">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6967">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6967">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-6968">Si habilita esta directiva, el resultado principal de la sugerencia de la barra de direcciones navegará a los sitios de la intranet si el texto introducido en la barra de direcciones es una sola palabra sin signos de puntuación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6968">If you enable this policy, the top auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will navigate to intranet sites if the text entered in the address bar is a single word without punctuation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6969">La navegación predeterminada llevará a cabo una navegación en un sitio de la intranet que coincida con el texto escrito, cuando en éste se escriba una sola palabra sin signos de puntuación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6969">Default navigation when typing a single word without punctuation will conduct a navigation to an intranet site matching the entered text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6970">Si habilita esta directiva, el segundo resultado de la sugerencia de la barra de direcciones realizará una búsqueda en la web tal como se ha escrito, siempre que este texto sea de una sola palabra y sin signos de puntuación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6970">If you enable this policy, the second auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will conduct a web search exactly as it was entered, provided that this text is a single word without punctuation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6971">Se usará el proveedor de búsquedas predeterminado, a menos que también se habilite una directiva para evitar la búsqueda web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6971">The default search provider will be used unless a policy to prevent web search is also enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6972">Dos efectos de la habilitación de esta directiva son:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6972">Two effects of enabling this policy are:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6973">La navegación por los sitios en busca de respuestas para las consultas de una sola palabra que normalmente podrían resolverse con un elemento del historial ya no se producirá.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6973">Navigation to sites in response to single word queries that would typically resolve to a history item will no longer happen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6974">En su lugar, el explorador intentará navegar a través de sitios internos que pueden no existir en la intranet de una organización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6974">Instead, the browser will attempt navigate to internal sites that may not exist in an organization's intranet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-6975">Se producirá un error 404.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6975">This will result in a 404 error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-6976">Los términos de búsqueda populares de una sola palabra requerirán de la selección manual de sugerencias de búsqueda para realizar una búsqueda adecuada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6976">Popular, single-word search terms will require manual selection of search suggestions to properly conduct a search.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6977">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6977">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6978">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6978">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6979">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6979">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6980">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6980">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6981">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6981">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6982">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6982">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6983">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6983">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6984">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6984">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6985">Nombre único de GP: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6985">GP unique name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6986">Nombre de GP: forzar la navegación directa en el sitio de intranet en lugar de buscar por la introducción de una sola palabra en la barra de direcciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6986">GP name: Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6987">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6987">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6988">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6988">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6989">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6989">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6990">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6990">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6991">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6991">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6992">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6992">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6993">Nombre del valor: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6993">Value Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6994">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6994">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6995">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6995">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-6996">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6996">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6997">Nombre clave de la preferencia: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6997">Preference Key Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-6998">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6998">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-6999">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-6999">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7000">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7000">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7001">Configurar la lista de nombres que se omitirán por alto la comprobación de la directiva de HSTS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7001">Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7002">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7002">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7003">En Windows y macOS desde 79 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7003">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7004">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7004">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7005">Los nombres de host que se especifiquen en esta lista estarán exentos de la comprobación de directivas de HSTS, que podrían actualizar las solicitudes de "http://" a "https://".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7005">Hostnames specified in this list will be exempt from the HSTS policy check that could potentially upgrade requests from "http://" to "https://".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7006">En esta directiva solo se permiten nombres de host de una sola etiqueta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7006">Only single-label hostnames are allowed in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7007">Los nombres de host deben tener un nombre canónico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7007">Hostnames must be canonicalized.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7008">Todos los IDN deben ser convertidos a su formato de etiqueta A, y todas las letras ASCII deben estar en minúsculas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7008">Any IDNs must be converted to their A-label format, and all ASCII letters must be lowercase.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7009">Esta directiva solo se aplicará a los nombres de host mencionados específicamente; sin embargo, no se aplicará a los subdominios nombrados en la lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7009">This policy only applies to the specific hostnames specified; it doesn't apply to subdomains of the names in the list.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7010">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7010">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7011">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7011">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7012">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7012">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7013">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7013">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7014">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7014">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7015">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7015">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7016">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7016">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7017">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7017">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7018">Nombre único de GP: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7018">GP unique name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7019">Nombre de GP: configurar la lista de nombres que se omitirán en la comprobación de la directiva de HSTS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7019">GP name: Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7020">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7020">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7021">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7021">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7022">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7022">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7023">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7023">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7024">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7024">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7025">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7025">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7026">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7026">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7027">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7027">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7028">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7028">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList\1 = meet

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7029">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7029">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7030">Nombre clave de la preferencia: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7030">Preference Key Name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7031">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7031">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>meet</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7032">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7032">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7033">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7033">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7034">Usar la aceleración de hardware cuando esté disponible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7034">Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7035">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7035">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7036">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7036">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7037">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7037">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7038">Especifica si está disponible el uso de la aceleración de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7038">Specify to use hardware acceleration, if it's available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7039">Si habilita esta directiva o no la configura, se habilitará la aceleración de hardware, a menos que bloquee de manera explícita una función de GPU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7039">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, hardware acceleration is enabled unless a GPU feature is explicitly blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7040">Si deshabilita esta directiva, también se deshabilitará la aceleración de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7040">If you disable this policy, hardware acceleration is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7041">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7041">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7042">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7042">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7043">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7043">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7044">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7044">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7045">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7045">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7046">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7046">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7047">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7047">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7048">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7048">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7049">Nombre único de GP: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7049">GP unique name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7050">Nombre de GP: usar la aceleración de hardware cuando esté disponible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7050">GP name: Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7051">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7051">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7052">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7052">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7053">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7053">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7054">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7054">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7055">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7055">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7056">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7056">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7057">Nombre del valor: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7057">Value Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7058">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7058">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7059">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7059">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7060">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7060">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7061">Nombre clave de la preferencia: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7061">Preference Key Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7062">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7062">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7063">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7063">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7064">HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7064">HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7065">Ocultar la experiencia de primera ejecución y la pantalla de presentación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7065">Hide the First-run experience and splash screen</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7066">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7066">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7067">En Windows y MacOS desde 80 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7067">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7068">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7068">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7069">Si habilita esta directiva, la primera vista de Windows y la pantalla de presentación no se mostrarán a los usuarios cuando ejecuten Microsoft Edge por primera vez.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7069">If you enable this policy, the First-run experience and the splash screen will not be shown to users when they run Microsoft Edge for the first time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7070">En las opciones de configuración que se muestran en la primera vista de Windows, el explorador usará de forma predeterminada lo siguiente:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7070">For the configuration options shown in the First Run Experience, the browser will default to the following:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7071">-En la página de la nueva pestaña, el tipo de fuente estará establecido en las noticias de MSN, y el diseño en Inspiradores.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7071">-On the New Tab Page, the feed type will be set to MSN News and the layout to Inspirational.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7072">-El usuario seguirá iniciando sesión automáticamente en Microsoft Edge si la cuenta de Windows es del tipo Azure AD o MSA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7072">-The user will still be automatically signed into Microsoft Edge if the Windows account is of Azure AD or MSA type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7073">-La sincronización no estará habilitada de forma predeterminada y los usuarios podrán activarla en la configuración de sincronización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7073">-Sync will not be enabled by default and users will be able to turn on sync from the sync settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7074">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, se mostrará la primera vista de Windows y la pantalla de presentación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7074">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the First-run experience and the Splash screen will be shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7075">Nota: Las opciones específicas de configuración que se muestran al usuario en la primera vista de Windows, también se pueden administrar mediante el uso de otras directivas específicas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7075">Note: The specific configuration options shown to the user in the First Run Experience, can also be managed by using other specific policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7076">Puede usar la directiva HideFirstRunExperience junto a estas directivas para configurar una experiencia de navegación específica en sus dispositivos administrados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7076">You can use the HideFirstRunExperience policy in combination with these policies to configure a specific browser experience on your managed devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7077">Entre estas directivas se encuentran:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7077">Some of these other policies are:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7078">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7078">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7079">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7079">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7080">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7080">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7081">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7081">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7082">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7082">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7083">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7083">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7084">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7084">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7085">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7085">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7086">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7086">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7087">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7087">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7088">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7088">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7089">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7089">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7090">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7090">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7091">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7091">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7092">Nombre único de GP: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7092">GP unique name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7093">Nombre de GP: Ocultar la experiencia de primera ejecución y la pantalla de presentación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7093">GP name: Hide the First-run experience and splash screen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7094">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7094">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7095">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7095">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7096">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7096">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7097">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7097">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7098">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7098">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7099">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7099">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7100">Nombre del valor: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7100">Value Name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7101">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7101">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7102">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7102">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7103">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7103">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7104">Nombre clave de la preferencia: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7104">Preference Key Name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7105">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7105">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7106">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7106">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7107">ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7107">ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7108">Permitir la importación de los datos del formulario Autorrellenar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7108">Allow importing of autofill form data</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7109">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7109">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7110">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7110">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7111">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7111">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7112">Permite que los usuarios importen datos de los formularios de autorrelleno desde otro navegador a Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7112">Allows users to import autofill form data from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7113">Si habilita esta directiva, la opción de importar manualmente los datos de autorrelleno se seleccionará automáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7113">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import autofill data is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7114">Si deshabilita esta directiva, los datos del formulario de autorelleno no se importarán en la primera ejecución, y los usuarios no podrán importarlos manualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7114">If you disable this policy, autofill form data isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7115">Si no se configura esta directiva, se importarán los datos de autorrelleno durante la primera ejecución, y los usuarios podrán elegir si desean importar estos datos manualmente en las sesiones de exploración posteriores.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7115">If you don't configure this policy, autofill data is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7116">Puede establecer esta directiva como una recomendación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7116">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7117">Esto significa que Microsoft Edge importará los datos de autorelleno durante la primera ejecución, pero los usuarios pueden seleccionar o borrar la opción de **datos de autorelleno** en la importación manual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7117">This means that Microsoft Edge will import autofill data on first run, but users can select or clear **autofill data** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7118">**Nota**: actualmente, esta directiva administra la importación desde los exploradores Google Chrome (en Windows 7, 8 y 10 y en macOS) y Mozilla Firefox (en Windows 7, 8 y 10 y en macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7118">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) and Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7119">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7119">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7120">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7120">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7121">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7121">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7122">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7122">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7123">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7123">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7124">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7124">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7125">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7125">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7126">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7126">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7127">Nombre único de GP: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7127">GP unique name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7128">Nombre de GP: permitir la importación de los datos del formulario autorrellenado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7128">GP name: Allow importing of autofill form data</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7129">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7129">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7130">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7130">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7131">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7131">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7132">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7132">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7133">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7133">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7134">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7134">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7135">Nombre del valor: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7135">Value Name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7136">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7136">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7137">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7137">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7138">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7138">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7139">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7139">Preference Key Name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7140">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7140">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7141">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7141">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7142">ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7142">ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7143">Permitir la importación de la configuración del explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7143">Allow importing of browser settings</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7144">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7144">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7145">En Windows y macOS desde 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7145">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7146">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7146">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7147">Permite que los usuarios importen la configuración desde otro explorador a Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7147">Allows users to import browser settings from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7148">Si habilita esta directiva, la casilla de verificación de la **Configuración del explorador** se seleccionará automáticamente en el cuadro de diálogo **Importar datos del explorador**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7148">If you enable this policy, the **Browser settings** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7149">Si deshabilita esta directiva, la configuración del explorador no se importará en la primera ejecución, y los usuarios no podrán importarlos manualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7149">If you disable this policy, browser settings aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7150">Si no configura esta directiva, se importará la configuración del explorador durante la primera ejecución, y los usuarios podrán elegir si desean importar esta configuración manualmente en las sesiones de exploración posteriores.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7150">If you don't configure this policy, browser settings are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7151">También puede establecer esta directiva como una recomendación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7151">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7152">Esto significa que Microsoft Edge importará la configuración durante la primera ejecución, pero los usuarios pueden seleccionar o borrar la opción de la **configuración del explorador** en la importación manual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7152">This means that Microsoft Edge imports the settings on first run, but users can select or clear the **browser settings** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7153">**Nota**: actualmente, esta directiva administra la importación desde Google Chrome (en Windows 7, 8 y 10 y en macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7153">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7154">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7154">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7155">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7155">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7156">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7156">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7157">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7157">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7158">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7158">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7159">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7159">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7160">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7160">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7161">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7161">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7162">Nombre único de GP: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7162">GP unique name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7163">Nombre de GP: permitir la importación de la configuración del explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7163">GP name: Allow importing of browser settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7164">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7164">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7165">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7165">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7166">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7166">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7167">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7167">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7168">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7168">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7169">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7169">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7170">Nombre del valor: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7170">Value Name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7171">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7171">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7172">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7172">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7173">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7173">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7174">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7174">Preference Key Name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7175">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7175">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7176">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7176">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7177">ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7177">ImportCookies</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7178">Permitir la importación de cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7178">Allow importing of Cookies</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7179">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7179">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7180">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 81 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7180">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7181">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7181">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7182">Permite que los usuarios importen las cookies desde otro explorador a Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7182">Allows users to import Cookies from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7183">Si deshabilita esta directiva, las cookies no se importarán durante la primera ejecución.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7183">If you disable this policy, Cookies aren't imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7184">Si no configura esta directiva, las cookies no importarán durante la primera ejecución.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7184">If you don't configure this policy, Cookies are imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7185">También puede establecer esta directiva como una recomendación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7185">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7186">Esto quiere decir que Microsoft Edge importará las cookies durante la primera ejecución.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7186">This means that Microsoft Edge imports Cookies on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7187">**Nota**: actualmente, esta directiva administra la importación desde Google Chrome (en Windows 7, 8 y 10 y en macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7187">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7188">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7188">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7189">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7189">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7190">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7190">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7191">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7191">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7192">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7192">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7193">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7193">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7194">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7194">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7195">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7195">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7196">Nombre único de GP: ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7196">GP unique name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7197">Nombre de GP: permitir la importación de cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7197">GP name: Allow importing of Cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7198">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7198">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7199">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7199">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7200">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7200">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
