<span data-ttu-id="31858-7568">Esta es una característica compatible con estándares web, pero puede romper la funcionalidad en algunos sitios web, lo que provoca que algunas acciones se retrasen hasta un minuto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7568">This is a web standards compliant feature, but it may break functionality on some websites by causing certain actions to be delayed by up to a minute.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7569">Sin embargo, si se habilita, se producen ahorros significativos de CPU y batería.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7569">However, it results in significant CPU and battery savings when enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7570">Consulte https://bit.ly/30b1XR4 para obtener más detalles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7570">See https://bit.ly/30b1XR4 for more details.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7571">Si habilita esta Directiva, la característica se habilitará y los usuarios no podrán invalidar esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7571">If you enable this policy, the feature will be force enabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-7572">Si deshabilita esta Directiva, la característica se deshabilitará y los usuarios no podrán invalidar esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7572">If you disable this policy, the feature will be force disabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-7573">Si no configura esta Directiva, la característica se controlará con su propia lógica interna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7573">If you don't configure this policy, the feature will be controlled by its own internal logic.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7574">Los usuarios pueden configurar manualmente esta opción.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7574">Users can manually configure this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7575">Tenga en cuenta que la Directiva se aplica por cada proceso del representador, con el valor más reciente de la configuración de Directiva vigente cuando se inicia el proceso de un representador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7575">Note that the policy is applied per renderer process, with the most recent value of the policy setting in force when a renderer process starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7576">Se debe reiniciar completamente para asegurar que todas las pestañas cargadas reciban una configuración de directiva coherente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7576">A full restart is required to ensure that all the loaded tabs receive a consistent policy setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7577">Es inocuo tener procesos que se ejecuten con diferentes valores de esta Directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7577">It is harmless for processes to be running with different values of this policy.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7578">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7578">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7579">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7579">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7580">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7580">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7581">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7581">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7582">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7582">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7583">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7583">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7584">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7584">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7585">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7585">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7586">Nombre único de GP: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7586">GP unique name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7587">Nombre de GP: controle la característica IntensiveWakeUpThrottling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7587">GP name: Control the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7588">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7588">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7589">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7589">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7590">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7590">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7591">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7591">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7592">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7592">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7593">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7593">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7594">Nombre del valor: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7594">Value Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7595">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7595">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7596">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7596">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7597">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7597">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7598">Nombre de clave de preferencias: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7598">Preference Key Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7599">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7599">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7600">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7600">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7601">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7601">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7602">Configurar la detección de bloqueos mejorada para el modo de Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7602">Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7603">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7603">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7604">En Windows desde la versión 84 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7604">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7605">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7605">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7606">La detección de bloqueos mejorada es un enfoque más específico para detectar páginas web bloqueadas en el modo de Internet Explorer que la que usa Internet Explorer independiente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7606">Enhanced hang detection is a more granular approach to detecting hung webpages in Internet Explorer mode than what standalone Internet Explorer uses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7607">Cuando se detecta una página web que se ha bloqueado, el explorador aplica una mitigación para evitar el bloqueo del resto del explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7607">When a hung webpage is detected, the browser will apply a mitigation to prevent the rest of the browser from hanging.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7608">Esta configuración le permite configurar el uso de la detección de bloqueos mejorada en caso de que se realicen problemas incompatibles con cualquiera de los sitios Web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7608">This setting allows you to configure the use of enhanced hang detection in case you run into incompatible issues with any of your websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7609">Se recomienda deshabilitar esta directiva solo si aparecen notificaciones como "(el sitio web) no responde" en el modo de Internet Explorer, pero no en Internet Explorer independiente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7609">We recommend disabling this policy only if you see notifications such as "(website) is not responding" in Internet Explorer mode but not in standalone Internet Explorer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7610">Esta configuración funciona conjuntamente con: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) establecida en "IEMode" y la directiva [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) donde la lista tiene al menos una entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7610">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7611">Si establece esta directiva en "Habilitada" o no la configura, los sitios web que se ejecuten en modo de Internet Explorer usarán la detección de bloqueos mejorada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7611">If you set this policy to 'Enabled' or don't configure it, websites running in Internet Explorer mode will use enhanced hang detection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7612">Si establece esta directiva en "Deshabilitada", la detección de bloqueos mejorada se deshabilita, y los usuarios recibirán el comportamiento de la detección de bloqueos de Internet Explorer básica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7612">If you set this policy to 'Disabled', enhanced hang detection is disabled, and users will get the basic Internet Explorer hang detection behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7613">Para obtener más información sobre el modo Internet Explorer, vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7613">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7614">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7614">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-7615">Deshabilitada (0) = detección de bloqueos mejorada deshabilitada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7615">Disabled (0) = Enhanced hang detection disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-7616">Habilitada (1) = detección de bloqueos mejorada habilitada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7616">Enabled (1) = Enhanced hang detection enabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7617">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7617">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7618">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7618">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7619">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7619">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7620">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7620">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7621">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7621">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7622">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7622">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7623">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7623">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7624">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7624">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7625">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7625">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7626">Nombre único de GP: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7626">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7627">Nombre GP: configurar la detección mejorada de bloqueo para el modo de Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7627">GP name: Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7628">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7628">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7629">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7629">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7630">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7630">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7631">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7631">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7632">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7632">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7633">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7633">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7634">Nombre del valor: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7634">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7635">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7635">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7636">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7636">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7637">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7637">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7638">InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7638">InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7639">Configurar la integración de Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7639">Configure Internet Explorer integration</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7640">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7640">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7641">En Windows desde la versión 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7641">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7642">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7642">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7643">Para obtener instrucciones sobre cómo configurar la experiencia óptima en el modo de Internet Explorer, vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7643">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7644">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7644">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-7645">None (0) = ninguno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7645">None (0) = None</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-7646">IEMode (1) = modo de Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7646">IEMode (1) = Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-7647">NeedIE (2) = Internet Explorer 11</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7647">NeedIE (2) = Internet Explorer 11</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7648">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7648">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7649">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7649">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7650">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7650">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7651">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7651">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7652">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7652">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7653">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7653">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7654">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7654">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7655">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7655">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7656">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7656">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7657">Nombre único de GP: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7657">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7658">Nombre de GP: configurar la integración de Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7658">GP name: Configure Internet Explorer integration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7659">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7659">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7660">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7660">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7661">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7661">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7662">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7662">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7663">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7663">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7664">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7664">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7665">Nombre del valor: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7665">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7666">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7666">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7667">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7667">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7669">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7669">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7670">Configurar la lista de sitios del Modo de empresa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7670">Configure the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7671">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7671">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7672">En Windows desde la versión 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7672">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7673">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7673">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7674">Para obtener instrucciones sobre cómo configurar la experiencia óptima en el modo de Internet Explorer, vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7674">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7675">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7675">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7676">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7676">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7677">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7677">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7678">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7678">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7679">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7679">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7680">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7680">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7681">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7681">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7682">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7682">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7683">Nombre único de GP: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7683">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7684">Nombre de GP: configurar la lista de sitios del modo de empresa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7684">GP name: Configure the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7685">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7685">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7686">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7686">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7687">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7687">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7688">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7688">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7689">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7689">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7690">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7690">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7691">Nombre del valor: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7691">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7692">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7692">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7693">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7693">Example value:</span></span>
```
https://internal.contoso.com/sitelist.xml
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7694">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7694">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7695">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7695">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7696">Especificar cómo se comportan las navegaciones "en la página" de los sitios no configurados al iniciarse en las páginas en modo Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7696">Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7697">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7697">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7698">En Windows desde la versión 81 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7698">On Windows since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7699">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7699">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7700">Una navegación "en la página" se inicia desde un vínculo, un script o un formulario en la página actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7700">An "in-page" navigation is started from a link, a script, or a form on the current page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7701">También puede ser un redireccionamiento de servidor de un intento de navegación "en la página" anterior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7701">It can also be a server-side redirect of a previous "in-page" navigation attempt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7702">Por otra parte, un usuario puede iniciar una navegación que no sea "en la página", y que sea independiente de la página actual, de varias formas con los controles del explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7702">Conversely, a user can start a navigation that isn't "in-page" that's independent of the current page in several ways by using the browser controls.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7703">Por ejemplo, con la barra de direcciones, el botón Atrás o un vínculo favorito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7703">For example, using the address bar, the back button, or a favorite link.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7704">Esta configuración le permite determinar si las navegaciones desde las páginas cargadas en el modo Internet Explorer a los sitios sin configurar (que no están configurados en la lista de sitios del modo de empresa) vuelven a Microsoft Edge o permanecen en el modo Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7704">This setting lets you specify whether navigations from pages loaded in Internet Explorer mode to unconfigured sites (that are not configured in the Enterprise Mode Site List) switch back to Microsoft Edge or remain in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7705">Esta configuración funciona conjuntamente con: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) establecida en "IEMode" y la directiva [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) donde la lista tiene al menos una entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7705">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7706">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, solo podrán abrirse los sitios que fueron configurados para el modo Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7706">If you disable or don't configure this policy, only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7707">Cualquier sitio que no esté configurado para abrirse en el modo Internet Explorer se redirigirá a Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7707">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7708">Si configura esta directiva como "Predeterminada", solo podrán abrirse los sitios que fueron configurados para el modo de Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7708">If you set this policy to 'Default', only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7709">Cualquier sitio que no esté configurado para abrirse en el modo Internet Explorer se redirigirá a Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7709">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7710">Si establece esta directiva en "AutomaticNavigationsOnly", obtendrá la experiencia predeterminada, aunque todas las navegaciones automáticas (como los redireccionamientos 302) a sitios sin configurar se mantendrán en el modo de Internet Explorer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7710">If you set this policy to 'AutomaticNavigationsOnly', you get the default experience except that all automatic navigations (such as 302 redirects) to unconfigured sites will be kept in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7711">Si establece esta directiva en "AllInPageNavigations", todas las navegaciones realizadas desde páginas cargadas en modo IE hasta los sitios sin configurar se mantendrán en el modo de Internet Explorer (opción menos recomendada).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7711">If you set this policy to 'AllInPageNavigations', all navigations from pages loaded in IE mode to unconfigured sites are kept in Internet Explorer mode (Least Recommended).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7712">Para obtener más información sobre el modo Internet Explorer, vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7712">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7713">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7713">Policy options mapping:</span></span>
  

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-7714">Predeterminado (0) = predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7714">Default (0) = Default</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-7715">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = mantener solo la navegación automática en el modo de Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7715">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = Keep only automatic navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-7716">AllInPageNavigations (2) = mantener todas las navegaciones en la página en el modo de Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7716">AllInPageNavigations (2) = Keep all in-page navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7717">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7717">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7718">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7718">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7719">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7719">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7720">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7720">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7721">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7721">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7722">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7722">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7723">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7723">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7724">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7724">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7725">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7725">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7726">Nombre único de GP: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7726">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7727">Nombre de GP: especificar el comportamiento de las navegaciones "en la página" de los sitios no configurados cuando se inician desde las páginas en modo Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7727">GP name: Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7728">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7728">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7729">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7729">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7730">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7730">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7731">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7731">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7732">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7732">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7733">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7733">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7734">Nombre del valor: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7734">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7735">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7735">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7736">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7736">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7737">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7737">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7738">IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7738">IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7739">Habilitar el aislamiento de sitio para determinados orígenes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7739">Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7740">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7740">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7741">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7741">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7742">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7742">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7743">Especifica los orígenes para que se ejecuten de forma aislada, en su propio proceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7743">Specify origins to run in isolation, in their own process.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-7744">Esta directiva también aísla los orígenes nombrados por los subdominios, por ejemplo, al especificar https://contoso.com/ que se https://foo.contoso.com/ aislarán como parte del https://contoso.com/ sitio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7744">This policy also isolates origins named by subdomains - for example, specifying https://contoso.com/ will cause https://foo.contoso.com/ to be isolated as part of the https://contoso.com/ site.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-7745">Si se habilita esta directiva, cada uno de los orígenes nombrados en una lista separada por comas se ejecutará en su propio proceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7745">If the policy is enabled, each of the named origins in a comma-separated list will run in its own process.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-7746">Si deshabilita esta directiva, las funciones "IsolateOrigins" y "SitePerProcess" también se deshabilitarán.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7746">If you disable this policy, then both the 'IsolateOrigins' and 'SitePerProcess' features are disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7747">Los usuarios aún podrán habilitar la directiva ''IsolateOrigins'' manualmente, a través de los indicadores de la línea de comandos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7747">Users can still enable 'IsolateOrigins' policy manually, via command line flags.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-7748">Si no configura esta directiva, el usuario podrá cambiar esta configuración manualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7748">If you don't configure the policy, the user can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7749">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7749">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7750">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7750">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7751">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7751">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7752">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7752">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7753">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7753">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7754">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7754">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7755">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7755">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7756">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7756">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7757">Nombre único de GP: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7757">GP unique name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7758">Nombre de GP: habilitar el aislamiento de sitio para orígenes determinados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7758">GP name: Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7759">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7759">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7760">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7760">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7761">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7761">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7762">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7762">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7763">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7763">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7764">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7764">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7765">Nombre del valor: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7765">Value Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7766">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7766">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7767">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7767">Example value:</span></span>
```
https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7768">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7768">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7769">Nombre clave de la preferencia: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7769">Preference Key Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7770">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7770">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7771">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7771">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7772">LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7772">LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7773">Permita sugerencias de proveedores locales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7773">Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7774">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7774">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7775">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 83 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7775">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7776">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7776">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7777">Permitir sugerencias por parte de los proveedores de sugerencias en el dispositivo (proveedores locales), como por ejemplo, los favoritos y el historial de navegación, en la barra de direcciones de Microsoft Edge y en la lista de autosugerencias.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7777">Allow suggestions from suggestion providers on the device (local providers), for example, Favorites and Browsing History, in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7778">Si habilita esta directiva, se usarán las sugerencias de proveedores locales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7778">If you enable this policy, suggestions from local providers are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7779">Si deshabilita esta directiva, las sugerencias de proveedores locales jamás se utilizarán.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7779">If you disable this policy, suggestions from local providers are never used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7780">No se mostrarán sugerencias para el historial y los favoritos locales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7780">Local history and local favorites suggestions will not appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7781">Si no configura esta Directiva, se mostrarán sugerencias para los proveedores locales, aunque el usuario podrá cambiar esta opción con la configuración de alternancia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7781">If you do not configure this policy, suggestions from local providers are allowed but the user can change that using the settings toggle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7782">Tenga en cuenta que es posible que algunas funciones no estén disponibles si se ha aplicado una directiva para deshabilitar esta función.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7782">Note that some features may not be available if a policy to disable this feature has been applied.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7783">Por ejemplo, las sugerencias del historial de navegación no estarán disponibles si habilita la directiva [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7783">For example, Browsing History suggestions will not be available if you enable the [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7784">Para finalizar la aplicación de esta directiva, es necesario que se reinicie el explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7784">This policy requires a browser restart to finish applying.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7785">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7785">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7786">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7786">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7787">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7787">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7788">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7788">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7789">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7789">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7790">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7790">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7791">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7791">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7792">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7792">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7793">Nombre único de GP: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7793">GP unique name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7794">Nombre de GP: permitir las sugerencias de los proveedores locales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7794">GP name: Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7795">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7795">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7796">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7796">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7797">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7797">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7798">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7798">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7799">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7799">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7800">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7800">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7801">Nombre del valor: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7801">Value Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7802">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7802">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7803">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7803">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7804">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7804">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7805">Nombre clave de la preferencia: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7805">Preference Key Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7806">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7806">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7807">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7807">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7808">ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7808">ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7809">Configurar Favoritos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7809">Configure favorites</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7810">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7810">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7811">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7811">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7812">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7812">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7813">Configura una lista de los favoritos administrados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7813">Configures a list of managed favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7814">La directiva crea una lista de favoritos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7814">The policy creates a list of favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7815">Cada favorito tiene las claves "nombre" y "URL", que contienen el nombre del favorito y su objetivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7815">Each favorite contains the keys "name" and "url," which hold the favorite's name and its target.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7816">Puede configurar una subcarpeta definiendo un favorito sin la clave "URL" pero con la clave adicional "secundarios", la cual contiene una lista de favoritos definida anteriormente (algunos de los cuales pueden volver a ser carpetas).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7816">You can configure a subfolder by defining a favorites without an "url" key but with an additional "children" key that contains a list of favorites as defined above (some of which may be folders again).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7817">Microsoft Edge modifica las URL incompletas como si fueran enviadas a través de la barra de direcciones, por ejemplo "microsoft.com" pasa a ser "https://microsoft.com/".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7817">Microsoft Edge amends incomplete URLs as if they were submitted via the Address Bar, for example "microsoft.com" becomes "https://microsoft.com/".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7818">Estos favoritos se ubican en una carpeta que no puede ser modificada por el usuario (pero el usuario puede elegir si quiere ocultarla en la barra de favoritos).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7818">These favorites are placed in a folder that can't be modified by the user (but the user can choose to hide it from the favorites bar).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7819">De forma predeterminada, el nombre de la carpeta es "favoritos administrados", pero puede cambiarlo si agrega a la lista de favoritos un diccionario que contenga la clave "toplevel_name" con el nombre de la carpeta que desee usar como valor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7819">By default the folder name is "Managed favorites" but you can change it by adding to the list of favorites a dictionary containing the key "toplevel_name" with the desired folder name as the value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7820">Los favoritos administrados no se sincronizan con la cuenta del usuario y no pueden ser modificados por las extensiones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7820">Managed favorites are not synced to the user account and can't be modified by extensions.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7821">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7821">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7822">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7822">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7823">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7823">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7824">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7824">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7825">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7825">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7826">Diccionario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7826">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7827">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7827">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7828">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7828">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7829">Nombre único de GP: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7829">GP unique name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7830">Nombre de GP: configurar Favoritos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7830">GP name: Configure favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7831">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7831">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7832">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7832">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7833">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7833">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7834">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7834">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7835">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7835">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7836">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7836">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7837">Nombre del valor: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7837">Value Name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7838">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7838">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7839">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7839">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedFavorites = [
  {
    "toplevel_name": "My managed favorites folder"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Microsoft", 
    "url": "microsoft.com"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Bing", 
    "url": "bing.com"
  }, 
  {
    "children": [
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge Insiders", 
        "url": "www.microsoftedgeinsider.com"
      }, 
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge", 
        "url": "www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge"
      }
    ], 
    "name": "Microsoft Edge links"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7840">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7840">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7841">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7841">Preference Key Name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7842">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7842">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ManagedFavorites</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>toplevel_name</key>
    <string>My managed favorites folder</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>microsoft.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Bing</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>bing.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>children</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge Insiders</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoftedgeinsider.com</string>
      </dict>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge</string>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft Edge links</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7843">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7843">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7844">ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7844">ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7845">Administrar motores de búsqueda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7845">Manage Search Engines</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7846">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7846">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7847">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7847">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7848">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7848">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7849">Le permite configurar una lista de hasta 10 motores de búsqueda, de entre los cuales uno debe estar marcado como motor de búsqueda predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7849">Lets you configure a list of up to 10 search engines, one of which must be marked as the default search engine.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-7850">No es necesario que especifique la codificación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7850">You do not need to specify the encoding.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7851">A partir de Microsoft Edge 80, los parámetros suggest_url y image_search_url son opcionales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7851">Starting in Microsoft Edge 80, the suggest_url and image_search_url parameters are optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7852">El parámetro opcional, image_search_post_params (que consiste en pares de nombres y valores separados por comas), está disponible a partir de Microsoft Edge 80.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7852">The optional parameter, image_search_post_params (consists of comma-separated name/value pairs), is available starting in Microsoft Edge 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7853">A partir de Microsoft Edge 83, puedes habilitar la detección del motor de búsqueda con el parámetro opcional allow_search_engine_discovery.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7853">Starting in Microsoft Edge 83, you can enable search engine discovery with the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7854">Este parámetro debe ser el primer elemento en la lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7854">This parameter must be the first item in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7855">Si no se especifica allow_search_engine_discovery, se deshabilitará la detección del motor de búsqueda de forma predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7855">If allow_search_engine_discovery is not specified, search engine discovery will be disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7856">A partir de Microsoft Edge 84, puede establecer esta directiva como directiva recomendada para permitir la detección de proveedores de búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7856">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy to allow search provider discovery.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7857">No es necesario agregar el parámetro opcional allow_search_engine_discovery.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7857">You do not need to add the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7858">Si habilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán agregar, quitar ni cambiar ningún motor de búsqueda de la lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7858">If you enable this policy, users can't add, remove, or change any search engine in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7859">Los usuarios pueden configurar cualquier motor de búsqueda de la lista como motor de búsqueda predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7859">Users can set their default search engine to any search engine in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7860">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, los usuarios podrán modificar la lista de motores de búsqueda libremente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7860">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can modify the search engines list as desired.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7861">Si la directiva [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) está establecida, entonces se ignorará esta directiva (ManagedSearchEngines).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7861">If the [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policy is set, this policy (ManagedSearchEngines) is ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7862">El usuario debe reiniciar su explorador para finalizar la aplicación de esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7862">The user must restart their browser to finish applying this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7863">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7863">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7864">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7864">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7865">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7865">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7866">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7866">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7867">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7867">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7868">Diccionario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7868">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7869">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7869">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7870">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7870">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7871">Nombre único de GP: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7871">GP unique name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7872">Nombre de GP: administrar los motores de búsqueda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7872">GP name: Manage Search Engines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7873">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7873">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7874">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7874">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7875">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7875">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7876">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7876">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7877">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7877">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7878">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7878">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7879">Nombre del valor: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7879">Value Name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7880">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7880">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7881">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7881">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedSearchEngines = [
  {
    "allow_search_engine_discovery": true
  }, 
  {
    "is_default": true, 
    "keyword": "example1.com", 
    "name": "Example1", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example1.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example1.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "image_search_post_params": "content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}", 
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", 
    "keyword": "example2.com", 
    "name": "Example2", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example2.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "encoding": "UTF-8", 
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example3.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", 
    "keyword": "example3.com", 
    "name": "Example3", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example3.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example3.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "keyword": "example4.com", 
    "name": "Example4", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example4.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7882">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7882">Mac information and settings</span></span>

    <key>image_search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload</string>
    <key>keyword</key>
    <string>example2.com</string>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Example2</string>
    <key>search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7885">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7885">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7886">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7886">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7887">Número máximo de conexiones simultáneas al servidor proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7887">Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7888">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7888">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7889">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7889">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7890">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7890">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7891">Especifica el número máximo de conexiones simultáneas al servidor proxy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7891">Specifies the maximum number of simultaneous connections to the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7892">Algunos servidores proxy no pueden administrar una gran cantidad de conexiones simultáneas por cliente, esto se puede solucionar estableciendo esta directiva en un valor inferior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7892">Some proxy servers can't handle a high number of concurrent connections per client - you can solve this by setting this policy to a lower value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7893">El valor de esta directiva debe ser inferior a 100 y superior a 6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7893">The value of this policy should be lower than 100 and higher than 6.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7894">El valor predeterminado es 32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7894">The default value is 32.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7895">Se sabe que algunas aplicaciones web consumen muchas conexiones con GETs en espera, por lo que si se reducen las conexiones máximas a un nivel inferior a 32, las redes de los exploradores podrían colgarse al abrir una gran cantidad de estas aplicaciones web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7895">Some web apps are known to consume many connections with hanging GETs - lowering the maximum connections below 32 may lead to browser networking hangs if too many of these kind of web apps are open.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7896">Si no configura esta directiva, se usará el valor predeterminado (32).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7896">If you don't configure this policy, the default value (32) is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7897">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7897">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7898">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7898">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7899">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7899">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7900">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7900">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7901">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7901">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7902">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7902">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7903">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7903">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7904">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7904">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7905">Nombre único de GP: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7905">GP unique name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7906">Nombre de GP: número máximo de conexiones simultáneas al servidor proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7906">GP name: Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7907">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7907">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7908">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7908">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7909">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7909">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7910">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7910">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7911">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7911">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
