  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7912">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7912">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7913">Nombre del valor: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7913">Value Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7914">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7914">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7915">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7915">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000020
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7916">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7916">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7917">Nombre clave de la preferencia: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7917">Preference Key Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7918">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7918">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>32</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7919">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7919">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7920">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7920">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7921">Permitir que Google Cast se conecte para transmitir dispositivos en todas las direcciones IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7921">Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7922">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7922">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7923">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7923">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7924">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7924">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7925">Habilite esta directiva para permitir que Google Cast se conecte a los dispositivos Cast a través de todas las direcciones IP y no solo a través de las direcciones privadas RFC1918/RFC4193.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7925">Enable this policy to let Google Cast connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses, not just RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7926">Deshabilite esta directiva para restringir Google Cast a los dispositivos Cast en las direcciones privadas RFC1918/RFC4193.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7926">Disable this policy to restrict Google Cast to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7927">De no configurar esta directiva, Google Cast se conectará a los dispositivos de Cast en las direcciones privadas RFC1918/RFC4193 únicamente, a menos que habilite la característica CastAllowAllIPs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7927">If you don't configure this policy, Google Cast connects to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses only, unless you enable the CastAllowAllIPs feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7928">Si la Directiva [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) está deshabilitada, no se aplicará esta Directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7928">If the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy is disabled, then this policy has no effect.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7929">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7929">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7930">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7930">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7931">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7931">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7932">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7932">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7933">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7933">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7934">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7934">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7935">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7935">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7936">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7936">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7937">Nombre único de GP: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7937">GP unique name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7938">Nombre de GP: permitir que Google Cast se conecte a los dispositivos de Cast a través de todas las direcciones IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7938">GP name: Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7939">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7939">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7940">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7940">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7941">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7941">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7942">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7942">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7943">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7943">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7944">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7944">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7945">Nombre del valor: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7945">Value Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7946">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7946">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7947">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7947">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7948">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7948">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7949">Nombre clave de la preferencia: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7949">Preference Key Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7950">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7950">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7951">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7951">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7952">MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7952">MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7953">Habilitar el uso y los informes de datos relacionados con bloqueos (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7953">Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="31858-7954">En desuso: esta directiva está en desuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7954">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7955">Actualmente se admite pero quedará obsoleto en una versión futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7955">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
   
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7956">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7956">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7957">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7957">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7958">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7958">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-7959">Esta directiva está en desuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7959">This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7960">Actualmente, se admite pero quedará obsoleto en Microsoft Edge 89.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7960">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in Microsoft Edge 89.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7961">Esta directiva se reemplaza por la nueva directiva: [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata)para Windows 7, Windows 8 y macOS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7961">This policy is replaced by the new policy:  [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata)for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7962">Esta directiva se ha reemplazado por Permitir telemetría en Windows 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7962">This policy is replaced by Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7963">Esta directiva permite los informes de datos de uso y relacionados con bloqueos acerca de Microsoft Edge para Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7963">This policy enables reporting of usage and crash-related data about Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7964">Habilita esta directiva para enviar informes de datos de uso y relacionados con bloqueos a Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7964">Enable this policy to send reporting of usage and crash-related data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7965">Deshabilita esta directiva para no enviar los datos a Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7965">Disable this policy to not send the data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7966">En ambos casos, los usuarios no pueden cambiar ni invalidar la configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7966">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7967">En Windows 10, si no se configura esta directiva, Microsoft Edge se ajustará por defecto a la configuración de datos de diagnóstico de Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7967">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7968">Si habilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge solo podrá enviar datos de uso si la configuración de los datos de diagnóstico de Windows está establecida en Mejorado o Completo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7968">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will only send usage data if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Enhanced or Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7969">Si deshabilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge no enviará los datos de uso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7969">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will not send usage data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7970">Los datos relacionados con bloqueos se envían en función de la configuración de datos de diagnóstico de Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7970">Crash-related data is sent based on the Windows Diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7971">Obtenga más información acerca de la configuración de datos de diagnóstico de Windows en [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7971">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7972">En Windows 7, Windows 8 y macOS, esta directiva controla el envío de datos de uso y de bloqueos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7972">On Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS, this policy controls sending usage and crash-related data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7973">Si no configura esta directiva, Microsoft Edge se ajustará de forma predeterminada a las preferencias del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7973">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7974">Para habilitar esta directiva, debe establecer[SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) en habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7974">To enable this policy,[SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-7975">Si [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) o [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) no se configura o se deshabilita, estos datos no se enviarán a Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7975">If [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) or [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>
                                                                                                                                                                                

<span data-ttu-id="31858-7976">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory, en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos, o en las instancias de macOS administradas por MDM o unidas a un dominio por MCX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7976">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7977">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7977">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7978">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7978">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7979">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7979">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7980">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7980">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7981">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7981">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7982">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7982">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7983">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7983">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7984">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7984">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7985">Nombre único de GP: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7985">GP unique name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7986">Nombre de GP: habilitar el uso y los informes de datos relacionados con bloqueos (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7986">GP name: Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7987">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7987">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7988">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7988">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7989">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7989">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7990">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7990">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7991">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7991">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7992">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7992">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7993">Nombre del valor: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7993">Value Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7994">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7994">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7995">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7995">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-7996">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7996">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7997">Nombre clave de la preferencia: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7997">Preference Key Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-7998">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7998">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-7999">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-7999">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8000">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8000">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8001">Habilitar oclusión de ventana nativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8001">Enable Native Window Occlusion</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8002">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8002">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8003">En Windows desde la versión 84 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8003">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8004">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8004">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8005">Habilita la oclusión de ventana nativa en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8005">Enables native window occlusion in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8006">Si habilita esta configuración, para reducir el consumo de energía y de CPU, Microsoft Edge detectará cuando una ventana esté cubierta por otras ventanas, y suspenderá los píxeles de los trabajos de pintura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8006">If you enable this setting, to reduce CPU and power consumption Microsoft Edge will detect when a window is covered by other windows, and will suspend work painting pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8007">Si deshabilita esta configuración, Microsoft Edge no detectará cuando una ventana esté cubierta por otras ventanas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8007">If you disable this setting Microsoft Edge will not detect when a window is covered by other windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8008">Si no se establece esta directiva, se habilitará la detección de ventanas ocultas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8008">If this policy is left not set, window hiding detection will be enabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8009">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8009">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8010">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8010">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8011">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8011">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8012">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8012">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8013">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8013">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8014">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8014">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8015">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8015">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8016">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8016">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8017">Nombre único de GP: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8017">GP unique name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8018">Nombre GP: habilitar oclusión de ventana nativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8018">GP name: Enable Native Window Occlusion</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8019">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8019">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8020">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8020">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8021">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8021">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8022">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8022">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8023">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8023">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8024">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8024">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8025">Nombre del valor: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8025">Value Name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8026">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8026">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8027">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8027">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8028">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8028">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8029">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8029">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8030">Establecer un tiempo de espera de retardo en la navegación por la etiqueta de la lista de sitios de modo empresarial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8030">Set a timeout for delay of tab navigation for the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8031">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8031">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8032">En Windows desde la versión 84 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8032">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8033">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8033">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8034">Permite establecer un tiempo de espera, en segundos, en las pestañas de Microsoft Edge esperando para navegar hasta que el explorador Descargue la lista de sitios de modo empresarial inicial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8034">Allows you to set a timeout, in seconds, for Microsoft Edge tabs waiting to navigate until the browser has downloaded the initial Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8035">Esta configuración funciona conjuntamente con: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) establecida en "IEMode" y la directiva [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) donde la lista tiene al menos una entrada y [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload) se establece en "Todas las navegaciones aptas" (1).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8035">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry and [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload) is set to "All eligible navigations" (1).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8036">Las pestañas no se verán más largas que este tiempo de espera de la lista de sitios de modo empresarial para descargar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8036">Tabs will not wait longer than this timeout for the Enterprise Mode Site List to download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8037">Si el explorador no ha terminado de descargar la lista del sitio modo empresarial cuando se agote el tiempo de espera, las pestañas de Microsoft Edge seguirán navegando de todos modos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8037">If the browser has not finished downloading the Enterprise Mode Site List when the timeout expires, Microsoft Edge tabs will continue navigating anyway.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8038">El valor del tiempo de espera no debe ser mayor que 20 segundos y no puede ser menor que 1 segundo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8038">The value of the timeout should be no greater than 20 seconds and no fewer than 1 second.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8039">Si define el tiempo de espera en esta directiva en un valor mayor que el predeterminado de 2 segundos, se mostrará una barra de información al usuario después de 2 segundos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8039">If you set the timeout in this policy to a value greater than the default of 2 seconds, an information bar is shown to the user after 2 seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8040">La barra de información contiene un botón que permite que el usuario se deje esperando a que finalice la descarga de la lista de sitios en el modo de empresa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8040">The information bar contains a button that allows the user to quit waiting for the Enterprise Mode Site List download to complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8041">Si no configura esta Directiva, se usará el tiempo de espera predeterminado de 2 segundos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8041">If you don't configure this policy, the default timeout of 2 seconds is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8042">Este valor predeterminado está sujeto a cambios en el futuro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8042">This default is subject to change in the future.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8043">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8043">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8044">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8044">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8045">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8045">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8046">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8046">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8047">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8047">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8048">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8048">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8049">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8049">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8050">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8050">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8051">Nombre único de GP: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8051">GP unique name: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8052">Nombre de la Directiva de Grupo: establecer un tiempo de espera para retrasar la navegación por la ficha de la lista de sitios de modo empresarial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8052">GP name: Set a timeout for delay of tab navigation for the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8053">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8053">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8054">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8054">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8055">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8055">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8056">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8056">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8057">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8057">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8058">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8058">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8059">Nombre del valor: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8059">Value Name: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8060">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8060">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8061">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8061">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x0000000a
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8062">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8062">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8063">NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8063">NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8064">Habilitar predicción de red</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8064">Enable network prediction</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8065">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8065">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8066">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8066">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8067">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8067">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8068">Permite la predicción de red y evita que los usuarios cambien esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8068">Enables network prediction and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8069">Esto controla la captura previa del DNS, la preconexión del TCP y el SSL, y la representación previa de las páginas web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8069">This controls DNS prefetching, TCP and SSL preconnection, and prerendering of web pages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8070">Si no configura esta directiva, la predicción de red estará habilitada, pero el usuario podrá cambiarla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8070">If you don't configure this policy, network prediction is enabled but the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8071">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8071">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-8072">NetworkPredictionAlways (0) = predecir las acciones de red en cualquiera de sus conexiones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8072">NetworkPredictionAlways (0) = Predict network actions on any network connection</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-8073">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = no compatible. Si se usa este valor, se tratará como si se hubiera definido en "Predecir las acciones de red en cualquiera de sus conexiones" (0).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8073">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = Not supported, if this value is used it will be treated as if 'Predict network actions on any network connection' (0) was set</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-8074">NetworkPredictionNever (2) = no predecir las acciones de red en cualquiera de sus conexiones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8074">NetworkPredictionNever (2) = Don't predict network actions on any network connection</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8075">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8075">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8076">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8076">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8077">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8077">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8078">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8078">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8079">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8079">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8080">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8080">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8081">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8081">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8082">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8082">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8083">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8083">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8084">Nombre único de GP: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8084">GP unique name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8085">Nombre de GP: habilitar la predicción de red</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8085">GP name: Enable network prediction</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8086">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8086">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8087">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8087">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8088">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8088">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8089">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8089">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8090">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8090">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8091">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8091">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8092">Nombre del valor: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8092">Value Name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8093">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8093">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8094">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8094">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8095">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8095">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8096">Nombre clave de la preferencia: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8096">Preference Key Name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8097">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8097">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8098">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8098">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8099">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8099">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8100">Configurar si un usuario siempre tiene un perfil predeterminado que inicia sesión automáticamente con su cuenta profesional o educativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8100">Configure whether a user always has a default profile automatically signed in with their work or school account</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8101">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8101">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8102">En Windows desde la versión 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8102">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8103">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8103">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8104">Esta directiva determina si un usuario puede quitar el perfil de Microsoft Edge que ha iniciado sesión automáticamente con la cuenta profesional o educativa de un usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8104">This policy determines if a user can remove the Microsoft Edge profile automatically signed in with a user's work or school account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8105">Si habilita esta directiva, se creará un perfil que no se pueda quitar con la cuenta profesional o escolar del usuario en Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8105">If you enable this policy, a non-removable profile will be created with the user's work or school account on Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8106">No se podrá quitar este perfil o iniciar sesión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8106">This profile can't be signed out or removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8107">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, el perfil con el que se ha iniciado sesión automáticamente, ya sea con la cuenta profesional o educativa de un usuario en Windows, no podrá cerrar sesión ni ser quitado por el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8107">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the profile automatically signed in with a user's work or school account on Windows can be signed out or removed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8108">Si desea configurar el inicio de sesión del explorador, utilice la directiva [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8108">If you want to configure browser sign in, use the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8109">Esta directiva solo está disponible en las instancias de Windows que están unidas a un dominio de Microsoft Active Directory o en las instancias de Windows 10 Pro o Enterprise que están inscritas para la administración de dispositivos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8109">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8110">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8110">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8111">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8111">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8112">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8112">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8113">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8113">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8114">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8114">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8115">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8115">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8116">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8116">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8117">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8117">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8118">Nombre único de GP: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8118">GP unique name: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8119">Nombre de GP: configurar qué usuario tiene un perfil predeterminado para iniciar sesión automáticamente con su cuenta profesional o educativa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8119">GP name: Configure whether a user always has a default profile automatically signed in with their work or school account</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8120">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8120">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8121">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8121">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8122">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8122">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8123">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8123">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8124">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8124">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8125">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8125">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8126">Nombre del valor: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8126">Value Name: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8127">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8127">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8128">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8128">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  


 
   
 

   
  

   

   

  
 
  
 

  
   

   
  
   
   
  
   
 
   
   
   
  
 
 
   
 
   


  
  
   
 
 
   
  

 
  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8129">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8129">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8130">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8130">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8131">Controlar el lugar en el que se aplican restricciones de seguridad para orígenes inseguros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8131">Control where security restrictions on insecure origins apply</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8132">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8132">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8133">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8133">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8134">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8134">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8135">Especifica una lista de orígenes (direcciones URL) o patrones de nombres de host (como "\*.contoso.com") en los que no se aplican las restricciones de seguridad para orígenes inseguros.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8135">Specifies a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns (like "\*.contoso.com") for which security restrictions on insecure origins don't apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8136">Con esta directiva se pueden especificar los orígenes permitidos para aplicaciones heredadas que no puedan implementar TLS o configurar un servidor de ensayo para el desarrollo interno de la web, de modo que los desarrolladores puedan probar las características que requieran de contextos seguros sin tener que desplegar TLS en el servidor de ensayo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8136">This policy lets you specify allowed origins for legacy applications that can't deploy TLS or set up a staging server for internal web development so that developers can test out features requiring secure contexts without having to deploy TLS on the staging server.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8137">Esta directiva también evita que el origen sea etiquetado como "no seguro" en el omnibox.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8137">This policy also prevents the origin from being labeled "Not Secure" in the omnibox.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8138">Establecer una lista de direcciones URL en esta directiva tiene el mismo efecto que establecer el indicador de la línea de comandos "--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure" en una lista separada por comas en las mismas direcciones URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8138">Setting a list of URLs in this policy has the same effect as setting the command-line flag '--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure' to a comma-separated list of the same URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8139">Al habilitar esta directiva, se anula el marcador de la línea de comandos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8139">If you enable this policy, it overrides the command-line flag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8140">Para obtener más información sobre contextos seguros, vea https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8140">For more information on secure contexts, see https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8141">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8141">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8142">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8142">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8143">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8143">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8144">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8144">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8145">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8145">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8146">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8146">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8147">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8147">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8148">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8148">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8149">Nombre único de GP: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8149">GP unique name: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8150">Nombre de GP: controlar el lugar donde se aplican las restricciones de seguridad para orígenes inseguros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8150">GP name: Control where security restrictions on insecure origins apply</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8151">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8151">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8152">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8152">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8153">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8153">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8154">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8154">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8155">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8155">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8156">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8156">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8157">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8157">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8158">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8158">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8159">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8159">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\1 = http://testserver.contoso.com/
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\2 = *.contoso.com

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8160">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8160">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8161">Nombre clave de la preferencia: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8161">Preference Key Name: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8162">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8162">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>http://testserver.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>*.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8163">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8163">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8164">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8164">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8165">Permita que los sitios web consulten los métodos de pago disponibles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8165">Allow websites to query for available payment methods</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8166">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8166">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8167">En Windows y MacOS desde 80 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8167">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8168">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8168">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8169">Permite establecer si los sitios web podrán comprobar si el usuario tiene métodos de pago guardados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8169">Allows you to set whether websites can check if the user has payment methods saved.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8170">Si deshabilita esta directiva, se le informará a los sitios web que utilicen las API PaymentRequest.canMakePayment o PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument que no hay ningún método de pago disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8170">If you disable this policy, websites that use PaymentRequest.canMakePayment or PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument API will be informed that no payment methods are available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8171">Si habilita o no establece esta directiva, los sitios web podrán comprobar si el usuario tiene métodos de pago guardados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8171">If you enable this policy or don't set this policy, websites can check if the user has payment methods saved.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8172">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8172">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8173">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8173">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8174">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8174">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8175">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8175">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8176">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8176">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8177">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8177">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8178">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8178">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8179">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8179">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8180">Nombre único de GP: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8180">GP unique name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8181">Nombre de GP: permitir que los sitios web consulten los métodos de pago disponibles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8181">GP name: Allow websites to query for available payment methods</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8182">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8182">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8183">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8183">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8184">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8184">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8185">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8185">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8186">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8186">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8187">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8187">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8188">Nombre del valor: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8188">Value Name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8189">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8189">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8190">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8190">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8191">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8191">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8192">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8192">Preference Key Name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8193">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8193">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8194">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8194">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8195">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8195">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8196">Permita la personalización de anuncios, búsquedas y noticias enviando el historial de exploración a Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8196">Allow personalization of ads, search and news by sending browsing history to Microsoft</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8197">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8197">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8198">En Windows y MacOS desde 80 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8198">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8199">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8199">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8200">Esta directiva impide que Microsoft recopile el historial de exploración de un usuario de Microsoft Edge para utilizarlo en la personalización de la publicidad, búsquedas, noticias y otros servicios Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8200">This policy prevents Microsoft from collecting a user's Microsoft Edge browsing history to be used for personalizing advertising, search, news and other Microsoft services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8201">Esta opción solo está disponible para los usuarios con una cuenta de Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8201">This setting is only available for users with a Microsoft account.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8202">Esta opción no está disponible para las cuentas de menores o de empresa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8202">This setting is not available for child accounts or enterprise accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8203">Si deshabilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán cambiar ni reemplazar esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8203">If you disable this policy, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8204">Si esta directiva está habilitada o no ha sido configurada, Microsoft Edge se establecerá de forma predeterminada en la preferencia del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8204">If this policy is enabled or not configured, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8205">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8205">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8206">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8206">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8207">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8207">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8208">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8208">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8209">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8209">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8210">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8210">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8211">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8211">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8212">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8212">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8213">Nombre único de GP: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8213">GP unique name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8214">Nombre de GP: permitir la personalización de anuncios, búsquedas y noticias al enviar el historial de exploración a Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8214">GP name: Allow personalization of ads, search and news by sending browsing history to Microsoft</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8215">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8215">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8216">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8216">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8217">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8217">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8218">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8218">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8219">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8219">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8220">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8220">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8221">Nombre del valor: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8221">Value Name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8222">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8222">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8223">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8223">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8224">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8224">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8225">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8225">Preference Key Name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8226">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8226">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8227">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8227">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8228">PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8228">PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8229">Permita anclar al Asistente para tareas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8229">Allow Pin to taskbar wizard</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8230">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8230">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8231">En Windows desde la versión 80 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8231">On Windows since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8232">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8232">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8233">Microsoft Edge usa el asistente Anclar a la barra de tareas para ayudar a los usuarios a anclar los sitios sugeridos a la barra de tareas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8233">Microsoft Edge uses the Pin to taskbar wizard to help users pin suggested sites to the taskbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8234">La característica anclar a la barra de tareas está habilitada de forma predeterminada y el usuario podrá acceder a la misma desde el menú Configuración y más.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8234">The Pin to taskbar wizard feature is enabled by default and accessible to the user through the Settings and more menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8235">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, los usuarios podrán llamar al asistente Anclar a la barra de tareas desde el menú Configuración y Más.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8235">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can call the Pin to taskbar wizard from the Settings and More menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8236">También se puede llamar al asistente a través del inicio de un protocolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8236">The wizard can also be called via a protocol launch.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8237">Si deshabilita esta directiva, el asistente para anclar a la barra de tareas se deshabilitará del menú y no podrá ser llamado a través del inicio de un protocolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8237">If you disable this policy, the Pin to taskbar wizard is disabled in the menu and cannot be called via a protocol launch.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8238">Las opciones de configuración del usuario para habilitar o deshabilitar el asistente para anclar a la barra de tareas no están disponibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8238">User settings to enable or disable the Pin to taskbar wizard aren't available.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8239">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8239">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8240">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8240">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8241">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8241">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8242">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8242">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8243">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8243">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8244">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8244">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8245">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8245">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8246">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8246">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8247">Nombre único de GP: PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8247">GP unique name: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8248">Nombre de GP: permitir el anclaje del asistente a la barra de tareas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8248">GP name: Allow Pin to taskbar wizard</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8249">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8249">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8250">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8250">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8251">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8251">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8252">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8252">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8253">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8253">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8254">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8254">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8255">Nombre del valor: PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8255">Value Name: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8256">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8256">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8257">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8257">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8258">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8258">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8259">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8259">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8260">Permitir la autenticación proactiva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8260">Enable Proactive Authentication</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8261">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8261">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8262">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8262">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8263">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8263">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8264">Le permite configurar si debe habilitar o no la autenticación proactiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8264">Lets you configure whether to turn on Proactive Authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8265">Si habilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge intentará autenticar con el modo proactivo al usuario que haya iniciado sesión con los servicios Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8265">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to proactively authenticate the signed-in user with Microsoft services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8266">Microsoft Edge comprueba con regularidad la actualización del manifiesto que contiene la configuración que rige la ejecución de este proceso en un servicio en línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8266">At regular intervals, Microsoft Edge checks with an online service for an updated manifest that contains the configuration that governs how to do this.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8267">Si deshabilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge no intentará autenticar con el modo proactivo al usuario que haya iniciado sesión con los servicios Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8267">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge doesn't try to proactively authenticate the signed-in user with Microsoft services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8268">Microsoft Edge dejará de comprobar con regularidad la actualización del manifiesto que contiene la configuración que rige la ejecución de este proceso en un servicio en línea.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8268">Microsoft Edge no longer checks with an online service for an updated manifest that contains the configuration for doing this.</span></span>
