<span data-ttu-id="31858-8269">Si no configura esta directiva, se habilitará la autenticación proactiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8269">If you don't configure this policy, Proactive Authentication is turned on.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8270">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8270">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8271">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8271">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8272">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8272">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8273">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8273">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8274">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8274">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8275">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8275">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8276">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8276">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8277">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8277">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8278">Nombre único de GP: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8278">GP unique name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8279">Nombre de GP: permitir la autenticación proactiva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8279">GP name: Enable Proactive Authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8280">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8280">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8281">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8281">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8282">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8282">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8283">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8283">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8284">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8284">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8285">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8285">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8286">Nombre del valor: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8286">Value Name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8287">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8287">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8288">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8288">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8289">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8289">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8290">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8290">Preference Key Name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8291">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8291">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8292">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8292">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8293">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8293">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8294">Habilitar contenido promocional de pestañas completas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8294">Enable full-tab promotional content</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8295">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8295">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8296">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8296">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8297">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8297">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8298">Controla la presentación del contenido de promoción o educación en la pestaña completa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8298">Control the presentation of full-tab promotional or educational content.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8299">Esta configuración controla la presentación de las páginas de bienvenida que ayudan a los usuarios a iniciar sesión en Microsoft Edge, a elegir su explorador predeterminado o a conocer las características del producto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8299">This setting controls the presentation of welcome pages that help users sign into Microsoft Edge, choose their default browser, or learn about product features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8300">Si habilita esta directiva (establecida como verdadera) o no la configura, Microsoft Edge podrá mostrar el contenido de las pestañas completas a los usuarios para proporcionarles información sobre el producto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8300">If you enable this policy (set it true) or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge can show full-tab content to users to provide product information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8301">Si deshabilita (establecido como falso) esta directiva, Microsoft Edge no podrá mostrar a los usuarios el contenido de las pestañas completas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8301">If you disable (set to false) this policy, Microsoft Edge can't show full-tab content to users.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8302">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8302">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8303">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8303">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8304">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8304">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8305">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8305">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8306">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8306">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8307">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8307">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8308">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8308">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8309">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8309">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8310">Nombre único de GP: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8310">GP unique name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8311">Nombre de GP: habilitar el contenido promocional de la pestaña completa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8311">GP name: Enable full-tab promotional content</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8312">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8312">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8313">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8313">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8314">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8314">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8315">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8315">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8316">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8316">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8317">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8317">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8318">Nombre del valor: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8318">Value Name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8319">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8319">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8320">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8320">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8321">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8321">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8322">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8322">Preference Key Name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8323">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8323">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8325">PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8325">PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8326">Pregunte dónde guardar los archivos descargados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8326">Ask where to save downloaded files</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8327">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8327">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8328">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8328">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8329">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8329">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8330">Establece la opción de preguntar dónde guardar un archivo antes de descargarlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8330">Set whether to ask where to save a file before downloading it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8331">Si habilita esta directiva, se le preguntará al usuario dónde guardar cada archivo antes de descargarlo; si no la configura, los archivos se guardarán automáticamente en la ubicación predeterminada, sin preguntarle al usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8331">If you enable this policy, the user is asked where to save each file before downloading; if you don't configure it, files are saved automatically to the default location, without asking the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8332">Si no configura esta directiva, el usuario podrá cambiar su configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8332">If you don't configure this policy, the user will be able to change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8333">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8333">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8334">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8334">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8335">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8335">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8336">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8336">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8337">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8337">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8338">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8338">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8339">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8339">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8340">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8340">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8341">Nombre único de GP: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8341">GP unique name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8342">Nombre de GP: Preguntar dónde guardar los archivos descargados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8342">GP name: Ask where to save downloaded files</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8343">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8343">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8344">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8344">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8345">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8345">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8346">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8346">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8347">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8347">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8348">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8348">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8349">Nombre del valor: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8349">Value Name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8350">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8350">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8351">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8351">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8352">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8352">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8353">Nombre clave de la preferencia: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8353">Preference Key Name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8354">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8354">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8356">QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8356">QuicAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8357">Permitir protocolo QUIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8357">Allow QUIC protocol</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8358">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8358">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8359">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8359">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8360">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8360">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8361">Permite el uso del protocolo QUIC en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8361">Allows use of the QUIC protocol in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8362">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, se permitirá el protocolo QUIC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8362">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the QUIC protocol is allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8363">Si deshabilita esta directiva, se bloqueará el protocolo QUIC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8363">If you disable this policy, the QUIC protocol is blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8364">QUIC es un protocolo red de la capa de transporte que puede mejorar el rendimiento de las aplicaciones web que usan actualmente el TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8364">QUIC is a transport layer network protocol that can improve performance of web applications that currently use TCP.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8365">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8365">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8366">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8366">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8367">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8367">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8368">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8368">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8369">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8369">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8370">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8370">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8371">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8371">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8372">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8372">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8373">Nombre único de GP: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8373">GP unique name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8374">Nombre de GP: permitir el protocolo QUIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8374">GP name: Allow QUIC protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8375">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8375">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8376">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8376">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8377">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8377">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8378">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8378">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8379">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8379">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8380">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8380">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8381">Nombre del valor: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8381">Value Name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8382">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8382">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8383">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8383">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8384">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8384">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8385">Nombre clave de la preferencia: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8385">Preference Key Name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8386">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8386">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8387">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8387">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8388">RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8388">RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8389">Notifique a un usuario que es recomendable reiniciar el explorador, o es necesario para actualizaciones pendientes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8389">Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8390">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8390">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8391">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8391">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8392">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8392">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8393">Notifica a los usuarios que deben reiniciar Microsoft Edge para aplicar una actualización pendiente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8393">Notify users that they need to restart Microsoft Edge to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8394">Si no configura esta directiva, Microsoft Edge agregará un icono de reciclaje en la parte superior derecha de la barra de menús, para pedir a los usuarios que reinicien el explorador para aplicar la actualización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8394">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge adds a recycle icon at the far right of the top menu bar to prompt users to restart the browser to apply the update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8395">Si habilita esta directiva y la establece como "Recomendada" (1), una advertencia recurrente indicará a los usuarios una recomendación de reinicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8395">If you enable this policy and set it to 'Recommended', a recurring warning prompts users that a restart is recommended.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8396">Los usuarios pueden ignorar esta advertencia y posponer el reinicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8396">Users can dismiss this warning and defer the restart.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8397">Si se establece la directiva como "Requerida", una advertencia recurrente indicará a los usuarios que el navegador se reiniciará automáticamente tan pronto como transcurra un período de notificación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8397">If you set the policy to 'Required', a recurring warning prompts users that the browser will be restarted automatically as soon as a notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8398">El período predeterminado es de siete días.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8398">The default period is seven days.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8399">Puede configurar este período con la directiva [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8399">You can configure this period with the [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8400">La sesión del usuario se restaurará al reiniciar el explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8400">The user's session is restored when the browser restarts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8401">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8401">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-8402">Recomendada (1) = recomendada: mostrar un aviso recurrente al usuario en el que se recomienda realizar un reinicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8402">Recommended (1) = Recommended - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is recommended</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-8403">Requerida (2) = requerida: mostrar un aviso recurrente al usuario para indicar que es necesario reiniciar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8403">Required (2) = Required - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is required</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8404">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8404">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8405">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8405">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8406">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8406">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8407">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8407">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8408">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8408">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8409">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8409">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8410">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8410">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8411">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8411">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8412">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8412">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8413">Nombre único de GP: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8413">GP unique name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8414">Nombre de GP: notificar al usuario que se recomienda o se requiere el reinicio del navegador para realizar las actualizaciones pendientes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8414">GP name: Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8415">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8415">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8416">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8416">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8417">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8417">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8418">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8418">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8419">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8419">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8420">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8420">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8421">Nombre del valor: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8421">Value Name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8422">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8422">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8423">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8423">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8424">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8424">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8425">Nombre clave de la preferencia: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8425">Preference Key Name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8426">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8426">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8427">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8427">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8428">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8428">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8429">Establezca el período de tiempo de las notificaciones de actualización</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8429">Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8430">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8430">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8431">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8431">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8432">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8432">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8433">Permite establecer el período de tiempo, en milisegundos, en el que se notifica a los usuarios que Microsoft Edge debe ser relanzado para aplicar una actualización pendiente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8433">Allows you to set the time period, in milliseconds, over which users are notified that Microsoft Edge must be relaunched to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8434">Durante este período de tiempo, se le informará repetidamente al usuario sobre la necesidad de una actualización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8434">Over this time period, the user will be repeatedly informed of the need for an update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8435">En el caso de Microsoft Edge, el menú de la aplicación cambia para indicar que es necesario realizar un reinicio cuando se supera un tercio del período de notificación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8435">In Microsoft Edge the app menu changes to indicate that a relaunch is needed once one third of the notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8436">Esta notificación cambia de color una vez que se supera el período de notificación, y vuelve a ocurrir después de que transcurre el período de notificación completo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8436">This notification changes color once two thirds of the notification period passes, and again once the full notification period has passed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8437">Las notificaciones adicionales habilitadas por la directiva [RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) siguen la misma programación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8437">The additional notifications enabled by the [RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) policy follow this same schedule.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8438">Si no se establece, se usa el período predeterminado de 604,8 millones de milisegundos (una semana).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8438">If not set, the default period of 604800000 milliseconds (one week) is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8439">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8439">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8440">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8440">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8441">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8441">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8442">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8442">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8443">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8443">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8444">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8444">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8445">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8445">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8446">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8446">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8447">Nombre único de GP: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8447">GP unique name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8448">Nombre de GP: establecer el período de tiempo de las notificaciones de actualización</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8448">GP name: Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8449">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8449">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8450">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8450">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8451">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8451">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8452">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8452">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8453">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8453">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8454">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8454">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8455">Nombre del valor: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8455">Value Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8456">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8456">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8457">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8457">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x240c8400
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8458">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8458">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8459">Nombre clave de la preferencia: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8459">Preference Key Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8460">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8460">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>604800000</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8461">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8461">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8462">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8462">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8463">Habilitar integridad de código de representador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8463">Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8464">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8464">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8465">En Windows desde la versión 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8465">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8466">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8466">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8467">Si esta directiva está habilitada o sin establecer, entonces la integridad del código de presentación estará habilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8467">If this policy is enabled or left unset, then Renderer Code Integrity is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8468">Esta directiva sólo debe desactivarse si se produce algún problema de compatibilidad con un software de terceros que deba ejecutarse dentro de los procesos de representación de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8468">This policy should only be disabled if compatibility issues are encountered with third party software that must run inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8469">Si se deshabilita esta directiva, la seguridad y la estabilidad de Microsoft Edge se verán perjudicadas, ya que se permitirá que se cargue código desconocido y potencialmente hostil en los procesos de representación de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8469">Disabling this policy has a detrimental effect on Microsoft Edge's security and stability because unknown and potentially hostile code will be allowed to load inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8470">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8470">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8471">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8471">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8472">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8472">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8473">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8473">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8474">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8474">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8475">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8475">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8476">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8476">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8477">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8477">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8478">Nombre único de GP: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8478">GP unique name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8479">Nombre de GP: habilitar la integridad de código del representador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8479">GP name: Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8480">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8480">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8481">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8481">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8482">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8482">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8483">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8483">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8484">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8484">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8485">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8485">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8486">Nombre del valor: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8486">Value Name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8487">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8487">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8488">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8488">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8489">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8489">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8490">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8490">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8491">Especifique si se necesitan comprobaciones OCSP/CRL en línea para los anclajes de veracidad local</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8491">Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8492">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8492">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8493">En Windows desde la versión 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8493">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8494">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8494">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8495">Controla la solicitud de las comprobaciones de revocación en línea (comprobaciones OCSP/CRL).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8495">Control whether online revocation checks (OCSP/CRL checks) are required.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8496">Si Microsoft Edge no puede obtener información sobre el estado de la revocación, estos certificados se considerarán revocados ("error no recuperable").</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8496">If Microsoft Edge can't get revocation status information, these certificates are treated as revoked ("hard-fail").</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8497">Si habilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge siempre realizará una comprobación de la revocación de los certificados del servidor que se hayan validado correctamente y estén firmados por certificados de CA instalados de forma local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8497">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge always performs revocation checking for server certificates that successfully validate and are signed by locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8498">Si no configura o deshabilita esta directiva, entonces Microsoft Edge usará la configuración de comprobación de revocación en línea existente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8498">If you don't configure or disable this policy, then Microsoft Edge uses the existing online revocation checking settings.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8499">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8499">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8500">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8500">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8501">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8501">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8502">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8502">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8503">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8503">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8504">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8504">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8505">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8505">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8506">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8506">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8507">Nombre único de GP: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8507">GP unique name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8508">Nombre de GP: especificar si se requieren comprobaciones OCSP/CRL en línea para los anclajes de veracidad locales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8508">GP name: Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8509">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8509">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8510">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8510">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8511">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8511">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8512">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8512">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8513">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8513">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8514">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8514">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8515">Nombre del valor: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8515">Value Name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8516">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8516">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8517">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8517">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8518">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8518">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8519">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8519">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8520">Habilite la resolución de errores de navegación con un servicio Web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8520">Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8521">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8521">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8522">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8522">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8523">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8523">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8524">Permite que Microsoft Edge emita una conexión sin datos a un servicio web para sondear las redes en busca de conectividad que se encuentra en lugares como hoteles y aeropuertos con Wi-Fi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8524">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a dataless connection to a web service to probe networks for connectivity in cases like hotel and airport Wi-Fi.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8525">Si habilita esta directiva, se utilizará un servicio web para las pruebas de conectividad de la red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8525">If you enable this policy, a web service is used for network connectivity tests.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8526">Si desactiva esta directiva, Microsoft Edge usará las API nativas para intentar resolver los problemas de navegación y conectividad de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8526">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses native APIs to try to resolve network connectivity and navigation issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8527">**Nota**: A excepción de Windows 8 y las versiones posteriores de Windows, Microsoft Edge *siempre* usará las API nativas para resolver los problemas de conectividad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8527">**Note**: Except on Windows 8 and later versions of Windows, Microsoft Edge *always* uses native APIs to resolve connectivity issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8528">Si no configura esta directiva, Microsoft Edge respetará la preferencia de usuario establecida en Servicios en Edge://configuración/privacidad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8528">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-8529">Específicamente, hay un botón de alternancia **Usar un servicio web para ayudar a resolver errores de navegación**, que el usuario puede activar o desactivar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8529">Specifically, there's a **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8530">Tenga en cuenta que si ha habilitado esta directiva (ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService), la opción **Usar un servicio web para ayudar a resolver los errores de navegación** estará activada, pero el usuario no podrá cambiar la opción con el botón de alternancia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8530">Be aware that if you have enabled this policy (ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService), the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8531">Si ha deshabilitado esta directiva, la configuración **Usar un servicio web para ayudar a resolver los errores de navegación** se desactivará y el usuario no podrá cambiar la configuración con el botón de alternancia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8531">If you have disabled this policy, the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8532">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8532">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8533">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8533">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8534">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8534">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8535">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8535">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8536">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8536">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8537">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8537">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8538">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8538">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8539">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8539">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8540">Nombre único de GP: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8540">GP unique name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8541">Nombre de GP: habilitar la resolución de errores de navegación con un servicio Web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8541">GP name: Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8542">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8542">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8543">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8543">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8544">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8544">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8545">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8545">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8546">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8546">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8547">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8547">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8548">Nombre del valor: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8548">Value Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8549">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8549">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8550">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8550">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8551">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8551">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8552">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8552">Preference Key Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8553">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8553">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8554">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8554">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8555">RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8555">RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8556">Restrinja las cuentas que se pueden usar como cuentas de Microsoft Edge principal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8556">Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8557">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8557">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8558">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8558">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8559">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8559">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8560">Determina qué cuentas pueden establecerse como cuentas primarias del explorador en Microsoft Edge (es decir, la cuenta que se elige durante el flujo de confirmación de la sincronización).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8560">Determines which accounts can be set as browser primary accounts in Microsoft Edge (the account that is chosen during the Sync opt-in flow).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8561">Si un usuario intenta configurar una cuenta principal para el explorador con un nombre de usuario que no coincida con este patrón, se bloqueará y verá el mensaje de error correspondiente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8561">If a user tries to configure a browser primary account with a username that doesn't match this pattern, they are blocked and will get the appropriate error message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8562">Puede configurar esta directiva para que coincida con varias cuentas mediante una expresión regular de estilo Perl para el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8562">You can configure this policy to match multiple accounts using a Perl style regular expression for the pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8563">Tenga en cuenta que las coincidencias de patrón distinguen mayúsculas de minúsculas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8563">Note that pattern matches are case sensitive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8564">Para obtener más información sobre las reglas de expresión regular que se usan, consulte https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8564">For more information about the regular expression rules that are used, refer to https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8565">Si no se configura esta directiva o la deja en blanco, los usuarios podrán configurar cualquier cuenta como la cuenta principal del explorador en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8565">If you don't configure this policy or leave it blank, users can set any account as a browser primary account in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8566">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8566">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8567">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8567">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8568">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8568">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8569">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8569">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8570">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8570">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8571">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8571">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8572">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8572">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8573">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8573">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8574">Nombre único de GP: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8574">GP unique name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8575">Nombre de GP: restringir qué cuentas pueden ser usadas como cuentas principales de Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8575">GP name: Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8576">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8576">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8577">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8577">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8578">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8578">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8579">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8579">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8580">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8580">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8581">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8581">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8582">Nombre del valor: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8582">Value Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8583">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8583">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8584">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8584">Example value:</span></span>
```
.*@contoso.com
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8585">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8585">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8586">Nombre clave de la preferencia: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8586">Preference Key Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8587">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8587">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>.*@contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8588">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8588">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8589">RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8589">RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8590">Configurar el directorio de perfiles móviles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8590">Set the roaming profile directory</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8591">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8591">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8592">En Windows desde la versión 85 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8592">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8593">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8593">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8594">Configura el directorio que se usará para almacenar la copia de perfiles móviles de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8594">Configures the directory to use to store the roaming copy of profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8595">Si habilita esta Directiva, Microsoft Edge usa el directorio proporcionado para almacenar una copia de los perfiles en itinerancia, siempre y cuando haya habilitado también la Directiva [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8595">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory to store a roaming copy of the profiles, as long as you've also enabled the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8596">Si deshabilita la Directiva de [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) o no la configura, el valor almacenado en esta Directiva no se usa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8596">If you disable the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy or don't configure it, the value stored in this policy isn't used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8597">Para obtener una lista de las variables que puede usar, vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8597">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables you can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8598">Si no configura esta Directiva, se usará la ruta de acceso del perfil móvil predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8598">If you don't configure this policy, the default roaming profile path is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8599">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8599">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8600">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8600">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8601">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8601">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8602">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8602">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8603">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8603">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8604">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8604">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8605">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8605">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8606">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8606">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8607">Nombre único de GP: RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8607">GP unique name: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8608">Nombre de la Directiva de Grupo: establecer el directorio del perfil móvil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8608">GP name: Set the roaming profile directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8609">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8609">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8610">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8610">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8611">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8611">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8612">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8612">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8613">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8613">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8614">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8614">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8615">Nombre del valor: RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8615">Value Name: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8616">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8616">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8617">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8617">Example value:</span></span>
```
${roaming_app_data}\edge-profile
```


           
              
      
    
             
   
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8618">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8618">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8619">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8619">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8620">Permitir el uso de copias móviles para datos de Perfil de Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8620">Enable using roaming copies for Microsoft Edge profile data</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8621">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8621">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8622">En Windows desde la versión 85 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8622">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8623">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8623">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8624">Habilite esta directiva para usar perfiles móviles en Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8624">Enable this policy to use roaming profiles on Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8625">La configuración almacenada en perfiles de Microsoft Edge (favoritos y preferencias) también se guarda en un archivo almacenado en la carpeta de Perfil de usuario móvil (o en la ubicación especificada por el administrador mediante la Directiva de [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8625">The settings stored in Microsoft Edge profiles (favorites and preferences) are also saved to a file stored in the Roaming user profile folder (or the location specified by the administrator through the [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation) policy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8626">Si deshabilita esta Directiva o no la configura, solo se usarán los perfiles locales habituales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8626">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, only the regular local profiles are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8627">La Directiva [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) deshabilita toda la sincronización de datos y suplanta la Directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8627">The [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy disables all data synchronization, overriding policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8628">Consulte https://docs.microsoft.com/windows-server/storage/folder-redirection/deploy-roaming-user-profiles para obtener más información sobre el uso de perfiles de usuario móviles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8628">See https://docs.microsoft.com/windows-server/storage/folder-redirection/deploy-roaming-user-profiles for more information on using roaming user profiles.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8629">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8629">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8630">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8630">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8631">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8631">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8632">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8632">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8633">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8633">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8634">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8634">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8635">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8635">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8636">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8636">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8637">Nombre único de GP: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8637">GP unique name: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8638">Nombre GP: habilitar el uso de copias móviles para datos de Perfil de Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8638">GP name: Enable using roaming copies for Microsoft Edge profile data</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8639">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8639">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8640">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8640">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8641">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8641">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8642">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8642">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8643">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8643">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8644">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8644">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8645">Nombre del valor: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8645">Value Name: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
