  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8646">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8646">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8647">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8647">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


           
              
      
    
    
   
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8648">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8648">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8649">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8649">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8650">Extienda la configuración de contenido de Adobe Flash a todo el contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8650">Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8651">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8651">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8652">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8652">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8653">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8653">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8654">Si habilita esta directiva, se ejecutará todo el contenido de Adobe Flash incrustado en los sitios web que estén configurados para permitir Adobe Flash en la configuración del contenido, ya sea por el usuario o por la directiva de la empresa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8654">If you enable this policy, all Adobe Flash content embedded in websites that are set to allow Adobe Flash in the content settings -- either by the user or by enterprise policy -- will run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8655">Esto incluye el contenido reducido o de otros orígenes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8655">This includes content from other origins and/or small content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8656">Para controlar qué sitios web están autorizados para ejecutar Adobe Flash, vea las especificaciones en las directivas [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting), [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) y [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8656">To control which websites are allowed to run Adobe Flash, see the specifications in the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting), [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls), and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8657">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, es posible que el contenido de Adobe Flash, de otros orígenes (de sitios que no se especifican en las tres directivas mencionadas anteriormente) o el contenido reducido sea bloqueado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8657">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Adobe Flash content from other origins (from sites that aren't specified in the three policies mentioned immediately above) or small content might be blocked.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8658">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8658">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8659">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8659">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8660">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8660">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8661">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8661">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8662">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8662">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8663">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8663">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8664">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8664">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8665">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8665">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8666">Nombre único de GP: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8666">GP unique name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8667">Nombre de GP: extender la configuración de contenido de Adobe Flash a todo el contenido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8667">GP name: Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8668">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8668">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8669">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8669">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8670">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8670">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8671">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8671">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8672">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8672">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8673">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8673">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8674">Nombre del valor: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8674">Value Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8675">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8675">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8676">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8676">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8677">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8677">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8678">Nombre clave de la preferencia: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8678">Preference Key Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8679">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8679">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8680">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8680">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8681">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8681">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8682">Permita que los usuarios continúen desde la página de advertencia HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8682">Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8683">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8683">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8684">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8684">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8685">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8685">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8686">Microsoft Edge muestra una página de advertencia cuando los usuarios visitan sitios con errores de SSL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8686">Microsoft Edge shows a warning page when users visit sites that have SSL errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8687">Si habilita o no configura (por defecto) esta directiva, los usuarios podrán hacer clic en estas páginas de advertencia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8687">If you enable or don't configure (default) this policy, users can click through these warning pages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8688">Si deshabilita esta directiva, se bloqueará a los usuarios para que no puedan hacer clic en ninguna página de advertencia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8688">If you disable this policy, users are blocked from clicking through any warning page.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8689">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8689">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8690">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8690">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8691">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8691">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8692">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8692">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8693">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8693">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8694">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8694">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8695">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8695">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8696">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8696">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8697">Nombre único de GP: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8697">GP unique name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8698">Nombre de GP: permitir que los usuarios continúen desde la página de advertencia de HTTPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8698">GP name: Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8699">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8699">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8700">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8700">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8701">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8701">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8702">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8702">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8703">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8703">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8704">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8704">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8705">Nombre del valor: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8705">Value Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8706">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8706">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8707">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8707">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8708">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8708">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8709">Nombre clave de la preferencia: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8709">Preference Key Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8710">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8710">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8711">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8711">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8712">SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8712">SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8713">Versión de TLS mínima activada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8713">Minimum TLS version enabled</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8714">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8714">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8715">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8715">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8716">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8716">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8717">Establece la versión mínima admitida de SSL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8717">Sets the minimum supported version of SSL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8718">Si no configura esta directiva, Microsoft Edge usará una versión mínima predeterminada, TLS 1.0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8718">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge uses a default minimum version, TLS 1.0.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8719">Si habilita esta directiva, puede establecer la versión mínima en uno de los siguientes valores: "TLSv1", "TLSv1.1" o "TLSv1.2".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8719">If you enable this policy, you can set the minimum version to one of the following values: 'TLSv1', 'TLSv1.1' or 'TLSv1.2'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8720">Cuando se establezca, Microsoft Edge no usará ninguna versión de SSL/TLS inferior a la versión especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8720">When set, Microsoft Edge won't use any version of SSL/TLS lower than the specified version.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8721">Los valores no reconocidos serán ignorados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8721">Any unrecognized value is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8722">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8722">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-8723">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8723">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-8724">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8724">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-8725">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8725">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8726">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8726">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8727">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8727">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8728">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8728">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8729">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8729">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8730">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8730">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8731">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8731">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8732">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8732">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8733">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8733">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8734">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8734">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8735">Nombre único de GP: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8735">GP unique name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8736">Nombre de GP: versión mínima de TLS activada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8736">GP name: Minimum TLS version enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8737">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8737">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8738">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8738">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8739">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8739">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8740">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8740">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8741">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8741">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8742">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8742">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8743">Nombre del valor: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8743">Value Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8744">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8744">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8745">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8745">Example value:</span></span>
```
tls1
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8746">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8746">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8747">Nombre clave de la preferencia: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8747">Preference Key Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8748">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8748">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>tls1</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8749">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8749">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8750">SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8750">SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8751">Guardar cookies cuando se cierra Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8751">Save cookies when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8752">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8752">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8753">En Windows y MacOS desde 86 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8753">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8754">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8754">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8755">Cuando esta directiva está habilitada, el conjunto de cookies especificado no se eliminará cuando se cierre el explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8755">When this policy is enabled, the specified set of cookies is exempt from deletion when the browser closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8756">Esta directiva solo surte efecto cuando:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8756">This policy is only effective when:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="31858-8757">El botón de alternancia en Configuración/Privacidad "Cookies y otros datos de sitio" está configurado y servicios/Borrar datos de exploración está cerrado o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8757">The 'Cookies and other site data' toggle is configured in Settings/Privacy and services/Clear browsing data on close or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="31858-8758">La directiva [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) se habilita o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8758">The policy [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) is enabled or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="31858-8759">La directiva [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) se configura como "Mantener cookies durante toda la sesión".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8759">The policy [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) is set to 'Keep cookies for the duration of the session'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8760">Puede definir una lista de sitios, basándose en modelos URL en los que se conservarán sus cookies durante las sesiones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8760">You can define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that will have their cookies preserved across sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8761">Nota: los usuarios todavía podrán editar la lista de sitios de cookies para agregar o quitar las URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8761">Note: Users can still edit the cookie site list to add or remove URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8762">Sin embargo, no podrán quitar las direcciones URL que haya agregado un administrador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8762">However, they can't remove URLs that have been added by an Admin.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8763">Si habilita esta directiva, la lista de cookies no se eliminará cuando se cierre el explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8763">If you enable this policy, the list of cookies won't be cleared when the browser closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8764">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, se usará la configuración personal del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8764">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the user's personal configuration is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8765">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8765">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8766">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8766">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8767">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8767">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8768">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8768">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8769">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8769">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8770">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8770">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8771">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8771">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8772">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8772">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8773">Nombre único de GP: SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8773">GP unique name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8774">Nombre GP: guardar cookies cuando se cierra Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8774">GP name: Save cookies when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8775">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8775">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8776">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8776">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8777">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8777">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8778">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8778">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8779">Ruta (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8779">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8780">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8780">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8781">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8781">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8782">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8782">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8783">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8783">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\2 = [*.]contoso.edu

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8784">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8784">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8785">Nombre de clave de preferencias: SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8785">Preference Key Name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8786">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8786">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8787">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8787">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8788">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8788">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8789">Deshabilitar la opción pada guardar el historial del explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8789">Disable saving browser history</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8790">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8790">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8791">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8791">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8792">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8792">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8793">Deshabilita la opción de guardar el historial del explorador y evita que los usuarios cambien esta configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8793">Disables saving browser history and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8794">Si habilita esta directiva, el historial de exploración no se guardará.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8794">If you enable this policy, browsing history isn't saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8795">Esto también deshabilita la sincronización de las pestañas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8795">This also disables tab syncing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8796">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, se guardará el historial de exploración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8796">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, browsing history is saved.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8797">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8797">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8798">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8798">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8799">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8799">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8800">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8800">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8801">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8801">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8802">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8802">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8803">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8803">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8804">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8804">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8805">Nombre único de GP: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8805">GP unique name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8806">Nombre de GP: deshabilitar la opción para guardar el historial del explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8806">GP name: Disable saving browser history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8807">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8807">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8808">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8808">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8809">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8809">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8810">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8810">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8811">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8811">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8812">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8812">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8813">Nombre del valor: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8813">Value Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8814">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8814">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8815">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8815">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8816">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8816">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8817">Nombre clave de la preferencia: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8817">Preference Key Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8818">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8818">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8819">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8819">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8820">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8820">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8821">Permitir o denegar captura de pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8821">Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8822">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8822">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8823">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 83 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8823">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8824">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8824">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8825">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, una página web podría utilizar las API de uso compartido de pantalla (por ejemplo, getDisplayMedia() o la API de la extensión Desktop Capture) para realizar una captura de pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8825">If you enable this policy, or don't configure this policy, a web page can use screen-share APIs (for example, getDisplayMedia() or the Desktop Capture extension API) for a screen capture.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-8826">Si deshabilita esta directiva, las llamadas a las API de uso compartido de pantalla fallarán.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8826">If you disable this policy, calls to screen-share APIs will fail.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8827">Por ejemplo, si está usando una reunión en línea basada en web, no funcionará el uso compartido de video o pantalla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8827">For example, if you're using a web-based online meeting, video or screen sharing will not work.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8828">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8828">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8829">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8829">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8830">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8830">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8831">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8831">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8832">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8832">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8833">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8833">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8834">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8834">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8835">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8835">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8836">Nombre único de GP: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8836">GP unique name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8837">Nombre de GP: permitir o denegar la captura de pantalla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8837">GP name: Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8838">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8838">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8839">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8839">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8840">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8840">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8841">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8841">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8842">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8842">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8843">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8843">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8844">Nombre del valor: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8844">Value Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8845">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8845">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8846">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8846">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8847">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8847">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8848">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8848">Preference Key Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8849">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8849">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8850">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8850">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8851">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8851">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8852">Habilite el desplazamiento al texto especificado en fragmentos de URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8852">Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8853">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8853">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8854">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 83 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8854">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8855">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8855">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8856">Esta característica permite que los hipervínculos y la navegación de la barra de direcciones URL se dirijan hacia un texto específico en una página web, al que se desplazará una vez que la página web termine de cargarse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8856">This feature lets hyperlink and address bar URL navigations target specific text on a web page, which will be scrolled to after the web page finishes loading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8857">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, se habilitará el desplazamiento de la página web hacia determinados fragmentos de texto a través de una dirección URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8857">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8858">Si deshabilita esta directiva, también se deshabilitará el desplazamiento de la página web hacia determinados fragmentos de texto a través de una dirección URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8858">If you disable this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8859">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8859">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8860">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8860">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8861">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8861">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8862">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8862">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8863">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8863">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8864">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8864">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8865">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8865">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8866">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8866">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8867">Nombre único de GP: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8867">GP unique name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8868">Nombre de GP: habilitar el desplazamiento de texto especificado en los fragmentos de URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8868">GP name: Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8869">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8869">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8870">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8870">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8871">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8871">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8872">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8872">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8873">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8873">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8874">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8874">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8875">Nombre del valor: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8875">Value Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8876">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8876">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8877">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8877">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8878">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8878">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8879">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8879">Preference Key Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8880">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8880">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8881">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8881">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8882">SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8882">SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8883">Permitir sugerencias de búsqueda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8883">Enable search suggestions</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8884">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8884">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8885">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8885">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8886">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8886">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8887">Habilita las sugerencias de búsqueda web en la barra de direcciones de Microsoft Edge y en la lista de auto-sugerencias e impide que los usuarios cambien esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8887">Enables web search suggestions in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List and prevents users from changing this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8888">Si habilita esta directiva, se usarán las sugerencias de búsqueda web.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8888">If you enable this policy, web search suggestions are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8889">Si deshabilita esta directiva, las sugerencias de búsqueda web nunca se usarán, aunque el historial local y las sugerencias locales de los favoritos seguirán apareciendo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8889">If you disable this policy, web search suggestions are never used, however local history and local favorites suggestions still appear.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8890">Si deshabilita esta directiva, no se incluirán en la telemetría de Microsoft ni los caracteres escritos ni las direcciones URL que visite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8890">If you disable this policy, neither the typed characters, nor the URLs visited will be included in telemetry to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8891">Si no se establece esta directiva, se habilitarán las sugerencias de búsqueda, sin embargo, el usuario podrá cambiarlas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8891">If this policy is left not set, search suggestions are enabled but the user can change that.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8892">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8892">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8893">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8893">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8894">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8894">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8895">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8895">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8896">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8896">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8897">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8897">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8898">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8898">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8899">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8899">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8900">Nombre único de GP: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8900">GP unique name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8901">Nombre de GP: permitir las sugerencias de búsqueda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8901">GP name: Enable search suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8902">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8902">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8903">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8903">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8904">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8904">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8905">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8905">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8906">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8906">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8907">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8907">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8908">Nombre del valor: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8908">Value Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8909">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8909">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8910">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8910">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8911">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8911">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8912">Nombre clave de la preferencia: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8912">Preference Key Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8913">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8913">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8914">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8914">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8915">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8915">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8916">Sitios web o dominios que no necesitan permiso para usar la atestación de clave de seguridad directa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8916">Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8917">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8917">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8918">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8918">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8919">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8919">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8920">Especifica los sitios web y los dominios que no necesitan un permiso explícito del usuario al solicitar los certificados de atestación de las claves de seguridad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8920">Specifies websites and domains that don't need explicit user permission when attestation certificates from security keys are requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8921">Además, se envía una señal a la clave de seguridad para indicar que puede usar la atestación individual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8921">Additionally, a signal is sent to the security key indicating that it can use individual attestation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8922">Sin esto, se le pedirá a los usuarios cada vez que un sitio solicite una consulta para la atestación de las claves de seguridad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8922">Without this, users are prompted each time a site requests attestation of security keys.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8923">Sitios (como https://contoso.com/some/path) solo coinciden con U2F appIDs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8923">Sites (like https://contoso.com/some/path) only match as U2F appIDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8924">Los dominios (como contoso.com) solo coinciden como ID. de webauthn RP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8924">Domains (like contoso.com) only match as webauthn RP IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8925">Para cubrir tanto las API de U2F como de webauthn en un sitio determinado, es necesario enumerar tanto la dirección URL de la aplicación como el dominio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8925">To cover both U2F and webauthn APIs for a given site, you need to list both the appID URL and domain.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8926">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8926">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8927">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8927">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8928">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8928">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8929">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8929">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8930">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8930">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8931">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8931">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8932">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8932">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8933">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8933">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8934">Nombre único de GP: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8934">GP unique name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8935">Nombre de GP: sitios web o dominios que no necesitan permiso para usar la atestación directa de la clave de seguridad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8935">GP name: Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8936">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8936">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8937">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8937">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8938">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8938">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8939">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8939">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8940">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8940">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8941">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8941">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8942">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8942">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8943">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8943">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8944">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8944">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation\1 = https://contoso.com

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8945">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8945">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8946">Nombre clave de la preferencia: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8946">Preference Key Name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8947">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8947">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8948">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8948">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8949">SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8949">SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8950">Enviar todos los sitios de intranet a Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8950">Send all intranet sites to Internet Explorer</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8951">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8951">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8952">En Windows desde la versión 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8952">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8953">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8953">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8954">Para obtener instrucciones sobre cómo configurar la experiencia óptima en el modo de Internet Explorer, vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8954">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8955">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8955">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8956">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8956">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8957">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8957">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8958">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8958">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8959">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8959">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8960">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8960">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8961">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8961">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8962">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8962">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8963">Nombre único de GP: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8963">GP unique name: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8964">Nombre de GP: enviar todos los sitios de intranet a Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8964">GP name: Send all intranet sites to Internet Explorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8965">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8965">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8966">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8966">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8967">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8967">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8968">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8968">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8969">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8969">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8970">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8970">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8971">Nombre del valor: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8971">Value Name: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8972">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8972">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8973">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8973">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-8974">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8974">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8975">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8975">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8976">Enviar información de sitios para mejorar los servicios Microsoft (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8976">Send site information to improve Microsoft services (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="31858-8977">En desuso: esta directiva está en desuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8977">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8978">Actualmente se admite pero quedará obsoleto en una versión futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8978">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
   
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8979">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8979">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8980">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8980">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8981">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8981">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-8982">Esta directiva está en desuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8982">This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8983">Actualmente, se admite pero quedará obsoleto en Microsoft Edge 89.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8983">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in Microsoft Edge 89.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8984">Esta directiva se reemplaza por la nueva directiva: [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata)para Windows 7, Windows 8 y macOS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8984">This policy is replaced by the new policy:  [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata)for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8985">Esta directiva se ha reemplazado por Permitir telemetría en Windows 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8985">This policy is replaced by Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8986">Esta directiva permite enviar información a Microsoft acerca de los sitios web visitados en Microsoft Edge para mejorar servicios como la búsqueda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8986">This policy enables sending info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft to improve services like search.</span></span>

   
<span data-ttu-id="31858-8987">Habilite esta directiva para enviar información a Microsoft acerca de los sitios web visitados en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8987">Enable this policy to send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8988">Deshabilite esta directiva para no enviar información a Microsoft acerca de los sitios web visitados en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8988">Disable this policy to not send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8989">En ambos casos, los usuarios no pueden cambiar ni invalidar la configuración.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8989">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8990">En Windows 10, si no se configura esta directiva, Microsoft Edge se ajustará por defecto a la configuración de datos de diagnóstico de Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8990">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8991">Si esta directiva está habilitada, Microsoft Edge sólo enviará información sobre los sitios web visitados desde Microsoft Edge si la configuración de datos de diagnóstico de Windows está establecida como Completa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8991">If this policy is enabled Microsoft Edge will only send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8992">Si esta directiva está deshabilitada, Microsoft Edge no enviará información acerca de los sitios web visitados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8992">If this policy is disabled Microsoft Edge will not send info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8993">Obtenga más información acerca de la configuración de datos de diagnóstico de Windows en: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8993">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8994">Esta directiva controla el envío de información sobre los sitios web visitados en Windows 7, Windows 8 y macOS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8994">On Windows 7, windows 8, and macOS this policy controls sending info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8995">Si no configura esta directiva, Microsoft Edge se ajustará de forma predeterminada a las preferencias del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8995">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-8996">Para habilitar esta directiva, debe establecer [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) como habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8996">To enable this policy, [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-8997">Si [MetricsReportingEnabled](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) o [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#metricsreportingenabled) no se configura o se deshabilita, estos datos no se enviarán a Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8997">If [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) or [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>
                                                                                                                                                                            

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-8998">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8998">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-8999">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-8999">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9000">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9000">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9001">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9001">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9002">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9002">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9003">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9003">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9004">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9004">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9005">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9005">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9006">Nombre único de GP: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9006">GP unique name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9007">Nombre GP: enviar información de sitios para mejorar los servicios Microsoft (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9007">GP name: Send site information to improve Microsoft services (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9008">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9008">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9009">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9009">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9010">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9010">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9011">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9011">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9012">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9012">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9013">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9013">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9014">Nombre del valor: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9014">Value Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9015">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9015">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9016">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9016">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9017">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9017">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9018">Nombre clave de la preferencia: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9018">Preference Key Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9019">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9019">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9020">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9020">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9021">ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9021">ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9022">Mostrar el acceso directo de Microsoft Office en la barra de favoritos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9022">Show Microsoft Office shortcut in favorites bar</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9023">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9023">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9024">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9024">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9025">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9025">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9026">Especifica si se va a incluir un método abreviado para Office.com en la barra de favoritos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9026">Specifies whether to include a shortcut to Office.com in the favorites bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9027">El método abreviado lleva a los usuarios que iniciaron sesión en Microsoft Edge a sus aplicaciones y documentos de Microsoft Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9027">For users signed into Microsoft Edge the shortcut takes users to their Microsoft Office apps and docs.</span></span>
