<span data-ttu-id="31858-9028">Si esta directiva está habilitada o no se configura, los usuarios podrán elegir si quieren ver el método abreviado de teclado al cambiar el botón de alternancia en el menú contextual de la barra de favoritos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9028">If this policy is enabled or not configure, users can choose whether to see the shortcut by changing the toggle in the favorites bar context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9029">No se mostrará el método abreviado si la directiva está deshabilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9029">If the policy is disabled, the shortcut won't be shown.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9030">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9030">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9031">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9031">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9032">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9032">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9033">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9033">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9034">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9034">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9035">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9035">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9036">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9036">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9037">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9037">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9038">Nombre único de GP: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9038">GP unique name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9039">Nombre de GP: mostrar el acceso directo de Microsoft Office en la barra de favoritos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9039">GP name: Show Microsoft Office shortcut in favorites bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9040">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9040">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9041">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9041">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9042">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9042">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9043">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9043">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9044">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9044">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9045">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9045">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9046">Nombre del valor: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9046">Value Name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9047">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9047">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9048">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9048">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9049">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9049">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9050">Nombre clave de la preferencia: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9050">Preference Key Name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9051">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9051">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9052">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9052">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9053">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9053">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9054">Habilite la compatibilidad con el intercambio de HTTP firmado (SXG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9054">Enable Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) support</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9055">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9055">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9056">En Windows y macOS desde 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9056">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9057">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9057">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9058">Habilita la compatibilidad con el Intercambio firmado de HTTP (SXG).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9058">Enable support for Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9059">Si no se establece o habilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge aceptará el contenido web que sirva como intercambios firmados de HTTP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9059">If this policy isn't set or enabled, Microsoft Edge will accept web contents served as Signed HTTP Exchanges.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9060">Si esta directiva está deshabilitada, los intercambios firmados por HTTP no podrán ser cargados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9060">If this policy is set to disabled, Signed HTTP Exchanges can't be loaded.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9061">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9061">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9062">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9062">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9063">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9063">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9064">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9064">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9065">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9065">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9066">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9066">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9067">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9067">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9068">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9068">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9069">Nombre único de GP: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9069">GP unique name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9070">Nombre de GP: habilitar la compatibilidad con el intercambio firmado de HTTP (SXG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9070">GP name: Enable Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) support</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9071">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9071">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9072">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9072">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9073">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9073">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9074">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9074">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9075">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9075">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9076">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9076">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9077">Nombre del valor: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9077">Value Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9078">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9078">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9079">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9079">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9080">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9080">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9081">Nombre clave de la preferencia: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9081">Preference Key Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9082">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9082">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9083">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9083">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9084">SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9084">SitePerProcess</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9085">Habilite el aislamiento de sitio para cada sitio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9085">Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9086">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9086">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9087">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9087">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9088">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9088">Description</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="31858-9089">La directiva "SitePerProcess" puede ser usada para evitar que los usuarios opten por el comportamiento predeterminado de aislar todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9089">The 'SitePerProcess' policy can be used to prevent users from opting out of the default behavior of isolating all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9090">Tenga en cuenta que también puede usar la directiva [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) para aislar orígenes adicionales más precisos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9090">Note that you can also use the [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policy to isolate additional, finer-grained origins.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-9091">Si habilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán optar por el comportamiento predeterminado donde cada sitio se ejecuta en su propio proceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9091">If you enable this policy, users can't opt out of the default behavior where each site runs in its own process.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-9092">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, el usuario podrá optar por no recibir el aislamiento del sitio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9092">If you disable or don't configure this policy, a user can opt out of site isolation.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9093">(Por ejemplo, con la entrada "deshabilitar aislamiento de sitio" en edge://flags.)  Si deshabilita o no configura la directiva, no se desactivará el aislamiento de sitio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9093">(For example, by using "Disable site isolation" entry in edge://flags.)  Disabling the policy or not configuring the policy doesn't turn off Site Isolation.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9094">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9094">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9095">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9095">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9096">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9096">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9097">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9097">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9098">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9098">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9099">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9099">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9100">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9100">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9101">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9101">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9102">Nombre único de GP: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9102">GP unique name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9103">Nombre de GP: habilitar el aislamiento de sitio en cada uno de los sitios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9103">GP name: Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9104">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9104">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9105">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9105">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9106">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9106">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9107">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9107">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9108">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9108">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9109">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9109">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9110">Nombre del valor: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9110">Value Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9111">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9111">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9112">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9112">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9113">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9113">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9114">Nombre clave de la preferencia: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9114">Preference Key Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9115">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9115">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9116">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9116">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9117">SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9117">SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9118">Habilite corrección ortográfica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9118">Enable spellcheck</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9119">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9119">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9120">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9120">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9121">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9121">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9122">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, el usuario podrá usar la revisión ortográfica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9122">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the user can use spellcheck.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9123">Si deshabilita esta directiva, el usuario no podrá usar la revisión ortográfica y las directivas [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) y [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) también estarán deshabilitadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9123">If you disable this policy, the user can't use spellcheck and the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policies are also disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9124">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9124">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9125">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9125">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9126">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9126">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9127">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9127">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9128">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9128">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9129">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9129">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9130">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9130">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9131">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9131">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9132">Nombre único de GP: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9132">GP unique name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9133">Nombre de GP: habilitar la corrección ortográfica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9133">GP name: Enable spellcheck</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9134">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9134">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9135">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9135">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9136">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9136">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9137">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9137">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9138">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9138">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9139">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9139">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9140">Nombre del valor: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9140">Value Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9141">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9141">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9142">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9142">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9143">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9143">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9144">Nombre clave de la preferencia: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9144">Preference Key Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9145">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9145">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9146">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9146">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9147">SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9147">SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9148">Habilite idiomas de revisión ortográfica específicos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9148">Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9149">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9149">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9150">En Windows desde la versión 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9150">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9151">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9151">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9152">Habilita varios idiomas para la revisión ortográfica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9152">Enables different languages for spellcheck.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9153">Cualquier idioma especificado que no sea reconocido será omitido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9153">Any language that you specify that isn't recognized is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9154">Si habilita esta directiva, el corrector ortográfico estará habilitado para los idiomas especificados, así como para cualquier idioma que el usuario haya habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9154">If you enable this policy, spellcheck is enabled for the languages specified, as well as any languages the user has enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9155">Si no configura o deshabilita esta política, no se realizarán los cambios necesarios en las preferencias de revisión ortográfica del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9155">If you don't configure or disable this policy, there's no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9156">Si la directiva [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) está deshabilitada, esta directiva no tendrá ningún efecto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9156">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9157">Si se incluye un idioma tanto en la directiva de "SpellcheckLanguage" como en la de [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist), se habilitará el idioma de revisión ortográfica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9157">If a language is included in both the 'SpellcheckLanguage' and the [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9158">Los idiomas admitidos son: af, bg, ca, cs, cy, da, de, el, en - AU, en - CA, en - GB, en - US, es, es - 419, es - AR, es - ES, es - MX, es - US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt - BR, pt - PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9158">The supported languages are: af, bg, ca, cs, cy, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9159">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9159">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9160">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9160">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9161">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9161">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9162">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9162">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9163">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9163">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9164">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9164">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9165">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9165">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9166">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9166">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9167">Nombre único de GP: SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9167">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9168">Nombre de GP: habilitar los idiomas específicos de la revisión ortográfica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9168">GP name: Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9169">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9169">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9170">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9170">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9171">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9171">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9172">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9172">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9173">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9173">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9174">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9174">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9175">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9175">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9176">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9176">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9177">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9177">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\1 = fr
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\2 = es

```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9178">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9178">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9179">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9179">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9180">Forzar deshabilitar idioma de revisión ortográfica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9180">Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9181">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9181">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9182">En Windows desde la versión 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9182">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9183">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9183">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9184">Deshabilitar de forma forzada los lenguajes de revisión ortográfica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9184">Force-disables spellcheck languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9185">Los idiomas no reconocidos en la lista se omitirán.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9185">Unrecognized languages in that list will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9186">Si habilita esta directiva, la revisión ortográfica se deshabilitará en los idiomas especificados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9186">If you enable this policy, spellcheck will be disabled for the languages specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9187">El usuario aún podrá habilitar o deshabilitar la revisión ortográfica para los idiomas que no estén en la lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9187">The user can still enable or disable spellcheck for languages not in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9188">Si deshabilita o no establece esta directiva, no se realizará ningún cambio en las preferencias de revisión ortográfica del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9188">If you do not set this policy, or disable it, there will be no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9189">Si la directiva [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) se establece como deshabilitada, esta directiva no tendrá ningún efecto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9189">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is set to disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9190">Si se incluye un idioma en alguna de las directivas [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) y "SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist", se habilitará el idioma de la revisión ortográfica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9190">If a language is included in both the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and the 'SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist' policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9191">Los idiomas admitidos son: af, bg, ca, cs, da, de, el, en - AU, en - CA, en - GB, en - US, es, es - 419, es - AR, es - ES, es - MX, es - US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt - BR, pt - PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9191">The currently supported languages are: af, bg, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9192">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9192">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9193">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9193">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9194">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9194">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9195">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9195">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9196">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9196">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9197">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9197">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9198">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9198">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9199">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9199">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9200">Nombre único de GP: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9200">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9201">Nombre de GP: Forzar la inhabilitación del idioma de revisión ortográfica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9201">GP name: Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9202">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9202">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9203">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9203">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9204">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9204">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9205">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9205">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9206">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9206">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9207">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9207">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9208">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9208">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9209">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9209">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9210">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9210">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\1 = fr
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\2 = es

```


  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9211">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9211">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9212">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9212">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9213">Permitir el tratamiento más estricto de contenido mixto (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9213">Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="31858-9214">En desuso: esta directiva está en desuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9214">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9215">Actualmente se admite pero quedará obsoleto en una versión futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9215">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9216">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9216">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9217">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 81 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9217">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9218">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9218">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9219">Esta directiva está en desuso porque solo pretende ser un mecanismo a corto plazo para dar a las empresas más tiempo para actualizar su contenido web cuando se ha comprobado que es incompatible con el tratamiento de contenido mixto más estricto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9219">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with stricter mixed content treatment.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9220">No funciona en la versión 85 de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9220">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 85.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9221">Esta directiva controla el tratamiento para contenido mixto (contenido HTTP en sitios HTTPS) en el explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9221">This policy controls the treatment for mixed content (HTTP content in HTTPS sites) in the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9222">Si establece esta directiva como verdadera o no establecida, el contenido mixto de audio y vídeo se actualizará automáticamente a HTTPS (es decir, la dirección URL se reescribirá como HTTPS, sin una reserva cuando el recurso no esté disponible a través de HTTPS) y se mostrará una advertencia de "no seguro" en la barra de direcciones URL para el contenido mixto de imágenes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9222">If you set this policy to true or not set, audio and video mixed content will be automatically upgraded to HTTPS (that is, the URL will be rewritten as HTTPS, without a fallback if the resource isn't available over HTTPS) and a 'Not Secure' warning will be shown in the URL bar for image mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9223">Si establece la directiva como falsa, se deshabilitarán las actualizaciones automáticas para audio y vídeo, y no se mostrará ninguna advertencia sobre las imágenes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9223">If you set the policy to false, auto upgrades will be disabled for audio and video, and no warning will be shown for images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9224">Esta directiva no afecta otros tipos de contenido mixto que no sean audio, vídeo e imágenes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9224">This policy does not affect other types of mixed content other than audio, video, and images.</span></span>


  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9225">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9225">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9226">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9226">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9227">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9227">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9228">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9228">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9229">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9229">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9230">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9230">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9231">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9231">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9232">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9232">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9233">Nombre único de GP: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9233">GP unique name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9234">Nombre de DG: permitir el tratamiento más estricto de contenido mixto (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9234">GP name: Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9235">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9235">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9236">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9236">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9237">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9237">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9238">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9238">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9239">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9239">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9240">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9240">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9241">Nombre del valor: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9241">Value Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9242">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9242">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9243">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9243">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9244">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9244">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9245">Nombre clave de la preferencia: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9245">Preference Key Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9246">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9246">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9247">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9247">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9248">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9248">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9249">Suprimir la advertencia de SO no compatible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9249">Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9250">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9250">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9251">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9251">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9252">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9252">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9253">Suprime la advertencia que aparece al ejecutar Microsoft Edge en un equipo o sistema operativo que ya no sea compatible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9253">Suppresses the warning that appears when Microsoft Edge is running on a computer or operating system that is no longer supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9254">Si esta directiva tiene un valor falso o no está establecido, las advertencias aparecerán en los equipos o sistemas operativos que no sean compatibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9254">If this policy is false or unset, the warnings will appear on such unsupported computers or operating systems.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9255">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9255">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9256">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9256">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9257">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9257">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9258">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9258">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9259">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9259">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9260">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9260">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9261">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9261">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9262">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9262">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9263">Nombre único de GP: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9263">GP unique name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9264">Nombre de GP: suprimir la advertencia de SO no compatible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9264">GP name: Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9265">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9265">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9266">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9266">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9267">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9267">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9268">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9268">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9269">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9269">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9270">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9270">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9271">Nombre del valor: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9271">Value Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9272">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9272">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9273">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9273">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9274">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9274">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9275">Nombre clave de la preferencia: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9275">Preference Key Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9276">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9276">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9277">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9277">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9278">SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9278">SyncDisabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9279">Deshabilitar la sincronización de datos con servicios de sincronización de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9279">Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9280">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9280">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9281">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9281">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9282">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9282">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9283">Deshabilita la sincronización de datos en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9283">Disables data synchronization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9284">Esta directiva también evita que se muestren solicitudes de consentimiento de sincronización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9284">This policy also prevents the sync consent prompt from appearing.</span></span>


 
<span data-ttu-id="31858-9285">Si no establece o aplica esta directiva como se recomienda, los usuarios podrán activar o desactivar la sincronización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9285">If you don't set this policy or apply it as recommended, users will be able to turn sync on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9286">Si aplica esta directiva como obligatoria, los usuarios no podrán activar la sincronización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9286">If you apply this policy as mandatory, users will not be able to turn sync on.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9287">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9287">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9288">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9288">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9289">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9289">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9290">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9290">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9291">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9291">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9292">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9292">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9293">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9293">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9294">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9294">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9295">Nombre único de GP: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9295">GP unique name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9296">Nombre de GP: deshabilitar la sincronización de datos con servicios de sincronización de Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9296">GP name: Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9297">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9297">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9298">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9298">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9299">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9299">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9300">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9300">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9301">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9301">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9302">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9302">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9303">Nombre del valor: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9303">Value Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9304">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9304">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9305">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9305">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9306">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9306">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9307">Nombre clave de la preferencia: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9307">Preference Key Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9308">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9308">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9309">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9309">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9310">SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9310">SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9311">Configurar la lista de tipos que se excluyen de la sincronización</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9311">Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9312">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9312">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9313">En Windows y MacOS desde la versión 83 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9313">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9314">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9314">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9315">Si habilita esta directiva, todos los tipos de datos especificados se excluirán de la sincronización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9315">If you enable this policy all the specified data types will be excluded from synchronization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9316">Esta directiva se puede usar para restringir el tipo de datos cargados en el servicio de sincronización de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9316">This policy can be used to limit the type of data uploaded to the Microsoft Edge synchronization service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9317">Puede proporcionar uno de los siguientes tipos de datos para esta directiva: "favoritos", "configuración", "contraseñas", "addressesAndMore", "extensiones", "historial", "openTabs" y "colecciones".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9317">You can provide one of the following data types for this policy: "favorites", "settings", "passwords", "addressesAndMore", "extensions", "history", "openTabs", and "collections".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9318">Observe que los nombres de estos tipos de datos distinguen mayúsculas de minúsculas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9318">Note that these data type names are case sensitive.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9319">Los usuarios no podrán reemplazar los tipos de datos deshabilitados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9319">Users will not be able to override the disabled data types.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9320">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9320">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9321">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9321">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9322">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9322">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9323">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9323">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9324">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9324">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9325">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9325">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9326">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9326">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9327">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9327">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9328">Nombre único de GP: SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9328">GP unique name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9329">Nombre de GP: configurar la lista de tipos que están excluidos de la sincronización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9329">GP name: Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9330">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9330">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9331">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9331">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9332">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9332">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9333">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9333">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9334">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9334">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9335">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9335">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9336">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9336">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9337">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9337">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9338">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9338">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled\1 = favorites

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9339">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9339">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9340">Nombre clave de la preferencia: SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9340">Preference Key Name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9341">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9341">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>favorites</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9342">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9342">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9343">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9343">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9344">Habilitar una característica de seguridad TLS 1.3 para los anclajes de veracidad locales (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9344">Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>
  
  
  ><span data-ttu-id="31858-9345">OBSOLETA: Esta directiva está obsoleta y no funciona después de Microsoft Edge 85.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9345">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 85.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9346">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9346">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9347">En Windows y MacOS, desde la versión 81 hasta la versión 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9347">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9348">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9348">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9349">Esta directiva está en desuso, ya que solo pretende ser un mecanismo a corto plazo para dar a las empresas más tiempo para actualizar los proxis afectados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9349">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to upgrade affected proxies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9350">Esta directiva controla una característica de seguridad de TLS 1,3 que protege las conexiones frente a ataques de degradación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9350">This policy controls a security feature in TLS 1.3 that protects connections against downgrade attacks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9351">Es compatible con las versiones anteriores y no afectará las conexiones a los servidores o proxies TLS 1,2 compatibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9351">It is backwards-compatible and will not affect connections to compliant TLS 1.2 servers or proxies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9352">Sin embargo, las versiones anteriores de algunos proxies que interceptan TLS tienen un error de implementación, lo que hace que sean incompatibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9352">However, older versions of some TLS-intercepting proxies have an implementation flaw which causes them to be incompatible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9353">Si deshabilita esta directiva o no la configura, Microsoft Edge habilitará estas protecciones de seguridad en todas las conexiones.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9353">If you enable this policy or don't set it, Microsoft Edge will enable these security protections for all connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9354">Si deshabilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge deshabilitará estas protecciones de seguridad en las conexiones autenticadas instaladas localmente con certificados de CA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9354">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will disable these security protections for connections authenticated with locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9355">Estas protecciones siempre están habilitadas en las conexiones autenticadas con certificados de entidad de confianza pública.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9355">These protections are always enabled for connections authenticated with publicly-trusted CA certificates.</span></span>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      

                                                                                                                                                                                                             

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9356">Se puede usar esta directiva para comprobar los proxis afectados y actualizarlos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9356">This policy can be used to test for any affected proxies and upgrade them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9357">Se espera que los servidores afectados den error en las conexiones con el código de error: ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9357">Affected proxies are expected to fail connections with an error code of ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9358">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9358">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9359">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9359">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9360">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9360">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9361">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9361">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9362">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9362">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9363">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9363">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9364">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9364">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9365">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9365">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9366">Nombre único de GP: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9366">GP unique name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9367">Nombre GP: habilitar una característica de seguridad TLS 1.3 para los anclajes de veracidad locales (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9367">GP name: Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9368">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9368">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9369">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9369">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9370">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9370">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9371">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9371">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9372">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9372">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9373">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9373">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9374">Nombre del valor: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9374">Value Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9375">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9375">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9376">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9376">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9377">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9377">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9378">Nombre clave de la preferencia: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9378">Preference Key Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9379">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9379">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9380">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9380">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9381">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9381">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9382">Especificar los conjuntos de cifrado TLS para deshabilitarlos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9382">Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9383">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9383">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9384">En Windows y MacOS desde 85 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9384">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9385">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9385">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9386">Configure la lista de conjuntos de cifrado que se deshabilitan en conexiones TLS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9386">Configure the list of cipher suites that are disabled for TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9387">Si configura esta Directiva, la lista de conjuntos de cifrado configurados no se usará al establecer conexiones TLS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9387">If you configure this policy, the list of configured cipher suites will not be used when establishing TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9388">Si no configura esta Directiva, el explorador elegirá los conjuntos de cifrado TLS que se usarán.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9388">If you don't configure this policy, the browser will choose which TLS cipher suites to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9389">Los valores del conjunto de cifrado que se van a deshabilitar se especifican como valores hexadecimales de 16 bits.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9389">Cipher suite values to be disabled are specified as 16-bit hexadecimal values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9390">Los valores los asigna el registro autoridad de números asignados de Internet (IANA).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9390">The values are assigned by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) registry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9391">La TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 del conjunto de cifrado TLS 1,3 (0x1301) es necesaria para TLS 1,3 y no se puede deshabilitar por esta Directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9391">The TLS 1.3 cipher suite TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 (0x1301) is required for TLS 1.3 and can't be disabled by this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9392">Esta Directiva no afecta a las conexiones basadas en QUIC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9392">This policy does not affect QUIC-based connections.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9393">QUIC puede apagarse a través de la Directiva de [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9393">QUIC can be turned off via the [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9394">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9394">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9395">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9395">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9396">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9396">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9397">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9397">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9398">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9398">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9399">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9399">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9400">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9400">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9401">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9401">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9402">Nombre único de GP: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9402">GP unique name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9403">Nombre de GP: especifique los conjuntos de cifrado TLS para deshabilitarlos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9403">GP name: Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9404">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9404">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
