  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9405">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9405">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9406">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9406">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9407">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9407">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9408">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9408">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9409">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9409">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9410">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9410">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9411">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9411">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9412">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9412">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\1 = 0x1303
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\2 = 0xcca8
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\3 = 0xcca9

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9413">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9413">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9414">Nombre de clave de preferencias: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9414">Preference Key Name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9415">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9415">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>0x1303</string>
  <string>0xcca8</string>
  <string>0xcca9</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9416">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9416">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9417">TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9417">TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9418">Permitir el bloqueo de las pestañas en segundo plano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9418">Allow freezing of background tabs</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9419">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9419">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9420">En Windows y macOS desde 79 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9420">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9421">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9421">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9422">Controla si Microsoft Edge puede congelar las pestañas que están en segundo plano durante al menos 5 minutos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9422">Controls whether Microsoft Edge can freeze tabs that are in the background for at least 5 minutes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9423">Al congelar la pestaña se reduce el uso de la CPU, batería y memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9423">Tab freezing reduces CPU, battery, and memory usage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9424">Microsoft Edge usa la heurística para evitar congelar las pestañas que funcionan correctamente en segundo plano, como las notificaciones de pantalla, la reproducción de sonido y la transmisión de vídeo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9424">Microsoft Edge uses heuristics to avoid freezing tabs that do useful work in the background, such as display notifications, play sound, and stream video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9425">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, las pestañas que han estado en segundo plano durante un mínimo de 5 minutos podrían ser congeladas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9425">If you enable or don't configure this policy, tabs that have been in the background for at least 5 minutes might be frozen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9426">Si desactiva esta directiva, no se congelarán las pestañas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9426">If you disable this policy, no tabs will be frozen.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9427">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9427">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9428">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9428">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9429">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9429">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9430">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9430">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9431">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9431">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9432">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9432">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9433">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9433">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9434">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9434">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9435">Nombre único de GP: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9435">GP unique name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9436">Nombre de GP: permitir el bloqueo de las pestañas en segundo plano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9436">GP name: Allow freezing of background tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9437">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9437">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9438">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9438">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9439">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9439">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9440">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9440">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9441">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9441">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9442">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9442">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9443">Nombre del valor: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9443">Value Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9444">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9444">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9445">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9445">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9446">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9446">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9447">Nombre clave de la preferencia: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9447">Preference Key Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9448">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9448">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9449">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9449">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9450">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9450">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9451">Habilitar los procesos de finalización en el administrador de tareas del explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9451">Enable ending processes in the Browser task manager</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9452">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9452">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9453">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9453">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9454">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9454">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9455">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, los usuarios podrán detener los procesos en el administrador de tareas del explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9455">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can end processes in the Browser task manager.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9456">Si la deshabilita, los usuarios no podrán detener los procesos y el botón Detener proceso estará deshabilitado en el administrador de tareas del explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9456">If you disable it, users can't end processes, and the End process button is disabled in the Browser task manager.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9457">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9457">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9458">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9458">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9459">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9459">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9460">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9460">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9461">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9461">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9462">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9462">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9463">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9463">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9464">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9464">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9465">Nombre único de GP: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9465">GP unique name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9466">Nombre GP: habilitar los procesos finales en el administrador de tareas del explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9466">GP name: Enable ending processes in the Browser task manager</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9467">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9467">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9468">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9468">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9469">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9469">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9470">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9470">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9471">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9471">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9472">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9472">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9473">Nombre del valor: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9473">Value Name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9474">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9474">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9475">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9475">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9476">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9476">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9477">Nombre clave de la preferencia: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9477">Preference Key Name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9478">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9478">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9479">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9479">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9480">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9480">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9481">Establecer el límite en megabytes de memoria que puede utilizar una única instancia de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9481">Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9482">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9482">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9483">En Windows y MacOS desde 80 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9483">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9484">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9484">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9485">Configure la cantidad de memoria que una sola instancia de Microsoft Edge puede usar antes de que las pestañas empiecen a ser descartadas para ahorrar memoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9485">Configures the amount of memory that a single Microsoft Edge instance can use before tabs start getting discarded to save memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9486">La memoria usada por la pestaña se liberará y la pestaña tendrá que volver a cargarse cuando se cambie a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9486">The memory used by the tab will be freed and the tab will have to be reloaded when switched to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9487">Si habilita esta directiva, el navegador comenzará a descartar las pestañas para ahorrar memoria una vez que se supere el límite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9487">If you enable this policy, the browser will start to discard tabs to save memory once the limitation is exceeded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9488">Sin embargo, no hay garantía de que el navegador siempre se ejecute por debajo del límite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9488">However, there is no guarantee that the browser is always running under the limit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9489">Cualquier valor por debajo de 1024 se redondeará a 1024.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9489">Any value under 1024 will be rounded up to 1024.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9490">Si no establece esta directiva, el explorador solo intentará ahorrar memoria cuando haya detectado que la cantidad de memoria física de su equipo es insuficiente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9490">If you don't set this policy, the browser will only attempt to save memory when it has detected that the amount of physical memory on its machine is low.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9491">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9491">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9492">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9492">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9493">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9493">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9494">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9494">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9495">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9495">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9496">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9496">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9497">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9497">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9498">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9498">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9499">Nombre único de GP: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9499">GP unique name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9500">Nombre de GP: establecer el límite de megabytes de memoria que puede usar una sola instancia de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9500">GP name: Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9501">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9501">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9502">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9502">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9503">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9503">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9504">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9504">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9505">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9505">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9506">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9506">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9507">Nombre del valor: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9507">Value Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9508">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9508">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9509">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9509">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000800
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9510">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9510">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9511">Nombre clave de la preferencia: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9511">Preference Key Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9512">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9512">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2048</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9513">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9513">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9514">TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9514">TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9515">Bloquear el seguimiento de la actividad de exploración de los usuarios en la web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9515">Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9516">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9516">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9517">En Windows y macOS desde 78 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9517">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9518">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9518">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9519">Le permite decidir si desea bloquear el acceso a los sitios web que quieran rastrear la actividad de los usuarios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9519">Lets you decide whether to block websites from tracking users' web-browsing activity.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9520">Si deshabilita esta directiva o no la configura, los usuarios podrán establecer su propio nivel de prevención de rastreo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9520">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users can set their own level of tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9521">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9521">Policy options mapping:</span></span>
   
 

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-9522">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = desactivado (sin prevención de rastreo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9522">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = Off (no tracking prevention)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-9523">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = básico (bloquea rastreadores malintencionados; el contenido y los anuncios será personalizados)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9523">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = Basic (blocks harmful trackers, content and ads will be personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-9524">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = equilibrado (bloquea rastreadores malintencionados y de sitios que el usuario no ha visitado; el contenido y los anuncios serán menos personalizados)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9524">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = Balanced (blocks harmful trackers and trackers from sites user has not visited; content and ads will be less personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-9525">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = estricto (bloquea rastreadores malintencionados y la mayoría de los rastreadores de todos los sitios; el contenido y los anuncios tendrán una personalización mínima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9525">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = Strict (blocks harmful trackers and majority of trackers from all sites; content and ads will have minimal personalization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9526">Es posible que algunas partes de los sitios no funcionen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9526">Some parts of sites might not work)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9527">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9527">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9528">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9528">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9529">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9529">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9530">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9530">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9531">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9531">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9532">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9532">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9533">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9533">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9534">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9534">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9535">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9535">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9536">Nombre único de GP: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9536">GP unique name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9537">Nombre de GP: bloquear el seguimiento de la actividad de exploración de los usuarios en la web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9537">GP name: Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9538">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9538">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9539">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9539">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9540">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9540">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9541">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9541">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9542">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9542">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9543">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9543">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9544">Nombre del valor: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9544">Value Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9545">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9545">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9546">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9546">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000002
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9547">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9547">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9548">Nombre clave de la preferencia: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9548">Preference Key Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9549">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9549">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9550">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9550">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9551">TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9551">TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9552">Habilitar la traducción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9552">Enable Translate</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9553">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9553">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9554">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9554">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9555">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9555">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9556">Habilita el servicio de traducción integrada de Microsoft en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9556">Enables the integrated Microsoft translation service on Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9557">Si habilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge ofrecerá la funcionalidad de traducción al usuario mostrándole un menú flotante integrado de traducción cuando sea necesario, y una opción para traducir en el menú contextual del botón derecho del ratón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9557">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge offers translation functionality to the user by showing an integrated translate flyout when appropriate, and a translate option on the right-click context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9558">Al deshabilitar esta directiva también se deshabilitarán todas las características de traducción integradas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9558">Disable this policy to disable all built-in translate features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9559">Si no configura la directiva, los usuarios podrán elegir si desean usar la funcionalidad de traducción o no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9559">If you don't configure the policy, users can choose whether to use the translation functionality or not.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9560">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9560">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9561">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9561">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9562">Puede ser recomendable: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9562">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9563">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9563">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9564">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9564">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9565">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9565">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9566">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9566">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9567">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9567">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9568">Nombre único de GP: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9568">GP unique name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9569">Nombre de GP: habilitar la traducción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9569">GP name: Enable Translate</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9570">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9570">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9571">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendada): Plantillas administrativas/Microsoft Edge: configuración predeterminada (los usuarios pueden reemplazarla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9571">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9572">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9572">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9573">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9573">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9574">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9574">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9575">Ruta de acceso (recomendada): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge\Recomendado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9575">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9576">Nombre del valor: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9576">Value Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9577">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9577">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9578">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9578">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9579">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9579">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9580">Nombre clave de la preferencia: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9580">Preference Key Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9581">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9581">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9582">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9582">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9583">URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9583">URLAllowlist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9584">Definir una lista de direcciones URL permitidas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9584">Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9585">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9585">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9586">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9586">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9587">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9587">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9588">Permitir el acceso a las direcciones URL enumeradas, como excepciones a la lista de bloqueo de URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9588">Allow access to the listed URLs, as exceptions to the URL block list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9589">Aplique formato al modelo de dirección URL en función de [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9589">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9590">Puede usar esta directiva para abrir excepciones a las listas de bloqueo restrictivas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9590">You can use this policy to open exceptions to restrictive block lists.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9591">Por ejemplo, puede incluir "\*" en la lista de bloqueados para bloquear todas las solicitudes y, a continuación, usar esta directiva para permitir el acceso a una lista limitada de direcciones URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9591">For example, you can include '\*' in the block list to block all requests, and then use this policy to allow access to a limited list of URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9592">Puede usar esta directiva para abrir excepciones para determinados esquemas, subdominios de otros dominios, puertos o rutas de acceso específicas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9592">You can use this policy to open exceptions to certain schemes, subdomains of other domains, ports, or specific paths.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9593">El filtro más específico determina si una dirección URL está bloqueada o es permitida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9593">The most specific filter determines if a URL is blocked or allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9594">La lista de permitidos tiene prioridad sobre la lista de bloqueados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9594">The allowed list takes precedence over the block list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9595">Esta directiva está limitada a 1000 entradas; las siguientes entradas se omiten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9595">This policy is limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9596">Esta directiva también permite al explorador invocar automáticamente aplicaciones externas registradas como controladores de protocolo para protocolos como "tel:" o "ssh:".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9596">This policy also allows the browser to automatically invoke external applications registered as protocol handlers for protocols like "tel:" or "ssh:".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9597">Si no configura esta Directiva, no hay ninguna excepción a la lista de bloqueados en la Directiva [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9597">If you don't configure this policy, there are no exceptions to the block list in the [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9598">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9598">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9599">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9599">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9600">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9600">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9601">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9601">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9602">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9602">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9603">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9603">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9604">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9604">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9605">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9605">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9606">Nombre único de GP: URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9606">GP unique name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9607">Nombre de GP: definir una lista de direcciones URL permitidas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9607">GP name: Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9608">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9608">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9609">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9609">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9610">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9610">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9611">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9611">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9612">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9612">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9613">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9613">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9614">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9614">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9615">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9615">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9616">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9616">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\1 = contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\2 = https://ssl.server.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\3 = hosting.com/good_path
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\4 = https://server:8080/path
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\5 = .exact.hostname.com

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9617">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9617">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9618">Nombre clave de la preferencia: URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9618">Preference Key Name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9619">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9619">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9620">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9620">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9621">URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9621">URLBlocklist</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9622">Bloquear el acceso a una lista de direcciones URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9622">Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9623">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9623">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9624">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9624">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9625">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9625">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9626">Define una lista de sitios basada en los patrones de dirección URL que están bloqueados (sus usuarios no pueden cargarlos).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9626">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked (your users can't load them).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9627">Aplique formato al modelo de dirección URL en función de [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9627">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9628">Puede definir excepciones en la directiva [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9628">You can define exceptions in the [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9629">Estas directivas están limitadas a 1000 entradas; las siguientes entradas se omiten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9629">These policies are limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9630">Tenga en cuenta que no se recomienda bloquear las direcciones URL "edge://\*" internas, lo que puede provocar errores inesperados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9630">Note that blocking internal 'edge://\*' URLs isn't recommended - this may lead to unexpected errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9631">Esta Directiva no impide que la página se actualice dinámicamente a través de JavaScript.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9631">This policy doesn't prevent the page from updating dynamically through JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9632">Por ejemplo, si bloquea "contoso.com/abc", es posible que los usuarios sigan pudiendo visitar "contoso.com" y hacer clic en un vínculo para visitar "contoso.com/abc", siempre que la página no se actualice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9632">For example, if you block 'contoso.com/abc', users might still be able to visit 'contoso.com' and click on a link to visit 'contoso.com/abc', as long as the page doesn't refresh.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9633">Si no configura esta Directiva, no se bloquea ninguna dirección URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9633">If you don't configure this policy, no URLs are blocked.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9634">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9634">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9635">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9635">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9636">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9636">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9637">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9637">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9638">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9638">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9639">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9639">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9640">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9640">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9641">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9641">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9642">Nombre único de GP: URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9642">GP unique name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9643">Nombre de GP: bloquear el acceso a una lista de direcciones URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9643">GP name: Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9644">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9644">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9645">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9645">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9646">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9646">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9647">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9647">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9648">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9648">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9649">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9649">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9650">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9650">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9651">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9651">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9652">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9652">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\1 = contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\2 = https://ssl.server.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\3 = hosting.com/bad_path
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\4 = https://server:8080/path
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\5 = .exact.hostname.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\6 = file://*
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\7 = custom_scheme:*
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\8 = *

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9653">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9653">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9654">Nombre clave de la preferencia: URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9654">Preference Key Name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9655">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9655">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/bad_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
  <string>file://*</string>
  <string>custom_scheme:*</string>
  <string>*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9656">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9656">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9657">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9657">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9658">Habilitar la característica User-Agent Client Hints (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9658">Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="31858-9659">En desuso: esta directiva está en desuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9659">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9660">Actualmente se admite pero quedará obsoleto en una versión futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9660">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9661">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9661">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9662">En Windows y MacOS desde 86 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9662">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9663">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9663">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9664">Esta directiva está en desuso porque solo pretende ser un mecanismo a corto plazo para dar a las empresas más tiempo para actualizar su contenido web cuando se compruebe que es incompatible con característica User-Agent Client Hints.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9664">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the User-Agent Client Hints feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9665">No funciona en la versión 89 de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9665">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 89.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9666">Cuando se habilita la característica User-Agent Client Hints se envían encabezados de solicitud granulares que ofrecen información sobre el explorador del usuario (por ejemplo, la versión del explorador) y el entorno (por ejemplo, la arquitectura del sistema).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9666">When enabled the User-Agent Client Hints feature sends granular request headers that provide information about the user browser (for example, the browser version) and environment (for example, the system architecture).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9667">Esta es una característica aditiva, pero los nuevos encabezados pueden romper algunos sitios web que restringen los caracteres que pueden contener las solicitudes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9667">This is an additive feature, but the new headers may break some websites that restrict the characters that requests may contain.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9668">Si habilita o no configura esta directiva, se habilitará la característica User-Agent Client Hints.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9668">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the User-Agent Client Hints feature is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9669">Si deshabilita esta directiva, esta característica no estará disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9669">If you disable this policy, this feature is unavailable.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9670">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9670">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9671">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9671">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9672">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9672">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9673">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9673">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9674">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9674">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9675">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9675">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9676">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9676">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9677">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9677">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9678">Nombre único de GP: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9678">GP unique name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9679">Nombre GP: habilitar la característica User-Agent Client Hints (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9679">GP name: Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9680">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9680">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9681">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9681">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9682">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9682">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9683">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9683">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9684">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9684">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9685">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9685">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9686">Nombre del valor: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9686">Value Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9687">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9687">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9688">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9688">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9689">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9689">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9690">Nombre clave de la preferencia: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9690">Preference Key Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9691">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9691">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9692">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9692">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9693">UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9693">UserDataDir</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9694">Establecer el directorio de datos del usuario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9694">Set the user data directory</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9695">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9695">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9696">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9696">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9697">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9697">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9698">Configure el directorio que se usará para almacenar los datos del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9698">Set the directory to use for storing user data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9699">Si habilita esta directiva, Microsoft Edge usará el directorio especificado independientemente de si el usuario ha establecido el marcador de línea de comandos "--user-data-dir".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9699">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified directory regardless of whether the user has set the '--user-data-dir' command-line flag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9700">Si no habilita esta directiva, se usará la ruta de acceso predeterminada del perfil, aunque el usuario podrá anularla con el marcador "--user-data-dir".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9700">If you don't enable this policy, the default profile path is used, but the user can override it by using the '--user-data-dir' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9701">Los usuarios pueden encontrar el directorio del perfil en edge://versión/en ruta de acceso del perfil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9701">Users can find the directory for the profile at edge://version/ under profile path.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9702">Para evitar la pérdida de datos u otros errores, no configure esta directiva en un directorio raíz de volumen o en un directorio que se use para otros propósitos, ya que Microsoft Edge administra su contenido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9702">To avoid data loss or other errors, don't configure this policy to a volume's root directory or to a directory that's used for other purposes, because Microsoft Edge manages its contents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9703">Vea [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) para obtener una lista de las variables que se pueden usar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9703">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9704">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9704">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9705">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9705">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9706">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9706">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9707">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9707">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9708">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9708">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9709">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9709">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9710">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9710">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9711">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9711">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9712">Nombre único de GP: Actualización</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9712">GP unique name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9713">Nombre de GP: establecer el directorio de datos del usuario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9713">GP name: Set the user data directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9714">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9714">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9715">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9715">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9716">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9716">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9717">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9717">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9718">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9718">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9719">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9719">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9720">Nombre del valor: UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9720">Value Name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9721">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9721">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9722">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9722">Example value:</span></span>
```
${users}/${user_name}/Edge
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9723">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9723">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9724">Nombre clave de la preferencia: UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9724">Preference Key Name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9725">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9725">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>${users}/${user_name}/Edge</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9726">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9726">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9727">UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9727">UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9728">Permitir comentarios de los usuarios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9728">Allow user feedback</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9729">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9729">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9730">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9730">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9731">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9731">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9732">Microsoft Edge usa la característica de Comentarios de Edge (habilitada de forma predeterminada) para permitir que los usuarios envíen comentarios, sugerencias o encuestas a los clientes e informen sobre cualquier problema con el explorador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9732">Microsoft Edge uses the Edge Feedback feature (enabled by default) to allow users to send feedback, suggestions or customer surveys and to report any issues with the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9733">Asimismo, de forma predeterminada, los usuarios no pueden deshabilitar (desactivar) la característica de comentarios de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9733">Also, by default, users can't disable (turn off) the Edge Feedback feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9734">Si habilita esta directiva o no la configura los usuarios podrán invocar la característica de comentarios de Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9734">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9735">Si deshabilita esta directiva, los usuarios no podrán invocar la característica de comentarios de Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9735">If you disable this policy, users can't invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9736">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9736">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9737">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9737">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9738">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9738">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9739">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9739">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9740">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9740">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9741">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9741">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9742">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9742">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9743">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9743">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9744">Nombre único de GP: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9744">GP unique name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9745">Nombre de GP: permitir comentarios de los usuarios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9745">GP name: Allow user feedback</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9746">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9746">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9747">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9747">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9748">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9748">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9749">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9749">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9750">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9750">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9751">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9751">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9752">Nombre del valor: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9752">Value Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9753">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9753">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9754">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9754">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9755">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9755">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9756">Nombre clave de la preferencia: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9756">Preference Key Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9757">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9757">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9758">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9758">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9759">VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9759">VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9760">Permitir o bloquear captura de vídeo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9760">Allow or block video capture</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9761">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9761">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9762">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9762">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9763">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9763">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9764">Controla si los sitios pueden capturar vídeo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9764">Control whether sites can capture video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9765">Si se habilita o no se configura (valor predeterminado), se le solicitará al usuario el acceso para la captura de vídeo en todos los sitios, excepto en los que tengan direcciones URL configuradas en la lista de la directiva [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls), a los cuales se les concederá acceso sin solicitarlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9765">If enabled or not configured (default), the user will be asked about video capture access for all sites except those with URLs configured in the [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy list, which will be granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9766">Si deshabilita esta directiva, no se le harán solicitudes al usuario y la captura de vídeo solo estará disponible para las direcciones URL configuradas en la directiva [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9766">If you disable this policy, the user isn't prompted, and video capture is only available to URLs configured in [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9767">Esta directiva afecta todos los tipos de entradas de vídeo, no solo a la cámara integrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9767">This policy affects all types of video inputs, not only the built-in camera.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9768">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9768">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9769">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9769">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9770">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9770">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9771">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9771">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9772">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9772">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9773">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9773">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9774">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9774">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9775">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9775">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9776">Nombre único de GP: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9776">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9777">Nombre de GP: permitir o bloquear captura de vídeo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9777">GP name: Allow or block video capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9778">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9778">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9779">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9779">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9780">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9780">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
