  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9781">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9781">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9782">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9782">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9783">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9783">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9784">Nombre del valor: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9784">Value Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9785">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9785">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9786">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9786">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000000
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9787">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9787">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9788">Nombre clave de la preferencia: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9788">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9789">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9789">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9790">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9790">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9791">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9791">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9792">Sitios que pueden acceder a dispositivos de captura de vídeo sin solicitar permiso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9792">Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9793">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9793">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9794">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9794">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9795">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9795">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9796">Especificar sitios web basándose en modelos URL que pueden usar dispositivos de captura de vídeo sin pedir permiso al usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9796">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use video capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9797">Los patrones en esta lista se hacen coincidir con el origen de seguridad de la dirección URL que realiza la solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9797">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9798">Si coinciden, el sitio recibe acceso automáticamente a los dispositivos de captura de vídeo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9798">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to video capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9799">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9799">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9800">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9800">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9801">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9801">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9802">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9802">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9803">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9803">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9804">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9804">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9805">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9805">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9806">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9806">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9807">Nombre único de GP: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9807">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9808">Nombre de GP: sitios que pueden acceder a dispositivos de captura de vídeo sin solicitar permiso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9808">GP name: Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9809">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9809">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9810">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9810">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9811">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9811">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9812">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9812">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9813">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9813">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9814">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9814">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9815">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9815">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9816">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9816">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9817">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9817">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com/
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = https://[*.]contoso.edu/

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9818">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9818">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9819">Nombre clave de la preferencia: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9819">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9820">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9820">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9822">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9822">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9823">Establecer la optimización de WPAD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9823">Set WPAD optimization</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9824">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9824">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9825">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9825">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9826">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9826">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9827">Le permite deshabilitar la optimización WPAD (detección automática de proxy web) en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9827">Allows you to turn off WPAD (Web Proxy Auto-Discovery) optimization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9828">Si deshabilita esta directiva, la optimización de WPAD se deshabilitará, lo que hará que el explorador tenga que esperar más tiempo por los servidores WPAD basados en DNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9828">If you disable this policy, WPAD optimization is disabled, which makes the browser wait longer for DNS-based WPAD servers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9829">Si habilita o no configura la directiva, la optimización de WPAD se habilitará.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9829">If you enable or don't configure the policy, WPAD optimization is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9830">Independientemente de si esta directiva está habilitada, los usuarios no podrán cambiar la configuración de la optimización de WPAD.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9830">Independent of whether or how this policy is enabled, the WPAD optimization setting cannot be changed by users.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9831">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9831">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9832">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9832">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9833">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9833">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9834">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9834">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9835">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9835">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9836">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9836">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9837">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9837">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9838">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9838">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9839">Nombre único de GP: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9839">GP unique name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9840">Nombre de GP: establecer optimización WPAD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9840">GP name: Set WPAD optimization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9841">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9841">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9842">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9842">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9843">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9843">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9844">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9844">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9845">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9845">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9846">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9846">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9847">Nombre del valor: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9847">Value Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9848">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9848">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9849">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9849">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9850">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9850">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9851">Nombre clave de la preferencia: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9851">Preference Key Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9852">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9852">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9853">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9853">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9854">WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9854">WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9855">Configurar la lista de aplicaciones web instaladas por la fuerza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9855">Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9856">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9856">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9857">En Windows y MacOS desde 80 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9857">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9858">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9858">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9859">Se especifica una lista de sitios Web que se instalan de forma silenciosa, sin la interacción del usuario, por lo que no pueden ser desinstalados o deshabilitos por el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9859">Specifies a list of websites that are installed silently, without user interaction, and which can't be uninstalled or disabled by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9860">Cada elemento en la lista de la directiva es un objeto con los siguientes miembros:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9860">Each list item of the policy is an object with the following members:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9861">La "dirección URL", que es obligatoria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9861">"url", which is mandatory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9862">La "dirección URL" debe ser de la aplicación Web que será instalada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9862">"url" should be the URL of the web app to install.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9863">Los valores para los miembros opcionales son:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9863">Values for the optional members are:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9864">"launch_container" debe ser una "ventana" o "pestaña" que indique cómo abrir la aplicación web una vez que se haya instalado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9864">"launch_container" should be either "window" or "tab" to indicate how the Web App will be opened after it's installed.</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9865">"create_desktop_shortcut" debe ser verdadero para crear un acceso directo en el escritorio de Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9865">"create_desktop_shortcut" should be true if a desktop shortcut should be created on Windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9866">Si se omite "default_launch_container", la aplicación se abrirá en una pestaña de forma predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9866">If "default_launch_container" is omitted, the app will open in a tab by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9867">Independientemente del valor de "default_launch_container", los usuarios pueden cambiar el contenedor donde se abrirá la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9867">Regardless of the value of "default_launch_container", users can change which container the app will open in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9868">Si se omite "create_desktop_shortcuts", no se creará ningún acceso directo en el escritorio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9868">If "create_desktop_shortcuts" is omitted, no desktop shortcuts will be created.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9869">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9869">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9870">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9870">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9871">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9871">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9872">Actualización de directiva dinámica: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9872">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9873">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9873">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9874">Diccionario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9874">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9875">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9875">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9876">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9876">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9877">Nombre único de GP: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9877">GP unique name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9878">Nombre de GP: configurar la lista de aplicaciones web instaladas a la fuerza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9878">GP name: Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9879">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9879">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9880">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9880">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9881">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9881">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9882">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9882">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9883">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9883">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9884">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9884">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9885">Nombre del valor: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9885">Value Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9886">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9886">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9887">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9887">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebAppInstallForceList = [
  {
    "create_desktop_shortcut": true, 
    "default_launch_container": "window", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/maps"
  }, 
  {
    "default_launch_container": "tab", 
    "url": "https://app.contoso.edu"
  }
]
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9888">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9888">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9889">Nombre clave de la preferencia: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9889">Preference Key Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9890">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9890">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebAppInstallForceList</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>create_desktop_shortcut</key>
    <true/>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>window</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/maps</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>tab</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://app.contoso.edu</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9891">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9891">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9892">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9892">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9893">Nombre de GP: volver a habilitar la API de componentes web v0 hasta M84.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9893">Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>
                       
        
  
  
  ><span data-ttu-id="31858-9894">OBSOLETA: Esta directiva está obsoleta y no funciona después de Microsoft Edge 84.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9894">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9895">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9895">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9896">En Windows y MacOS desde el 80 hasta el 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9896">On Windows and macOS since 80, until 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9897">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9897">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9898">Esta Directiva no funciona porque esta directiva permitió que estas características se habiliten de forma selectiva hasta la versión 85 de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9898">This policy doesn't work because this policy allowed these features to be selectively re-enabled until Microsoft Edge version 85.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9899">Las API de los componentes Web v0 (Shadow DOM v0, elementos personalizados v0, e importaciones de HTML) fueron deshabilitas en 2018, y han sido deshabilitas de forma predeterminada empezando por M80.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9899">The Web Components v0 APIs (Shadow DOM v0, Custom Elements v0, and HTML Imports) were deprecated in 2018, and have been disabled by default starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9900">Si configura esta directiva como verdadera, se habilitarán las características de Web Components V0 para todos los sitios.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9900">If you set this policy is set to True, the Web Components v0 features will be enabled for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9901">Si establece esta directiva como falsa o no la establece, las características de los componentes Web v0 se deshabilitarán de forma predeterminada, comenzando por M80.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9901">If you set this policy to False or don't set this policy, the Web Components v0 features will be disabled by default, starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9902">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9902">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9903">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9903">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9904">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9904">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9905">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9905">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9906">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9906">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9907">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9907">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9908">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9908">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9909">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9909">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9910">Nombre único de GP: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9910">GP unique name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9911">Nombre GP: vuelva a habilitar los componentes Web API V0 hasta M84 (obsoleto)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9911">GP name: Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9912">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9912">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9913">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9913">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9914">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9914">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9915">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9915">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9916">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9916">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9917">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9917">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9918">Nombre del valor: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9918">Value Name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9919">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9919">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9920">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9920">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9921">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9921">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9922">Nombre clave de la preferencia: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9922">Preference Key Name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9923">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9923">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9925">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9925">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9926">Permitir que el controlador de WebDrive reemplace las directivas que no sean compatibles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9926">Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (obsolete)</span></span>
                       
        
  
  
  ><span data-ttu-id="31858-9927">OBSOLETA: Esta directiva está obsoleta y no funciona después de Microsoft Edge 84.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9927">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9928">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9928">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9929">En Windows y MacOS desde el 77 hasta el 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9929">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9930">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9930">Description</span></span>
  
  
<span data-ttu-id="31858-9931">Esta Directiva no funciona porque Webdriver ya es compatible con todas las directivas existentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9931">This policy doesn't work because WebDriver is now compatible with all existing policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9932">Esta directiva permite que los usuarios de la función WebDriver anulen las directivas que puedan interferir con su operación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9932">This policy allows users of the WebDriver feature to override policies which can interfere with its operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9933">En este momento, esta directiva deshabilita las directivas de [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) e [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9933">Currently this policy disables [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) and [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9934">Si la directiva está habilitada, WebDriver podrá anular las directivas de incompatibilidad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9934">If the policy is enabled, WebDriver will be able to override incomaptible policies.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="31858-9935">Si la directiva está deshabilitada o no está configurada, WebDriver no podrá anular las directivas que no sean compatibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9935">If the policy is disabled or not configured, WebDriver will not be allowed to override incompatible policies.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9936">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9936">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9937">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9937">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9938">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9938">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9939">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9939">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9940">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9940">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9941">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9941">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9942">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9942">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9943">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9943">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9944">Nombre único de GP: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9944">GP unique name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9945">Nombre de GP: permitir que WebDriver reemplace las que no sean compatibles (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9945">GP name: Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9946">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9946">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9947">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9947">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9948">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9948">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9949">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9949">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9950">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9950">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9951">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9951">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9952">Nombre del valor: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9952">Value Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9953">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9953">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9954">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9954">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9955">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9955">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9956">Nombre de clave de la preferencia: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9956">Preference Key Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9957">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9957">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9958">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9958">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9959">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9959">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9960">Administrar la exposición de la dirección IP local por WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9960">Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9961">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9961">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9962">En Windows y MacOS desde 80 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9962">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9963">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9963">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9964">Especifica una lista de orígenes (direcciones URL) o patrones de nombre de host (como "*contoso.com*") para que la dirección IP local pueda ser mostrada por WebRTC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9964">Specifies a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns (like "*contoso.com*") for which local IP address should be exposed by WebRTC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9965">Si habilita esta directiva y establece una lista de orígenes (direcciones URL) o patrones de nombre de host, al habilitar edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-Hide-local-IPS-con-mDNS, WebRTC mostrará la dirección IP local a los casos que coincidan con los patrones en la lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9965">If you enable this policy and set a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns, when edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will expose the local IP address for cases that match patterns in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9966">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, y edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-Hide-local-IPS-con-mDNS está habilitado, WebRTC no mostrará las direcciones IP locales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9966">If you disable or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will not expose local IP addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-9967">La dirección IP local está oculta con un nombre de host mDNS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9967">The local IP address is concealed with an mDNS hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9968">Si deshabilita o no configura esta directiva, y edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns está habilitado, WebRTC no mostrará las direcciones IP locales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9968">If you enable, disable, or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Disabled, WebRTC will expose local IP addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9969">Tenga en cuenta que esta directiva reduce la protección de las direcciones IP locales que los administradores podrían necesitar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9969">Please note that this policy weakens the protection of local IP addresses that might be needed by administrators.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9970">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9970">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9971">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9971">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9972">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9972">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9973">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9973">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9974">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9974">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9975">Lista de cadenas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9975">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9976">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9976">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9977">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9977">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9978">Nombre único de GP: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9978">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9979">Nombre de GP: administrar la exposición de la dirección IP local por WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9979">GP name: Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9980">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9980">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9981">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9981">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9982">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9982">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9983">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9983">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9984">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9984">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9985">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9985">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9986">Nombre del valor: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9986">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9987">Tipo de valor: lista de REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9987">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9988">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9988">Example value:</span></span>
```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\1 = https://www.contoso.com
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\2 = *contoso.com*

```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9989">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9989">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9990">Nombre clave de la preferencia: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9990">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9991">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9991">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>*contoso.com*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-9992">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9992">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9993">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9993">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9994">Restringir la exposición de la dirección IP local por WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9994">Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9995">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9995">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-9996">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9996">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-9997">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9997">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-9998">Le permite establecer si WebRTC mostrará o no la dirección IP local del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9998">Allows you to set whether or not WebRTC exposes the user's local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-9999">Si establece esta directiva en "AllowAllInterfaces" o "AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces", WebRTC mostrará la dirección IP local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-9999">If you set this policy to "AllowAllInterfaces" or "AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces", WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-10000">Si establece esta directiva en "AllowPublicInterfaceOnly" o "DisableNonProxiedUdp", WebRTC no mostrará la dirección IP local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10000">If you set this policy to "AllowPublicInterfaceOnly" or "DisableNonProxiedUdp", WebRTC doesn't expose the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-10001">Si deshabilita o no define esta directiva, WebRTC mostrará la dirección IP local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10001">If you don't set this policy, or if you disable it, WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-10002">Asignación de opciones de directiva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10002">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-10003">AllowAllInterfaces (valor predeterminado) = permitir todas las interfaces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10003">AllowAllInterfaces (default) = Allow all interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-10004">Esto muestra la dirección IP local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10004">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-10005">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = permitir las interfaces pública y privada a través de la ruta http predeterminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10005">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = Allow public and private interfaces over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-10006">Esto muestra la dirección IP local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10006">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-10007">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = permitir la interfaz pública a través de la ruta predeterminada http.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10007">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = Allow public interface over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-10008">Esto no muestra la dirección IP local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10008">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="31858-10009">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = usar TCP excepto si el servidor proxy es compatible con UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10009">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = Use TCP unless proxy server supports UDP.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-10010">Esto no muestra la dirección IP local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10010">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-10011">Use la información anterior al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10011">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10012">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10012">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10013">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10013">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10014">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10014">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10015">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10015">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10016">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10016">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10017">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10017">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10018">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10018">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10019">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10019">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10020">Nombre único de GP: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10020">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10021">Nombre de GP: restringir la exposición de la dirección IP local de la WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10021">GP name: Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10022">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10022">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10023">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10023">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10024">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10024">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10025">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10025">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10026">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10026">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10027">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10027">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10028">Nombre del valor: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10028">Value Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10029">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10029">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10030">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10030">Example value:</span></span>
```
default
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10031">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10031">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10032">Nombre clave de la preferencia: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10032">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10033">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10033">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>default</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-10034">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10034">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10035">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10035">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10036">Restringir el rango de puertos UDP locales usados por WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10036">Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>
  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10037">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10037">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10038">En Windows y MacOS desde 77 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10038">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10039">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10039">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-10040">Restringe el intervalo de puertos UDP usado por WebRTC a un intervalo de puertos específico (incluyendo los puntos de conexión).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10040">Restricts the UDP port range used by WebRTC to a specified port interval (endpoints included).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-10041">Debe especificar el intervalo de puertos UDP locales que WebRTC puede usar al configurar esta directiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10041">By configuring this policy, you specify the range of local UDP ports that WebRTC can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-10042">Si no configura esta directiva, o si la establece con una cadena vacía o un intervalo de puertos no válido, WebRTC podrá usar cualquier puerto UDP local disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10042">If you don't configure this policy, or if you set it to an empty string or invalid port range, WebRTC can use any available local UDP port.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10043">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10043">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10044">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10044">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10045">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10045">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10046">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10046">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10047">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10047">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10048">Cadena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10048">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10049">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10049">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10050">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10050">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10051">Nombre único de GP: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10051">GP unique name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10052">Nombre de GP: restringir el rango de puertos locales UDP usados por WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10052">GP name: Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10053">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10053">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10054">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10054">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10055">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10055">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10056">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10056">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10057">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10057">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10058">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10058">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10059">Nombre del valor: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10059">Value Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10060">Tipo de valor: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10060">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10061">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10061">Example value:</span></span>
```
10000-11999
```


  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10062">Información y configuración de Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10062">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10063">Nombre clave de preferencia: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10063">Preference Key Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10064">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10064">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>10000-11999</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="31858-10065">Volver al principio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10065">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10066">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10066">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10067">Usar la resolución del proxy de Windows (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10067">Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>
  ><span data-ttu-id="31858-10068">En desuso: esta directiva está en desuso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10068">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-10069">Actualmente se admite pero quedará obsoleto en una versión futura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10069">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10070">Versiones compatibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10070">Supported versions:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10071">En Windows desde la versión 84 o posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10071">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10072">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10072">Description</span></span>
  <span data-ttu-id="31858-10073">Esta directiva está en desuso, ya que se reemplazará por una característica similar en una versión futura, consulte https://crbug.com/1032820.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10073">This policy is deprecated becuase it will be superseded by a similar feature in a future release, see https://crbug.com/1032820.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-10074">No funciona en la versión 87 de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10074">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 87.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-10075">Use Windows para resolver los servidores proxy de todas las redes de exploradores en lugar de la resolución de proxy integrada en Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10075">Use Windows to resolve proxies for all browser networking instead of the proxy resolver built into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-10076">El solucionador de proxy de Windows admite características de proxy de Windows como DirectAccess/NRPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10076">The Windows proxy resolver enables Windows proxy features such as DirectAccess/NRPT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-10077">Esta Directiva se proporciona con los problemas descritos por https://crbug.com/644030.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10077">This policy comes with the problems described by https://crbug.com/644030.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-10078">Hace que el código de Windows recupere y ejecute archivos PAC, incluidos los archivos PAC configurados a través de la Directiva [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10078">It causes PAC files to be fetched and executed by Windows code, including PAC files set via the [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="31858-10079">Como las búsquedas en red para el archivo PAC ocurren por Windows en lugar de con el código de Microsoft Edge, las directivas de red como [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) no se aplicarán a las búsquedas en red de un archivo PAC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10079">Since Network Fetches for the PAC file happen via Windows instead of Microsoft Edge code, network policies such as [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) will not apply to network fetches for a PAC file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-10080">Si habilita esta Directiva, se usará la resolución del proxy de Windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10080">If you enable this policy, the Windows proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="31858-10081">Si deshabilita o no configura esta Directiva, se usará la resolución de proxy de Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10081">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the Microsoft Edge proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10082">Características admitidas:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10082">Supported features:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10083">Puede ser obligatorio: sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10083">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10084">Puede ser recomendable: no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10084">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10085">Actualización de directiva dinámica: no es necesario reiniciar el explorador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10085">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10086">Tipo de datos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10086">Data Type:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10087">Booleano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10087">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10088">Información y configuración de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10088">Windows information and settings</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10089">Información de directiva de grupo (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10089">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10090">Nombre único de GP: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10090">GP unique name: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10091">Nombre GP: usar la resolución del proxy de Windows (en desuso)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10091">GP name: Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10092">Ruta de acceso de GP (obligatoria): Plantillas administrativas/ Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10092">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10093">Ruta de acceso de GP (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10093">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10094">Nombre de archivo de ADMX GP: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10094">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10095">Configuración del Registro de Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10095">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10096">Ruta de acceso (obligatoria): SOFTWARE\Directivas\Microsoft\Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10096">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10097">Ruta de acceso (recomendado): N/D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10097">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10098">Nombre del valor: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10098">Value Name: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="31858-10099">Tipo de valor: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10099">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
  ##### <span data-ttu-id="31858-10100">Valor de ejemplo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="31858-10100">Example value:</span></span>
```
0x00000001
```
